item.text: glu klu klu// rgya gar skad du Ar+ya la li ta ba sa na ma
ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skadadu/'phags pa rgya cher rolong zhes
bya sgrag pa tshon po'i mdo/bam po dang po// sangs rgyas
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
skad bdag gis shes pa dus gtsugan/ bcon ldan 'drasamanyan yod na/ rgyal burgyalanyakyi
byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong khri nyis stong gi dag slong gi
dge 'dun chen po la/ 'di lta sta/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u de skye dang/ tshe dang ldan pa
rta bul dang/ tshe dang ldan nga rlangs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang/ tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang/ tshodang ldan pa grags sbyin dang/ tshe
dang ldan pa dri ma med dang// tshe dang ldan pa lag ba zangs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ba lang ba dag dang/ tshodang ldan pa
steng rgyas 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan ba ga ya 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kA ri'i bu dang/ tshe
dang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshodang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshodang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen bo dang/ tshodang ldan pa ka li
kachen bo dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang/ tshe dang ldan ba sku la byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang bo dang/ tshodang ldan pa ma
thu@#// 'gags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan ba dga' byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'ug ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan ba
nam gru dang/ tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa don yodargyal po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu 'gro ba chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa
ba ku la dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bodang/ tshe dang ldan ba sgra gcan zin dang/ tshe dang ldan ba legs 'ongs dang/ tshe dang ldan ba kun dga' bo dang/ de
dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang/ spyi ba gcig
gis thogs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin ba thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad
kyis rnam par rtsa ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thams cad thob ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sem
[。 ]dpa' smon lam thams cad shin tuyo su rdzogs pa/byang chub sems dpa'i sa na yang dag par rig pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud nga/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang
thob pa// byang chub sems dpa'i debang thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa sha stag ste/
'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pogazungs kyi dbang phyugargyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po sang ga'i tog dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dang la chen po don grub blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chan po so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par sbyor dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
sI rdzacharasams dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khor bzhi dang//
rgyal po dang rgyal po'i sras dang/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang/ chab 'og gi rgyal phran dang/ rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang/ rgyalarigs dang/ bran ze dang/ tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag
deng / blon po dang/ 'khor gyi mdang/ grong khyer ba dang/ yul gyi mo dang/ mu stegs can dang/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ dpyod pa ba dang/ kun/
tu rgyu snyatshogs kyis ram gror byas/ blamar byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod pa byas so// bcom ldan 'dAsan bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ myang ba bsod cing mang ba dang/
na bza' dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims chadang/ snyan gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad rung ba ngarosashing/ bcom ldan 'das ni b.ros pa dam pa dang/ grags pa dam pa
brnyes kyang/ bad+ma la chusam gos pa ltar/ than sa rud du mchogs ma gos par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang/ sgra dang/ snyan pa ni 'di skad du/ bcom ldan
'dasade na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i
kha la sbyakha/ blanamed ba/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to// den spyan lnga dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig
rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol lha dang bcas pa// bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dag sbyong dang/ bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu lhad mare bcas ba dag rang gis mngon par
mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad nas/ nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to// de thog mar dag ba/ bar du dge ba/ thamar dge ba/ don bzang de/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs/
su rdzogs kha/yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba'achos ston/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gyi gung can l/ sas rgyas kyi rgyan
bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thagatu/
skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gsang nas/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung/
des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ lha'i budabang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i butshadamadapa dag yang dag par bskul to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer
gyi tshogs de las bskul khatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo// ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzod// 'od bazogazi brjid dam ba dri med pa ga/ sa lus rab zhathugs dag zhi/
ba bo// shAkya sing ga thub dang phrad par gyis// ye shes mtshomathuchen dag ngas// chos kyi mnga' bdag kun mkhyen thub pa'i dbang// ma dpalhasamatshod lha yalhagyur pa// chos
lar ba byungamanga' dbang mdzod la rten// gang zhig gdul dka' soms la mnga' mdzad de// ga bzhi g bdud kyisAng las gro'akha 'khrugs// de 'di mthong thos don med/
lo ma yin gyis// rnam gro'a mthar phyin zhi ba'i drung du rung// mtshungs medachos la snang bar gyur pa ste// mun salatshul bzangaston par rab mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyodazhamkhyen pa dpagamedang//
da la dung du dad pa mchog gis don// de nasman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong// de nasmra ba dpa' botshogs ngan 'dzoms// de chos kyi rtsa lag don dmamakhas// de 'dren pa bla med lam ston
pa'o// gnas gtsang ma'i res kyi lha'i bu de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer des phog cing/ tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag
gis kyang bskul ma thagatu rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyis mthus bskal pa grangasamad tshad[︽]dbagrang ba las shin tu 'dus pa dag las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams rjes su dran zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sangs rgyus kyi zhing gi yon tan bkodapa gang yin pa dag dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yAn pa dag dang/ chos bstan

pa gangayane pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran par gyur to// de nas de'i nub mo ma nyal tsam na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ dga' bo dang
shan tu dga' bo dang/ tsan dan dang/ mchod byas dang/ rab tu zha ba dang/ dul ba'i dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i res kyi lha'abu gzhan shan tu mang po ba dog 'phags/
shing shin tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa dag gis/ lha'i snang bas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'akhod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ bcom ldan 'dasargya cher rol pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po bsdus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bstan// dga'
ldan gyi pho brang dam panas 'bab pa dang/ ched du dgongs te lhums su 'jug pa'i rnam par rol pa dang/ malagyi gnas kyi khyad par kun tu bstan pa/ rigs bzang por skyes pa 'asa'i thugs
kun tu bstan nga/ byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las yon tan gyi khyad par gyis shan tu 'da'abar bstan pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gis dang/ lasakyi gnas dang/ yi ga dang/ grangs
dang/ lag rtsis dang/ rtsis dang/ ral gri'i thabs dang/ 'phong dang/ stobs dang/ rgyad gyi 'dzin stangs rnams sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa kun tu bstan pa// btsun mo'i
'khor dang/ yul gyi longs srod dang/ yongs su spyod pa kun tu bstan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pas lo ngas su grub pa'i 'bras bu brnyes/
ko ba yongs su brjod pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rol pa dang/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam pa 'jigs pa bstanang de bzhan gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ ma'igs ba bsdus/
ba/ sangs rgyas kyis tshad ma mchis pa nges par bstan pa/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon chad gsungs pa mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i bla ma dang/ chos
pas+sa kyi tog dang/ mngam mdzad dang/ yon tan gyi tog dang/ yon tan 'byung gnas dang/ 'od zer chen po dang/ drang srong lha dang/ dpal gyi gzi brjid dang/ bden pa'i rtog dang/ rdo tshemakhrag
dang thams cad zil gyisaganon dang/ gser mdog dang/ shin tu 'thor gshegs dAng/ bya ru'i rgya mtsho dang/ me tog gi tog dang/ gzugs bzang dang/ sbyan bzang dang/ drang srong sbed/
dang/ dmag tshogs las rgyal dang/ mtho ba dang/ ma tog rgyas pa dang/ mdzod spyi gzi brjid dang/ shin tu rgyas dang/ 'od zebazang po dang/ bkra shis ldan dang/ bstan bzang dad//
sang ga'i gzi brjid chen bo dang/ blo gros brtan bas byin dang/ sos ka'i spyis dri dang/ bden pa'i phyogs gragu pa rgyatshan dang/ 'od ldan dang/ skar rgyal dang/ 'jig rten mdzes dang/
'od rgya chen dang/ rin chen grags dang/ grags shul gzi brjid dang/ rin po cha'i gzi brjid dang/ tshongs pa'i gzi brjid dang/ sgra snyan dang/ me tog bzang po dang/ ribam tog dang/
rab tu yad 'ong dbyangs dang/ dge ba tshul bzangs dang/ rab tu 'dzum pa'i spyan dang/ yon tan phungapo dang/ 'brug sgradang/ kha dog mdzes dang/ tsho'i gzi brjid dang/ ngom bag glang po'i
'gros dang/ 'jig rtena mngon par smon dang/ dgra las rgyal dang/ yang dgo mchod dang/ rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ 'khor ba 'jig dang/
gsar thub dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang sngon chad gsungs pa la gsan/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po lasman pa

dang/ skya bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ skya bo phal po che dang/ lha dang ma rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba dang/ sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang/ thog pa chen po 'di la
brjod pa dang/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang/ bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan pa dang/ phyang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
gang zag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa bskyed pa dang/ dam pa'i tshes yongs su gzung ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdungs decad pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi mdzad ba yongs su
rdzogs pa yod kun tu bstan pa'i slad du/ dbastan du gsol zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha 'bu de dag dang/ lha dang bcas nga'i 'jig rten la thugs
brtse ba'i phyiracangam gsung bas gnang ngo// de nas lha'i bu de dag kyang bcom ldan 'dasakyicang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ tsham zhing mgu la yi ras shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang/
yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tsan dan gyi phyam dang/ a ga ru'i phyi ma dang/ me tog
man+da ra ba dag gis kyang mngon par gtor ta/ de nyidadum snangabar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nub mo de'anemanangs pa dang/ smigama'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der ga shegs te/
khyonanas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs
nas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag mdang 'dir nga'i drung du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang
dga' bo dang/ shin tu dga' bo dang/ tsan dan dang/ mchod byas dang/ rab zhi dang/ dul bar ba zhi dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'abu gzhin shin tu
mang po zhes bya ba nas/ de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to zhwa bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a de dag dad/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga/
la ba de gsasu thalamo sbyar ba btud to/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bstan du gsol/ de ni spyi bo mang bo
la sman pa dang/ skya bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba mdzad pa dang/ skye bo phal po tshe dang/ lha dang mi rnams dang/ daltar dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
sams dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ nyan thos chan
bo de dag dang/ lha dang ma dang/ lham yan dang bcas pa'i 'ajig rten la thug brtse ba'i phyir/ cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo// del 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge slong dag gongani
mdang gsum 'di'i//gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur cing// nyon mongs med par rab tu gnas gyur la// rtse gcig sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du// rdzu 'phrul chazhing kha dog
bzang ldan la// drind dpal 'bar lhaya bu lhags nas// dpal gyis rgyal byed tshal 'di snang byas te// dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon par lcags// dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po tsan dan
dang/ dga' bo rab tu sams zhamachod byas dang// shin tu dga' bzhib lha yi bu// bye balhamang de dang de dag rnams// nga ya zhabs la phyag 'tshal bskor byas te//
nga yi mdun du 'dar ni'akhod par gyur// de dag soramo thal sbyar gus bcas par// de dag 'dir ning la gsol ba btab// 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i don slad du// rgyal ba kun gyis ston
cad gang gsungs pa// shin tu rgyus mdogling gzhachen po 'ad// thub pa 'dod chags bsal bas de ring yang// byang chub sems dpa' tshog sakun gzunga bzhi dangs// phas kyi rgol dang
bdud rnams 'dul mdzad pa// theg pa chen po mchog 'di reb gsung zhing// thub pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol// lha'atshog sakyis gsol ba de gnad phyir// mi gsung gyur pas
gnang ba mdzad pas na// thams cad tshimazhang rab dga' mgu gyur nas// dga' ba thob pas me tog salam gtor// de phyir dag slong dag gis rgyas pa'i mdo/ 'jig rten kun l phanapa'i
don gyi phyir// de bzhin gshags ba kun gyis sngon bshad pa// glangagazhi chen po khyad kun 'di'i nyon cig/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pogo// dag slong dag de la chos kyi
rnam gras shanitu rgyas pachanapo'amado// rgyachar rol pa zhes bya ba de gangazhin/ dge slong dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchogan gnas pa/ mchod par bya bas mchod//
pa dbang bskur ba thob pa// lha brgya stong gas bstod cing bkur te/ brjod cing bsngags pa// bsam pa thob pa/ smon lam gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad/
gang dag par thob pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig shani tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan nga/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ khrol yod pa dang/ dga' ba 'bar ba'i/
blo rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs la mkhas pa chen po' din pa'i pha rol tu
sonab/ tshongs pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang/ sIng rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pa dang/ rig pa chen pos sgrib ba med/
cing chags pa med pa'i ye shesa mthong ba mngon du gyur pa// dran pa nye bar gzhug pa dang/ yang dag par song ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi
yan lag dang/ lam dang/ byang nub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos
lus legs par brgyan pa/ yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pas/ log bamed pa'i tshig gi lam yang dag par sbyakha/ drang zhang ma lo la rgyagyumed pab yode
thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ zhum pa thams cad med pa/ sems can thams cad la sems manyam pa//

sas rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tumed pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang bos ngor lta zhing lta ba' yadi dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang// tshangs
pa dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dad/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ srin po rnams kyi mngon par dga'
bar bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste bstan pa la thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa lamakhas pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsus
ba bzung ba la dran pa'i snod 'khrugs pa med pa dang/ gzungs mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu thob pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhagapa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang
bo dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa'i tshos ngan ngon dang/ bsod nams kyis lang dag par bsgrubs pa'i tshosakyi
gru chen po 'i ded dpon chen po chu bo bzhi'i parol du 'gro ba'i bsam pa can/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad b/ g.yul po'i gam larob tu 'dug pa/
nyon mos pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'joms pa// ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon sra ba dang ldan pa// byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po 'chub lhug pa'i bsam pas skyes pa/ zab cing
gnal/ brtson 'grus kyi chos kyanus mngon par brlan pa/ thabs mkhas nga 'a snying po dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ bsam gtan gyiwa bcan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi za 'bru dang ldan ba/
yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'amatsho las skyes pa// nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i gdung ba mo da pa' zla bas dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma rgyas pa/ tshul khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ bag yod pa'i bsung gi
ngad phyogs bcur thogs pa med par ldang ba/ 'jig rtenan shos pasathu bor gyur pa// 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa// skyes bu chen po 'did+ma/ bsod nams dang/ ye shesakyi tshogs

kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba/ shes rab dang/ ya shes kyi nyi ma'a'od zer gyis mi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rgyas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang/
ldan b/ 'phagos pa'i bden ba bzhi'i sdor mo dang mche ba shin tu rnob/ tshongs pa'i gnas bzhi'i sa drang bser ba/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhes shin tu bsdus pa'i mago dang ldan pa// rten cing 'brel da ra
'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis khong duchud pas rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pas ral pa can du byas sha'i rig
da dang ye shes kyi ze ba can/ rnam par thar pa ba sgo gsum gyi kha gdangs pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mig dang ldan ba/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam/
par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi phug na gnas pa/ spyod lam bzhi dang/ dul ba'i nags tshal dang/ nags 'dab nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stos/
bcu dang/ ma 'jigs pa bzhidang/ 'ba'i skyobs dang ldan ba/ skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ smyu g.yo ba med pa// rtsal la zhum pa med pa/ mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang/ ri dgas
mang po 'tshogs rab tu 'jomasar bdag med par sgra brjod pa'i sang ge'i nga re chen po sgrog pa/ skyes bu song gu rnam par grol ba dang/ bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab kyi 'od dang/
'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi lang tog dang/ rab rib med par byed pa stobs dang brtson 'grus 'barab/ lha dang ma'i
nangadu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa// spyas bu chen po ba nyim/ nag po'i phyogs med pa dkar po'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs pa// blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong pas mag gi
! dbang po la thogs pa mad pa/ lha brgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyaseshan tu brgyan pa// bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can/ byang chub kyi yan lag go bde bas

0 zla ba'i 'od zer du gyurang/ mdang lhamakhas pa'i mi rtog ku mu da kha 'byed ba/ skyes bu chen po zla ba 'khor gyi gling bzhi'i sod ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa// sems can/
thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba/ blo dpyad thogs pa med pa// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang/ brtul zhugs shin tu phun sumatshogs shangarab tu rdzogs pas khyad par du
bogs dbyung bar bya ba'i bsam pa can/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigs kyi brgyud du byung ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo
sgyur ba chen po/ rten cing 'brel par 'a byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ chos rin po che thams cad kyi rab tu gang ba/ thos pas mi ngoms pas yangs shing rgya che la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes
dang tshul khrims kyi tshod las ma 'da' ba/ blo rgya mtshodangs ltar rgya chab ' mchog tu gyur nga/ sa dang/ chu dang/ me dang/ rlung dang/ mnyan da 'a sams su gyur ba/ra ba ltar brtan zhing g.yo/

la bskyod par nus pa'i yid dang ldan ng/ rjes su chags pa dang/ khobakhro ba med pa// nam mkha' dkyil ltar dram mdatsang ya ngas la 'dra ba med par rgya cheba'i blo dang ldan b/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin
tu yongs su dag pa// sbyin pa legs par sbyin pa/ sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa/ lhag pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa/ bden pa'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan nga/ dge ba'achi ba thams cad yongs
sku bcol te/ gos bar bya ba bsgos pa// dgaba'aphyi banges par byas pa// bskal pa grangs med ba bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrabs pa/ sbyin pa rnams
bdun tsanib/ bsod nams bya ba 'dengos po lnga shani tu bstan pa/ legs par spyad pa lus kyi rnam gsum/ ngag gi rnam bzhi/ yid kyi rnam gsum spyad par gyur pa// dge ba bcu'alas kyi'am bstan
ba dang ldan ng/ yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa brten par gyurong/ yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i smon lam btab ba/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi
bcu dang ldan nga la zhugs pa// yang dag pa'i rnam par thar pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par byas ba/ yang dag pa'i nyis pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan ba dang por byas pa/ sas

rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba/ sas rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga la sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa// rang sangs rgyas bya ba brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi la lhag

bar bya ba byas pa/ sems can tshad med grasamad nga dgamatho ris dang thar pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa/ blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'dod pa tshe
gcig gis glegs ba/ 'di nas sha'a'osanas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa gnas pa/ lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba/ lha'itshigs rnams kyis 'di no 'dinAsha 'phos nas ma'i 'jig rten du
skyes te/ ring po ma thogs par blun mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur ro zhes der shan tu mchod ba/ gzhal med khang ba gnas sum khri nyis stong la
rab tu gnas pa/ stegs bu dang/ bgam dang/ rta babs dang/ skur khung dang/ bsal khang dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ khyams kyis legs par brgyan// gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan/

dang/ ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yaraka'i dra ba'i bla res bres pa// ma tog mnar ba dang/ mnar bachen po dag chal par bkram pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa//
me tog a ti mug ta ka dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ skya snar dang/ sa brtol dang/ btang bzung dang/ btang zung chen po dang/ mya ngan mtshang dang/ nAgro dadang/ tin tu kadang/ as na dang/ dong ka'i/
ma tog dang/ shing kes ra dang/ tam la dang/ sa la dang/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen pos brgyan// gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa// gzhimanyamazhing bkod pas mdzes bar byas pa/ me tog/
snang 'od dang/ mal ka dang/ sna ma'am tog dang/ bar shakAdang/ ta ra ni dang/ ba la deng/ ko ta ra ni dang/ mchog tu dri zhim dang/ danus ka ri dang/ lha'i sna ma'am tog dang/ ut+paladang/

pad+ma dang/ ku mud dang/ pad+ma dkar bo dang/ drareb tu zhim pa'i bla re chen po phyogs phyogs su bres pa/ bya 'dabasngon dang/ ne tsodang/ raskogs dang/ khu byug dang/ ngang pa dang/ rma bya dang/ dur pa
dang 1 kun la dang/ kal bte dang/ shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya snatshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin ra/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stongagis mig mngon du phyogs te lta zhing ltadamo bya ba//
ba chos rgya chab chen po yang dag par brjod pas/ 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyis nyon mos pa thams cad gcod pa// ngargyal dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ dregs pa dang/ khro ba dang/ tha ba dang/khong khro ba
med par gyur ba/ dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dran brgyam zhing gsal ba skye ba'i gzhal med khang chen po don bde bar gnas shing/ chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam byung ba dang/ sol
snyan dang/ glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong pa'i sgra de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dag kha'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo//

bsonanams rgya chen tshogs ma 'a dran rtogs dang// blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa// mtshungs mad stobs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba// mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs pa mdzod// rgya chen

dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dri ma gsum spangs rgyugs dang skyon zhi ba// dag ba dri mad rnam par dag pa'i thugs// sngonatsho dzeldir sbyin spyad dagongs par mdzod// zhi gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs
bzod pa dang// dul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtana shes rab stobs// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrige rnam spyad b// spyod rigs cher byung dgongs mdzod dgos par mdzod// sems can rnams la thugs brtse
mdzad rgyu cing// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrug khyod kyis mchod// dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cig grags mtha' yas// de dus 'gas kyis btang snyom sa ma mdzad cig// rgasha nyon mongs 'jig/

mdzod jul khralag/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri ba dang// lha mnadabang po dag kyang sdod lags kyis// 'chi 'pho'i tshulamkhyen 'ago ba bstan par mdzod// bskal pa stong du dka' ba spyad gyur kyang// rgyu
mtsho'ichu yos bzhinam rims kyis// ngoms pa khyod kyi thugs dam dag blta// yun ris skom nyen spyi bo tshim par mdzod// smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba khyod// chos la dgyud par khyod dgyes 'dod
mdegyas// 'on kyang drim med pa'ispyanamanga' ba// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la thugs brtsamadzod// lha rnams bye ba khyod la chos thos pas// ngoms par 'gyur ba ma lags lon gyis kyang// dal dang mi
ldan gyur pa'i ngan song du// gnas par gyur pa dag la gzigs sugasol// drim mod pa'i spyan mnga' phyogs bcu ya// 'jig rten dag gsas rgyas gzigs gyur cing// dedag rnams lasachos gasan
chos mchog de// 'jig rten dag la rnam par dbye ba mdzod// dpal ldan khyodakyi bsod nams dpalagyisan// dga' ldan pho brang shin tu mdzes modakyi// 'on kyang thugs rje thugs dang ldan pas na//
'dzam khu 'argyal mtshon du nacherang shog/ brtul zhugs thub pa byang chub regaces te// 'dod pa'i khams las rab tu 'das pa gi gzugs kyi khams nalha rnams gaba 'khod pa// dumawams cad mngon par
rab tu dga'// mgon po khyod kyis bdud kyis las rnams bcom// khyod gzhan mustags can rnams phama mdzad de// khyod nibyinub phyag mthil bzhag dang 'dra// de'i dus lags kyi

btang snyoms ma mdzod cig/ nyonamos rab tu 'bar ba'ajig rten la// dpa' bo khyod kyis sprin ltar khya ba medzod de// bdud rtsi 'char pa mngon par rab tu phob// lha mi rnams kyi skyonamongs zhi bar mdzod//

khyo nasman pa khams la mkhas pa ste// yun ring nad pa smanangs bor ba yi// sems can rnam tharagasum gyi sbyar sman gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la myur du 'khod// seng ge 'i nga ro thos bar ma gyur pas//
wa rnams 'jigs pa med par sgra sgrog gis// sangs rgyas song ga'i sgra nareb sgrogs te// mu stegs can gzhan wa rnams skrag par mdzod// sa yi dkyilan stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi// stobs ldan
khugan shes rab sgronam bsnams// phyag ma thal dam pas sa la brdaba medzod de// 'di rnams khyod kyis rab tu pham par mdzod// gang dag khyod la lhung ba zad 'bul ba yi// 'jig rten skyongab bzhi po
sdod cing mchis// khyod bltams gang dag lenapar 'gyur pa la// brgya byan tshangs pa khrag khrig sdodacing mchis// blo gros bzang po rigasachen rigs ldan pa// gal gnas nias byang chub sems dpa' yi//

spyod ba ston 'gyur dam ba'irigs skyos bar// rigasakyi nang na btsun pa'i rogs la gzigs// snod gyur gangadunor bu rin potshe// khazhag na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin// nor bu rin chen lta bur dri

med thugs// 'dzam bu'argyal mtshan dunachar pa phob// glu dbyangs sgra las rnam pa 'dalta la/ tshigs su bcad pa mang bo byung gyur nas// 'di ni dus lags btang snyoms ma mdzodaces// snying rje'i yid dang
ldan la bskul bar byed// yang dag par u0f97bar bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis bgo// dag slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dus de ltabus yang dag par bskul ba dang/ gzhal
med khang na bod nas byung// chos kyi mthob zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen po gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug cing dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chog nopa der/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs so//

zhugs nas kyang sang ge'i khritshos bzang po zhes bya ba la 'dug go/ de nas lha'abu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' dang skal bamanyam pa/ thog nga mtshungs pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang khang bzangs de nyid du zhugs/
go/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa// byang chub sems dpa' dang spyod pa 'dra ba dag dang/ lha'i bu de dag kyang/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams bag la cing/ lha'i bu ba la
rnams kyang bsal nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa mthun pa'i 'khor can du byas te/ 'khor bye ba phrag dru gzhurtsa brgyad brgyadadad/ khang bzas der zhugs nas// so so'i rigs par rang rang ga sang ga'i
khro la 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lo bcu gnyis nama'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de'atshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag 'dzam bu'i gling du
lhags nas/ lha' kha dog ma snang bar byas te// bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur nas/ bram ze rnams rigs byed slob du 'dzud de/ gang zhig rnam pa 'di lta bu mngal du zhugs
tho par gyuran/ de na skyis bu chen po'i mtshan sumacu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag dang ldan n rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gsum du 'gyur ba med de/ de gal te khyim na gnas na
na/ 'khor sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal bachos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur te/ de'irin po che sna bdunan 'dalta ste/ 'khor lo rin po
dang/ glang po rinapo dang/ rta rin po tshe dang/ bud med rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ khyim bdag rin po che dang/ blon po ri bo che dang bdun no// 'khor losgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khod
larinapo che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhin/ 'di la rgyal bo rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ gso sbyong g ma tshes bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te/ dbu zungs su gnas shang/ steng
gi khyamasan budamed kyi tshogs kyi kun nas bskor cing 'dug ba'itsi/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong yod nga// mu khyud dang ldan pa// lte ba dang bcas pa/ thams cad gsar
@#las grub pa// mgar bsam byas pa/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsamanas 'byung ste/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de mthong nas/ 'disnyam du sems te/
bdag gis thos pa/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskurab/ gsosbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te/ dbu zungs su gnas shing stong gi khyams na bud med kyis tshogs kyis kun nas

bskor cing 'dug pa'i tsho/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po chu byung bar gyur na/ da ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur rozhes thosan/ bdag gatrid du lha'i 'khor lo ranibo che 'ongs pa las na/
bdag kyang 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin du nges so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bonas dbang bskur ba de bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa ba lcangs la btsugs te/

lag pa g.yu bsalha'i 'khor lo rin pocha de skor zhing 'di skadadu/ btsunang lha'i 'khor la ni po che chos kyi skor cig/ chos ma yin pas nam yin no zhes bya ba'atshig smras pa dang/ de nas lha'i 'khor la
napo ched/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bskor bas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las shar phyogs su legs par bgro// rgyal po 'khor lo sgyur ba mang dbud gatshogs yanalag
bzhi ba dang lhan cig tu rjes su 'gro'o// sa'i phyogs gang du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de gnas par gyur pa der/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de lo dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
dngalhan cig tu gnas bar 'gyu'o/ de nas shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal bo gang lan ba de dag dngul gyi snod ni gser gyis bkang ste thogs/ gser gyi snod ni dngul salen bkang ste thogs nas/ 'khor lo/
sbyar ba'i rgyal bo bsu zhing 'di skad du/ lha 'dir legs par gshegs so// lhatshur gshegs su gsol/ lha'i chab srid/shin tu rgyas shing 'byor la bde ste/ lo legag shad/
nyams dgyes la/ skye bo mang po dang mas gtams pa lags na/ lha nyid kyi yul du byon nas bzhugs su gsol/ de skad ces smras ba dang/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bonas dbang bskur bas khams kyi
rgyal po de dag la 'di skad du khyed rang rang gi rgyal srid dag chos kyis gyis shig/ chos ma yin pas nam yin no// khyed srog chag dag mgasod cig/ mkhyen bar n lan cig/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem
cha par ma byed cig/ brdzun du ma smra zhig/ phram ma zer cig/ ngag rtsub bom snya zhig/ tshig kyal bam smazhig/ brnab sems can dum gyur cig/ gnodas mas can du ma gyur cig/ log par lta bar ma gyur
cig/ srog gcod pa la byams par ma gyur cig/ log par lta ba can gyi bar la sems par ma gyur cig/ pa'i yul du chos ma yin pa byung da re/ chos ma yin par spyod pa la byams pa'i m byed cig ces bsgo/
nas/ rgyal po rgyalagis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ de ltar shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o// shar
phyogs kyi rgyan tshol song nas/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho' sa rgal la// rgal nas kyang lho phyogs su nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis legs par 'gro ste/ 'khor la sbyar ba'i rgyal po yang dpung ga

[n/ ]tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro// snga ma bzhin du lce phyogs su rnam nga ra rgyal bar byed do// lho phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do//

byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshol ba'agro// byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal le// rgalanasakyang nam mkha'alas rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal

po' yi brang du legs par 'ongasanas/ btsunamo'ikhor bya sgo'i steng du nyams pa med nga ra gnas te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bani/ 'khorale rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//

'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa jilta bu dang ldan pa yin zhen/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigegs sbubo nas dbang bskur ba'i glang po rin po chesnga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad thal dkar du
gyurang/ yon lag bdun shin tu gnas nga/ gtsugagaser gyis brgyan pa// gsar gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ gse ra gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa// gsar gyis dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan

pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul da 'chos can te/ 'diltar glang po brgyal de byang chub ces bya'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba glang po rin po cha de brtag par 'dod par

gyur ba de'atsho/ nyin shar kar glang bo rin po che de la zhon te/ sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho mtha' skor dang bcas ba/ rgya mtsho'amur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/khye'u
sus kyi dga' ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor losgyur ba'i rgyal po glang bo rin po che rnan nga dalta bu dang ldan pa yin// 'khor lo sgyur ba'irgyal po rta rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa
yin zhin/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbabaskur ba'i rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad sngon por gyur pa/ na goganag pa/ gam lcang la 'dug pa// zhonan gus par byed pa//

gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang bcas nga/ gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ gsar gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan ng/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/ 'deltar rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi

shugs can zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi banas dbang bskurab/ rta rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'atsho/ nyi ma shar kar rta rin po tsha de la zhonanas/ sa chen po 'ad rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor

dang bcas pa rgya mtsho'amur thug ba dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/ bying rgyal po'i pho brang du 'khor nas/ khye'u sus kyi bde ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgyal po na rta rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin

no/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'argya' po nor bu ni bo che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhen/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'anor bu rin po che snam bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad du spro ba/bi 'i

larang bzhin zur brgyad du 'dug pa// shin tu sbyangs ba 'byung ste/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis btsunamo' 'khor thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/

nor bu rin po che de brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'atsho/ mtshan mo nam gyi gul/ mun pa mun nag gnad du nor bu rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtsa na la brtags to/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sa bzung po blta ba'i phyir//

so ngan/nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang bas gsal bar 'gyur go/ nor bu rin po chade 'i 'khor na gnas
pa 'am de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur pa dang/ gcig gis gcig mthong/ gcig gis gcig shes nas gcig 'di skad du smaste/ bzhin bzangs dag longs las kyi mtha' dag byos shig

tshong dus dag khrom/ nyin shar te nyin mor shes so zhes zer te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nor bu rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan ba yin no// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i/
bud med rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhen/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur babud med rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ tshul dang mthun nga/ rgyal rigs
su skyes pa// ha cang yang mi ring ba/ cang yang ma thung ba/ ha cang yang mi sprim nga/ hacang yang masgom pa// ha cang yang ma dkar ba/ ha cang yang ma gnag pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/
tshul du shes pa/ bltan sdu gang/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri 'byungab/ kha nas ut+pa la 'a ngad ldang ba/ katsa
lana'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ de grang pa'i dus na na lus la regan dra ba/ dra ba'i dus na lus la regan bsal pa ste/ de 'khor la sbyar ba'i rgyal po ma gtogs par gzhan

la yid kyi khya'adod chags sum byed na/ lus kyi lta tsa smyos te/ 'khor la sbyar ba'argyal de na bud med rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khongolo sgyur ba'argyal po khyim bdag ran po
che rnam pa dzalta bu dang ldan pa yin zhen/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i khyim bdag ran po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas pa/ gsalakhaM/ yid gzhungs nga/ lha'i

mag dang ldan pa 'byung ngo// de lha 'amig des dpag tshad khor khor yug tu bdag po dang bcas pa 'gyi ga teradag kyang mthong/ bdag bo med pa'i gtor dag kyang mthong ste/ de bdag po med pa'i gter gyi nom

gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor gyi dgos pa byed de/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pon khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po blon bo

napo tshe rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhen/ 'di la 'khor 'grosgyur ba'i rgyal bo'aben de rinapo che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa'o// de 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgyal

po des bsams pa tsam gyis bskor ba'i bya ba'i dbang rnams bsko'i// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po na blon po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal bo na ren po che sgo bdun de
dag dang ldan pa yin no// de la bu stong 'byung ste/ dpa' brtul bod pa/ mna' gnachog gi gzugs dang ldan pa// pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa shastag ste/ de rgyan tsho' thug pas/
chen po ma lus pa gnod pa sdo bamed cing/ 'tsho ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing/ mtshon gyis brda ba med la/ chos kyi legs par phab ste gnasaso/ gal te khyim nas khyim na da bar rab tu
byun gnas nigs rgyas su 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa// 'dren pa gzhan gyi drod ma 'jog dang/ lhadangama rnams kyi ston par 'gyur ro zhes rig byed 'don du 'dzud do// de bzhin du lca'abu
gzhan dag kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags shing/ rang sangs rgyus dag la bskul ma 'debs te/ 'phags pa dag da lta lo bcu gnyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' yum gyis lhums su 'jug gas/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ber cig ces zer// dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grobakhyer chen pon/ mjug ma sgyur bzhes bya ba'i rol/ rang sangs rgyas glang po zhes bya ba 'dug pas/ sgra
de thosanas rdoba'i stod du 'ab la bya ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyenadu 'phags so// gyen du 'phagasanas kyang/ me'i khams lasnyoms par zhugs te/
sgron ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so// de'i mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang/ chu rgyus dang/ rus pa dang/ sha dang/ khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad nams yongs su zad par
gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' shig sa la lhags nas/ rkang rjes de dag ni da dung yang drang srong gi rjes shes grag ste yodado// dge slong dag 'di tsho yul wAr Nas ri dgas kyi nags
drang srong lhung ban/ rangasas rgyas lnga brgya 'khod pa de dag gis kyang skade thosanas/ nam mkha' la shang ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags nas/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ sgron ma
bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de dag ga mkhris pa dang/ bdakan dang/ chu rgyus dang/ rus pa dang/ sha dang/ khrug tu gyur ba gang yan pa de dag thams cad nams

yo ga su zad par gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba'ashagegs la lhungs so// de ltar 'dir drang srong rnams lhung ngo zhes/ de phyin chad drang srong lhung ba zhes bya ba yang/ drang srong lhung ba/ drang srong lhung ba
zhis mang du chags par gyur to// ma'i ji gas pa byin pa'i ro digs dag kyang de na gnas pas// de phyin chad ri dgas kyi nagasazhes bya ba yang/ ri dgas kyi nags/ ri dgas kyi nags zhes ming du gyur to/
dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dang 'a dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa 'dug pa na/ rnam pa ra lta bachen po bzhala rnam par lta ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dus la rnam par lta ba dang/
gling la rnam par lta ba dang/ yul la rnam par lta ba dang/ rigs la rnam par lta ba'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub soms dpa' dus rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
ni thog ma'i dus sems can 'du ba'atsho/ ma'i mngal du ma 'jug gi/ gang gi tsho 'jig rtenags 'a bar kun nas snang bar gyur te/ skye ba snang bar gyur/ rgyab snang bar gyu/ na pa snang bar gyur/
'chi ba snang bar gyur pa de'atsho/ byang nub sems dpa' ma'i mngal du 'jug go/ dgeslong dgaci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gling rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhen/ byang chub
sems dang 'an mtha' 'khob kyi gling du mi skye/ shar gyi lus 'phags por ma/ nub kyi ba glang spyod du ma/ byang gasgra mi snyan du ma skye/ lho'i 'dzam bu'agling nyid du skye'o// dge slong dag

ci'i phyir byang nub sa mas dpa' yul rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhen/ byang chub sems dang bani mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na mi rnams dbang po rtul zhing blun la lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can//
legs par bstan pa dang/ nyes par bstan pa'i don shes par bya ba'i skal ba med ba dag yod pa dag tumi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa' na yul gyi dbus nyid du skya'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' rigs rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rigs dma' ba gdol pa'i rigs sam/ smage ma mkhan gyi ragis sam/ shing rta mkhan gyi
jigs sam/ g.yung rigasasum skye'i// bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kho na ste/ rigs gnyis su skye'o// de lagang gatsho bram ze'i rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe/ bram
ze'i rigs su skya'o// gang gatsho rgyal rigs btsun par bya ba de 'tsho/ rgyal rigs su skya ste/ dge slong dag da ltar na rgyal rigs btsun par bya bas// de'i phyir byang chub
tho sems dpa' rgyal rigs su skye ste/ dge slong dag don gyi dbang de la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa// rnam par lta nga chen po bzhi la rnam par
lta ste/ de ltar bltasanas cang ma zer bar gyur to// 'phagru pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pachen po'i mdo bam po gnyis pa// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu de dag dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a
de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs rin po chen ji lta bu zhig tu skyo bar 'gyur/ yuman ngo lta bu zhig la lhums su 'jug par 'gyur zhes 'dri'o// de la la la
na re yul ma ga d+ha na lus 'phags kyi rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la/ lo legs pa dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes
zer ro// la la na re de ni tshol dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de nama'i yi rgyud kyi dag pa yang ma yin/ pha'i rgyudakyis dag pa yang ma yin la/ bsod nams chung dus/
byung gas/ bsod nams rgya chen pos mngon par byung ba ma yin zhing/ rgod la ma brtan ti ma gnas pa yin la/ yul de yang nyo 'khor gsogs mas gang ba/ bskyed mos tshal dang/ mtsho dang/
mtshe'u dag kyang ma ning la// ri brags ltar mtha' 'khob kyi gnas su gyur pa ste// de'i phyir de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin zhas zer ro// la la na re ko sa la'i rigs 'di 'khor mang zhing/
bzhon pa mang lanor chab ste/ don byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la lan re de yang tshuladang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'ad/
ltar ko sa la'i rigasan/ gdol pa'i rigs las shi 'phos nas skyes pa yin te/ pha dang mas dag pa yang ma yin la/ dma' ba la mos pa lta/ rigs mtho bar yang ma bya/ nor dang rin
bo che'i gter yang tshad med par phun sum tshogs pa ma mAn te/ de'i phyir de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yan no zhes zer ro// la la na re rgyal po bad sa la'i rigs 'da'abyoracing rgyas la lo legs pa/
dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang de'i tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
bzhi na/ 'di ltar rgyal po bad sa' rigs na phal pas/ gtum la/ gzi brjid 'bar ba yang ma yin zhing/ skyes pa gzhan las skya ba grub pa// pha ma nyid kyi gzi brjid kyi las kyis

grub pa ma lan la/ de'i rgyal po yang chadabar lcab ste/ de'i phyir de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re grong khyer chen po yangs pa can 'di ni 'byor cing rgyus la/ la lags
pa dang/ bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ nyams dga' ba/ skye bo mang po dang/ mas kun tu gang ba/ stogs bu dang/ ba gam dang/ stababs dang/ skar khung dang/
bsal khang dang/ khang pa bdags pa dang/ khang bzangs dag gis legs par brgyan pa ste/ me tog gi ra ba dang/ nags tshal gyi phreng ba ma rtog kun tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin la/
lha'i pho brang dang 'dra ba yan te/ de na byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la lanar de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin// daci'i phyir zhan/
'di ltar de dag la ni phan tshun du rigs par smra ba med do// chos spyod patshadado// gongam dang/ bar ma dang/ rgan pa dang/ gtso bo dag la yang rim gror bya ba med cing/ re re zhing yang
'dasAmadu bdag ni rgyal po'o// bdaganargyal po'i snyam du sems pas/ slob mar khas len pa med cing/ chos khas len pa med pa// de'i phyir de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no
zhes zer ro// la lan re grong khyer 'bags rgyalan/ rab snang gi rigs 'dan dpung ma zhang bzhin pa mang ba/ rol gyi g.yul ngor rgyal ba thob pa lan te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'
yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la lanar de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni khro zhing gtum la/ rlung zhing gzu lums can/
0 rgod pa ste/ las yod par lta ba yang ma yin pas/ de'akhyer de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lcan s su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// la lan re grong khyer bcom brlag 'di/
'byor cing rgyas la 'go legs pa dang/ bde ba dang ldan pa// skye bo mang po dang mas kun tu gang ba yin pas/ rgyal po lag bzang sde dpo' pa'i bdag po rgyal po'i pho brang de ni byang chub sems
dpal yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyirazhin/ 'di ltar rgyal po de ni log par lta ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes
pa ste/ mi rgod dang 'dra ba'i rgyal bo An pa sa/ byang nubasems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa na log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar ma rigs te/ de'i phyir de lang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/

la la nare grong khyerahastan pu ra 'di'i rgyal don skyibasang ga bu'i rigs kyi rgyud las skyes pa/ dpa' zhing rtul phod pa dang ldan pa// yan lag mchog gi gzugs phun sumatshogs pa gzhan gyi sde 'jom pa ste/

rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os yanino zhes zer ro// la lan re do yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'di ltar skyabasang ga bu'i rigs su skyes pa dag
gis rigs kyi rgyud rnam pa 'khrugs par byas te/ g.yul ngor brtan pa lan chos kyi bu zhes zer/ 'jigs sde lani rlung ga bu zhes zer/ srid sgrub lan dbang po'i bu zhes zer/ rig byed dang lhar
bcas la na tha skar gyi bu zhes zer te/ de'aphyir rigs de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin nozhes zer ro// la lana'i grong khyer bcom brlag/

sgo 'danashin tu yang nyams dga' zhing phan tshun 'byor gyi stong du/ rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa' sa yang yin la/ rgyal po de yang glang po dang/ rta dang/ shing rta dang/ dbud bu chud dang/
dpung ga tshogs mang po dang ldan b/ gsar dang/ dngul dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bai DUr+ya dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ bya ru dang/ sa le sbram dang/ nor dang/ yo byad shin tu mang ba/

rgyu rgyu' bo dang/ blon po thams cad kyis zil gyis mnon pa'i stobs dang/ pha rol gnon pa dang ldan/ mdza' ba dang ldan zhing chos la dga' ba ste/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug

pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// lalan re de yang tshul dang mthun ba ma yan te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de yodamod kyi/ de nashin tu rgas pas bu bskyed

pa'imathu yang med la// bu yang mang bas de'i phyir rigs de yang byang chub sems dang 'de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lha de dgags

'dzam bu'i gling ga yul chen po bcu drug po thams cad na/ rgyal bo'i rigs mthon po mthon bgangaji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la bltas na/ thams cad kyang nyes pa dang bcas par mthong ste/ de dag de

ltar sams pa'i yid la byed pa 'tshe/ lha'i bu ye shes tog ga rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub las phur na ldog nga/ theg pa chen de 'di la des nga ra gyur pa zhig yod pa des// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor

dang/ lha' 'khor chen po yod pa de dag la bde skyidaces smras so// grogs po dag tshur sheg/ byang nub sanas dang la de nyid kyi drung du dong ste/ rigs rin po che yon tanang lta bur phun sum tshogs pa

zhig tu srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur ba dri'o zhes smras pa dang/ lags so zhes te/ de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' drung du phyin te dris pa/ skyes

bu dam pa'i rigs rin po chayon tan phun sum tshogs pa ji lta bu zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tham pa skye bar 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dang sa byang chub sems dang 'tshogs chen po dang/ lha'i

tshogs chen po de dag la rnam par bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang du skye bar 'gyur pa'i rigs de ni/ rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi phun sumatshogs pa
yin te drug cu rtsa bzhi gabazhin/ 'di lta ste/ rigs de ni btsun pa yin/ rigs don kun gyi mngon par shes pa yin/ rigs de na phran tshogs med cing gnod par byed pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni
rgyud phun sumatshogs pa yan/ rigs de ni mo 'brang phun sumatshogs pa man/ rigs de na sa bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yan/ rigs de ni sngon gyi skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gas de ni
klu@#// btsun pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyi mngon par shes pa'i skyes bu thud phun sum tshogs pa yan/ rigs de ni dbang che bar grag
pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de na skyes pa mang ba yin/ rigs de ni bud med mang ba yin/ rigs de na 'jigs pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni dman pa med cing zhum
ba med pa yin/ rigs de ni brkam pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ gas de na blon pos blta zhing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/
rigs de ni bzo don yod pas bshams shing longs spyod la sbyod pa yin/ rigs de ni mdza' ba brtan pa yin/ rigs don dud 'gro'i gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags kyis srog la
lta ba yan/ rigasad ni byas pa gzo ba dang ldan pa yin/ ragis de ni brtul zhugs shes pa yin/ rigs de ni 'dun pas ma bgro ba yani/ rigs de ni zhe sdang gam 'gro ba yin/ gas
de ni gti mug ga ma 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni 'jigs pas ma 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin/ rigs de ni gti mug la ma gnas pa yin/ rigs don lag
spabs che ba yin/ rigs de ni bya ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni gtong ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni sbyin pa la mos pa yan/ rigs de ni zho sha shes pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal
bas brtan pa yin/ rigs de ni mthu rtsal dad ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal mchog dang ldan pa yin/ ris/ sa de ni drang srong mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni lha mchod pa yin/ gas de nan chod
rten mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni mtshan rjed pa yin/ rigs de na bon du 'dzin pa med pa yan/ rigs de ni phyogs bcur sgra grags pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khor chen po dang ldan pa yin
rigs de na 'khor ma phyed pa dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni bla na med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa yan/ rigs de ni rigs kyi nang nas gtso bor bya ba yin/ rig gas de nirags la dbang thob pa yin//
rigs de ni dbang chab r grags pa yin/ rigs de ni phar 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni mar 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni dge sbyong du 'dzin pa yin/ gas de na bram ze 'dzin pa yin/ rigs
de ni nor dang 'bru'i bangamadzod mang ba yan/ rigs de ni dbyig dang/ gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bai rUm+madang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byi ru dar/ sa' spram dang/
dngul dang/ rdzas dang/ yo byad mang ba yin/ rigs de ni glang po che dang rta dad ( rdza mo dang/ ba lang dang/ lug shin tu mang ba yan/ rigs de ni dran po dang/ bran mo dang//
las byed pa dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba shin tu mang ba yin/ rigs de ni thub par dka' ba yani/ rigs de ni don thams cad grub pa man/ rigs de ni 'khor la sbyar ba'i rigs kyi brgyud du skyes
/ba yin/ rigs de ni sngonagyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs kyis bskyod pa yin/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs su yis btsun par skyes pa yin/ rigs de ni 'jig
rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas ba/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang/ bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i nang na/ rigs la smos pa'i skyon gyi kha na ma tho ba thams cad dang bral ba ste//
grogs po dag gang du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'byung bar 'gyurab 'i rigs da ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// grogs po dag srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sam
dopa 'a bud med gang ga mnga' du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i bud med de na/ yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ sum cu rtsaganyis gang zhe na/ 'di ltaste/ byang chub sems
dpa' srid pa tha ma pan kun gyi mngon par shes pa'i bud med kyi mngal du 'jug go/ kun gyis mngon par shes pa dang/ spyod ba la glags ma thod pa dang/ rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang/
cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang/ mang phun sum gas pa dang/ chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang/ sngon chad ma btsas pa dang/ tshul khrims phunasum
tshogs pa dang/ btong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang mthun par 'dzin pa dang/ gsal ba dang/ dul ba dang/ 'jigs pa med pa dang/ mang du thos pa dang/ mkhas pa//
ba0 dang/ skya mad pa dang/ g.yo med pa dang/ mi khro ba dang/ phrag dog med pa dang/ ser sna med pa dang/ mi rgod pa dang/ ma g.yeng ba dang/ rtso mad pa dad bzod cing des pa dang ldan pa dang
ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang/ 'dod chagasadang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi shas chung ba dang/ bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba dang/ khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs dang ldan pa dang/ yon tan
thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bud med kyi mngal du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'jug go/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug pa'i
bud med de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' nazla bamar gyi ngo la ma'i mngal du ma 'jug gi/ byang chub sems dpa'

srid pa tha ma pa ni/ zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ste/ rgyas pa la skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa 'i tshe/ ma gso sbyongs byangs pa'i mngal du 'jugago/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/
lha'i bu de dgags byang chub sems dang las rigs yo das su dag pa dang/ ma yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ skyes bu dam pa 'dis rnam pa ji snyed
du bstan pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rigs de gang zhig la yod snyam du sems so/ de ltar s mas shing yid la byed pa la zhugs pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya'i grong khyer 'di
khyo cing rgyas la/ bde zhing lo legs pa dang ldan te/ nyams dga' zhing skyo ba mang po dang/ mas gang ba yani'/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang ma'i brgyud kyis dag
pa/ pha'i brgyud kyis dag pa/ chung ma dag pa dang ldan pa// las kyis thab la nyon mongs pa med pa/ dpe byad bzang ba/ shin tu mdzangs pa/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa//
grags pa chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigs kyi brgyud du skyes pa/ nor dang/ gter dang/ rin po che dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa las yod par lta ba/ sdig pa'i lta ba med ga
shAkya'i yul kun nas ya nga rgyal po de gcig du ra zad// tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag dang/ blon po dang/ 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis rim gror bya zhing mchod pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug
pa/ hacar yad mi rgan/ ha cang yang ma gzhon zhing/ gzugs mdzes la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ bzo shes pa// dusashes pa/ bdag shes pa/ chog shes pa/ sems can shes
pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ mtshan shes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi rjes su ston pa'o// sar khyab gnasakyi grong khyer chen po de ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi gnas te/
gang dag der skyes par gyur pa de dag kyang de dang/ skal ba 'dra ba dag ge/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma de la lha mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya ba/ shAkya'i bdag po shin tu legs par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i
bu mo zhig yod pa 'ang/ phyag cing gzhon zhing dar la bab pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ sngon chad ma btsas pa/ bu dang bu mo med pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ bu don 'dris pa ltar/
blta na sdug pa/ lha'i bu mo ltar rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bud med kyi skyon rnams dang bral ba/ bden par smra ba/ ma drag pa/ ma bslang ba dang/ mi gtser ba/ kha na nad tho ba med/
pa/ gyo mda'i sgra lta bu med pa/ ca co med pa/ 'jam zhing snyan la/ yid du 'ong bar smrab/ ma ris pa/ khong khro bded/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa dang/ rgyags pa dar/ khro ba med pa dang/
phrag dog med pa/ dus su ska ba/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan ng/ khyos chog par 'dzin pa// khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can/ skyes pa gzhan la bsam pa'i re
labya bar ng bralab/ mgo dang/ rna ba dang/ sna gnas su phebs pa/ bung ba'i mchog gi kha dog lta bu'i sgra dang ldan pa// dpral ba legs pa/ smin tshugs legs pa/ khro gnyer med pa//
bzhin 'dzum pa/ gsong por skyab/ 'jam zhing snyan pab tshags dang ldan pa/ mthun par 'dzin pa/ drang ba/ gya gyu med pa/ sgyu med pa// g.yo med pa/ khrel yod cing nga tshashes nga//
mi rgod pa/ ma g.yeng ba/ kha don ma smra ba/ 'chal pa'i tshag med pa// 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi shas chung khaM/ ngang des shing bzod pa dang ldan pa/ rkang lag dang
ma bya// mag dang/ blo shin tu bsungs pa/ rkang lag shin tu 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin+dab gos ltar reg na bde ba/ pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma ltar thag shin tu rnam par dag ba
zla sna dbyibs legs shing mdog sdug pa/ yan lag shin tu brtan pa/ 'ja' dbyibs ltar shin tu 'dud pa/ yan lag dang nying lag shin tu 'byes pa/ yan lag la smad du med pa/
mchu bam pa ltar dmar ba/ blta na mdzes pa/ mgul rim bzhin du 'jug pa// rgyun dam pa dang ldan pa// sna ma'i me tog dang/ bar shakaltar so shin tu rnam par dag pa/ phrag pa leg
par byin gyis 'tsham pa// rim gyis legs par grub pa'i dpung dang ldan pa/ skad pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba/ gzhog nyams pa med pa/ lte ba lung zab pa/ sta zur 'jam
zhing yangs la/ zlum zhing brtan par grub pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs shing mtshungs pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ glang po'i sna ltar mnyam zhing legs pa'i bar dang ldan pa// byin pa
ri dgas se na ya'il bu/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa'i mthil rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ltar 'jug pa/ bgro ba'i mag tu sdug pa/ mig gis dbad pa nyams pa med pa/ yid du 'ong zhing blta
na sdug pa/ bud med rin po che'i gzugs las khyad par du 'phags pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ sgyu 'phrul sbrul pa lta bu'i gzugs su bdug pa/ sgyu 'phrul zhes mngag brdar btag pa/
sgyu rtsal la mkhas pa/ dga' tshal gyi lha'i bu mo lta bu zhig rgyal bo zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo' 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yun du tshul dang mthun gyis/ gang
byang chub sems dpas rigs dag las bstan pa de ni/ shAkya'i rigs nyid la snang gi/ gzhan la ni ma yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// dag pa'i sems can chos mtho khang/
bzangs na// chos bzangs seng ge 'i khri la rab tu 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen ldan pa dang// skal ba mnyam pa' lha rnams drang srong 'khoro// de na 'dug cing de ni 'di
snyam sems// rigs gang rnam dag rab tu shes dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' skye dang tshul mthun gang/ pha ma gang zhig dag pa'i dngos dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun tu
rnam bltasan// rgyalarig rtsal brgyud che ba gang yan pa// kun kyang skyon dang bcas par rjes bsams nas// shAkya'i rigs ni skyon dang bral bar mthong// zas gtsad rgyal po' rigaM
nang rigs dang ldan// mi dbang rgyud na rnam dag cho rigs can// 'byor cing rgyas la 'khrug pa med pa ste// skye bo dam pa chos ldan rim gro can// ser skyar brjod pa'i grong khyer
sems can gzhan// kun kyang bsam pa rab dag chos dang ldan// bskyed mos kun dgab gzhal med khang gis brgyan// skye ba'i ser ser skyar brjod pa mdzes// kun kyang
[@]// tshan chen stobs dang ldan pa ste// glang bo gnyis sam gsum gyi stobs kyang bdag/ 'phong rtsal brlabs pa'i pha rol mthar phyin kyang// srog gi don du/
zla gzhan la gnod ma byed// zas gtsang rgyal po'i bud med dben pa de// bud med dam pa stong ga mchog tu phyin// yid du 'ong ba sgyu 'phrul sprul pa'i gzugs// de yi ming yang lha
mo sgyu 'phrul te// mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang lha yi bu mo bzhin// 'byes pa'i lus ldan yan lag dri med sdug/ lha dang ma rnams M gang yang rung ba dag/ sgyu 'phrul mthong na gang ngoms
de med kyang// 'dod chags zhen med snang bas zhe sdang med// den bajam snyan drang ba'i ngag dang ldan// mi brlang ma rtsub shin du des pa ste// de ni bzhin 'dzum khro nyor rab tu sbyangs//
ngo tsha khrel yod chos spyod ldan pa ste// nga rgyal med cadim khengasargod pa med// phrag dog med cing sgyu dang g.yo med de// gtong la dga' zhing rtag tu byams sems ldan// las yod lta zhing
lag pa'i sbyor ba sbyangs// bden la gnas shapalus dang yid rab bsdams// sa lagang yod bud med skyon mang tshogs// de dag thams cad de la yod ma yin// ma ya 'jig rten dri za'i
'jig rten nam// lha yi 'jig rten dag na bud med gzhan// lha mo sgyu 'phrul mtshungs med ga la lhag/ drang srong chen pob mar ni de 'os te// tshe rabs lnga brgya kho nas tshad bar yang//
de byang chub sems dpa'i mar gyur to// de dang der ni yab kyang thas gtsang ste// de yi yon tan ldan pa ma ya shes// dka thub can ltar de ni brtul zhugs gnas// brtul zhugs rjes
spyod rtag par chos kyang spyod// rgyal pos gnang ste mchog sbyin thob pas na// 'dod pa ma sbyad zla ba sum cu gnyis// gang gi phyogs na de 'dug batreng ba 'am// nyal zhing 'gro bar gyur
ba'i gnas dag kyang// de yi las dge gzhol pa'i 'od zer gyis// shin tu snang bar bod kyis gsal bar 'gyur// lha dang lha min ma rnams gang yang rung// 'dod chags sems kyis
blta bar nus pa med// spyod lam rnams su 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan// de la kun kyang ma dang bu mor lta// sgyu 'phrul lha mo dge ba las kyi rgyus// rgyal po'i srid ni ba langasa rnam
par 'phel// khams kyi rgyal po 'ang 'jug par ma byed cing// rgyal po'i grags dang brjod pa rnam par 'phel// de ltar sgyu 'phra lasnod du mthun gyur cing// de ltar sems can dam pa mchog
mdzes pas// de nyid yon tananachog dang ldan pas na// 'di ni bur 'gyur de ni ma ya 'os// lha ma yon tan mchog dang ldan pa ste// glang po khra yi stobs bdog ma gtogs par//
'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di ni ma mchog ste// 'dzin par nus pa'i bud med gang yang med// de skad che ba'i lha yi bu rnams dang// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya chen dag/ shAkya'i
rigs rnams dga' bar mdzad pa yi// yum du legs ldan sgyu 'phrul 'gyur zhes zer// rigs yongs su dag pa bu ste gsum pa'o//
kyi// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rigs la rnam par bltas nas// dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang chen po 'khyu dang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi
yod pa gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug ste// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa rgyal mtshan mthon po zhes bya ba yod de// byang chub sems dpa' de gzhal med khang chen po
! der song nas phyin pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa// khyed rnams 'dir 'duba'agyis shig/ 'chi 'pho ba rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos rjes sudran pa/
chos rjes su bstan pa tha ma'i chos mnyan pa byang chub sems dpa' las nyon cig/ de skad kyi tshig thos nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas
gzhal med khang chen po der 'dus so/der byang chub sems pas 'khor gyi khyams gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam du yangs par byin gyis brlabs par gyur nas// da de
tsam du bzang zhing de tsam du bstan sdug la/ de tsam du rgyan gyis rgyas shing/ de tsam du yid du 'ong bar gyur pa des/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad dad
rang gi khyim gyi bkod pa la dur khrod lta bu'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de la byang chub sems dpa ga rangagi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pas yongs su brgyan padage sad/
ga'i khri nor bu rin po che du mas rtsa ba sbras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu'i stan du ma bting ba/ lhasbos zhim po du mas bskos la/ 'dug sbyos dam pa mchog tu bya ba du mas bdugs pa/ lha'i
me tog kha dog du ma'i dgram la bkram ba/no bu dang/ rin po che'i bod brgya stong du ma 'khar ba'i gzi brjid can/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bugalor

kab dra ba du ma'i sgra byung bas mngon par dga' ba dang ldan pa// zhi bo che'i dril bu brgya stong du ma mngon par dkrol ba ba sgra dang ldan pa/ napo che dra ba brgya stong du mas yongs su gsal bar/
gyur pa/ rin po che gdugs ba stong du mas kun nas bkab pa/ dar brgya stong du ma rab tu dang das pa/ dar gyi phreng ba lnga lnga brgya stong du mas shin tu brgyan kha/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong dums
glu blangs/ gar byas/ lo ma byas pa/ yon tan brgya stong du ma kun tu brjod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du mas rjes su bsrungs pa/ brgya byin brgya stong du mas rug byas pa//

tshangs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu btud pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bzung ba/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgya sa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mtha' yas par
na@#// dgongs pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par pha rol tu phyin pa tshogs su byas pa'i bsod namasakyi rnam par sman pa'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba
lta bu la bdugago/ dge slong dag de ltar n byang chub sems dang ba seng ge 'i khri chen po yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la 'dug na/ lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la skyes pa//
grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus bsod nams brgya'i mchon gyis legs par brgyan ba la ltos/ shar dang/ lhadang [“ ]nub dang rta byad dad/ 'og rang/ steng dang/ phyogs
bcu kun n byang chub soms dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na bo da cing/ thams cad khyad srid pa tha ma pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ shi 'pho'i
rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa tshad med pa/ grangs med/ bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la ltos/ de nas lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis
byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong bar gyur te/ mthong bar gyur nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar
ba btud de/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad du 'di ltar bdag cag gis bltas pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig mthod ba na/ byang chub sems dpa'i
byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ legs so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas byang chub sems dpas yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bos nas/ 'di skad ces
sbyas ste/ grogs po dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa ba de dag lha'i bu de dag la gang ston pa shi 'pho'i rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo nyon cig/ grogs po dag/
tshosaM snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sams dpas 'chi ba tho ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ lha'i 'khoral gdonam za bar yang dag par bstan par bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyadagang
zhe na 'dilta sta/ grogs po dag dad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bsam pa mi phyed par 'gyur ro// dang ba tshos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems ga pa can dad par 'gyur ro// mchog tu
dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro/ dga' ban chos snang ba'i sgo ste/sems rnam par dag par 'gyur// lus kyi sdom pa ni chos snang bab sgo ste/ lus kyi nyes
pa rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par 'gyur do/ ngag gi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngag gi nyes pa bzhi yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// yid kyi sdom pa ni tshes snang ba'i sgo ste//
brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba spong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pan chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
tsa spya// tshes rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos bstan pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo// skyon med par/
zla 'jug par 'gyur ro// gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas thams cad rab tu sbyong bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ smon lam
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyun ro// lta rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rgya chen por 'gyur ro// byams pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsad nams bya ba'i
dngos po thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// snying rje ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rnam par gtso ba med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro// dga' ba ni chos snod ba'i sgo ste/ mi dga' ba/
thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// btang snyoms ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste// 'dod pa la smad par 'gyur ro// mi rtag par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa dang/ gzug
yod pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal du so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ snyan lam kun tu chad par 'gyur go/
bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la mngon par zhen pa med par 'gyur ro// zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rjes su chagasapa 'bar ba
med par 'gyur ro// ngo tshashes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur// khrel yod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ phyi la nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// bden pa na chos snang
ba'i sgo ste/ lha dang ma rnams ma sla bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste Da bdag slu ba med par 'gyur ro/ chos spyod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo// chos la rten par
'gyur ro// gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngan song gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// byas pa bzo ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo dge ba'i rtsa ba
byas pa rnams chud ma za bar 'gyur// byas pa rig pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la brnyas pa med par 'gyur ro// bdag shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la bstod
pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la smod pa med par 'gyur ro// chos shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos
la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// dus shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mthong ba don yod par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal bcom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
ro// zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung bar 'gyur ro// khon du 'dzin pa med pa na chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'gyod pa med par 'gyur do/
mos pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ the tshom med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro// ma sgrug pa so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa sbyong bar/
'gyur ro// gnod sems med pa na chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa spyod bar 'gyur ro// gti mug med pa na tshos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mdeshes pa rnam par sel bar
'gyur ro// chos don du gnyer ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ don la rton par 'gyur ro// chos 'dod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos snang ba thob par 'gyur ro// thos pa mol ba na chos
snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// ming dang gzugs yongs su
zhes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rgyur lta ba yang dag par 'jom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste Da rig pa dang rnam par grol ba thob
par 'gyur ro// rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba spong ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtho bar sems pa med cing dma' bar sems pa med par bgyur ro// zhud pa la mkhas pa nas
snang ba'i sgo ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// khams mnyam pa nyid ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ kun 'byung ba ngo bar 'gyur ro// skye mched gsal ba ni chos snang ba'i
sgo ste/ lam sgom par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'gog pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// lus la song ba'i dza?d pa ni ches lca['' '] dben pa 'a
'gyur ro/ tshor ba la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ na ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// sems la song ba ni dran pa tshe snang+gI t+taM/ son sa ra lta pu
so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// chos la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rab rabo dang bra la pa ye shes su bgyur go/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi na chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sa pa'i chos
thams cad spod ba dang dag pa'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur/ dad pa'i dbang/
po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ga zhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dran pa'i dbang po
ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ las legs par byas par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po na chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ shes rab kyi dbang po na tshos snang
ba'i sgo ste/ mngon sum gyi gshis su 'gyur ro// dad pa'i stobs ni ches snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdud kyi stobs la yang dag par 'dab bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grusakyi stobs ni chos snang
ba'i sgo ste/ phyir ma ldog par 'gyur ro// dran pa stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ma 'phrog par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
rnam par rtog pa thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ma shu tha bar 'gyur ro// dran pa yang dag byang chub yan lag na tshos snang ba'i sgo// chos
ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus/
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shin tu rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ting nge 'dzin sgrub
par 'gyur ro// shin tusbyas pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bya ba byas par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag na tshes snang ba'i sa
chos thams cad manyam pa nyadi du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag na chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skye ba thams cad du smon par 'gyur ro// yang
dag pa'i lta ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i rtog pa na chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog dang/ yongs su rtog pa
thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i ngag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ya gi dang/ sgra dang/ skad dang/ tshig gi lam thams cad brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur
yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ las med cing rnam par smin pa med par 'gyur ro// yang dag pab 'tsho ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshol ba thams cad rgyun chad pa
'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med
par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems ma 'khrugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyisams ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dkon mchog
gsum gyi rigs rgyun ma 'chad par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med par 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste//
sangs rgyas kyi chos M rgya chen po la lhag par dmigs par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtshan dang/ dpe byad bzang po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing/ ser sna can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ma'i khom pa dang/ ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par 'da' zhing/ tshul khrims 'chal sems can
kyi yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sams dang/ ba ba dang/ zhe stang dang/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa dang/ rgyags
ba spong bar 'gyur zhing/ gnod sems can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos brtsams pa ldan/
cad nyams su len par 'gyur zhing/ le lo can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bsam gtan dang/
mngon par shes pa thams cad skyed cing/ sems g.yengs pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshos snang ba'i sgo ste/ma rig pa
rang/ gti mug gi mun pa mun nag dang dmags pa'i lta ba sbyong zhing/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur// thabs mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste
sems can ji ltar mos pa bzhin du spyod lam ston cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos bo bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste// sems can thams cad sdun
nang byang chub brnyes pa las chos nod par 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba na chos snang bab smi ste/ bdag ga bde ba la ma chags shang yongs su skyo ba med par 'gyur ro//
dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste sems
can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi tshog san chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ de
bzhin gshegs d pa'i teng nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// lhag mthong gi tshogs nas snang ba'i sgo ste/ shes rab kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni
chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro// rten pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gzungs thob pa ni chos snang
ba'i sa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro// spobs pa thob pa ni ches snangaba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tsham par byed par
'gyur ro// rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzo ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dad 'thun par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
[p]// lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyur ro// sa nas sar
'phar ba'i ya shes ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mngal du 'jug pa dang/ btsas pa
dang/ mngon par 'byung ba dang/ dka' ba spyad pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/
