yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag/ 'di dag ni chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tsha
lha'i 'khor du gdon mi za ba gang bstan par bya'o// dge slong dag byang chub sems dapas chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u 'di bstan pa'itsho/ lha'i 'khor de dgalas lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong// bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// lha'i bu sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa sum khri nyis stong ni ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lta'i bu
bye ba sum cu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad khyad lta'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du yogs par/
0 gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha 'khor de dag rgya chen dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag snas so// gang gi tshe na dga' ldan
gnas mchog nas/ 'dren pa skyes bu seng ge 'chi 'pho'i tshe/ lha rnams dag la tshig tu smra ba ni// bag med mtha' dag rnam par spyod shes skye// lha yi dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa// yid kyis
bsams pas 'byung ba dang ldan pa// thams cad las dge rgyu las byung ba ste// de nidage ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin// de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis// sngon gyi dge bsags 'dini
zad gyur te// gang du ma bde sdug bsngal myong 'gyur ba// ngan song dag tu song bar gyur ta re// nga la gus par bya ba bskyed nas ni// chos gang thos par gyur ba de dag la// nan tan gyis
nirab tusgrubasangashag dang// bde ba mtha' yas nges par thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad ma rtag brtan pa man// ther zug ma yin rmi lam 'dra ba ste// smig rgyu dang ni sgyu ma rnamA
dang 'dra// klog dang dbu ba 'dra zhing 'gyur pa yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan dag ni dga' bas ni// lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin du ngoms ma 'gyur// gang dag rdul med 'jig rten 'das
pa yi// shes rab ldan pa de dag ngoms par 'gyur// lha mo dag dang 'grogs dang glu dbyangs ni// gar gyi ltad mo pa dang mtshungs shing 'dra// dper na 'dus pa dag ni khri las su//
phan tshun 'gro bar sbyor babyed dang mtshungs// dge ba'i las byas rjes su 'brang byed cing// phyi bzhin 'gro bar byed pa ma gtogs par// 'dus byas dag la gro
yod ma yin te// mdza' bshes nye du med cad 'khor kyang med// de lta bas na lhan cig mthun byas la// phan tshun byams sems phan pa'i ams byas te// chos kyi spyad pa dag ni
spyad par gyis// spyad pa legs par sbyad la gdung ba med// thos dang tshul khrims sbyin la dga' gyur cing// bzod dang des pa phun sum tshogs kyis te// sangs rgyas dang nitshos dang
zla dge 'dun dang// de bzhin bag yod pa dag dran par gyis// rtan pa med cing sdug bsngal bdag med la// rgyu dang rkyen rnams dag ni ldan gyur cing// bdag po med la bems por gyur pa
mi/ chos 'di dag la tshul bzhin brtag par gyis// nga la rdzu 'phrul dag ni gang yod dang// spobs pa yashes dbang rnams gang thob pa// kun kyang las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste// thos
pa tshul khrims bag yod rnams las byung// sems can don dang phan dang byams don du// nga yi tshul khrims dang ni thos pa dang// bag yodapa dang sbyin dang dul ba dang// yang dag sdom
pa'i rjes su bslab par gyis// ngag dad skad dang sgra rnams tsamagyas na// dge ba'i chos rnams sgrub par ma nus kyis// nan tan snying por bya bas sgrub bos sgrub byos la// ji skad
lcas ba de bzhin bya bar byos// gzhan gyi gling ba'i skabs nas dbye bar// bdag gis rtag tu sgrims pas 'bad par gyis// la las byas shing sbyin ba yod ma yin// ma byas par yang/
'grub par 'gyur pa med// sngon chad 'khor bar 'khor tsho sdug bsngal dag/ myong bar gad gyur don dran par gyis// khyod cag lag pa nyid du nges pas na// mya ngan las 'das 'dod chags
bral ma thob// de lta bas na dul dang bshes gnyen dang// tshul dang mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang// chos mnyam dam pa thob par byas nas ni// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs
zhi bar gyis// nga rgyal dang ni rgyags dang dregs mthod la// rtag tu mnyen zhing dran la g.yo med cing// mya ngan 'das par 'gro la gzhol byas te// lam rtog bya ba'i phyir na sbyor bar
gyis// gtimug rnyog pa'i mun pa thams cad kyang// shes rab sgron mas rnam par bsal bar gyis// bag la nyal bcas skyon gyi drwa ba rnams// ye shes rdo rje yi ni rnam par grol//
shin tu mang por smra ba ci dgos te// don dang yang dag ldan pa'i chos de la/ khyed cag gnas pa byas par ma gyur na// de la chos kyis lan pa ma yin no// gang tshe ngas na byang chub
thob gyur te// 'chi med 'gro ba'i chos char 'babs pa'i tshe// rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa khyed// chos kyi dam pa mnyan pa'i phyir shes shig/ chos snang ba'i sgo'i bu ste
kha nubya// bzhi pag kadage slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam 'di yang dag par bstan// yang dag par/
'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod// yang dag bar dga' bar byas// bzod par byas nas// lha'i 'khor bkra shis dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag kho bo ni
'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro// kho bo sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ba tshe/ sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang/ snyan par smras pa dang/ don sbyad pa dang/ don mthun
zla par bya ba bzhi las mgron du bos la/ grogs po dag da kho bo ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangam rgya bar 'dug pa de ni/ kho bos byas pa ma shes
shing rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur// de nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag du zhing byang chub sems dpa'i rkang ba gnyis la 'jus te bde skad ces 'dzin to// skyes bu dam ba khyod mi
bzhugs na/ dga' ldan gyi gnas 'di mdzes par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpas lhab 'khor chen po de dgal bdaskad du/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dis khyed
la chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras taM/ da nas byang chub sems dpas rang ga mgo las thad dang cod pan phog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mgo la bzhag nas 'di
skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyodan de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smas te/ de nas byang chub semA
dpas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam par dbang bskur nas/ yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la sbas pa/ grogs po dag/ kho bos ji lta bu'i gzugs
kyis ma'i mngal du 'gro bar bya/ de la kha cig na re bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su gshigs par rigs so zhes zer ro// la la na ro brgya byin gyi gzugs su/ la la na re tshangs pa'i
gzugs su/ la lan re rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su la la na re sgragacan gyigazugs su/ la la na re driza'i gzugs su la la
na re ma 'am ci'i gzugs su/ la la na re lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re zla ba'i gzugs su/ la la na ro nyi ma'i
gzugs su/ la la na re nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gzugs su bzhud pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro// de nas tshangs rigs kyi lha'i bu gzi brjid dam pa zhes bya bsngon drang
srongalas shi 'phos pa/ bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces snas so// bram ze rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi
tshig yig byed kyi bstan bcos las ji skad du 'byung ba de ltabu'i gzugs su byed chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su bzhud pa ni rigs so// de'ang rtsa 'dra zhe na//
glang bo dam pa lus chen mchog gyur pa// mchab drug can gasaragyi brab sagayogs// mgo bo rab tu dma' zhing shin tumadzes// 'gram nas zagatsang gzugs ldan dpal ldan/
pa'o// rig byed bstan bcos yang dag mkhas pa yi// bram zes rnam pa de 'dra de shes nas// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan 'gyur zhes// yang dag nyid du lung na ston
par 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas skye ba'i dus la bltas nas/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas bzhin du/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa der
snga ltas brgyad bstan to// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim de rtswa dang/ sdong dum dang/ tsher ma dang/ gseg ma dang/ gyo ma med cing/ bim med la/ chag chag legs
par btab pa dang/ phyag dar legs par byas shing/ rlung rdul can dang/ mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba dang/ sbrang ma dad/ sha sbrang dang/ sbrang bu dang/ phye ma leb dad//
sdig sbrul med cing/ me tog gi kun tu gang ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba dang po'o// ri'i rgyal po gdar la bya 'dab sben dang//
ni tso dang/ ri skegs dang/ khu byug dang/ dang pa dang/ rma bya dang/ dur pa dang/ kun l dang ka la bde dang/ shang shang te'u la sogs pa/ sbyong shog sna tshogs mdzes pa/ yid du//
'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i bya'i tshogs gang dag gnas pa de dag der 'ongs nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de'i stegs bu dang/ ba gam dang/ rta babs dang/ skar khung
dang/ bsal khang dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang khang bzangs kyi steng dag tu gnas shing/ dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ rang rang gi sgra skad dag 'byin
te/ 'din sa ltas byung ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang/ nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang/ skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba
dag na/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dus tha dad par 'byung ba de thams cad kyang kha 'bus shing me tog rgyas par gyur te/ 'dini snga ltas byung ba gsum pa'o//

rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i chu'i longs spyod kyi rkyen rdzong la sogs pa gang dag yodapa de dag thams cad kyang/ pad+ma bdab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ tshad shing rta'i 'phang la
tsam dag gis khebs par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba bzhi pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa don mar dang/ 'bru mar dang/ sbrang rtsa dang/ bu ram gyi dbu ba dang//
sha kha ra la sogs pa bza' ba'i rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang/ yongs su spyad pas zad par ma 'gyur zhing yongs su gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni sna ltas/
byung ba lta pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor chen bo dgan/ rnga ba tshe dang/ dza Da dang khar rnga dang/ rgyud gcag ba dang/ pa wang dang/
gling bu dang/ rgyud gsum pa der/ khar ba sol khril dang/ pheg lasogs ba rol mo'i chaspyad gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma blangs/ ma dkrol bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgra'ang sgrog
par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung badrug pa'o// rgyal pozos gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa na/ gser dar/ dngul dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bi ma dang/ dung dang//
man shel dang/ byi gu la sogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang kha phye yod/ dri ma med la rnam par dag cad dang du gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas
byung ba bdun pa'o// nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis rlag par byed sa'i/ lus dang sems dga' ba skyed pa'i 'od dag cing dri ma med pas snang bar gyur te/ 'dini snga ltas byar ba brgyad pa'o//
'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gsum pa/ ka lhamo sgyu 'phrul lang khrus byas/ lus cug bas
phyugs/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lag pa shin tu brgyan te/ gos shin tu 'jam pa mchog bgos shing/ btsun myu dad bcas la/ dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ rangs pa
thob nas/ bud med stong phrag bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma rolamo bya ba 'de khang bzas na/ bde bar gnas pa'i rgyud du phyin te/ g.yasarol na khri
bzang po rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa la 'dug nas/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin khro gnyer med cing/ rab tu dang ba'i mchog gis rgyal po zasagatsang ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
rgyal pos bdag legs par bdag la gsan du gsol// rgyal pa khyod la gsol gyis bdag la de gnod shag/ bdag gi bsam pa yid la ci mchis par dag pa// de dag bdag
la gsan cing thugs dgyes rongs par mdzod// lha bdag nyer gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs len par gsol// bdag ni 'gro la byams pas yan lag brgyad len te/ srol/
chags gnod pa spangs shing bsam pa rtag dag pas/ ji ltar bdag la byams pa de ltar gzhan la bgyi// rku sems rnam par sbyadas te 'dod dang dregs pa sbyangs/ rgyal po 'dod pa
rnams la log par g.yem mi bgyid// bden la gnas shing phra ma ma mchis zhe gcod spangs// ma dag skyal pa'i tshig kyang yongs su ma spyod do// gnod soms zhe sdang tha ba gti
tshug rgyags pa dad// brnab sems kun sladas rang nor gyis 'tshal bar bgyi// yang dgaspor bas kha gsag tshul 'chos phrag dog spangs// dge bcu
las lam 'di dag bdag gis spyad par bgyi// bdag ni tshul khrims brtul zhugs mngon dga' rab bsdams kyis// ma yi dbang po dag la bzhed pas sred ma mdzad// rgyal po
khyod la yun rades mi dger gyur du mchi// bdag gi tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyer gnas dgyes par mdzod// rgyal po bdag gi 'tshal pa 'di lags de myun sul// khang bzangs
bsal khang ldan pa ngang skya ldan pa'i nang// me tog bkram pa'i mchis mal 'jam zhing dri bda' bar/ grogs mos rtag tu bskor cing bad dgar gnas snyam bgyid// skyes pa nyud ma
rnams dang de bzhin khye bu dag dang// bud med phal pa rnams kyang mdun na mchis mi ba tshal/ snyan tsang yid mchi sgra snyan nyan kha ma gtogs bar/ gzugs dang sku gsud yid du ma mchi
bdag mi 'tshal// bcings dang btson rar stsal pa thams cad dgyebar gsol// nor gyis brel ba'i mi rnams nor dang ldan par mdzod// zas skom dad bshing rtogs dang sbyin pa rta
'gro ba bde ba'i slad du dgung bdun stsal pamadzod// pho brang 'din skyes pa khye'u dang bud medadag/ ji snyed mchis pa 'thab rtsod khro ba'i tshig bral dang// phan tshun byams pa'i yad ldan
phan dang des sems kyis// dga' tshal gnas pa'i lha ltar mthun zhing bde spyod mdzod// rgyal po'i chad pa che phra gnyer gyis bdab ba dang// gnod pa bgyi dang brdeg gtsog sdig mi
mdzad par// kun la'ang dad pa'i thugs kyis byams dad phan dgongs te// lha yis skye bo rnams la sras gcig bzhin du gzigs// rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dga' gyur nas
smas pa khyod ni ci 'dod de kun de bzhin bya// khyod kyis bsam pa yid kyis gang rnams rjes bsam shing// khyod kyis mchog blangs gang yin de na des sbyin no// rgyal po'i dam pas da
gi 'khor la bsgo ba ni// khad bzas dam pa'i steng du phun sum tshogs pa shoms// me tog mdzes pa khrom la bdug spos mchog gas bdugs// gdugs dang ba danata la'i phreng ba'i
rgyan kyang gyis// thab phod stong phrag nyi shu sna tshogs go cha can// mda' mdud lcags mda' mdung thung ral gri thogs pa dag// yid bod sgra gcan ngang skya ldan pa skor gyis te/ lha mo
'jigs pa med par bya phyir srung zhing gnas// khrus byas spos byug gos mchog dag gis yan lag brgyan// bud med rnams kyis de bskor lha yi bu mo 'dra// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ldan/
sil snyan stor blangs te// lha mo dor zhugs lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas// lha yi rin chen rin thang chen pos rtsi sngas pa/ 3khril gos mchog mang pos yid 'ongs mal bshams te//
mal phyin gtsug gi nor bu rin chen kod byas nas// badres pa'i nags tshal lha la bu mo bzhin du gnas// dge slong dag de nas rgyal po chen po
bzhi dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ lha'i bu rab bathab bral dang/ yongs su dag ldan dang/ 'ab 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dad/ bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang/
mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ mdun na 'don tshadas mchog dang/ mdun na 'don tshadas bzangs dang bod bkod pa dang 'od gsal dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi dbang phyug chen
po dang/ mthar thug dang/ 'og man pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa dang/ gzhan s da lha brgya stong mang po 'dus te/ gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag/
bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med par gshegs su gsolan/ bdag cag gis byas pa ma shes par 'gyur to/ bdag cag la ma chas/ grogs po dag
khyed kyi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang/ lhums su bzhugs pa dang/ bltams pa dang/ bor budad/ byis pa'i nang na rol ba dang/
btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dad/ rol mo gzigs pa dang/ mngon par 'byung ba dang/ dka' ba spyod pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying bor gshegs pa dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/
byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dan/ mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du/ phan bsems dad/ dga' khab sems dang/
bdas pa'i sems dad/ byams pa'i sems dad/ gnyan pa'i sems kyis rtag par rgyun du byang chub sems dpa zhan 'bring na 'khod par su dag spro// de'i tshe tshags
su bcad pa 'di dag kyad skyas sa/// khyed las su zhig rtag tu dga' yid kyis// gzugs mchog mnga' ba'i zham rang byed pa sogs// su dag rang ga/bsod nams
gzi brjid dang// stobs dang grags pa rnam par sel bar 'dod// gang zhig lha yi pho brang 'di dag na// lha mo dag dad 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi/ lha ya bde bas dga' bar
'dod pa dang// dri med zla ba'i zhalagyi nam rade gyis// de bzhin 'dres pa'i nags tshal mdzes pa mchog/ lha yi 'byung gnas lha yi pho brang na// gser mdog me tog rgyas par
ga' 'dod na// dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba'i zham ring gyis// gang gis sna tshogs shing rta de bzhin du/ dga' tshal me tog man dar 'dab rgyas su// lha mo lhan cig rtse bar
'dod pa dag/ skyes bu chen po 'di yi zhamarang gyis// 'thab bral bdag po'am dga' ldan bdag po 'am// yang na dbang phyug 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang// 'gro ba kun gyi mchod
bya/ ]'os 'dod pa dag/ grags pa mtha' yas ba da nam 'di gyis// gang zhig 'phrul dga'i khad pa mdzes pa dang// dbang sgyur lha yi gnas su rtse 'dod/
me yid kyi 'phrul gyis thams cad spyod 'dod pa// yon tan mchog mnga' ba de la zham 'di gyis// bdud kyi dbang po zhi sdad yod med la// rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug kun gyi mthar phyin/
pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dbang mthar phyin 'dod na// phan pa tshad ba 'di dang lhan cig deng// de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' byas te// tshangs pa'i gnas su gnas par
su 'dod pa// de ni tshad med bzhi ya bgaza mnga' ba// skyes bu chen po'i zham ring der nas kyis// 'on tan gang zhig ma yi nang dag tu// 'khor los sgyur yul langasapar skye 'dod
na 15na chen 'byung gnas ma 'jigs bde spyin pa// bsod nams ma dag pa mnga' ba'i zham 'di gyis// gang zhag sa bdag de bzhin tshong dpon bu/ phyagacing skyed la nor mang
tshogs chen dang// dgra yi dpung bcom 'khor dang ldan 'dod pa// de ni phan mdzad 'di dang lhan cig dang// gzugs dang longs spyod de bzhin dbang phyug dang// snyan pa grags dad spobs
dang yon tan dang// gzung 'os tshig dang mnyan pa'i tshig 'dod pa// de ni tshangs dbyangs mkhas pa'i gan du song// lha dang ma yi 'dod pa gang yin dang// srid pa gsum bde ba thams
0 cad dang// bsam gtan bde dang dben pa'i dpe 'dod pa// de ni chos kyi dbang phyug zham ring gyis// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang sbyang ba dang// nyon mongs mun pa sel bar su 'dod cing//
zhi ba rab zhanyor zhi bde ldan pa// de ni thugs dul zham ring myur du song// gang zhig slob dang ma slob rad rgyal dang// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 'dod dang// stobs bcus
se nga ge'i sgra sgrogs su 'dod pa// de ni yon tan rgya mtsho mkhas drung song// gang zhig ngan song rnams kyi lam gtsed cang/ bzad 'gro'achi ba med pa'i lam dbye dang// yan lag brgyad
lam 'gro bas 'gro 'dod na// 'gro lam mabar phyin 'di ya zham ring gyis// gang zhig bdagshegs yongs su mchod pa dang// thugs rje mnga' ba de las chos nyan dang// dge 'dun
yon tan thob par 'dod pa ni// yon tan rgya mtsho 'di ya zham ring gyis// skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal zad pa dang// 'khor ba'i bcings pa rnam par grol ba dang// nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam
rnam dag spyod 'dod pa// de ni sems can dag bab zham radi gyis// 'gro ba kun n mdi bod sngog mdzesangashang// gzugs mchog mtshan dang yon tan rgyas pa dang// bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang
'grol 'dod pa// dan blta sdug mkhas pa'i gan dusong// tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang// zab cing blta dka' gting dpag dka' ba la// rnam grol bod 'dod mkhasal
gang yin da// sman pa'i rgyal po'i gan du myur dusong// yon tan 'di dang gzhan yang rnam mang dang// srid pa'i bde dang de bzhin mya ngan 'das// yon tan thams cad
kyi rab tu rdzogs 'dod pa// de ni brtul zhugs grub mkhas gan du song// tshig de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'bum dang//

'thab bral gyi lha 'bum dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang/ 'phrul dga' lha 'bum dang/ bdud kyi ris kyi lnga sngon gyi dge ba'iles kyis byung ba drug khri dang/ tshas ris kyi lha drug khri brgyad stong dang//
rgyu 'og min gyi bar gyi lha brgya stong mang po dag 'dus par gyur ba dang/ gzhan yang shar phyogs dang/ lha phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs nas lha'i bu brgya stong mang po 'dus par
gyur pa de dag las gang dag mchog tu bya ba'i lha'i bu dag gis lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag cag rnams kyi bsam pa yang dag pa 'dra
ya tshig 'di lha ya dbang po bdag gis gsan du gsol// 'dod pa'i dga' byor bsam gtan bde ba mchog spradas te// sems can dag pa dam pa 'di ya zham 'di bgyi// lhums su
gshegs dang lcams na ba shugs dang bltams pa'i tshi/bdag nyid chen po mchod 'os shin tumachod par bgyi// bsod nams dag gis bsrungs pa'i dradasrod yongs bsudas nas//
tsa zhi sded sems kyis gus kyad gags nad 'gyur ma mchis// klu dbyangs sil snyan rol me'i dbyangs sgra legs bsgrags pas// yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i yon tan bsngags brjod de//
gang thos skye babyang chub mchog tu sems baskyed pa// lha dang mi rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyi// rgyal po'i pho brang me tog bsal mas rgyas par dgang// a ga ru mchog nag pos
bdugs te dri ma bgyi// de yi tshe lha ma rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing// nad med rigs nad bral zhing bde bar 'gyur bar bgyi// me tog man+dar dang kun nas 'du ba dang// sam byed rab tu
sim byed sU la rnam snang dang// me tog bzang pos phrin las dag las khyud bde// ma chod pa'i slad du ser skya'i grong kun dgar bar bgyi// ji srid yum gyi lhums na drig sum ma gos
bzhugs// ji srid rga shi mthar phyin bltams par gyur gyi bar// dusrid dus su dang ba'i yid kyi sham rang bgyi// blo gros chamang mchod pa bgyi bar bdag cag sams// bltams nas
gom pa bdun gshegs brgya byin tshangs pa yis// lag tu bdas te sngos chu nag gis sku bsil ba// sems can rnam par dag pa de ni mthong bas// lha mi'i dag thob pa rgya chen legs
par 'thob// ji srid bar du 'jig rten rjes su mthuna mdzad par// 'dod pa'i nyon mongs 'joms mdzad btsun mo'i nang bzhugs la// ji srid cig na rgyal srid kun sbyangs khab nas 'byung
desrid dus su dar ba'i sems kyis zham ring bgyi// ji srid cig na lan bsnams byang chub snying por gshegs// ji srid gcig tu bdud bcom byang chub reg gyur cing ka
tshangs pa khrag khrig 'khor lo bskor bar gsal btab pa// de srid bde bar gshegs la mchod pa rgya chen bgyi// sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med btul gyur te// stod gsum
khams su sangs rgyas phrin las nam langs nas// zhi zhing bsal ba'i mya ngan 'das par gshags gyur pa// de srid kun gyi drad srong grags chen gtar ma bgyid// dge slong dag
de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs phun sum tshogs ba mthado nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ so mas can dag pa mchog dam pa ji lta bu
'dzin par 'gyur ba'i na chung de ni ji lta bu zhibed yod snyam nas/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ me tog dang sres dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa na chog tu bya ba dag khyer nas lha'i lus yid las
grub pa thob cing/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag skad cig de nyid la lha'i pho brang de nas ma snang bar gyur te/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen po

dam pa bskyed mos tshal brgya stong gsabargyan pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchogakhang bzangs chen po ngang skya ldan zhes bya ba lha'i dbang po'i pho brang lta bu der phyin nas/lha bi bu mo gos
lhug lhug po gyenang/ dge ba dri ma med pa'i bsod nams gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ lha'i rgyan gyis lag pa yin tu brgyan pa tsheg gis lha mo skya ba phyul mal mchog gi steng na 'dug
pa mthong nas/ phan tshunamadzub mos ston cing/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de gcig gcig tshigs su bcad de sbas pa// lha gnas 'khod pa'i lha yi bu mo rnams/
yid bod byang chub sems dpa'i sku mthong nas//de tshe de dag 'di snyam sems gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' yum 'gyur ci 'dra snyam// lag na me tog phreng can de dag rnams// the tshom
skyes nas rgyal po'i pho brang du// me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas su// sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud cing lcags// lhug lhug gos gyon 'jo bag gzugs 'chang bas// lha mo sgyu
'phrul mal sted gnas mthong nas// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mos phyag byas te// mi mi bud med gzugs la legs ltos 'dzer// bdag cag nga rgyal sams kyis mngon sems
pa lha yi bu mo'agazugs mchog yid 'ong snyam// rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di yi gzugs mkhongan// lha yi lus kyad zil gyis non par mthong// 'di na gad zag mchog gis yum bgyur
du// yon tan ldan pas shin tu gshazhang 'os// nor bu rin chen snod bzang gnas pa ltar// lha mo 'di ni lha yi lhasnod yin// rkang lag mthil dang spyi bo man chad du// yan lag mar
bod lha las lhag pa ste// mig gas blta na ngoms par 'gyur ma yin// yid nar sems ni phyir zhing dga' bar 'gyur// 'di yi ba bzhin lus mdzes sdug
ba ni/ nam mkha'i dkyil na zla ba mdzes pa'i dra// nyi ltar dri med me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'di yi lus las 'od gsal bzad po 'byung// gser sbram btsom khazang po'i gser bzhin du//
lha mo 'di ya kha dog rnam par mdzes// 'di yi skani' ngam gtsang dri zhim sta// bung ba mchog gi mdog 'dralcang lor 'khyil// de yi mig ni kharlo'i 'dab ma 'dra// rnam dag soni/
nam mkha'i skar ma bzhin// skad pa gzhu ltar phra zhing sta zur yas// phrag pa zlum zhing tshag rnams mngon pa med// bar legs glang po mchog gi sna 'dra sta// byin ba shin tu legs
pi na gyis phra// rkang lag mthil mnyam shin tu dmar ba ste// 'di ni gzhan mni lha ma bu mo des// de ltar rnams mang du mar blta byas nas// me tog gtor tu bskor ba byas
nas ni// grags ldan rgyal ba'i yum la bstodabyas te// sad cig gcig gis phyir yang lha gnas dang// de nas phyogs bzhi skyong ba bzhi po dang// 'thab bral rab dad brgya byin
! 'phrul ba dang// lha tshogs lha min grul bum srin po dang// mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye ches snas ba// skyes bu mchog gi mdun du khyed deng la// skyes bu dam pa de la bsrung dang bskyab
pa bgyis// 'gro ba dag la yid kyis snang med// ma rnams la yang gtse ba ma byed cig/ lha mo skyabaphrul khyim mchog gang gnas pa// der ni na thun par 'khor dang lhan cig kun//
mda' gzhural gri mdung thud mtshon thogs la// nam mkha'i dkyilanag nas te blta bar gyis// de ltar sha 'pho'i dus shes lha bu rnams// ma rtog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas ni// sor
bcu'i thal mo sbyar te 'dud byos la// dga' ba'i sems kyis sgyu 'phrul drung du dong// smra ba'i seng ge 'i dusanading lags kyis// 'jig rten kun l thugs rjesabartse bskyod de// ma dbang
sa mas can dag la 'chi 'pho sten// mchod sbyin don du bdag cag gsol ba 'debs// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' mi 'apa'i dus kyi tshe/ de shar phyogs
nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa// dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang bo dag/ byang chub sems dpa ba la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sen
dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa// dga' ldan gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong
phrag mang po dag/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas// lha'i bu mo'abum
phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sel snyan dang/ glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lcags
so// de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum kha dang/ 'thab bral dang/ ga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyin r nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa/
pa'i sal stan dang/ glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dbab ga la ba der lhags so// de nas byang chub sems
rgyu dab 'a khang pa rtsegs pa chen po bsod nams thams cad kyis yang dag par byung ba dpal gyi snyid po lha rnams kyis kun nas blta ba'i nang du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dbab de dag dang/ lha
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas bskyod par brtsams so// dge snyed dag de ltar bskyod par brtsams pa'i tshe/
byang chub sems dpas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgya che zhing yangs la/ thag gru che ba 'di sngon chad ma byung ba'i 'od snang ba lha'i 'od lashin
tu 'das pas yongs su gsal zhing snang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar gang sdug pa sdig pas khebs nas/ mun pa mun nag snag tu gyur pa/ snang ba med pa/ gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag
'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mathu che la/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pas kyang/ 'od dang kha dog dang/ gzi brjid kyi las mar ma gyur/ thal lar ma gyur/ lhang nger ma gyur pa//

dan sa mas can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang rang gi lag pa brkyang pa' da na ma thong ba de dag tu'ang de'i tshe/ snang ba chen pos rgyas par khyab par gyur cing/ der skyes pa'i nyi mas can de dag snang
ba des khyab par gyur nas/ gcig gis gcig mthong zhing/ gcig gis gcig shes te/ 'di skad du kyi grogs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so// kyi grogs po dag

sems can gzhan dag kyang 'di skyes so zhes zer bar gyur pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkya'o//stong gsum gyi stong chen bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang/ ltas chen pokhatse brgyad du gsos/
rab g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'o gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// ldog rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'khrugs/ rab tu ba khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug
so/ 'ur bur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chos chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// dbusadom na
mtha' mtho bar gyur to// shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to// lho phyogs dma'an byad phyogs mtho bar gyur to// byang
phyogs dam na lho phyogs mtho bor gyur to// de'i tshe sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba tsham par 'gyur ba/ mgu bar 'gyur ba/ dad bar 'gyur pa/ sam par gyur pa/ mnyan
par 'gyur pa/ bsngags par 'os ba [7 ] mtshungs pa med pa/ mnyan na gtang ma bra ba/ mi mthun ba mi da ba/ dngar bar 'gyur ba med pa dag kyang grags par gyur to// skad cig de la sems can
gang la yang gnod pa 'am/ 'jigs pa bam/ dngang ba 'am/ bganod pa med par gyur to// skad cig de la nyi zla dang/ brgya byin dad/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dag ga 'od kyad
mi snang bar gyur to// sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dad/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde ba
thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma 'gyur/ zhe sdang gis gnod par ma 'gyur/ gti mug gsaganod par ma 'gyur zhing/ phrag dog gam
ser sna'am/ nga rgyal bam/ 'chab pa dang/ rgyags pa 'am/ khro ba 'am/ gnod sems sam/ yongs su gdung bas gnod par 'gyur ba med par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang
skad cig de la phan tshun pha ma tsam du sems pa'i 'du shes su gyur nas/ byams pa'i sems dang/ phan pa'i sems dad ldan par gyur to// lha dang mi'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong dug kyang ma dkrol ma blangs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin par gyur to/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang lag pa dang/ phrag pa dang/ spyi bos gzhal med khang chen po de dag 'degs
tsang khyer bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag gis kyang rang rang gi glu dbyangs blangs te/ mdun dang rgyab dang/ g.yas g.yon dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la glu dbyangs kya sgra skad kyis
mngon par bstod pa/ khyod kyis sngon chad dge las bsags pa dang// yun rangs dus kyi dge bas byung ba dang/ khyod kyis chos rnams kun gyis tshul sbyangs pas// do ring mchod pa rgya chen byud
par gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon// sras mo sras sdug sbyin pa mdzad pas na// lha yi me tog char du bab ba 'di// sbyin pa spyad pa de yi 'bras bu lags// gtso bo khyod kyis
rang gi sha bcad de// srang la gcal nas thugs byon bya phyir btang/ sbyin pa de spyad pa la 'bras bu des// yi dgas 'jig rten rnams kyang zas skom thob// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod
kyis sngon// tshul khrims ma zhig mnyams bsrungs pas na/ d+hAtshul khrims de spyad pa la 'bras bu des// ma khom ngan song yongs su dag par gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon//
byang chub bsgrub pa'i gzhir na bzod pa bsgoms// bzod pa de spyad pa ya'abras bu des// lha dang ma kun byams ba'i sams su gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// brtson 'grus ma
gong dam pa bsgoms pas na// brtson 'grus de spyad pa ya 'bras bu des// sku ni ra rab bzhin dumadze sa par grub// bskal pa bya ba mad par khyod kyis sngon// nyon
mongs sbyangs slad bsam gtan bsgoms mdzad pas// bsam gtan de spyad pa ya 'bras bu des// 'gro ba kun la nyon mongs gnod mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon//
nyon mongs gcod pa ba shes rab bsgoms mdzad pas// shes rab de spyad pa yi 'bras bus// 'od gsal dam pa rnam pa snang zhing mdzes// byams pa'i go mnabs nyon mongs 'a rdzoms
ma'i mdzad cing// sems can kun la thugs rje che byung ba// dgyes pa mchog brnyes btang snyoms mchog ldan pa// bdagshegs tshangs gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab sgron ma'i
'od dang gzas 'phags shing// gti mug skyon gyi mun pa kun sel ba// 'dren pa stong gsum dag na mig gyur pa'i// thub pa lam ston khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon
shes mchog la mkhas// bden pa gzigs shing dam pa'i don bslabs pa// brgya la nas srog chags gzhan dag sgrol mdzad pa// bde gshegs grol gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
thabs dang mngon shes dam pa kun la mkhas/ 'chi 'pho 'chi 'pho med pa'i 'pho bston// 'jig rten chos kyirjes su mthun mdzad kyang// 'jig rten gang du'ang chags pa khyod mi mang
gang dag byed na nyan tam ltar lhags pa// de dag thob pa dam pa bsam ma khyab// khyod las chos nyid thos te gang dad cing// dga' ba yangs pa skyes pa smos ci 'tshal// dga' ldan
gnas rnams kun na mog mog gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma mngon du shar// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam ma khyab// nyon mongs gnyid kyis log las sad par mdzad//
deng na babrang 'byor cang rgyas gyural/ bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams lang long gyur// lha ya khums sal snyan sgra phyung bas// rgyal bo'i khab na sgra snyan grag par gyur// bsod nams
gzi brjid rdzogs shing las dge ba// bud med gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan gyur pa// de yi sras gyur de ni da ltar 'byor// dpal gyis 'jig rten gsum na zil gyis gnon/
ma mchog 'byung ba de yag brjid kyis// deng phyi phyin chad pho brang dam pa 'di'i// lus can rnams la 'dod sdang bathab rtsod med// kun kyad byams pa'i sems kyis srid zhur bcas//
'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyal byung bas na// rgyal po'i rigs ni rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur// ser skya'i grong 'di shin tu phun sum tshogs// rin chen mdzod kyis rab tugang bar
'gyur// gnod sbyin srinapo grul bum gsang ba pa// lha dang lha mnitshogs rnams dbang por bcas// mi mchog srung ba gang dag gnas pa rnams// de dag ring por ma thogs thar
0 @#// pa batholo// gus dad su zhu la ni gnas nas su// 'dren pa khyod bstod bsod nams gang bsags pa// kun kyang byang chub tun yongs su bsdo// mi la dam pa
khyod ltar rgyun du shog/ bskyod par brtsams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////dge slong dag de ltar dgun bdas te/ dpyad kyi dus la dpyad zla tha chung gi tshe/ skar ma sa ga
la bab pa'i dus kyi ram pa la/ shing rnams kyi lo ma rgyas shing me tog mchog tu rgyas nas/ grang dro dang/ mun pa dang/ rdul med cing sa gzhasdo gzhon nu skyes pas labs par/
tshu gnas pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyi mchod pas dus la bab pa'i tshod la rnam par gzigs nas/ tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la skar ma rgyal gyi dus su// yum gso sbyong/
blangs pa'i rum du/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'phos te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du/ glang po'i phru gu thal dkar mche bajug dad ldan pa/ mgo'i kha dog srin bu
ldam bu chu gsher gyi mdog lta bu/ mche ba la gsar 'tshig pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ dbang po nyams pa medakhar byas te/ mab glo g.yas pa nas bzhugs so//
zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas logs su brten te gnas kyi/ glo g.yon pa logs su nam yang ma brtan to// lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal bdab na nyal ba des kyang milam 'di lta bu mthong ngo//
glang po kha ba dngul mdog mche ba drug/ rkang lag rab mdzes mgo bo ma ra sdug pa// bgros bza lus tshogs rdo rdzobazhin brtan pa// glang po'i mchog gcig khong dusong snyam byed//
des na de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lam na'ang// ma mthong ma thos myong bar ma gyur to// lus kyad bde zhing sems kyad bder gyur nas// bsam gtan mnyam par gzhag pa bzhin du gyur/
de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rgyan dang gos lhug lhug poragyon cing thogs pa las// lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang/ rangs pa dang/ nyams bde ba thob nas/
mal dam ba de las langs te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ khang bzad s deb steng nas babs te/ shing chu mtshang ga te nags tshal ga la ba der song
nas/ de mya ngan mtshad gi nags tshal du bde bar 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du pho nya btang nas/ rgyal po gshegs su gsol/ lha mo de khyod kyi zhal mthong bar bzhed do zhes
byas pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas rab tu dgab par gyur te/ lus g.yos nas khri bzang po las langs te/ blon po dang/ grong rdal bdang/ 'khor dang/
gnyen pa'i skye bo dag gis yongs su khasor tsar mdun du bdar te/ mya ngan mchang gi nags tshal ga la ba der song ngo// song nas kyang bdag gis lus shin tu lci ba snyam byed nas/
zhe brgyad ma rtswa
// mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal du 'gro ma nus te/ de mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal gyi sgor bdug nas cung zad cig bsams te/ de'i tshe tshags su bcad pa 'di sbas so/bdag
ni g.yu la du dub 'a bab phul phyin pa// dong ltar lus lce bdag gis myong mi dran// bdagag khyim dubang 'gro ba' deng ma nus// kyi ma bad rtsi su la dri bar bya// gnus ga tsar ma'i ris kyis lha dag/
nam mkha'i dkyilan ba khod nas lus phyed mngon par sprul te/ rgyal bo zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rakab thub brtul zhugs yon tan 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod//
byams dang snying rje tho bas bsod nams ye shes dbang bskur ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' che ba dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos gyur te// rgyal bo khyod kyi sras gyur lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngal du
zhugs// de tshe rang gi mgo cag sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas te// rgyal po rim gro bya bar ldan gyur de yi nang du zhugs// ngargyal dregs pa med pas lha mo sgyu 'phrul don bltas te// ngas ni khyod
la ca bya nu sbyar khyod kyis nga la smos// lha mos snyas pa/ kha ba dngul gyi mdog du 'du nyi zla 'od las 'phags pa ste// rkang lag legs shang rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid// glang po'i
bdag ni nyal zhing mchis na lha rnams bye bas rab tu bstod// 'on kyang bdag la 'bro zhing batshig dang zhe sdang rmongs ma mchis// zhi ba'i sems su gyur cing bsam gtan bde dang ldan sAm bgyid//
bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni rigs la dge 'am dngos sam ci// bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni ya nga dag ldan par lud ston pa// rig byed milam gzhung la mkhas shing gza' yi cho ga mkhan// rgyal po myur du bram
zi 'dig legs par dgug lugasalo// de skad tshag thos rgyal pos de yi dus kyi skad cig la// bram ze rig byed bstan bcos gzhung la shin tu mkhas pa gnyer// sgyu 'phrul bram ze rnams kyi/
mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras// kho mos rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong n de yi lo rgyus gson/ bram ze rnams kyis sbas pa// lha mos bka' stsal du gsol// khyod kyis rmi lam pa 'dra ba zhig gzig
thos nas kyang dpyad par bgyi// lta mos smras pa/ kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste/ rkang lag legs shar rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid// glang po'i dam pa rdo
ste bzhin du tshig brtan gazugs bzang ba//bdagag rum du zhugs pa de yalo rgyus mnyan par gyis/de skad tshig thos nas nibram ze rnams kyis 'di skadasas// rigs la dngos po la mchis
dgyes pa rgya chen barnyes par 'gyur// khyod la sras mnga' mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa skye bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i rigs su rigs ldan 'khor lo sgyurab che ba nyid// gal te 'dod pa dag dang rgyal
srid pho brang sbyangs gyur te// 'jig rten kun la thugs brtse chags med rab tu byung gyur na// de ni 'jig rten gsum na sbyin gnas sangs rgyas 'gyur pa ste// bdud rtsi
mchog gi ro yis 'jig rten thams cad tshim mdzad gyur// de skad tshig snyan lung bstan te/ rgyal po'i pho brang zan zes nas/ bya dga' byin pa blangs nas su/ bram ze de dag dong ngo// nag

slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas bram ze mtshan dang ltas shes shing rnam par 'byed pa dang/ rmi lam gyi gzhudangashes pa dag las de skad kyi tshig de thos nas tshame zhing mgu ste/ yi dngas la
rab tu dga' zhing/ dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ bram ze de dag bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ myang ba mang po nyams su bsod pas tshim zhing ngoms par byas nas/bya dga' byin bkya'o//

de nyid kyi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de'i sgo bzhi na/ grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo thams cad du sbyin pa byin te/ jitsam du byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/
zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams lan gos/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhonapa/ sbos 'dod pa rnams la ni sbos/ phreng ba 'dod pa
rnams la ni phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni phyug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ 'tshob 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba byon no// dge slong dag da
0 nas zlul po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'di khyim gang na 'dug na bde zhing nyon mongs pa med par 'dug par 'gyur snyam pa dang/ de nas skad cig nyid la rgyal po
chen po bzhi/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// lha thugs las su ma mdzad par btadasnyoms su bde bar bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems
dba'i pho brang bsham mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// skyong ba'i gzhal med khang rnams dan//sum cu rtsa
gsum pa yi bzang// byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang ni// rnam par rgyal tsam bdag gi dbul// de nas lha'i bu rtab 'thab bral rgyal bo zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di
skad ces smras so// kho bo'i khang khyim mthong gyur nas/ brgya byin bye ba ngo mtshar gyur/ 'thab bral rab kyi dpal ldan khang/ rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul// de nas
lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grags pa chemada' sngon chadan//dga' ldan gang du bzhugs gyur ba/ pho brang dam pa 'dzan par
rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// dpal ldan yid las grub pa'i khang/
0 @#// de ni rin chen rang bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' mchod don du/ rgyal po bdag gis dbul bar bgyi// de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'aphrul dbang byed rgyal po
zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces skyas so// 'dod pa'i khams gnas ji snyed pa// gzhal med khang mdzes gang yod pa// bdag gi gzhal med khang dung na// 'od dang mdog
kyang gtor bar snang// de bas dpal ldan bdag gis dbul// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// rin chen rang bzhin pho brang bzang// de ni rgyal po blang bar gyis// lta ya ma tog
rab bkang ste// lha ya spos kyi ngad ldad pa'i// pho brang yangs pa bdag gis dbul// der ni lha mo bzhugs bar gyis// dge slong dag de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i
dbang po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i phyir// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa der rang bdag byis phul bar gyur to// rgyal bo zas gtsang mas kyar
mi'i las ni bdas kyis/ lha yin na ma gyur pa bshams par gyur ta/ de la byang chub sems dpa ba bkod pa chen po'i tade de 'dzin gyi mthus/ khyim de dag thams cad du lha mo sgyu ba phul
mngon bar ston to// byang chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi dum na 'dug pa' tshi/ glo g.yas phyogs 'gos su skyil mo krung bcas te gnas par gyur to// lha'i dbang po de dag
thams cad kyang so so nas bdag nyid kyi khyim na byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dug gi/ gzhan ma yin no zhes de ltar shes par gyur to// de la 'disad ces bya ste/ ting Ta'adzan bkon/
ba che la gnas gyur to/ sbal pa bsam gyis ma khyabasprul byas nas// lha rnams thams cad bsam pa rdzogs bar byas// rgyal po'ang de ltar yid bzhin bsam pa grub
de nas lha' ra de'i nang nas/ lha'i bu khacig 'odi snyam du sems te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang yin pa de dgakyang mi'i lus kyi dra brin skyong zhade 'khyolo na/ da ma yan pa'i lha
gzhan sum curtsa gsum pa 'am/ 'thab bral lam/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dag lta smos kyang ci dgos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gtsa bzhi ng dra u0f7ada ba dad bral ba/ 'jig rten thams
cad lasa mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can rin po che dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums ma lus dri ma zhim par zhugs par gyur snyam pa dang//
da nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bud med kyi lus M na smad pa lags pa dang/ 'dod
chags la spyod rtsis bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhinagshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar che na/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sngon byang chub
sems dpar gyur pa/ 'di ltar dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums mi'i lus su glo g.yas phyogs su brten te bzhugs so zhes bgyi
ba 'di ni rab tu mang ngo mtshar che ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad do zhes de skad du smras pa nabadag la ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan bdas kyis
bkab stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod byang chub sems dang 'a yongs su spyad pa/ rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba gang byang chub sems dpa' ba'i dug na gnas pa'i yongs su sad par gyur pa mthong
bar ba dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni da lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus na de lags te/ de bzhin gshegs par byang chub sems dpa'i longs su spyad
pa de bstan te mthong na glo ba dga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs ba ]tshadas pa
'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tshangs pa'i 'a jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/ das bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgobos phyag 'tshal
te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyen bzhin
du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod kyis sngon du byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i rna ba num nazla ba bcu 'dug 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyod
pa blangs sam/ gsol pa/ ]bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshadas pa de deg la yod ston cig/ gsal pa/
bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na mchis lags/ bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa de'i phyir zla ba bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de 'dir khyod kyis ston go dang/ jitsas
du 'dus byas pa shes par 'gyur ro// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs pa dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyad pa rin po
che bkod pa de blang gis de'i bar du khyed 'khod cig/ de nas ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nas ga
snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig de nyid la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin to// de nas me mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i bu tshadas pa bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so//
grogs po khyod song la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'di man chad/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas yan chad du sgra sgrogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che ni bkod pa bdag cag gis de
[0a ]@#// bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug nas/khyed kyi nang nas mthong bar su dga' ba myur du shog cig ces smras go bar gyis shig/ de nas ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/

lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su sbyar pa rin po che bkod pa blangs te// tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag tshad sum brgya pa'i

stang du bzhag nas/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du phab// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zham rang du 'ded ba na skyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dus pa chen por gyur
zla te/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de yang lha'i gos dang/ lha'i phreng ba dang/ lha'i sbos dang/ lha'i mi tog dang/ lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang/ lhagi longs
stod rnams kyis mngon par bdun byas par gyur cing/ lha dbang che bar grags pa dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni 'di tsam ste lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su 'dug nas rgyang
rang po nas/ gdong thal mos bskyabs te/ mgo byol nas bltas kyang mthor bar ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i nang na tshangs pa dag ni mthu che ba ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab
bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dag kyang dengag gdung na dma' ba yin na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta smos kyang ci dgaso/de nas bcom ldan 'das/
kyis de'i tshe/ lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'as de dag zhi bar mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de thos pa tsam gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma rnams myo mya par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro/
de nas rgyal bo chen po bzhi lha'i dbad pa brgya byin gyi drung du lcags nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po khyad chub sems dpa'i yongs su sbyad pa rin po che bkod pa 'di bdag cag gis
mthong bar mi nus na ji ltar bgyi/ des de dag la snas pa/ grogs po dag kho bos khyod ji ltar bya/ kho bo nyid kyis kyang mthong bar ma nus so// grogs po dag 'on kyang da ni nam bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar phul ba de'i tshe mthod grang ngo// de dag gis sbas pa 2 lha'i dbang po de bas na/ ci nas kyang myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/ smras pa/ grogs po dgag lha'i
bu mngon par 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar phyin te/ dga' bar bya ba'i tshig brjod par gyur gyi bar du sdod cig/ de nas de dag phyogs gcig tu 'khod
da mgo byol nas/ bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing 'khod par gyur to/ 4/ de nas ma mjed kyi bdag po tshadu pa lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub
sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod ba de khyer te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der phul lo// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni/ gzugs bzang/
mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ steng khang pa brtsigs pas legs par brgyan pa ste/ de'i tshad ni'aphar du 'di lta ste dper na/ byis pa
btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa tsam mo/ khangasaM brtsegs pa de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/ byis pa btsas nas zla ba drug len pa 'dug pa'i stegs butsam ma// byang chub sems
dba'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de'i kha dog dang dbyibs ni 'di lta bu ste/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de'i dbyibs dang/ kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// lta rnams/
zla kyis de mthong na yang mag 'khrugs shing ngo mtshar du gyur to// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhag na lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge sta dper na mgar ba mkhas pas gsor shin tu
bzhu ste/ legs par sbyangs nas// dri ma'i skyon med pa ra byas pa'i gser bzhin du khad pa brtsegs pa de rnam par mdzes so// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su snyad pa de'i nad du khri bshams
pa ni byang chub sams dpa'i dung mgrin ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang/ kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// tshangs pa chen posags bgos pa de la dbyang
chub sems dpa'i khri de'i drung na mdzes par ma snang ba/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung dang char gyis btab pa'i la ba nag po bzhin no// khang pa brtsigs pa de nitsan dan sbralagyi snyed pa las byas
pa ste// de'i phyi ma zhe gcig labang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams sa ngan du ma chog go/ khang pa brtsigs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyis snying po dolta bu s kun nas bskor bsta/ 'ad ba brtsegs
pa de dang 'dra ba gnyis pa gcig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa dad po de'i nad na ma chags ma reg par 'dug go/ khang pa brtsigasaM pa de khon dang 'dra ba gsum pa gcig kyang/ khang pa brtsigs pa/
gnyis pa de'i nang na ma rig ma chags par 'dug go/ sbyos kyi khang pa brtsigs pa gsum pa de'i nang du khri de bzhag ste/ gdan bting ngo// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de kha dog ni rnam pa 'di
lta ste/ dper na ba zur ston po'i rig dam pa dang ldan pa bzhin no// spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'khor na/ ma tog lha las 'dus pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
kyad ma skyed par/ byang chub sems dpa'i ston gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas khang pa brtsigs pa der skye// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni rdo rje'i ring
bzhin te/ sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa ste ka tsa lina'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'o// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas bkod pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub
sems dpa' yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der kun tu snang ngo// gang ga nub mo byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du 'jug pa de'i nub mo log gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/ sa chen po
rngams dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brtol te/ pad+mabyung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyibs du mngon par 'phags so// pad+ma de ni khal sbyor ba skyes/
bu dam pa dang/ tshadas pa chen po brgya phrag bcu'i stod la dbang bas mthong du zad kyi/ gzhan sus kyada mthong ba med do// stong gsum gyi stor chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dan steng
khudang/ sAd po dad bcud ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pad+machen po de la zil mngar gyi thages pa chags te 'dug nas/ da tshangs pa chen bsab pa'i snod bzang bos blangs shing
zla/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/ byang chub sems dang sa kyang de blangs te tshangs pa chen po'asnying brtse ba'i phyir 'thungs par gyur to// snying khu'i thigs pa de 'thungs na byang chub sems
dpa'i srid pa tha ma pa// byang chub sems dpa'i na thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ma gtogs pa ra de yang dag par bde bar zhu bar nus pa// sems can gyi khamasan sems can de lta bu de
gang yang med do// las gang gi rnam par smin pas snying khu'i thigs pa de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' la yod par gyur ca na/ byang chub sems dang sa sngon yun 'di bor byang chub sems
rapa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can nad pa dag la sman byin pa dang/ sems can ngs ma pa la rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang/ skyabasasu 'ongs pa rnams
yongs su ma btang ba dang/ rtag par me tog ga phud dang/ 'bras bu' phur dang/ ro'i dud de nga han gshegs pa rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa ba ma nor rna mdzad ng/ de bzhi
gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang/ pha dang ma la phul zhing phyis bdag nyid yongs su spyod spyod pas las de'i rnam par snyan pas tshangs pa chen po// zal mngar gyi thig
ra de byang chubs mas dpa' la 'du la la// khang pa brtsegs pa der gnas kyi khyad par dga' ba dang/ rtsed mo dang/ phreng babargyus pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa 'phags pa ji sud cig yodapa

de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub se mas dpa'i sngon gyi ra sa kyi rnam pas sbyin pas der byung bar snang ngo// byang chub sems dang 'a yongs su spyad pa ni po che bkod pa der/ gas stong phrag brgya'i

rgyan ces bya ba phyug gcig byung ste/ deb u0f7ada 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dang 'a srid pa tha ma pa ma gtogs par/ sems can gyi ras na sems can de lta bu de gang na nga med do// gzugs dang sgra dang
dri dang/ ro dang reg pa mchog tu bya ba dam pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang khang pa brtsigs pa de na med pa gang yad med do////'phagos pargya cher rol
pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bzhi pa// yongs su spyad par bya ba khad pa brtsigs pa de ni 'di ltar phyi nang shin tuyongs su grub pa 'di la shin tu yongs su rdzogs/
00 @#// pa ste/'di lta ste/dper na yul ka ling ka nas byung ba'i dar ltar reg na bde ba'o// de yang 'al byar bstan par zad kyi/ de la dpar med do// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi smon lam/
gyis 'di ni bsam pas 'grub ste/ gdonam za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dbab chen po ma'i 'jig rten du skye dang/ khyim nas mngon pa du byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibadachub
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ ma gang ga rum du skye bar 'gyur ba de'adum g.yas par khang pa brtsegs pa rin po tshe bkod pa dam pa star mngon par 'grub
cing phyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te/ khang pa brtsigs pa der skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug par 'byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'i lus nur
nur po dang me mer po dang/ ltar ltar po dang/ red re da por 'gyur bamed nyid/ yan lag dang/ nying lag dang/ mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'dug bzhin du 'byung la/ lhamo skya

'phrul gyi rmi lam du glang po che chen po'os par mthong ba 'di ni chos nyid do// de de ltar 'dug pa la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu
rtsa brgyadadang/ gang las lag na rdo rje skyes pa'i gnod sbyin gyi rigs gsang ba pa zhes bya ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas/ rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par phye bzhin
'brong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro byed pa'i lha mo bzhi yod de/ su khu la zhes bya ba dang/ mu khu la zhes bya ba dang// rgyal mtshan ldan pa zhes bya ba dang/ 'od dang ldan gzhes

bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ngo/ lha'i dang po brgya byin yang lhab bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub
sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus na rnam pa 'di lta bur gyur te/
dper na/ mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa ba nang na 1 ri'i so la 'jud pa 'dug pa ni dpag tshad gcig nas kyang snang/ dpag tshad lnga'i bar nas kyang snang ngo// de bzhin du byang chub
sa nas dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus mngon par grub pa yang de lta bur gyur te 'od gasal zhing gzugs bzad la mdzes shing lta na sdug par gyur pa de/ khang pa brtsigs pa de 'inang/
du skyil mo krung du 'dug na/ gser gyis le sbrum rigs dang ldan pa rin po cha bezlurgyus brgyan pa lta shan shuladzes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'o mas kyang byang chub sems dar ba rum na 'dug
pa mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin gyi tshogs chen po nang nas glog byung ban snang ba chen po bskyed de// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rulan 'jug pa yang dpaladang/
gzi brjid dang/ kha dog gis nye bar rin po che'i khad pa brtsegs pa dad po de snyadapar byed do// snang bar byas nas sbos kyi 'ad pa rtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar
byed do// sbyosakyi khang pa brtsigs pa gnyis pa snang bar byas nas/sbosakyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snyang bar byed do// skyes kyi khang ba brtsigs pa gsum pa snang bar byas nas/
ma'i lus thams cad snyad bar byed do// de snang bar byas nas/ de stan gang la 'jug pa de snyad bar byed do//desnad por byas nas/ khyim thams cad snang bar byed do// khyim thams cad
T+Tha/ snang bar byas nas// 'od 'phro ba khyim gyi steng du byung ste/ shar phyogs smad bor byed do// de bzhin lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byed phyogs dang/ log dang/ steng dang/ phyogs
bcu kun tu rgyang grags tsam du phyogs re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i dpa' dang/ gzi brjid dad 2 kha dog gis snang ba byas par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar

byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bskur bya ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po tshan po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnod sbyin/
! lnga brgya tsam dag dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe'od s te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas de dag 'ongs par rig nas lag pa g.yas pa brgyang sto/ mdzub mo bsgreng nas stan ston no//
'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa de dag kyang ji ltar bting ba'i stan la 'khod par gyur te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa 'a ma'i rum na 'dug bzhin du/ skyes zin pa'i gzugs dang 'dra bas//
lag pa spyod cade 'dag la/ rnam par bskyod cing gzhog par mthong nas/ de dag dga' mgu zhing nyams bde ba thob ste/ byang chub sems dar ba la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// byang chub
sems dpas kyang de dag de ltar 'khod pa mthong nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yad dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzan du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga'
bar byed do// gang gi tshe de dag 'dong 'dod pa ra gyur pa de'i tshe thang byang chub sems dang ba de dag gi sems sems kyis rnam par shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brgyad ste/ de dag 'dod ba'i brda
ston to// de ltar lag pa brkyang ste 'dor ba'i brda bstan nas/ phyir skum par byed da/ ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag na/ byang chub
sems dpas kyang 'dod bar gnang do snyam sams/shang/ de dag byang chub sems dang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la lan gsum bskor babyas nas 'dong bar gyur to// de ltar byang
chub sems dpa' nub mo ma nyal nas lag pa g.yas pa brgyang zhing/ brkyang nas kyang bskum pa dang/ bskums nas kyang dran zhidangashes bzhin du/ lag pa de 'jog pa brgyu ni de yin no
rkyen ni de yin no// gzhan yang gang ga tsha rgyas pa 'am/ budamed dam/ khye'u 'am/ bumo su yad nud ste/ byang chub sems dang kho blta ba'i phyir 'das pa deb tsho//
thog mar ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya bskya'o// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' ma dga' bar bya ba skya bo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa ba ma 'a ruman 'dug ra ba tshe/ sngar
dga' bar bya ba sprul la mkhas par gyur te/ lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ mi 'am/ ma ma yin pa su la da dung 1 byang chub sems dpa ba la sngon du dga' bar bya ba'i tshig sna bar nus
pa med do// byang chub sems dpa' nyid thog mar dga' bar bya ba lcazhing/ de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o// de nas snga dro'i dus zad de/ nyi ma gud
la bab nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa/ mngon par 'phags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang/ de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/
chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpas de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong bar mthong nas/ gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag dga' bar byed cing/ dzub mo brgyad ste stan ston to// dge slong dag de'i tshibang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyir bzlog ma nusanas ji
ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas chos kyi gtam gyis
yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzan du bajug/ yang dag par gzengs stod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' la go ba gang du brgyad pa de legs su byang chub sam
dpa'i ma yang lta bar gyur to// de nas lha de dag kyang 'disam du bdag cag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya bsnu'o snyam mo// de dag ga re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems
dpa' bdag 'a bab shig la sbaste/ bdag 'ba' zhig la dga' bar bya ba snu'o snyam mo// khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i dbang po brgya byan dar/ sum cu rtsa gsum bab lha de dag gi gzugs brnyan
snang bar gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ma rum na gnas pa longs spyod yongs su dag par gyur pa de lta bu nagazhan dag na med do// dge slong dag gang gi 2 lha'i dbang
bo brgyabyin dang/ de ma yin pa'i lha bdu gzhan dag 'dod bar 'dod par gyur pa deb so'ang 1 byang chub sems dpasade dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ lag pa g.yas pa

brkyang ste/ de dag 'dod pa'i brda ston te// brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do/de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ de ma yin pa'i
lha'i bu sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag kyang 'disnya mdu/ bdag cag byang chub sasems dpas kyang 'dod bar gnad do snyam du sems ngashadi/ de dag kyad byang chub sems dpa' dang
byang chub sems dpa' ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to// dge slong dag nyi ma phyed kyi dus bdas nas/ phyi dro'i dus la bab pa dang/ ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha'i bu/
brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lha yul ba'i snying khu'i bags pa de khyer nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gal bden/ byang chubs mas dpa' de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bya ba
ts+tshA dad bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas man jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas te 'ongs par shes nas/ byang chub semA
dpas yang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa lag pa g.yas ba brgyung ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la dga' bar bya ba skyas te/ mdzub mo brgyad nas stan ston to//
dge slong dag ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' las bzlog pa ma nus nas/ ji ltar btang ba'i stan de dag la ma na nged kyi bdal po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs ris kyi
lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dbas de ltar 'khod par rig nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzed+ma
bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed byang chub sems dpas lag pa gang du brkyang pa de logs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul ya da lta bar gyur to// de ltar na lha de dag kyang bdag cag na byud chub sems/
dpa' dad dga' bar bya ba'i gtam byed do snyam ste/ lha'i bu de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dbab na bdag 'bashag la snaste/ bdag 'ba' shag 'dagab ba'i gtam byed do
snyam mo// dge slong dag gang gi tshe ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang/ byang chub sems dpas de dag gsems kyi rtog
pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ lag pagayaso pa brkyang ste// de dag kha dong ba'i brda ston to// de ltar 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du lag kha
bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag na byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dod bar gnang ngo snyam du sems
shing/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dod bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' yang dran de shes bzhin du lag pa 'jog
par gyur to// dge slong dag shar phyogs dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ bog dar/ stong dang/ phyogs bcu kun nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong
[z ]// mang po byang chub sems dpabade blta ba dang/ de la phyag bya ba dad bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ chos mnyan pa dang/ chos yang dag par brjod par bya ba'i phyir 'od bar gyur
to// de dag de ltar bdas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas lus las bod bkyi ste/ bod kyi bkod pa de dag seng ge 'i khrir sprul nas/ de ltar sprul pa'i khridi dag la byang chub sems dbab de/
dag 'khod du bcug ste/ de dag de ltar 'khod par shes nas 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid rgya cher rnam par dbye ba'i don du dris te brtags kyang skal ba mnyam pa lha rnams ma btog
par gzhan sus kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas nub mo ma nyal nas lus las 'od bkye ba'i rgyun de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// dge slong dag lha mo
sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'a mgi num na 'dug pa'i tshe/ lus lci bar mtshor te/ gzhan du na yad pa dang/ 'jam pa dang/ bde bar tshor zhing lta mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gad/
yong myong bar ma gyur to// 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas kyang yodas su gdung bar mgyur/
laM 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gtso ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la yod rnam par rtog par ma gyur te/ grang ba 'am/ tsha ba 'am/ bkres pa
'am som pa 'am/ mun pa bam/ rdul dang/ dal ba tshor ba 'am/ mthod bar ma gyur te/ de la gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dradang/re dang/ ga yid du ma 'ong bar snang bar ma
gyur to// rmi lam ngan ba yang mthong bar ma gyur to// de le'ud med kyi skya 'am/ g.yo 'am phrug dag gam/ bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang nyams su gnod par byed par ma gyur
do/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ma ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag pa ra blangs te/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhid dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems
dang rim yang skyes pa gang la yang 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar ma gyur la/ skyes pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa' ma la 'dod chags kyi sems ma skyi'o// ser skya'i grong khyer chen po
de yang yul gzhan dag na skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khya'u dang bu mo su gang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zad ng/ 'byung pos non pa ji snyed cig du yod pa de dag thams cad
kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' ma ma byed ma dag tu sosashing dran pa thob par gyur to// mi ma yin pa de dag kyad myur du gnas gzhan du 'dong bar gyur to// sems can gang la la zhig nad
sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur te/ rlung dang/ mkhris pa dang/ bad kan dang/ bdus pa las byung ba'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa dang/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna 'and dam/
lcab nad dam/ mchu'i nad dam/ so nad dam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ shu ba 'am/ 'bras sam/ mdze 'am ]sha bkra 'am/ skam pa 'am/ brjod byed dam/
rims sam/ lba ba 'am/ la mag gam/ me dbal lam/ rkang shu la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' mas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa tsam

gyis nad dang bral bar gyur cing/ rang rang la de gnas su 'dong bar gyur te// ba na lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis rtswa nyag ma 'ga' zhigs las blangs te/ sems can nad pa dag la byin na yang de dag da blad+ma
ma thag tu nad med cing nyams pa med par gyur te//gang gi tshalha mo sgyu 'phrul des bdag gi lto goms par blta bdeb [.]byang chub sa mas dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ma lo
gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gdong gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin te/ de ltar de mthong nas tshan zhid mgu la ya rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba byis par gyur to// dag
slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par lha'i rol mo sa lasnyan gyi sgra 'byung zhing/ lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur
to/ char ni dus bzhin du 'bab/ rlung na dus bzhin du ldang/ dus dang skar ma dag kyang dus bzhin du 'gyur zhing 'a pho bar gyur to// rgyal srid kyang bde zhing lo legs la/ 'khrug pa med cad dag
med par gyur to// ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na/ shAkya'i rigs dang/ sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa thams cad kyang za zhing 'thung/ dgagazhing rtsa la dga' da shur spyod do// sbyin pa dag
kyang gtong/ bsod nams dag kyang byed de/ zla ba bzhi 'das pa'i dus ston pazhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gisartse zhing bde bar gnas pas gnas par gyur to// rgyal po zas
gtsang ma yang tshangs par spyod ba la da dag par blangs te/ rgyal po'i las ba tang nas[7 ]dka' thub kyi nags tshal yongs su dag par gnas pa bzhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis chos
kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'adzum na gnas pa na rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrulagyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pas gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dus na gnas
pa'i tshe gnas gnas ba mthong ngam/gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so//bde bar gsheg pa mthong lag so// de bzhin gshags pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ 'jig
rten skyong ba bzha dang/ dom yin pa'i lta dang/ ma gzhan dag kyang bstan te mtheng nas/ de dag tshim 'di mgu la ya rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes sa// me mched
u@#// kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i phyir yod tshadas pa'i 'jig rten du mchod par byed pa'i phyir btog ste/ phyir nas bzhag par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yong/
dge slong dag la bka ba la/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa ba ma'i rum na 'dug pas lhadar ma khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug theg pa gsum la yongs su sman par byas par gyur to//
de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gang tshe rgyal sras sems can dam pa sa la ma gnas pa//de tshe sa 'ad tshal dad bcas par rnam pa drug tu g.yos// gser mdog 'od bkye ngan sod thams cad rnam
par sbyangs par gyur// chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes lha yi tshogs rnams rab tu dga'// gzhal med khang chen dbyibs legs rin chen du mas rnam par spras// der ni dpa' bo rnam par
'dun pa bzhugs par gyur nas 'dug/ tsan dan dri zhes chog gis rab tugad zhad rnam par mdzes// stong gsum rin chen yongs su bkang bad yi srad phyad ran ma chig/ stong chen 'jig rten
khams kyan 'og nas brtol ba byas nas na// yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas kyi pad+ma'i sAde khu'i thig pa khyud// da ni zhag bdun bsod nams gzi brjid tshadas pa'i 'jig rten 'a lags// dalas
nying khu'i thags blangs tshangs pa rgyal ba'i sras la 'bul// byang chub sams dpa' dba' bo tshangs ba 'dra ba ma gtogs par// sems can gang gis de zos 'jur 'gyur sems can nas
na med// bskal pa du ma'i bsod nams gza bde snyer khu'i thags gnas pa// de zas lus dang sems dang shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// 'dren pa mchod phyir brgya byin tshadas pa/
'jig rten skyong ba rnams// byang chub sa mas dpa'i drud du rtag par dus gsum rgyun tu 'ong// phyag byas mchod byas chos kyi dam pa de dag thos gyur nas// bskor ba byas te kun kyang gang
nas khengs pa'i gnas su 'dong// 'jig rten khams rnams kun nas chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' 'ong// 'od bkod khrir gyur rnams la de dag gnas par phan tshun snang// mchog tu bya
ba'i theg pa dam pa'i chos ni thos gyur nas// kun kyang dga' bab gi mas bgyur bstod pa'i phreng ba brjod cing ba dong// bud med byas pa gang dag sdug bsngal ldan par gyur pa dang// 'byung pos
non dad sems 'khrugasags med rdul gyis yog pa rnams// de kun lha mo sgyu 'phrul mthong nas sems ni red gyur te blo gros rtog da dran dang ldan zhing so so'i khyim khyer ba dang/ rlung dang bad kan
mkhris pa'i nad dang 'dus pa'i nad thebs dang// mig nad rna nad dgags lus sems ma bder gyur ba dag/ rnam mang tha dad nad kyi rnam pas gang dag gnod gyur pa// de dag sgyu 'phrul 'a ga pa
mgo la bzhag pas nad med gyur// yang na rtswa yi nyag na bgazhag sa las blangs byas te// sgyu 'phrul nad pa byin na thams cad rims nad med par gyur// bde ba thob tsir da red ma nyams
[g] ]/so so'i khyim du 'dong// de ni sman gyur sman pa'i rgyal po rum na bdud du phyir ro// gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul bdag gi lus la brtag byas pa// de tshe byang chub sems dpa'
kyi rum na 'dug pa mthong ba ni ji ltar bar snang gnas kyis zla ba skar mas bskor gnas pa// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan pa snang// de la bdod chags zhe sdang gti
chug gnod par 'gyur ba med// de la bdod la de med de la phrag dog ba tsha ba med// dga' ba'i sams dang mgu ba'i sems dang dga' dad lad bder gnas// de la bkres dang skom dang tshe dang/
rtsa grang ba'i gnod pa med// lha yi rol mo sal snyan dbyangs sgram byas rtag tu 'byung// lha yi spos dri me tog dam pa mchog mdzes cha ra yad 'bab// lha dang mi rnams de la lta zhing lha ma thams
cad kyang// de dag phan tshun gnodapa med cing 'tshe ba gang yang med// sems can dga' bder rtse zhing zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa byed// dga' ba'i sgra sgrog gas de dag dag zhing mgu ba'i yar
dang ldan// rgyal po'i srid bde 'khrug pa med cing char ba dus bzhin 'bab// rtswa dar sman dad me tog rnams kyang de yi dus su skye// rgyal po'i khab tu zhag bdun rin chen char pa babagyur pas
sems can dbul po de las len cing sbyin byed bde bar spyod// sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal gyur ba de tshegang yang med// rir ba 'om gyi dga' tshal sems can bzhin du dga'/
dang ldan// shAkya'i rgyal po de yad gso sbyong rab la nyer gnas shing// de ni rgyal po'i bya ba ma byed chos la rtag par spyod// de ni dka' thug nags tshal song nas lha mo sgyu 'pha'al//
sems can mchog su la khyod kyi lus la bde ba ci 'dra rmad// lhums su 'jug pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i bskyed mos tshal du snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis byud ngo// sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhin/ ma tog thams cad la 'bus
nas rgyas par gyur pa dang/ rdzing dag na me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu da rad/ pad+ma dkar po yod pa dag kyang kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur ba dang/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing
ljon pa gsar pa dag kyang sa las 'thon te/ kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur ba dang/ rin pa che'i shing ljon pa brgyud byud ba dang/ gter chen po nyi khri 'bus te byung nas gnas bar snang ba dang/
khyim gyi nad du yad rin po che'i myu gu 'thon pa dang/ spos chu'i dad la dpal gyi lnga 'bru mar dri nam pas sbags pa rnams kyang zag par gyur pa dang/ gangs kyi ra'i ngogs las sa ga'i
phrugagu dag 'das te/ dga' bar rtse zhing ser skya'i grong khyer dam pa la bskor ba byas nas/ sgo na gnas par gyur kyang/ sems can gang la yang 'tsho ba med bar gyur pa dang/ glang po'i
phrug gu thal kar lnga brgya lhags te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rkad pa lasna'i rtse mos nyug cing gnas par gyur pa dang/ lha'i byis pa dogs pa ska rags bcings
pa dag kyad/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khoragyi pang pa nas pad pa rab tu 'gre ldog par snyad bar gyur pa dang/ klu'i bu mo mchod pa sna tshogs kyi yo byad thogs pa dag kyang lus
phyed phyud nga nam mkha' la rgyu bar snang pa dang/ lha'i bu mo khra yang rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs share nam mkha' la 'khod par snang ba dang/ bum pa gang ba khri yang ser skya'i gnas kyi
lca grong khyer chen go la bskor ba byed par snyad bdad/ lha'i bu mo khro lang sos chub ril bab+hang ga ra gludal thogs shing 'khod pa snyad pa dang/ lha'i bu mo khral dgadugs dad/ rgyal mtshan dang/
bdan thogs shing 'khod par snangab dang/ lha'i bu mo brgya stod mang po dag kyang dud dang/ rje dang/ rja rje dang/ khar rdza mgul nas dpyangs te/ sdod cad 'khod par snang ba dang/ rlung/
thams cad kyang ma ltadabar gnas par gyur pa dang/ chu klung dang chu bran thams cad kyad ma mgul zhing ma 'bab par gyur pa dad nyi zla dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skar
! ma'i tshogs rnams kyang ma rgyu bar gyur pa dang/ skar ma rgyal dang yang ldan par gyur pa dang/ rgyal bo zas gtsang ma'i khyim yang na pa cho'i dra bas yog bar gyur pa dang/ ma yang mi
'bar bar gyur pa dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ khang bzangs dad ya da theg dang/ rta babs dag la'ang nor bu dang/ rin po che dag 'phyang bar snang bar gyur pa dang/ ras bcos bu'i mdzod
dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod rnams kyang sgo 'byed par snang ba dad/ bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya rgod dang/ spud ka dad wa'i sa dag kyang med par gyur bdang/ sgra skad snyan pa'i/
sgra dag kyang 'byung bar gyur pa dang/ skye bo thams cad kyi las kyi mtha'ang rgyun chad par gyur pa dang/ sa'i phyogs mthon dman du 'dug pa rnams kyang mnyam par gnas par gyur pa dad/ lanagyi
gzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ srang dad/ tshong dus kyi 'khor kyang lag mthil ltar gzhi mnyam nyid 'jam la/ me tog sal mas gang ste mdzes par snang ba dang/ sbrum ma thams cad kyang bde
ba dang/ legs par btsa' bar gyur pa dang/ shing sA la 'a nags tshal gyi lha thams cad kyad shing ga le ma'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste phyag 'tshal zhing/ gnas par snang ba ste/ snga ltas sum/
cu rtsa gnyis po de dag byung bar gyur to// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi gzi brjid dang/ mthus kyang byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab par
shes te/ nam gyi sod la rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drud du 'ongs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdag gi bsam pa gang lags gsol gyis lha ni gsan du gsol// yun ring 'de po
bdasanas bskyed mos tshal gyi blo skyes te// gal te khyod ma bkyon cadi zhe sdang phrag dog ma mang ba na// bdag gi rtsis skyed mos tshal du mchi bar bgyi// chos dgongs//
brtson pa dka' thub sprod pas khyod kyang skyo mkhyen grang// bdag kyang sems can dag pa srel nas yun na rang lags na// sAla'i shing ljon steng po mchog kyang me tog kha 'bus te// skyed mos
tshal gyi ga sar da ni mchiba'i gsasalho// sos ka'i dus mchog bud med rnams kyi rgyan du 'gyur lags te// nags rgyu khu byug dang na rma bya sgra rab snyan ba 'byin// gtsang zhing mdzes la sna
tshogs me tog rdul gyi ngad khyad ldang// da ni mchin ma thogs legs par bka' lung stsal du gsol// rgyal po'i dbang pos lha mo las ni di skad tshig thos nas// dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i/
[” ]sems kyis 'khor la smras pa ni// bzhon pa bzhon chen 'gyogs pa'i shugs ldan dag kyang bstad par gyis// yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan lum bi ni tshal brgyan bar gyis// ri sdo'i

mdog ldan sprin gyi kha dog mthun par gyur pa yi// glang po steng phrag nye shu snyed cig myur du bstad par gyis// glang po'i dbang po mche ba drug ldan dril mdzes gle las brgyus// gser dang na ro bus
! rnam par spras shing gsar gyi dra bas spud// rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa ste// dngul dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rdza rdzog lcang lo bzang 'khril ba'i// rta mchog
stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du stod gyis te// gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka 'i dra ba glo nas dpyang ba gyis// skyes bu rtul phod g.yul la mos shang 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag/ mda' gzhu
ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha rnon thogs pa// stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du chos te bshamasagyis la// sgyu 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni bsrung bar gyis// lum
ba ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khrom brgyan par gyis// ges dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad brgyan par gyis// lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs rgyal par khrom//
de ltar thams cad bshams zin myur du nga la sbranapar gyis// 'khor rnams kyisan di skad tshig thos skad cig tu// bzhon pa kun bshams de bzhin lum ba ni yad brgyan byas te// rgyal gyur
rgyal gyur sku tshering skyongs rgyal po gshegs sugasol// ji skadabaka' sku la de bzhin kun gyis dus bab lha gzigs shig/ ma la bdag padom pa de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur nas// khyim
gyi dam par zhugs te bud med rnams la 'di skad smras// gang zhig nga la snying nye nga la dga' bar 'dod pa dag/ nga yi bka' bzhin gyis te bdag gi lus kun brgyan par gyis// sbos mchog
