ngad kyi dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs sdug pa'i gos// 'jam zhing yid 'ong dga' ba'i sems kyis legs par bag bgyis// bradan 'phyang ba'i mu tig se mo de yis brgyan par gyis// rgyan gyi
khyad par thams cad der rang kun gyis bstan par gyis// khar rdza rgyud gcig gling bu pa wang rdza rnga dum dum phag/ sil snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag khyad bshams par
zla gyis sgra snyan thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing// lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur pa khyed kyis gyis// shing rtab mchog 'di lha mo sgyu 'phrul gcig pu
'dug bar gyis// bud med skyes pa gzhan dag su yang shing rta der ma 'khod// na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing rta de drongs te// gang du'ang yid du ma 'ong ma mthun sgra rnams

mi grag gis// lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nas byung ste sgo drung phyin pa'i tshe// rta dang glang po shing rta rkang thang dpal ldan sna tshogs dbud// rgyal po'i sgo drung lhags tshe sgra chen mang po grag par
gyur// rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra ltar de dag yongs su grags// de tsho bkra shis don du dril bu brgya stong dkrel babus// shing rta de yang de ltar rgyal pos sna tshogs brgyan pa la// lha
zla ] rnams stong gas lha ya khri yang legs par bshams pa byas// rin chen 'di ljon me tog la ma ldan gzhaldan par byas// rma bya khrung khrung ngang ba yid du bod ba'i sgra yang 'byin// gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan ba dan mi phra kun nas 'khor bar bsgreng// lha yi gos dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis dkab// lha yi bu mo nam mkhob las ni shing rta de la lta// lha ya sbradabyangs snyan pa
0 zlog cing bstod pa'i tshig brjod de// gang tsha lha mo sgyu 'phrul sang ge'i khri la 'dug gyur ba// de tshe stong gsum sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// lha rnams gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin cinge
ma tog sna tshogs 'thor// de red lum ba ni 'dar 'gro ba'i dam pa bltams gyur te// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ni shing rta'i mchog de 'dren par byed// sum cu rtsa gsum bdag bo dbang po'od lam
gyi bya ra byed// tshangs pa skyo bo mi srun sel cadi sngon du 'gro bar gyur// lha rnams brgya phrag stong yang thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal 'dud// rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bkod
ba de la lta// de ni 'di snyam 'di'i lha ya lha zhig yin snyam byed// gang la skyong ba bzhi dang tshadas pa'i dbang por bcas pa lha// mchod pa rgya chen byed pa bdi ni ngas bar sangs rgyas 'gyur//
srid pa gsum na lha klu brgya byin tshadas pa 'jig rten skyong// gang mang mchod pa 'di 'dra bzod pa'i sems can da med de// yang na mag 'gas mad na de dag srog dang bral bar 'gyur//
'di ni lha yi dam pa yin pas mchod pa thams cad bzod// dge slong dag de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rta'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni kun
nas bskor/ glang po che'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang rkang thang dpa'i zhing rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa dang ldan pa/ ga cha legs par bgos pas
bya// ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni yongs su bsrungs/ shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du bdar/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i phu nu rigs su skyes//
pa'i shAkya'i rgan po dang/ gzhon pa dang/ bar ma bzhi khrin yongs su bsrungs/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras/ glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byed/ khar ba'i sal khrol dang pheg rdob
sil snyan dad/ glu dbyangs len pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/ lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ klu'i bum brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ mi'am ci'i
bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dad/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bkor ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa sha stag glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis bsngags pa brjod pa
rjes su 'brang bas 'gro'o// lumab nab nags tshal thams cad kyang spos chu'i chagachag gas btabacing/ lha bam dogogs gtor bar gyur to// nags tshal dam pa de'i nangan/ shing
ljonapa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang dus lam bab pa lam dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu skyes par gyur to// nags tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan par gyur
ta 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dres pa'i tshal lha rnams kyis legs par brgyan ba btAn no// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum banib nags tshal du phyin nas shing rta dam pa de las grwa
tu mi dang lha'i bu mo dgagis yongs su bskor 'di/ shing drud nas na shing drung dug tu 'gre/ nags tshal nas na nags tshal dag tu 'chag/ ljon pa nas ni ldan pa dga' lta nang/ da rim
gyis shing rin po chachen po mchog dang phul dubya ba/ 5 'a ga shin tu rnam par 'byis pa/ lo ma dang/ dog pa bzang po dang ldan ba/ ma dang lha'i me tog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa// skyes mchog
dang phul du bya ba'i dri'i dad dang ldan pa'i gos kha dog sna tshogs dpyangs pa/ nor bu dang/ rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i bod rnam pa tha dad pa 'bar ba/ rtswa ba dang/ sdong po dang/ yalag dang/
lam rnams rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa/ yal ga rang zhing shan tu rnam par ba byas pa smug sha te sa bya ba sa'i phyogs lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing shin tu bzad la langs pa

rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu s pa/ katsa lin+d+ri'i gos ltar reg na bde pa'i sa la 'dug pa ston gyis rgyal ba'i yum gyis bton pa// lha'i glu dbyangs blangs ba 1 gnas gtsang ma'i lha bzang zhing drin
med la rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi thor tshugs dang/ rtsod ban mngon par gtud pa'i spyi bos mngon par phyag bya ba'i shing ljon ba blag sha de 'i drud du phyin to/
de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus/shang phyug sha des mngon par gtud de phyag byas so// de nas lham sgyu 'phrul nam mkha'i dkyil du snang ba'i glog gas phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa
g.yas pa brkyang nas/ phyagasha' ma la ga las bzudas/ tshul du shas bar nam mkha'i dkyil dubaltas nas/ bya rlungs ses byed cing 'dug par gyur to/

denas de'i tsho 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i nan gnas lha'abu mojug khri lhags te/ lham sgyu 'phrul la rim gro dang/ bkur sti byed par gyur to// byang chub sems dang ba ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ rnam

pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par gnas so// de zla ba bcu tshang nas ma'i glogams ba nas dran zhig shes bzhin du mdal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung ste/ gzhan ltar ma yan dang gzhan/
! dgal mngal gyi dri ma zhes bya ba brjod pa de lta bu med bar gyur to// dge slong dag de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis mdun na 'khod de/ de
gnyis kyis ni gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gos ka shi ba'i srib mos lus dang yan lag thams cad kyis dran zhun shes bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blangs so// byang chub sems dpa' lung
pa brtsigs pa gang gnang na bdug cinge/ ma'i rum na gnas gnas pa de yang ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs ris kyi lta rnams kyis/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gyon du ba tag ste
mchod rten du bya ba dang/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni mar gyur ba gang gsakyang ma byas kyi/byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs pa
de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tus la 'bab ste// byang chub sems dang ba des la babs par gyur ma thag tu/ pad+ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di nga brtol te 'byung ngo/ kru'argyal bo/
dag dang dang nye dga' po gnyis kyang nam ma ba'i dkyil na lus phyed phyung ste 'khong nas/ bsal ba dang/ dro ba'i chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon pa ra sprul nas byang chub sems dang 'i lus bkrus so/

brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jigartan skyong ba la sogs pa gzhan la nga lta ba bu brgya ste nga na nga pa dag byang chub sa mas dang ba btsas ma rngag du spos chu sna tshogs dar ma tog sa la nas lus 'bru

nying mngon par 'thor ro// bar snang las kyang rdul yab kyi rdza ma gnyis dang/ rin pa tshabagadugs byang bar gyur to// de nga d+ma chen po de la 'dug nas phyogs pa zhir rnam par lta sku/sang ge'i lta

lta nga'ang sa bu chen po'i lta stangs kyis rnam par lta'o// de'i tshe byang chung sems dang sa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par snyan da' sa byang nga lcaT mgo/ sa pa med ngas stong gsum gyi stong
chen po se'ajig rten gyi khams thams cad grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang [7 ]yul 'khor dang 2 pho brang 'kher dang/ ljongan sa nug/ yul du can 8 de nas rgyu / bkage nga yarang [“]
sa cha na[']ra shun ha cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa ba da rab tu shes te/ nyin nas kyang san sa can gang tshul khrims nan ngang nga 'dzin dusa'ashagar pa nga na/[7 ]dag pa dang yang pas
de lta bu gang la la zhig yod dam zhes rnam par lta'o// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdag dang mtshungs pa bsam
can gang yang ma mthong nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing bag tsha ba med de/ zhum ba dang/ bag 'chums ba med pas legs par bsams pa dran par byas
te/ pasamU po brtags nasasems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par byas te/ sus kyang brtan pa med par byang chub sems dbab dag ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar
bya'o zhes/ shar phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro// daltar byang chub sems dbab gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba de dang de dag tu pad+ma dgakyang skyes par gyur to// lta dang ma rnams kyi sbyin
pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes lho phyogs lags su gom pa bdun boraro// nub phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas gom pa bdun pa 'a gnas te/ nga ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa go
'din nga'i skye ba tha ma ste/ skye ba dang/ rna ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes seng ge ltar min par gyur pa'i sgra sgrags so// sems can thams cad kyi nangan bla na med bar bya'o
zhes/ byang phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro// bdud dang bdud kyi sngonugazhom par bya'o// sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi sa mas can dmyal ba'i me bsad bab pa'i chos kyi char sprin
[6：]chen po'i char phab ste/de dag bde bas tsham par bya'o zhes bgags phyogs legs su gom pa nga dun bar ra// sems can thams cad kyis gyen du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes stong gi phyogs/
logs su bdom pa bdun bor nas steng du lta'o// byang chub sen sa dang 'a tshig de brjod na bag tu 1 de nas de'i tshe stod gsum gyi stong chen po' bajig rten du ser nas 'dir smras ma don pa ga
bar gyur to/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung bab ma nges par shes pa chos nyid do// gang gi tshe byang chub san sa dpa' srid pa tha ma pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba dang/

gang gi tsho ba namad pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul gyi rnam ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo// dag slong dag de'i tshe sam
can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu g.yos par gyur to// 'jig rten du sa g.yo ba tshan bo shin tu 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba ya du byung bar gyur to// ma dang lu'i sa'i gnad de/
la mo'i dbyangs sgras bya ba thams cad kyang ma byungs par sgra byin par gyur to// de'i ri stengagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus dang/ dus mtshams so so'i
shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags pa dang/ rnam par dag par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas kyang sprin gyi sgra grags te/ sprin med pa ba nam mkha' las kyang
dal bu dal bus phra ba phra ba'i char lta yul ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i me tog dang/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ sbos kyi phye ma dad 'dres pa bab par gyur te/ rlung regan sa chog tu/
[Z ]bde ba bajam pa/ dri zhim po dag kyang ldadabar gyur to// phyogs thams cad kyang mun pa dang/ rdul dang/ du ba dang [.]khug rna med cid rab tu dad bas rnam pa ra mdzes par gyur to/
steng gi bar snang las kyang tshangs pa 'i sgra chen posnyan cid zab pa grags par gyur to// nyi zla dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od thams cad kyang zalagyis/
mnan te/ 'od kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa/ rag na mchog tu bdeb/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde ba skyed pa 'jig rten las 'das pas stong gsum gyi steng chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sa mas can thams cad kyang bde bas shin tu tshim par gyur te// 'dod chags
dang zhi sdad dang/ gtimug dang/ dregs pa dad/ ma dga' ba dang// zhum pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ chags ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ sa ra sna thams cad dang bral zhing ma dag
ba'i bya ba thams cad sbyangs par gyur to// sems can nad ba rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to// bkres shing skom ba'i sems can rnams kyang bkris pa dang skom pa med par gyur to/
chang gis ra ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang skyo sa pa med par gyur to// skyes pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur do// mag mang pa rnan na kyis kyang mag thob par gyur to// rna ba 'on pa
rnams kyis kyang sgra shes bar gyur to/ yan lag dang nying la ga nyams pa rnams kya nga ngusung pa 2nas pa ni de (dbu la pa rnams kyis kyang nor theb par gyur to// btson ra na
khodapa rnams kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to// mnar me da ra la sogs nga 'in na['] ra du da kyi nang du bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad de'i tshe rgyun
chad par gyur to/dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyi dga' gcig tha ba sob na nga3tab ga/ sa pa nga/ gshin rdzob ba jig rten pa'i sems can rnams bkres pa dang
snyem pa la sogs ra ba sdug bsnga la yang 'bar gyur to/ gang ga ni dudachub sar da pas pa pa tshe yo sa dpar sbyad pa shin tu spyad pa ]brtsen 'grus chen po dang
ldan pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe/ chos ted thekaMs su tu su saMbadzig tshan gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams sa'i phyogs de/ de yi mi zhig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du ngun gyi ba rAg gang dag datsam du stobs kyi shugs drag po dang ldan par byang chub
sems dang ba bcas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur to// bajig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe gru'i

sgra chen bo yang byung bar gyur to// gar gyi sgra chen po yod byung bar gyur to// de'i tshe me tog dang/ phyi ma dang/ spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ rani bo medang/ rgyan dang/ gos kyi sngon dpag tu mad pa
dag kyang char du mngon par bab par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ mdor na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
pa 'a jig rten du byung ba'i tsha/ bya ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa byung bar gyur to// de nas tshe dad ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gtsag tu bzar nas/ pus
mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das 'a 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
pa ni sems can thams cad las ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur na/ da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar
rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta m+mos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ni lan bzhi 'am/ lan lngar yang lan bcur yang/ lan lnga bcu'i bar du yang/ lan brgya'i bar du yang
lan brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// de skad ces gse[' ]nga/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// kun dga' de ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dge slong la la lus na bsnyen sa ra sems r bsgor sa [; ： ]rma klan sa mthasgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa ma mkhas
pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/ rgod pa// 'ongan [？ ]ma nga snyam n pasum ga pa d+ha na pa ba na nga/ dad pa med pa/ dag stong gi dri mar gyur pa/ dag sbyang
gi tshul dang ma 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rtul du 'gro pa yong rma pa ke ka yid ma skyes shing de dag phyogs gcig tu tshogs nas/ gcig la
gcig 'disad du kyi bye da cag 'di lu'i ma rigs pa la lces ngas ga ra [- ] [.. ]/ shags dang 'dres pa la yang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod yod ces
bya ba dang/ de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo g.yas pa nas[']mngal gyi dri mas mu ges nga/ 4 nin zer bar 'gyur te/ skyes bu glen pa de dag sems can/
legs par byas pogalas dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus ma gtsang ba' ga rang du mi 36 nge dge slong dag sems can dam pa de lta bu dag gi mngal du 'gro
ba dang mngal na gnas pa ni shin tu yang bzang ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la snying brtse bas mi'i 'jig rten du skyo ste/ lhar gyur
gnyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo ma skor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo sems can rnams zhum par 'gyur zhing/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus de ni lhar gyur pa yan gyis/ bodag cag na ma tsam du zad pas na/ bdag cag gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs bar byas bar ma nus so zhes zhum par gyur tu
sgyu 'ong ba'i phyir te/ skyes bu glen ba chos kyi rkun por gyur pa de dag 'di snyam du sems can de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de ni bdagacag gis tshod bzung bar bya ba ma yin no snyam dum
sems so// kun dga' bo de dag ni de ba tsha/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul la yang yod ma ches par bgyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i cho
'phrul lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/ kun dga' bo de ltar skyes bu glen pa// red pa dang/ bkur stadang/ tshigs su bcad pas zil gyis non pa mgatsang bar byed ba/ rim gro'i zal gyis
non pa ma rabs kyi ngang tshul can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos sbyong zhing bsod nams ma yin pa'i mdon par 'du bya ba mang po ji snyed cig mngon par 'du byed pa la ltos//
[22/ ]'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya brnag pa chan ri ba mdo ban[']de ltar/ ka ba pa/ cesaM ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/ 'di lta bu'i mdo ste/
bzang po la yang spyod de mi snyan nga la brjed pa de lta bu'i dag seng dag byung ba lnga khab pa la ska/ kun dga' bo de dag ni mdo sde 'di lta bu srong zhing ma
snyan par brjod par yang ma zad de sdig pa rnam pa du ra ra no pa pa 'du ga ba sa ba u0f7agnyer pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa//
bcom ldan 'das bo na skyes bu dam pa ma 'gags pa de 'dra nga de dbartag phra ba/ ses na pa la 3[']nga lta bu zhag tu mnye/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med nga rat+tan[']te/ 'dus / na nga sa nan sa lan snyan pas skur pa btab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin
nga 'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ de nas tshe dang/ [” ] zhen brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam ba ma lags pa de dag ki sprod pa'i ng dag nyos nasaM908ga 4[1 ]tshem ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga/ kun dga' bo de dag
ga spyod pa ni mnyam par ma 'gyur zhing/ sems can de dag ni ma mnyam pa'i spyod pa can du 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de dag tshul dang ma 'dra ba'i spyod pa des/ mnar med/
cho pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' po dag slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhag/ mdo sde 'dilta
bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing/ yid ma ches pa dang/ sbyong ba de dgan sha'aphos ma thag tu mnar med pa ba sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' pod bzhin
ts+tsa gshegs pa la ni tshad du ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhinagshegs pa ni tshad med cing zab la rgya che zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o// kun dga' bo la la zhig mdo
'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dad mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dad pa skyes pa'i sems can de dag gis thob pa de ni legs par thob pa yin te/ de dag gi 'tsho ba ni don yod pa'o//
de dag gi mi'i dngos po ni don yod pa'o// de dgag spyod pa na legs par spyod pa'o// de dag gis ni snying bo blangs so// de dag ni ngan song gsum las grol ba// de dag ni de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'gyur ro// de dag gis ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su thob bo// de dag gis ni dad pa thob pan don yod do// de dag gis na yul 'khor gyi zas
'a gas pa rjes su// de dag ni sa ma sa can da lta nga tsa 7gas pa pa ni sa pa yin no// de dag par pa ga sa pa gtubs pa yin no// de dag na de 'khor ba'i 'brog dgen pa
las rgal to// de dag bde na mya ngan bya nge ro a'u klogs pa cheg tu du ba ga ya ngos ra tshun na da ba de dag gis na skyabs su 'gro ba 'gas par blangs so// de
dag na sbyin pa 'a gnas ya ru Ne/ ma chod pa /de nas 'jig chen du bde dang dkon da las ya ka la 'jig rten na sdin pa'i gnas su bzung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de bzhin gshegs nga 'i che pa'i dzag yin pa sa pa a ga na u0f7cna sa run de dgan dge ba'i rtsa ba don dang ldan pa ma yin te/
kun dga' bos na sa can de dag ni nga dang tshe ras khang/ 'a zhi[']yid du 'gro'o// [']bar gyur pa 'i grab na yin ne mar/ brtsari zhe na/ kun dga' ba la lan bris pa tsam gyis dga' zhang ade du
'ong ba yodakyi/ mthong na ma yin no// kun dga' bo la 'a nan sbyong ban dga' zhing dpeA song pa ma da/ shes pa na min yan no// kun dga' bo la la ni mthong na yang dga' zhing yad du 'od la/

thos nas yang dga' zhing ya da du 'ong ba yod do/ kun dga' bo gang yang rung ste/ la par 'ake la shong ngam 2 kres nas ga' zhing yang du 'ong bar pa ra na/ khyed kyis de la 'di ltar de dag ni nga dang
tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs pa'i grogs po yin par nges par rtogs par bya ba ste/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// de dag ni de bzhin gsheg
kyi pas dgrol bar bya'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dad/ yon tan gyi cha mnyam pa'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ba'o// de dag na de bzhin gshegs pas/
bzung ba// kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid kyi tsho yang sems can su yang rung ste/ 'jigs pas nyam thag cing ba ngos nas/ mi 'jigs pa slong na sem
can de dag la da ngas ma 'jigs pa byin par gyur na/ da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyad chub mngo na par rdzogs par sangs rgyas bar lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo dad pa la
brtson bar gyis shig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bal ba// kun dga' bo khyod kyi bya ba ci yodapa de dag ni da bzhin gshegs pas byas so// nga rgyal gyi zug rngu nad bzhin gshegs
pas bsal to// kun dga' bo grogs po'i gtam thos pa tsam gyis kyang dpag tshad brgya'i lam du yang 'gro ste/ thos bas kyang dga' bar 'gyur pa yin na/ sngar ma mthong ba las mdza' bo mthong
bar gyur na smos kyang ci dgos te/ gang nga la rten cing dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par byed pa de dag ni ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen
@# cing sems can de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' bo ste// de dag na bdag cag gi yang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' ra gang yanang

ra mdza' ba la sdug cad yad du'ong ba yin no// mdza' bo de'i bgang sdug pa'i grogs po de yang de la sdug cing 'byed du 'dab man no/ kun dga' bodi lta bas na khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud pa byas
dad ba tsam yang bskyed par gyis shig/ ngas ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgo par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang gtad de/ de dag kyang 'di dag ni bdag cag gi lang
ma dza' bo yin no zhes bya bar mkhyen cing/ bsam pa rdzogs bar mdzad par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig la bu dag nyanacade/ mthun par 'dzin pa gcig pu
zhig bdog par gyur la/ skyes bu de yang mdza' bo mdu ba zhig yin na/ pha de shi zin kyang phab mdza' bos yongs su bzung ba'i bud na yodas par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang
su yang rung ste 1 nga la dad na de dag ngas bzung ba yin te/ de dag ni nga'i mdza' bo'o// de dag ni nga la skyabs su dong ba'o// de bzhin gshegs ba ni mdza' bo mang po mnga' ba ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung zhing brdzun du ma gsud bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang/ yang dag par gsung ba ma 'ongs pa'i do ba zhan gshag
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes su gtad kyis/ kun dga' bo dad ba la brtson par gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod la brtsol/ pa dgra bca
ba'o/// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/ lha'abu mo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas ngashang/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'
tog dang/ sbos dad/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gos dang/ rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// de la 'di skadatsas bya ste/ dge badri med rnam dag gser gyi bde ldan nyema' 'ad[E]

ldan pa// lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan brjod stong phrag drug cu deyi tsha/ skad cig de la lum bi ni'i lha mo sgyu 'phrul de la sku/ ma dgyes sa mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag khyed kyi phyag rjed
lags/ bdag caga rnams kyis bgyi ba du mchis su bgyi ba 'tshal bka' stsol cig/ bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed nus ldan nye ba'i sems dang ldan pa lags// khyod kyis dgyes shing bdaba'i
nyams bskyedam dgyes thams cad sbyang bar gsol// rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa de rade lha mo myur skyed 'gyur// ji ltar zhugs shing 'di rnams kha 'bus sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing//
stong phrag bgrangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnasarashing lag pa 'dud pa dor// ji ltar dag sa rgya mtshor bcas te rnam pa drug tu g.yos lags na// khyod las lha yul ma yul sbragrags 'jig
! rten 'das pa'i sras bltan 'gyur// ji ltar rnam dag 'od kyis rnam par mdzes shang gsar gyi kha dog bzang// nam mkha'i dkyil las yad bod sa la sA na brgya dag ma dkrol sgra 'byin dang//
ji ltar dag cing gtsang la 'dod chags bral ba'i lha rnamag brgya stong yang// dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de rang 'jig rten kun phan bltam par 'gyur// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten
skyong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan dag kyang// dga' zhing bod pa'i sa mas kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid// skyes bu seng gi brtul zhugs grub pa de yang brtsib logs g.yas
nas byung// gser gyi ri dang 'dra zhing dag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltams// brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dur te thub pa de yad blangs// zhing rnams brgya stong 'od bzang
bkye bas thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur// ngan song gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med gyur te// lha rnams brgya phrag stong gis me tog gtor te gos kyi
g.yab mo byung// de tshe sa 'di stobs mthu ldan zhing rdo rje'i dngos gnas pad+ma mdzes// sna tshogs mngon mthon dag la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i mtshan las zhabs bzhag ste// gom pa bdun
du bzhud nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa na// rga shi sel ba'i sman pa ram pa sems can mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i mchog dang brgya byin lha mchog nam mkha'i
bya@#// dkyil na 'khod gyur te// gtsang zhing dang la mdzes pa'i sbos chu dag gas 'dren pa'i sku yad bsal/ klu yi rgyal gnyis bar snang gnas nas grang drob chu sa rgyan/
kyi kyang gtong// lha rnams brgya stong dag kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsal byed// 'jig rten skyod ba rnams kyang rim gro dam par lag pa bzang pas lan// stong gsum 'di
yad rgyu dang ma bcas par rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// mdzes pa'i bod rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bltams pas nyon mas
sdug bsngal de dag kha// ma ya badren pa rgyal ba la// lha rnams me tog sal mas 'thor// stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa ya// brtan pa gam pa bdun du bzhud// sa phyogs gang
du zhabs bzhag pa// der ni pad+ma bzang ba'i mchog/ rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ sa las mngon du ma thon par gyur// de ltar gom pa bdun bzhud nas// ga dang 'chi ba la ba yi/
snyan pa dam pa 'dir byung zhes// tshadas pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung brjod do// 'jigs med phyogs su rnam gzigs te// de nas don ldan gsud phyung ba// nga ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso//
! 'jig rten phul phyin rnam bar 'dren// nga yi skye mtha' 'di yin zhes// ma la 'dren pas 'dzum pa mdzad// lha dbang bcas rang 'jig rten skyong dag rab tu dang sems skyes//
sngos chu mchogagis 'jig rten phan pa'i don ma dzad sku mang bas la// klu dbang rnams kyang lhan cig ma thun par byas nas ni// dri zhim sbos chu dag gargyan gyis sku la da bsal bas//
lhagazhan khrag khrig dag kyang bar snang ba na gnas nas su// dri zhim sbesaM chu ma chog gi rgyun gyis rang byung sku yang bsal// gdugs dkar yangs dang ja la babazang po dam pa thogs nas ni/
bar snang 'khod de lha rnams ma yi myu mchog sku bsalabyed// skyes bu gcig cig 'dres par 'ongs nas zas gtsang de la dgar smras nga// lha gcig 'byor pa rgyas gyur khyod kyi sras mtshan gyis
brgyan pa bltams// de ni nges pos 'khor la sbyar ba'i dbang phyug gdung rabs rin chen batshob// 'dzam bu'i glang bdagadugs mad gcig 'gyur phas kyis dgra yang ma mchis 'gyur 2
de nas skyes bu ga nyes 'das zas gtsang rgyal po'i mdun du de se da ste/ lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur shAkya'i rigs su rgyal bu skyes gyur nas// shAkya rnams kyi grong du rogs ba 'bum
phrag lta na btsas pa skyes par gyur// kun kyang gzhan gyis ma thub stobs dang ldan yod tshan po che dang badra// skyes bu gzhan 'ongs snyas pa bdag las bgyis pa'i sprugason lha// 'dun
pa can la sogs pa 'bangs kyi byis pa brgyad brgya btsas par gyur// bsngags ldan gyi ni zla bo chibs rta stong phrag bcu dag 'brangs gyur to// chibs mchog dam pa gser gyis bod ldan rnga
@#// rngog lcang lor 'khril ba lags// mtha' 'khob khams kyis rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du// rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drud du mchis kyis legs/
bar rgyal gyur la// dan ba dbag ma chis sug las su bgyi rgyal pos bdag la bka' skul gsol// rgyal pa khyed 'dir mnga' brnyes ba dag babangs jo bo lha cig rgyal bar sbyin// gser
gyi dra bas mdzes pa'i glang po dam pa stod phrag nyi shu dag/ nam mkha' las na dgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po' khab tu mgyogs su mchis// sa srung la sogs na gu za chu dag dang debu na drug stod
'khrangs// lha cig lha mchog bltams zhang de dag btsas pas rgyal khab phun sum tshogs// rje cig rgyal ba gshegs te bsod nams gza bod ldan pa bltams ba ya// yon tan dag na ma thod
bar gyur nas lha dar ma rnams stong bgrangs pa// rab tu dga' bar gyur dang kun la nyid kyis legs par gzigs su gsol// myur du rgyal gyur cigaces byang chub dam pa mya nganamed par bzhugs
dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dang 'a btsas pa dang/ skad cig de la sbyin pa gtong ba yang de bas rgya cher gyur to// ya rabs kyi rigs lnga brgya yang btsas par gyur to//
grags ldan la sogs pa bu mo khri dang/ bran mo brgyad brgya dang/ 'dun pa la sogs pa bran lnga brgya dang/ rtebu mo khri dang/ bsngags ldan la sags pa rtobu pho khra ded/ ba glang phyagu mo lnga/
brgya dang/ ba glang gi phrugu bo lha brgya ba dag kyang btsas shadi 'brangs par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad rgyal po zas gtsang mas snagrangs yar bris te sras bu gzhen su rtsod pa'i phyir byin/
bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i bdos spyod kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus/ gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i dbus kyis phyogs nas ashod thab sdong po rgyas par gyur to// gling

phra mo rnams su yang tsan dan gyi nags tshal skyes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i le ngos spyod kyi don du god khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu yang bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya dag kyang byung bar gyur to//
gter lnga stong yang sa'i 'og nas gyen tu 'dus te sgo ston par gyur to// de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de de dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas//
rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du bdag gis du ba gzhanonu deb 'di ji skad cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang/ de bdi snyam du sems te ( bu 'di skyes ma thag tu bdag gi don thams cad yang
dag par grub par gyur gyis bdeb mang ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste// de nas rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' las mi grwa chor byas nas/ ngu 'di'i ming don
thams cad grub pa zhes bya zhes mang du ba tagasaso// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas/ ma'i glo g.yas pa la da ma ral ma nyams shing sngon bzhin du gyur to//
der khron pa lan gsum ldud pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to// spos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzing bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to// de nas lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag lha'i
sbos kyis bsgos ba'i 'bru mar gyi dri zhim po khyer to/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i drung du lhags nas [7 ]bltams pa legasaM par bltam mam/ sku las bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dra bar
gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byug ba dang/ rnam par byug pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i dud du lhags nas/ bltams pa legs bar bltam mam/ ska la ma
bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i drung du lcags nas/ bltams pa legs par
bltam mam/ sku la ma bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis ba'i gos thogs te/ byang chub sems dang ba ma 'a drud du lhags nas Da bltams kha
legs par bltam mam/ sku la ma bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas/
bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang glu dbyangs len cing byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags te/
bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la ma bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed cag 'khod
pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du 'bod nas/ rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog par gyur to// dge slong dgade ltar byang
chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lum bi ni'i nags tshal du/ lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang/ pheg rdeb pas rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bsti stang byas so/
mchod pa byas so// khaza' ba dang bca'o ba dang/ myang ba dag kyang drangs par gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang 'dus nas/ kun dga' bab smra brjod par gyur to// sbyin pa/
dag kyang byin no// bsod nams dag kyang byed do// bram ze sum khri nyis stong yang nyin gcig bzhan du tsham par byas so// su dgaci 'dod pa de dag la yang de byin par gyur to//
brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khyabu'i gzugs su sprul te/ gralagyi thog ma la 'bod nas bkra8shas kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod par gyur te/ ji
ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing// ji ltar bgro kun bde las na/ 'gro la bde ba 'god pa yi// bde ba mdzad cig bltams par mngon// ji ltar 'bar ma 'od kyis// lha dang nyazlo'i
bya@#// bod rnams kyang// mi snang zil du rlag pa las// bsod nams bod cig khyur bar mngon// mag med rnams kyang mdzad gyur 'di// rna ba 'on pas sgra thos la
smyon pa rnams kyang dran ldan l// 'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon// ji ltar nyon mongs ma gnod cing// 'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur las// tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su/
gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar mngon// sal me tog rgyas gyur cing// sa yang manyam par gnas pa las// 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa yi// thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar ma don//
ji ltar 'a jig rten 'khrug med cing// pad+ma chen po mthon pa las// nges par gzi brjid chen po 'di// 'jig rten mgon du byon par 'gyur/ 2 lha ya spos kyis sbags gyur pa/// 'jam
pa'i rlung gis ngad ldang zhing// sems can nad rnams nagyur las/ 'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byon// gzugs khams gnas pa'i lha rgyal pa// 'dod chags bral ba 'di dag kyang//
thal mo sbyar nyid 'dug pa las// 'di ni sbyin pa ba gnas su byon// mi rnams kyis lha mthong zhing// lha rnams kyis ni ma mtheng yang// phan tshun 'tshab med pa las// 'di ni dad dgo/
chen por byon// me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing// chu klung thams cad mi g.yo la// sa yar dal bus g.yo ba las// 'di ni yang dpa gzigs par 'gyur// dge slong dag
!de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul sha ba'i dus byas par gyur te/ des ba'i dus byas nas/ snum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha pa nang du skyes so//
dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i lan bon gyis/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so snyam na/ de ltar ma blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i 'i tshad ni mthar thug pa phyi
ro/ 1 dge slong dag 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang btsas nas zhag bdun lon na ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes te dbang po yongs
su rdzogs nas mngon po'abyungan ma snying 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro// dge slong dag de ltar zhag bdun lon nas/ thog mar ser skya'i gnas kyi grod tshe dachen ponas/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul bkod pa ji lta
bus bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs par gyur ba de dag las bye ba brgya stod gyur pas kyang lhag pa'i bkod pa chen pos/ byang chub sems dpab grong khyerachen bo ser skya ba la/nas su shugs so//
de zhugs pa dang/ bum pa spos chus gang ba lnga stod gas mdun du drangs par gyur to// de bzhin du bu mo lnga stong na rma bya mdongs lag na thogs de bdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga stong
ni ta la'i yalag thog sashing mdun du 'dod bar gyur to// bu mo lnga stong ni sbos chub la babyung gar thogs te/ lam chag chag gas 'debs shing mdun du 'dod bar gyur to// bu malnga
steng na nags tshal gyi ma tog gi phreng ba ba phyang ba khye'u tshang sna tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bum lnga stongan bzad par sgyur ba'i ri ni bo che thogs te// la
gyi byi dor byed cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga stong nastan bzang po thogs shing mdun du bde bar gyur to// bram ze lnga stod na dril bu thogs te/ bkra shis kyi sgra 'byin cing mdun du

'dod bar gyur to//glang go lnga stong ni rgyan thams cad gyis brgyan te mdun du 'dod bar gyur to/ rta nyi khri ni gser gyi rgyan gyi bkodatsang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// shing rta brgyad khri ni/
sku gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'deng bar gyur to// rkang thang dang 'a zhing rtul phod pa yan
lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ go cha su babagos pa bzhi khri ni/ byang chub sems dang ba 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin 'dod bar gyur to// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i grag
ba grags pa che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag ni/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas bkod ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing phyi bzhin 'dod
bar gyur to// shing rta gang la byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de yang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du mas legs par brgyan pa'i gyur to/lha'i bu o rgyan thams cad
kyis chas pas/ rin po che'i phreng ba thogs pa nyi khris shing rta de drangs te/ lha'i bu mo gnyis kyis bar du ni ma'i bu mo gcig bdug/ mib bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni/ lha'i bu mo gcig 'dug kyang
byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu mos kyang ma'i bu mo'i dri ma zhim pa ma tshor// mi'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs mthong na bag med par ma gyur to// dge slong dag ser

skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen par shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ched du khyim lnga brgya phubaste/ de dag byang chub sems dang kha grong khyer der 'jug pa'i tsho/ rang rang gis byas pa'i
khyim gyi sgor 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas lus gus par btud de rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du/ kyi don thams cad grub pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kyi lha lha 'dir gshegs su
gsol/ kyi sems can dag pa bder gshegs su gsol/ kyi kha lo sgyur ba dam pa bde gshegs su gsol/ kyi dga' zhing bde ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs su
kya snyad pa med ba'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kun nas spyan mda' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kyi ma mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa 'i yon tan dang
gzi brjid mnga' ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs sugasol zhes de skad 'dzer to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
mas de dag thams cad dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim de kun tu yang zhugs par byas te/ zla ba bzhi len nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi
khyim du zhugs te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen po der byang chub sems dpab bzhugs par gyur to// den shAkya'i rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te bgros pa/
phan pa'i sems dang/ byams pa'i sems kyi yon tan dang ldan pa dang/ 'jam pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' gtsang ba dang/ byi don bya ba dang/ nyams su blang bar sus nus zhes byas pa dang/
de na shAkya'i bu ma lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o// bdag gis gzhon nu'i rang gi bgyi'o zhes zer// den shAkya zhes bgres ches bgres de dag na re/ bu mo
'di dag thams cad ni byis pa gzhon nu thor bu gzhon la/ gzugs dang dar la bab pas rgyags shing dregs pa yin pas 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dus su rin gyi bya bar mi nus
sa'o skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u ta ma 'di gzhon nu'i su mo ste/ 'dis ni gzhon nu ba re ba dang legs par bskyed par nus so// rgyal po khrasagatsang ma yang mnyes par nus so zhes thams cad
gros gcig tu 'dus te/ skye dgu'i bdagamo chen mo ga'u ta mis dad par byas nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u ta mas gzhon nud 'gas par bskyed do// de'i tshe byang chub sems dab 'a rim gror ma
ma sum cu rtsa gnyis bskos par gyur te/ de la brgyar ni pang na batshoba'i ma ma 'o//brgyadan nu na snyan pa'i ma ma// brgyad na rtsin grogs kyi ma ma// brgyad ni dri ma ba phye ba'i ma ma 'o//
de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te dpyad pa/ ji ltar gzhon nu bad ba khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig tu 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyis rab tu 'byung

ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang/ de'i tshe'i 'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la drang srong chen po nag bo zhes bya ba/ mngon pa na shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig snag gi tsha bo mes byin zhes bya bdad
lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las/ des byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul mad du mthong ste/ nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha'i bu mang po sangs rgyas kyi sgra
sgrogs cing gos kyi g.yab mo g.yob pa dang/ dga' zhing phan tshun du 'dod pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ ma la bdag ga rnam par blta ba zhig tu bya 'am sAm nas/ des lha'i mig gis
'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bltas na/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen bodi na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/ 'jig rten than
cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan ba zhig btsas par mthong nas/ bram ze khye'u mas byin la spyas pa/ bram ze'i khye'u shes par
za u@#// gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling dun rin po che chen po byung ste// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen pon/ rgyal po zas gtsad mkhyam ru pa/zhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid/
klo kyis gzi dad ldan par byas la/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod ba 1 skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsas so// de gal te khyim na gnas na namatha' bzhi la dbang
ba 'kher la sbyor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur to/ rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po srad kyi mthu stobs thob pa// rin pa che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/
'a na po che bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bud med ni po che dang/ khyim bdag rin pa tsho dang blon po no bo
che dang bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la bu stong yod par gyur ta/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa// pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa sha stag 'byud bar 'gyun no//
de ni sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor bde rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa// chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med pa dang/ chos dang mthun par rang gi mthus zil gyis mnan cing mngon par phab ste/
dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed par 'gyurar// de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su bgyur te/
ston pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi rnying ma 'jog pa// 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na tshur sheg/ de ltar bdong ngo// de nas drang srong chen po nag po lcag/

ga tsha bo mes byin dang 'grogs te/ ngang pa'i rgyal pa ltar nam mkha'i dkyil nas ldadas te/ sar skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen pa ga la der song nas phyin pa dang/ rdzu baphrul brtul nas rkang gis sor

skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen par dong ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma khyim gyi sgo bsdud de// dge slod dag de ltar drang srong ga pa des rgyal po

zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgo drung du srog chags brgya stong mang po 'dus pa mthong do// de nas drang srong nag po skeba'i drud du yod ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma khyod sod la rgyal po zas gtsad
ma la chab sgon drang srong gtsagi mchis so zhes gsolag/ de nas sgo ba des de ltar bgyi'o zhes drang srong nag po ltar mnyan te/ rgyal po zas gtsangam ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ tha mo
sbyar te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ chab sgo ni drang srong rgan po 'khogs pa nas gzer ba zhig mchis te/ 'di skad du bdag ni rgyal po bzhal
mtho bar btsala'o sumachi'o// de nas rgyal bo zas gtsangams drang srong nag po'i stan 'ding du bcug ste/ ma de la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srod de nad du bdaba'agyis shig
de nas ma de spyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas/ drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces smras te/ nad dubazhud cig/ de nas drang srong nag po rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song/
phyin pa dang/ mdun du bdug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'daskad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po rgyal bar spyon cig/ rgyal bar spyon cig/ sku tshe ring bar srungs shig/ chos bzhin du rgyal po
mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal ba jos gtsar nas/ drang srong nag pa la yon chu dang/ rkang pa la gtor ba'i chus mchod pa byas te/ shin tu legs par yongs su bkur nas stan la bdar to// desnyan
la bde bar 'dug par shes nas/ rjes dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas par bde skad ces smras so// drang srong sngon mthong bar ma dran na/ 'dir ci la byon/ ci zhig bzhed/ skad ces smras pa/
za dang/ drang srong nag pos rgyal po khras gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras zhag bltams par gyur pa de blta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so// rgyal pos snyas pa

drang srong chen po gzhon nu nyal zhade mchis kyis langs kyi bar du cung zad cig gzhas shig/ drang srong gis skyas pa/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni rid par ma nyal to/ skyes bu dam de
kyi bu dag nasad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas drang srong nag po de la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ sad pab brda byas so// de nas
rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa lag pa gnyis kyis[︽]shan tu legs par blangs te/ drad srong nag po'i drung du khyer ro// de nas drang srong nag pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
bltas na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing/ dpe byad bzang ba brgyad cus legs par rnam par sbrus pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang/ tshadas pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong
ba las 'phags pa lus can/ nyi ma brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ yan lag thams cad du mdzes pa mthong nas/ kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar gyis gang zag 'ji byung

ngo kyi ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa 'i gang zag 'di byung ngo zhes/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas stan las langs te// thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dang ba rkad pa gnyis la
phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phong du blangs te/ sems shang 'jug par gyur to// de nas des byang chub sems dang ba lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
yodapa ma bod sa/ dadag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du na ma'agyur ro// gal te khyim na gnas na na mtha'abazhi la dbang ba'i 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgyal par
'gyur te zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed do// zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ba dang/ gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na na/ de bzhani gshegs par
1/ 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring ma 'a jog par gyur ba mthong nas/ des de lta bur mthong ba dang mcham blags te/
( dus nas shugs rang du byung ba dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de mchi ma blags te dus nas/ shugs ring du 'byin par mthong nas/ sngangs te ma dag gzhung 'dis pa rings par drang srong chen
bo dol smas pa/ drad srid de ltar bshums shing blugs te bshums pa dang/ shugs ring du 'byin pa tsa zhig nongos/ gzhon nu 'di la ma dge kha 'am cig ma gdab bam/ de skad ces smras pa dang/
drad srong chen pa nag po rgyal pazas gtsangan la 'di skad ces smas so// rgyal po chen po bdag gzhon nu'i slad du du ba yang ma lags/ 'di la ma dge ba yad gang yang ma mchis te/ bdag
nyid du bar bas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te/ nas gzer la/da lta gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bden gdon ma 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyaste/ bla na med pa chos kyi 'khor lo dag sbyong dam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste//
'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar ma nus ba skor bar 'gyur ro// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sman pa dang/ bde ba'i sud du chos ston par 'gyur to/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog
mar dge kha/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos don bzad pa// tshig 'bru bzad bo/ma 'dres pa// yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i mthar phyin pa gi tshes gang
dag par ston par 'gyur do/ sems can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di las chos dra thos nas/ skye ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems can rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi
ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ skye sngags bdon pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid m bde ba dang/ bakhrug pa'i chos can rnams ni rga ba dang/ na ba dad 'chi ba dang/ mya nganA dud/ smra sngag
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ pad ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las mdongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ sems can 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gsems gdungs pa
rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi char pos sam par mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can lta ba ngan ga sna tshogs bababs pos khebs pa lam gol bar zhugs pa rnams ni/ lam drang por mya don
las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/ sems can 'khor ba'i dra ba dang/ btson nur ba khod cade nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams ni/ bcadis pa las lo das su grol bar mdzad/
par 'gyur/ sems can tshashis pa'i mun pa dang/ rab rib dang/ ling togags mag ldongs pa rnams la ni shes rab kyi mig skyed par 'gyur/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i zug rngus zug
tsa @#/ pa rnams la ni/ zug rngu 'byin par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ u dum wa ra'i me tog ni brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// rgyal
pa chen po de bzhin du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brgya la brgya lam na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de ltar gzhon nu 'di ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang 2 sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol
bar 'gyur zhing/ 'chi ba med pa la rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la/ bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog de ma mthong ba dang bdug nand ma mchis pa 'di las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
te 2 rgyal po chen po bdag ni de'i slad du ngu zhing ma ngaga' bas shugs ring du 'byin pa lags so// rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi bstan bcos las 'byung ba lta na ni/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub
ba yad kha kha na ba zhugs par ma 'gyur// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ra rgyal pa tshon po// gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ste/
sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gzhan nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu'i gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ rgyal pa tshin pa gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes buchen pa'i
mtshan dang bo 'di dang ldan no// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams car grub pa ni dbu stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro dang/ rma bya mgrin pa ltar min na thang du phebastsal la bas u
'khyil ba dang/ dpral ba ba dbyes mnyam ba lags sa/rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa smin mtshams su mdzod s+saskyes ban ra pa dngul bya dag ltar mang ba
lab/sa so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa nis+san gyi rdza ma bab lta bu dang/ sngan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang/ tshams bzhibatsumanyam pa dang/ tshemar thalas bzang ba dang/
tshoms shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pan tshadas pa 'i dbyangs dang/ ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang/ lcags shin tu ring zhing srab pa dang
'gram pa seng ge 'i 'dra ba dang/ dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang/ mjunamatho ba dang/ thal gong rgyas pa dang/ pags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba dad 1 bzhengs pazhin du ma btud par phyag
bus mor slebs pa dang/ lo stod seng ge 'i lta bu dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal bo na ba gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ shing n+ya gro ta ltar chu zheng pa ba pa dang/ spur ra nas skye pa dang/ ban
lag gi smyu galas phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil ba dang/ mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang/ ba' legs par zlum pa dang/ byin pa la dpags kyi sa rgyal po e na ya'o lta bu dang/ sor mo rang kha
bla// dang zhabs kyi rtar ba langs pa dad/ zhabs kyi gong ma tho ba dang/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthal mnyam pa dang/ phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang ldan pa la//
so rgyal po tshon po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo ni ri skyes ba na bzang zhing rtsabs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud dar bcas/ lta ba dang bcas pa lags

to// rgyul bo tshon bo bag zhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zha bas mnyam zhing ngashin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal bo chen po gzhon nu don gan so cad gru ba ba nases bu chen po'i mtshan/ sum

curtsa ba nyi sa po 'di dag dang ldan no// rgyal po chen po/ mtshan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag ni 'khor losgyur ba'i rgyal po la ma 'byung ste/ mtshan de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpab rnams la 'byung ngo//
rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mchis te/ de dag dor ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa nakhaban bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal

bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub ba na sen mo ma tho ba dang
sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang/ so na mo'i mdog snum pa dang/ sor mo rnams zlum pa dang/ sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang/ sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang/ rtsa ma mngon pa dang/ long bu mi mngon pa dang/
chig sa ma mngon pa dang/ zhabs mnyam zhing ma ma nyam pa ma mchis pa dang/ zhabs kyi rted pa yangs po dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal potshon pa ba gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ phyag gi ri

mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang/ phyag gi ri mo ya yor ma gyur pa dang/ phyag ga ra mo rim par 'tsham pa dang/ sgros bim pa ltar dmar ba dang/ sgra mi drag
pa'i tshig dang/ ljags mnyen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang/ glang po tsho'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dang/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po/
gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dpe byad bzang bo yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ phyag ring ba dang/ sku'i na bza' ba/tsang ma phun sum tshogs pa dang/ sku 'jam pa dang/ bsnyengs pa ma mdab ba'i sku
dang/ zhum pa mi mda' ba'i sku dang/ rim par 'tsham pa'i sku da da/ shin tu sba bar mdzes pa'i sku dang/ rnam par legs par grub pa'i sku dang/ pus mo'i lha nga yangs shidirgya che la shin tu gad
ba dang ldan pa lags// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub ban sku zlum pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa dang/ sku la lo ma mchis pa dang/ sku rim gyis legs par grub bdar
lte ba zab pa dang/ lte ba'agal ba dang/ lta ba'am gyis gzhol ba dang/ drad srid ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang/ kun nas mdzes pa dang/ snang ba dam ba shin tu rnam par dag cing rab rab ga
[©]// mchis pa'i bod kun nag 'byung ba dang ldan pa las sago/ rgyal bo chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ glang pa ltar dal ba'i 'gros dang/ song ga'i/
stabs lta bu'i 'gros dad/ khyu mchog gis bas lta bu'i 'gros dang/ dad pa'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang/ g.yas phyogs su mdzes bar 'khor ba'i 'gros dang/ dgu zlum pa dang/
dkaku skabs phyin pa dang/ dku ma redas bo dang/ sked pa gzhu'i chang 'dus ltar phra ba dang/ mdog gi nyis pa ba 'am/ gnag pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sku dang ldan pa lags M so//
rgyal ba tshon po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ mche ba zlum pa dad/ mche ba rno ba dang/ mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang/ spyan gsal ba dang/ sbyan
dri ma med pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i snganadang ldan pa dang/ spyan ring ba dang/ spyan yangs pa dang/ ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal bo rlon po gzhon nu don thams can
grub pa ni smin ma'i ldumanyam ba dang/ smin ma stug pa dang/ smin ma gnag ba dar/ smin ma rgyun chags pa dang/ sman ma rim gyis gzhol ba dang/ mkhur ba rgyas pa dang/ mkhur ba mi
mnyam pa med pa dang/ mkhur ba skyon dang bral ba dang/ sdang ba dang khro ba'i mdog med pa dang/ shin tu rigs ba'i dbang po dad ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams
cad grub pa de ni mdzod spu yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dar/ gdong dang dpral ba rkyen du 'bab pa dang/ dbu yongs su rgyas pa dang/ dbu skra gnag bdad/ dbu skra mnyam pa dang/ dbu skra/
dri zhim ba dang/ dbu skra ma pa shor ba dang/ dbu skra ma 'dzadi ba dang/ dbu skra byin gyis phra ba dang/ dbu skra lcang lor 'khyil ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu dono smanA
cad grub pa de ni/ dbu skra dbal gyi be bu dang bkra shis dang/ g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang/ sdong ras kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dbu skra dang ldan pa'o// rgyal po chen po/ 'di dag nigazhananu don thams

cad grub pa 'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste/ de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pAn khab na bzhugs bar ma 'gyur gyi/ gdo ma 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du khab nas mngon par phyung
bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po zas gtsadams drang srong chen zhig po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas/ tsham zhing mgu la ya rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid
bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ tshags su bcad pa 'di smras so// khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing// drang srong rnams/
kyis mchod gyur te 'jig rten kun gyis mchod rten bas/ bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag de ltar rgya la bzos gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag bo snag gi tsha bo mas byin dang
[+ p]/ bcas te/ kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas// gos bskon te/ bskor ba byas so// de nas drang srong chen po nag po gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul
gyis nam mkha' las nang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo// de nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mas byin la 'di skad ces snus so// mas byin khyed kyis nam sangs rgyas
'jig rten du byung ngo zhes thos pa de'i tsho/ khyodasong ste de'i bstan pa la rab tu byungashag dang/ de na khyod kyi mun pAb don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste//
lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i ngos la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgrogs pa// lha yi drang so dpo' la gnas pas mthong nas dga' mchog thob/ 'di na srog chags rnams kyi dga' skyes sad+ma
rgyas zhes bya'i tshig 'di tsa/ bdag gi lus kyang rab sam gyur cade sems bde mchog tu zhi bar gyur/ lha 'am 'on te lta mni yang na nam mkha' lding ngam ma bam ci// sangs rgyas zhes
bya dga' dad mos byed tshag 'di sngon chad ma thos ci/ lha ya ma log gis phyogs bcur 'a dar sa dang rgya mtsho rnams la bltas// phyis mdas ra mtsho la rmad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong//
'od gsal mdzes ba lus la sam byed 'di ni rab tu bzad snang zhing// ji ltar ri yi rtse mo rnams su byi ru'i chu gu mthon gyur la// shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bzad rgyus sna tshogs 'bras
bus brgyan 'gyur las/ srid pa gsum du dkon mchog dam pa myur du 'byung bar shin tu gsal/sa 'di thams cad mnyam zhade dri med lag mthal bzhin du snang ba dang/ lha rnams dga'/
zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin gyur la/ klu rgyal rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi steng na rin chen rnad byud 'phyob las/ 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal ba'i dkon mchog chos kyi'akhyud gnas
des par 'byung/ n gnas ong zhi zhing sdug bsngal bral te sems can rnams ni bder ldan la// lha yi tshogs rnams rnam mkha'i dkyil la dga' dang ldan bar rgyu ba dang/ 1 ji ltar lha yi glu
dbyangs sgra snyan yid du 'dab grags pa las/ srid pa gsum 'di'i dkon mchog 'byung 'gyur de yakhaltas su gdon mawa/[） ]'dzam bu'i gling 'dir drang srong nag pos lha yi mchog gas rnams
bltas na// ser skya'i gnas na rgyal po zas gtsad grong khyer dam pa yod pa der// mthu chen ma thuldan mtshan dang bsod nams gzi brjid rgyas pa btsas pa mthong// mthong nas dga' mgu
rangs shing bde ba'i lad skyes mthu yang skyes par gyur// de nas ngo mtshar rnyed de rang gi slob ma lhan cig 'dis su dod// phyin nas ser skyar brjod pa'i rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog gi sgo 'dug

ste zham rang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po drang srong des mthong nas// sgo bde la smras pa chab sgor drad srod phyin ces myur du gsol// de mnyan myur du pho brang nad phyin rgyal po la ni da
khasnyad pa// lha cig drang srong rgan 'khogs dka' thub chen po can cag cha ba skar ma ches// drang srong mchog de rgyal po'i pho brang nang du mchibar dga' zhes ma/ rgyal/
no patshon po nang du gtang dam ma gtad bdag la bka' stsal gsol// de nas de la stan bting rgyal pos khyodasong nad du mthong zhes bsgo// drang srong nag pos sgo ba'i tshig thos dga' mgu bde
dang ldan par gyur// skom pa bsal ba la chu 'dod bkres bas gdungs pa zas la mos pa ltar// drang srong dam pa de yang sems can mchog de ma thod du mngon par dga'// rgyal ba rgyal gyur
sku tshar de bsang gsol zhes dga' bas de skad smras// snyan bar brjod nas yid dul dbang po zhi zhing des pa stan la'adug/ rgyal bos gus par sgrubyas drang srod thub pa de la tsheg brjod pa///
rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir byon rgyu ci thub pas bdag la myur du gsungs// khyod kyi sras bltams gzungs mchog ga pha rol phyin cing gzi brjid che dang ldan// mthu chen mtshan rab sum cu gnyid kyis
kun nas brgyanacing 'baka'ag rgyal po khyod sras thams cad donagrub de ni mthong bar bdag dga' ste// de slad 'dir mchis rgyal po bdag la 'tshal ba gzhan ni yong ma mchad// legs so/
sgo legs par byon to mnyal tam ma mnyel khyod ma thod bdag dga'o// na chog sbyin gzhon nu de nyal da ltar blta ba'i skabs na ma mchis kyis// ro shig yud tsam gzhis dad bdar na zla ba nya ba dri
med ba// skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa 'dra ba'i dri med gzigs par 'gyur// gang tshe kha la sbyar mchog zla ba rgyas pa'i bodamangab de sad pa// de tshe rgyal po sa 'od 'bar gzugs 'chang
nyi las 'phags 'od phar blangs te// 'di lta drang srong lca masamachod pa gser mchog gzugs ldan da gzigs shig/ drang srong nag pos de la rkang pa mdzes pa 'khor lo'i mtshan can mthong//
de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag batshal te// bdag nyid chen po bstan bcas mkhas pas pang du blangs nas bsams sharibaltas// des ni mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan gyis/
mchog gis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas// mgo cogs rig byed bstan bcos mkhas pa de ni de la rnam gnyis mthong// stobs ldan 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgya la ma sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso ba/
'gyur// shin tu ma dga' lus dang sems kyis mche ma blugs te shugs rang byung/ (rgyal po mchog kyang sde ngas par gyur nas bram ze tsa snyad bshums zhes smras// drang srong nag pos
bdag ga don grub bgegs shag la gzigs sam// drang srong smad bshums mdzad dge sdig gang gzigs bdag la mad bar ge sungs// khyod sus don kun grub la bar chad lhag tu 'gyur/
gas dga' ba thob pa'i yid kyis ma na bodo zhes de skad du// 'di la sku la mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dri med mda' ba las// rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te gsum du ma
mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdzod// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgya la 'gyur yad nas ngas rgyas 'jig rte rtogatso bor byon// bde mi'i dod pa'i yon tan bzhin par ma 'gyur nges bar sa sa rgyas 'agyur/

drang srong lung bstan de thos rgyal po dga' zhing bde ba thob par gyur// de nas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rkang ba gnyis la phyag khyad bus// stobs mchog ldan pa khyod na lhas mchod drad srong rnams
kyin pa sngags pa ste// srid gsum kun gyi 'gu pa'i ded dpon mchog gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong dga' bas tsha po de la snas pa nga la bgadams ngag nyon// gang tsho bad na byang chub
sangs rgyas 'gro la 'khor lo bskor thos pa// de tsho myur du thub pa'i bstan la rab byung mya ngan 'das pa thob/ drang srong dam pa de las rkang la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni// 'di 'dra'i
sras mnga' khyod kyis thob pa rgya chen legs pa thob ces smras// 'di ni 'jig rten lha dang mar bcas chos kyis tsham par mdzad par 'gyur// drang srong mtshig de ser skya'i gnas nas byudonas
bdag gnas dgon par phyin 'phags pa rgyabar ral pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// kham pa drug pa/// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
sams dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i bu dang da phyug chen pos/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bos te/ 'di skad ces smras so/ 'grogs po dam tu byang chub sems dpa ba
sams dpa' chen po gang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam
gtan dang/ shes rab dad/ thabs dang/ thos pa dang/ spyod pa dang/ brtul zhugs dad dka' thub can/ sbyad pa legs par spyad pa/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang
dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa/ btang snyoms kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i blo tsan/ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ga cha 'a gas par bgos pa//
sngon gyi rgyal pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byad pa/ bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa// rtul ba des pa ra byas pa dad ldan pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu 'jomA
ra dag pa'i bsam pa shin tu dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa/ yi shes chen po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan can/ bdud kyi stobs mthar 'apyan pa// stong gsum gyi ded dpon chen po/ lha dang
mas mchod pa ]mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin byas pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i bsam pa can/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ 'che ba
ny+tsa@#/ ma thar 'byin ng/ legs par skye ba skyes pa/ 'gro ba rnam par byang chub par byed pa de/ bu ram shing pa'i rgyal bo'i rigs su skyes nas ma'i 'jig rtenadu byung ste/
de myur du bla na med pa la de dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyus tshur shig/ bdag cag de la phyag 'tshal zhing dam gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ mngon
par bstod par bya ba'i phyir 'deng ngo// lha'i bu nga rgyal gyi ril gyis non pa gzhan dag kyang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal ba ma byed ba dang/ de dag kyang nga rgyal dang 'gas
ba dang/ rgyags pa gtong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dang 'a la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gro dang/ bkur sti byed par bya ba'i phyir 'deng ngo// de ni lha'i bu de dag la yun ring po'i don dang/ phan
pa dang/ bde ba dang/ 'chi ba med pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// rgyal po zas gtsar ma rgyal ba 'phel ba yang rjes su bsgrags bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ya nga de kho nab lung
bstan pas lung bstan te/ bdag cag phyir 'ong bar bya'o// de skad ces bsgo nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po/ lha'i bu stong brgya phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su skor cing mdun du bdar nas//
ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bod kyis rgyas par bkang ste/ rgyal po zas gtsad ma'i pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ sgo bas rgyal bo la gsol te/ rgyal pos
0 gnang nas rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas// bla gos phra/bgag pa ra/ la ma ga du skor ba byas nas spyi
byang chub sems dbab thad du blangs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smas so/ 2rgyal po chen pa dbyis pa ma pa sa byis pa ra mdzeng cig/ de ci'i slad du zhen
rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa dang/ gzhon nus lha dang ma dang/ lha ma yan du bcas pa 'jig/ pa kha dog da
ga' brjod dang/ grags ba dang/ dpo la gyis zil gyis non lags na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dang ba ni gdon ma 'tshal bar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyud
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang phyag chen de gnas gtsang ma 'a ris kyi lha'i bu mang ba dang lhan cig tubyang chub sems dang 'a
la mchod pa dang/ ram gro chen po byas to/ de kho na'i lung bstan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nas phyir bdag gi gnas su song ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ yon tan
rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin pa de bltams pa// lha yi dbang pos shes nas dga' ste lha la smras// de thos 'gyur pa'i ng bskal pa bye mad shin tu dga'// tshur shig mi la dbang po de la
/mchod du 'ded// rin chen nor bus gtsug legs porgyan spyod lam ldan// gtsug phud mdzes pa 'phyang ba rnam par dag pa'i lha// stong phrag bcu gnyis tshad pa
gser skya'i gnas mchog tu// myur du lhags nas rgyal po'i sgo la drud na sdod// de dag rnams kyi slob la ni yad 'od lcas// rgyal po'i bo brang song ste thugs su chud par gsol//
chab sgobs kyadag demanyan nas nang du song// thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po do la 'di skad ces smras// lhacag rtag tu rgyal gyur sku tshe 'de du srungs// bsod nams yangs pa rnam dag 'od can chab
sgor mchis// rin chen nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyun spyod lam ldan// zla ba nya ltar bzhin bzang zla ltar dri med 'od// rgyal po de dag gang du mchi yad grib ma gda'// sug pa 'dom pa
gom pa'i sgra dag thos mi 'gyur// ga sar sgrub bgyid kyang rdul ni yongs mi ldang// skye bo rnams kyang de dag mthong na ngoms ma 'gyur// de dag lus kyi 'od ni shin tu rgya chen gsal//
tshigs kyang yod du mche ste ma la dpe ma mchis// zab cing 'jam mnyenasnyan pa 'byung gnas las nas// de dag ma ma lags kyi lha tshogs lags snyam bgyid// me tog mchog phreng byag
! ba dar gyi lda ldi dag/ kun gyi lagan thob sa nas gus dang bcas par sdod// rgyal po lha rnams de dag gzhon nu lha yi lha// blta bar 'tshal zhing mchod pa'i sladadu mchis su des// rgyalaM
pos de skad tshig shes rab tu dgar gyur nas// song ste kun kyang pho brang nang du gshegs zhes kyis// de dag yon tan spyod lam khyod kyis smras ltar na// rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba na ma la gang/
yar med// sgo bas zal mo sbyar te lha la 'di skad smras// rgyal pos gnang gis khyed cag nang du bzhud du gsol// lag na phreng thogs de dag dga' mgu ya ra ngos te// lha ya gnas dang
'dra ba'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs// lha mchog de dag khyim du phyin par mthong nas ni// rgyal pa stan las langs te thal mo sbyar byas te// ri chen rtsa ba can gyi khri gdan bshams pa 'dir//
thug sa brtse mdzad pa'i thugs kyis byed cig bzhugs su gsol// nga rgyal dregs med de dag stan la 'khod par gyur// bdag cag ci slad 'dir mchis rgyal po gsan du gsol// khyodasras
rnam dag sku mang ba bsod nams chen po bltams// shin tu legs pa'i zhabs ldan bdag cag mthong bar 'tshal// gdag 'gro ba gang dang sbyor ba gang ca'i 'gyur// mtshan bzangs na tshan gyi
cho ga dag ni bdag cag 'tshal// de bas rgyal po'i dam pa ma dgyes sbyang bar mdzod// sna tshogs mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa blta bar 'tshal// rgyal bo bud med tshogs kyis bskor ba de rab
dga'// gzhon nu ma yi 'od ltar 'bar ba phang du blangs// lha mchog gtsug phud 'phyang ba dag ni nye bar bsnyen// theg ma sgor byud stod gsum 'di dga kun tu gayos// lha mchog de dag 'dren
pa'i zhabs dang sen mo ni// thongs mdog dri med rnam dag sku yi gzi mthong nas// gtsug phud 'phrad pa de dag myur du langs par gyur// dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi zhabs/
lamags phyag 'tshal// 'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'drar lta bdapal can dang// 'di 'dra'i bsad nams gza brjod spyi gtsug ma mthado dang// mdzod spu nas na rgya chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dra las
bdud rnams pham mdzad byang chub b.rus 'gyur gdon ma 'tshalag/ mun sel nyon mongs bral ba'i yon tan brtags nas su// yang dag yon tan ji ltar don mthong d la bstod// skye dang rga dang 'a
rgyu dang nyon mongs dag bsal ba'i// sems can rin chen 'di ni ring po ma thogs 'byung// yongs tog 'dod chags yul gyigatsub mas bskyed pa yi// rnam gsum mes ni srid gsum kun
khar 'ongs gdungs par// dpal khyod chos kyi sbyin gyis stong gsum bkang nas ni// bachi med char gyis nyon mongs gdung bzhi mdzad 'gyur// byams pa'i gsung mang ba thugs rje ldan pa 'jam
pa'i gsung// tshangs pa sgra dbyangs yid bod gsudaru sgrog mdzad pa// stong gsum kun tu go zhing 'gro ba gor 'gyur pa// bcom ldan khyod kyis sangs rgyas gsung chen myur du sgrogs//
srid pa 'dod chags bcing bying srid pa'i rtsir ba gnas pa// mu stegs can gyi tshogs ngan log par lta ba bcom// khyed kyi rgyu la brtan dang stod pa'i chos thos nas// seng ge s wa tshogs bzhin
du de dag 'byer bar 'gyur// nyon mongs chen po'i du ba ma rig bsgribs bsal te// kun tu 'byung ba skye ba nges par snang byed pa'i ye shes 'od 'phro shes rab 'od ragi gzigs pa yis// 'gro ba kun gyi
mun pa chen po bas kha par gsol// gang du sems can dag pa rmad byung 'di 'dra byung// lha dang ma rnams kyis ni rAd pa rgya chen thob// rnam par rtogs par mdzad pa'i sems can rin chan
'dis// ngan song lam bcad lha yi lam ni btod par 'gyur// ser skya'i gnas su lha yi me tog char phab nas// bskor ba byas te gus par bstod pa byas nas na/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
legs shes de dag tshig brjod ci de// lha tshogs de dag tshul du shas bar mkha' la dang// bltams pa'i 'bu sde bdun pa'o// 1 (dge slong dag de ltar byang chub semA
dpa' gang gi nub mo btsas pa de nyid kyi zhu ba ma// rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta burnams su bu mo nye khri btsas par gyur te// de dag thams
cad kyang de dag gi pha ma rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang// bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bu mo nyi khri byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro
bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur byaba'i phyir phul lo// mdza' bshes dang/ blon po dang/ nye du dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang/ bsnyen
bkur bya ba'i phyir bu mo nyi khri phulal// blon po 'khor rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ bu mo na khra phul la// dge
slong dag de'i tshe/ shAkya'i rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu 'di ni lha khang du bkur ba'i
bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa// gzhon nu de ltar bkur ba legs kyis/ de bas na/ grong khyar na brgyan par gyis shig/ srung dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo dad/ tshodo dus dag na mdzes par
gyis shig/ bkra mi shis pa/skur pa dang/ zhar ba dad/ 'on pa dang/ lkugs pa dang/ dbyibs mi mdzes pa dang/ gzugs ma mdzes pa dang/ dbang ma tshang ba rnams ni
sol cig/ bkra shis pa rnams kyang sogs shig/ bsod nams kyi rnga ni brdungs shig/ bkra shis kyi dril ni dkrol cig/ grong khyer dam pa'i sgo ni rgyan gyis legs par sbyad cig/
rol mo salasnyan dang/ pheg rdob ba shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag ni lang zhing rdobs shig khams kyi rgyal po nyams dud na sogasashig/ tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag dang/ blon po dang
sgo ba dang/ 'khor gyi ma dag ni gcig tu sdus shig/ bu mo'i shing rta ni goms shag bum pa gang ba rnams ni snyan cag/ khramaza kha ton pa rnams ni sdus shig/ lha khang rnams
ni shin tu brgyan 'gyis shig/ dge slong dag de nas rgyal pos ji skad bsgo ba de bzhin du/ thams cad sbyar ba dang/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma rang ga khyim du song nas// skye
dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u ta mA la bos te 'di skad ces snas so// gzhon nu lca khang du bkur gyis rgyun gyis legs par brgyan par gyis shig/ legs so zhes skye dgu'i bdag mtshan
ma ga'u ta mas de ltar mnyan te/ gzhon nu brgyan gyis brgyan to// de nas gzhon nu de rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med bas/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis
sru mo la sbas pa/ ma bdag gang du bkur/ smas pa/ bu lha khang du bkur ro// de nas gzhon nus bzhin 'dzum ste bgad nas/ su mo la tshigs su bcad de smyus ba/
bdag bcas de tshastong gsum 'di ni g.yos par gyur/ brgya byin tshangs pa lha man lto 'phye chen po dang/ nyi zla de bzhin rnam thos bu dad gzhan nu yang// spyi bo rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te
phyag 'tshal nas/ de ring ma las gang du bdag bkur bgyi ba yi/lha gzhan bdag gsagod na 'phags pa gang zhig mchis// lha rnams kun las bdag 'phags lu a lha lags te//
bdag 'dra'i lha lad ma mchis gangom ga la mchis// 'on kyang 'jig rten rjes bsnyags tsamadu bdag mchi 'am// bdag gi rnam 'phrul skye bos mthongon dgar 'gyur zhade// rim grol kun
sti shin tu che bar bgyid 'gyur la// lha mas bden lha ya lha zhes rig par 'gyur// dgeslong dgade ltar grong khyer du gzhon nu'i shing rta bshams te rgyan gyis brgyan/
nas bkra shis thams cad bshams te/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu phud du ngas nasaM/ bram ze dang/ grong rdal ba dang/ tshod dpon dang khyim bdag dad blon re dang/
khams kyi rgyal po dang/ sgo ba dang/ 'khor gyi ma dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ nya dus bskor te/ srad dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo dang/ sun mdo dang/ tshod dus rgyan tshad med pas
rgyu brgyan pa byas nas/ bdug spos dri zhim pos na bdugs/ me tog sil ma ni gtor/ rta dang/ glang po cha dang/ shing rta dang [7 ]rkang thang ga bun long na char gyur/ gdugs dang/

rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan ni bsgreng/ sal snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra ni phyung ste/ sang bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha brgya stong dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shing rta drangs te/ lha'i bu mo bub khrag
khrig brgya stong du mas nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog ga char babaste/ saMlasnyan gyi sgra 'byin par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar rgyal te zas gtsang nas rgyal po' bkod ba chen pa dang/
rgyal bo'i phun sum tshogs pachen bo dang/ rgyal po'i byin chen pos gzhon nu de khyer te lha khad du byin to/ de nas byang chub sems dpas lha khang der nang da g.yas pa'i mthal
ba zhag pa dang/ de nas lha'i gzugs sems med pa de dag bad lta ste/ gu lad dang/ semabyed dang/ lus ngan dang/ zla ba dang/ nya ma dang/ rnamadzes kyi bu dang/ brgya byin dang tshungs
pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa 'i gzugs dan sa cad kyang/ rang rang gis ba nas nad la das dang dung ba sen sa dang 'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha dang
mi brgya stong ni/ kye ma a la la zhes bya ba dang/ ca co dang/ ga zha'i sgra brgya stong mang po 'byin par gyur to/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa de thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu
g.yos so// lha'i me tog gi char yang ma ngon par bab bo// lha 'is la snyan brgya stong du ma dag kyang ma dkra [']kar sgra 'byin par gyur to/ lha gang dag gi gzugs gang yan pa de dag thams cad
kyang rang rang gi gzugs bstan nas/ tshagasasu bcad pa 'di dag sla bar gyur to/ ri rgyal ra mchog ba nam ya nga yungs kar 'bu la phyag ma 'tshal// rgya mtsho klu rje gnasazhu nam yang brjes ru la

phyag ma 'tshal/ nyi zla 'od byed srin bu me khyer bod byed de la phyag ma 'tshal/bsod namA shes rab dge byung leg ldan lha rnams ba/da la'ang phyag ma bzhes//su ngas 'bru brjes chu dang srin bu me khyer 'dra bshu gyur pa ni//stong gsum 'aTon
lha mi gang na da rung ste brgyal gnas ba lags// ri brgya mtsho nyi zla badra ba 'jig rten rang byung dam pa ste/ de la 'jig rten phyag 'tshal ba ni mtho risi mya ngan 'das pa thog byang chub sa nas
dpa' lha khang du zhugs pa de bstan pa'i tshe// lha'i bu brgya stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yad dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//
ga slong dag khyad chub sems dpa 'a lha khang du khyer ba'i tshe/ btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i rkyen ni de yan/ rgyu ni de yan no/ lha khad du khyer ba'i le'u ste brgyud pa go/
dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na ba don 'char po zhes bya ba 'char 'gro ba'i pha/ bram ze lnga brgya tsam gyis bskor te/ skar ma ma bzhi 'das nas nag dal bab pa'i tshe/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i
rgo drung du phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// da na gzhon nu'i rgyan mdzad pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa 1 lags kyis byed du chug shig/ de'i
rgyal po zas gtsadam dang/ shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis rgyan gyi rnam pa lnga brgya tsam byed du bcug ste/ 'di ltar lag pa'i rgyan dag dang/ rkad pa'i rgyan dag dad mgo'i rgyan dag dang/
mgul gyi rgyan dag dad/ sor gdub dag dang/ rna rgyan dag dang/ dbud rgyun dag dad/ gser gyi ska rags dgard/ gser skud dag dod/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dgadad/ na bo chu'i
dra ba dag dang/ lham rin po tshes smras ba dag dang/ do shal rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan pa dag rang/ gdu bu rgyan can dag dang/ nagul gdub dag dang/ rtsod pan dag kyang byed du bcug ste//
0 zin nas/ skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/ shAkya de dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du dong nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon nu rgyan du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed kyis gnyen du
la brgyan pa dang/ mchod pa byas pa chog gis/ ngas gzhon nu'i rgyan thams cad byed du bcug go/ spyas pa bdag cag gas rgyan 'di dag gzhon nub sku la gdugs mtshan bdun zhig du gdags su gsol
de ltar gnang na pa dag cag gis sug las bgyis pa yang don mchis pa ra 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nam nangs te/ nyin shar ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal bkod pa dri ma ni da da nas gsung
zhugs so// de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u ta mas byang chub sems dar ba phang du blangs so// bud med brgyad khris kyadabyar chub sems dpa ba bsu ste/ gdong du 'u 'de [']da pa ra gu
bu mo stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste/ gdong du lta zhing bkod par gyur to// shAkya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing da pa rgyud do// phran zla 3
stong yang lhags nas byang chub sems dpa'i gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// de nas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya bas rgyan ji snyad cig byas pa de dag thamA cad kyang sku 6 4 sa da
lus la btags te/ de dag lus la btags ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi bod kyis mog mog por gyur nas lham mer ma gyur/ lan nor ma gyur/ lhang der ma gyur ta/ 'di lta sku
dper na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du snag tsha'i chug gzhag na lham mer marung/ lhan ner mdud/ lhang nger ma rung ngo// de bzhin du rgyan de dag thams cad byang/
