chub sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis phog na lham mer ma rud/ lhan ner ma rung/ lhang der ma rung ngo// de bzhin du rgyan gyis rnam pa gang dang gang byang chub sems dang ba lus la btags pa
de dang de dag mag mog par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar gyi gan du snag tsha'i yug bzhag pa bzhin no// dab tshe skyed mos tshal gyi lha mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'dug
pa des lus chen po bstan nas// mdun du 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad/ shAkya'i tshogs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// stong gsum sa 'di grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa kun
gal te gser gyis gang khyab dri ni da mdzes gyur kyang/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gzigs gcig gis jil rlag ste// gsar gzhan dag ni dpa' dang bral zhing gsal ma 'gyur/ sa ba de
mtha' dag 'dzam bu'i gling ga gser khebs kyang// 'dren pa dpal rgyas khung 'od phud zil gyis non// ma snang ma gsal ma mdzes 'od kyang nyams gyur cing/ bde gshegs skyob/
pa'i drung du snag tsha bzhin du 'gyur// yon tan brgyas gar 'di ni da ga gza ya saM brgyan// de ni rgyan gyis mdzes min shin tu dri med sku// nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma nor bu me dag dang/
tshe tsha a pa rA bod [']nga dang la stag mdun mi gsal// gang sku sngon gyi dge ba'i 'bras bus mtshan pas pa[：]da la gzhan gyis byas la be rgan mA[… ]nyab las// rgyan 3
'or na mkhas pas mdzad ma gtsishig/ blo gros mchog mdzad 'di ni bcos ma'i rgyan bzhed/ 'dun pa bdi na rgyal khab sras dang lhan cig pa tsa// dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i rnam
pang[', ] ga u0f7a ba ni rgya chen mchog tu 'gyur snyam nas// shAkya dag ni yid dga' mgu zhing ngo mtshar gyur// lha mo des de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i de ga dag par
sems dpa' de la mngon par gtor ta da nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// rgyan gyis 'bus dgu pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar pa/ ter nud pa 'phang sbyin pa dang// bkra shis
pargyu sbyong bas na/ khye'u stong phrag bcu dad/ bu mo steng phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te ya ga'i grwar bajug pa byas so// bzang ba dang/ ba rul ba dang Da kas
gang ba'i shing tu pad+mo phrag bcu dang/ gser dngul dang/ dbyig gis gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu drangs te/ ser skya'-i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i srung dang grong dpa da tshapa
dus kyi tshogs pa gang yin pa dag tu gtor to// mngon par byan no// sil snyan 'bum phrag brgyad kyi sgra lad phyung zhing/ me tog gi char chen po ya nga mngon par bab so/ sug
sgo khar dang/ rta babs dang/ skar khung dang/ bsal bad dang/ khong ba brtsegs pa dang/ khang bzangs dag gi steng nas bu mo brgya stong rgyan thams cad kyis/
brgyan pa dag/ byang chung sems dang 'a la lta zhing me tog dag 'thor bar gyur to// lha'i bu ma stong phrag brgyad ni rgyan thams cad kyis lhug lhug por brgyan te/ ran pa tsho bzod byed thog
nas las 'phyug cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas dong bar gyur to// lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra zad ng/ lha ma yan dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi
'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang lus phyed phyud zhing/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog dang/ dar gyi lda ldi 'bre bar gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kar rgyal po zas gtsang
ma'i mdun du bdar nas// byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas 'dod bar gyur te// bkod pa ba rnam pa 'dilta bu 'dasi/ byang chub sems dpa' ya ga'i grwar zhugs par gyur to//byang chub
sems dpa' yi ger grwar zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod de/ kha bub tu 'gyel to//
de ltar 'gyel ba dga' ldan gyi rigs kyi lha'i bu yan lag bzang po zhes bya bas mthong nas/ lag pa g.yas pas btog ste blang ngo// blangs nas kyang de nam mkha'i dkyil na bdug ste/
rgyal bo zas gtsang ma dang/ skye ba phal bo che de dag la tshigs su bcad de snyas la// ma ya 'jig rten 'di na bstan bcos gang yod pa// grongs dang ya gi rtsis dang khams kyi rgyud dag dang/
'jig rten ba 'o ya sbyor pa tshad med mang po dag/ bskal pa bya mang sngon chad 'dis ni de dag bslabs// 'on kyang skyo bo'i rjes su mthun pa tsam mdzad de// byis pa mang po thog pa mdog la
smin mdzad dang/ sems can khrag khrig gzhan yang 'chi medadagod pa'i phyir// shin tu lobs pa 'ong bslab phyir yi ga'i grwar zhugs so// 'jig rten 'das pa'i bden pa'i lam gyi tshul
mkhyen cing/ rgyu la rtenanas ji ltar 'byung ba de la'ang mkhas// ji ltar 'dus byas 'gags zad pasal 'gyur de tshul yang// mkhyenan yaba'i bstan bcos tsam lta cis ma mkhyen//
'jig rten gsum na 'di ya slob dpon gong na med// lha dar ma'i bcas nang na 'di nyer gcoye ste// bskal pa bya mang ston chad gang la 'das bslabs pa 'gi/ ya ge de dag mang ya nga khyed kyis
shas ma 'gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud sna tshogs gang 'byung ba// skad cig gcig gis sems can dag pa bdas mkhyen te// gzugs med ltar ma snang ba'i tshul yang r ba ma la san
ya gi gzugs yod ba lta snang dag lta smos ci dgos// de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu des byang chubs nasadapa' la lha'i me tog mang pos gtor te/ de nyid du masnang bar gyur to//
de nas ma ma dad/ bran mob 'a khor bkod de/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sogs pa/ shAkya gzhan na phyir dod de// de nas byang chub sems dar tsan
dan sbrul gyi sAd la byas pa ba la ge'i shing// lha'i tshon gyis byugs pa ( gsar gyi lang mag gas gtags pa/ mtha' ma nor du rin po ches kun nas brgyan pa thogs te[7]slob dben kun
gyi bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so// kyi mkhan pos bdag la yig gang zhig bslab/ tshangs pa'i yi ge 'am/ kha lo stakho ya gi 'ag/ bad+ma'i gad pa'i m ge'am/ ang ga ba
gi 'am/ mad ga 'i yi la ka kham/ yul sa ga 'a ya le 'am/ bkra shis pa'i ya gi 'am/ sor mo pa'i yi ge 'an/ shaka' ya ge 'am/ la ba nu'i ya gi 'an/ bag med pa'i yig 'ag/

b.ru sha 'a ya le gnad ka ga'i yi li 'am/'gro lding ba'i nga ce de 'am/ ki ra ta' yi ge 'am/ lho phyogs pa'i ya le ga bam 2 drag shul can gyi ya ba 'am/ grangs kyi lag bas/ spyi'i tshugs pa la yang se kham/
rjes su mthun pa 'a ya ge 'am/ bru shab la gi 'am/ ka sha' ya gi bam/ rgya'i ya gi bam/ phu na 'ge 'am/ chu na'i ya gi bam/ ya ga 'dringangam/ rgyas par bri ba'i ya ge 'an/ rgyal
gyi ya gi 'am/ lha 'a ya ba 'am/ klu'i ya gi 'am/ gnodasbyin gyi la gi 'am/ dri za'i ya gi 'am/ ma 'am ci'i yi ga 'am 2 lto 'phye chen po'i lag kham/ lha ma yin gyi ya le 'am/ nam mkha'

snang ba de yi bde bas (ra dbas kyi ba lor lA lo'i yi ge 'am/ khA skad shes pa'i yi ge 'am/ sa bla'i lha'i ya ge ma/ bar snad pa u0f7a lha' yase 'a na/ nub kyi ba lad spyod kyi yi bde 'am/ byang gi sgra
mi snyan gyi yi gi 'an/ shar gyi lus 'phags po'i yi ge 'am/ bdeg pa 'a yig 'am/ gzhag pa 'a ya leg lam/ bstan pa ba yal khan/ rgya mtsho po'i ya ba bag/ rdo rje'i yal 'a ma sbrang
yag ra lan gyi sa ga'am/ rnam 'thor gyi na ge bam/ rades med kyi las 'ag/ bstan bcos bskor ba'i ya gi 'am/ rtsis skor ba 'a ya cig 'am/ gdeg pa skor ba'i ya gi bam/
gzhag pa la skor ba'i ya gi 'am/ rkang pas bris pa'i ya ga bam/ tshig lan gnyis su gdab pa'i tshig gi mtshams kyi 'a gi 'am/ tshag gi mtshams bcur brgyud pa'i bar gyi 'gi 'an/
bla thabs su bsnan pa'i ya gi 'am/ sgra thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i ya gi 'am/ rig pa dang ma thun pab ya gi 'am/ rnam ban 'dren pa'i da le 'am/ drang srid gas dka' thub spyad pa'i yi ge
'am/ lha'i des pa'i la ge 'am/ sa blta ba'i yi ge'am/ nam mkhar blta bab ya ba 'am/ sman thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa 'a ya le de'am/ snyid pa thams cad kun tu sdad ba'i lage 'am/ 'byug
bo thams cad kyi sgra sdud bab ya gi 'am/ kya slob dpon yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nang na bdag la gang bslab/ de nas Mbyis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen ngomotshad du gyur nas/ bzhon
[7 ]@#/// gyi 'dzum phyud ste/ ra rgyal dang/ dregs pa dang/ rgyags pa med par byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa bde dag sman sa// sems can dag pa ngomatshar che// bstan/
bcos kun la bslabs gyur kyang// 'jig rten 'jig rtan rjes bsnyags phyir// ya gi'i grur ni byon par gyur// yi ga gdag mang dag kyang// bdag gis shes par mgyur pa// de la 'di ni/
byang gyur kyang// yi ge slob pa'i grwar byon to// bde yi zhal ni mthong mod kyi// sbyigatsug kha gas pa bltar ma snang// ya gi'i shes ra ba sathar phyin na// bdag gis bad ga ji ltar bslab
ska lha ya lha chen lha 'dini// lha rnams kun gyis chog mkhas pa// khyad par 'phags shing mnyam pa med// 'jig rten gang zag do zla med// bdag kyang bdi nyid mthun pas na// shes
rab thabs kyis khyad par gyis// 'jig rten kun gyi dbung gnyan pa// lobs pa 'di ni bslab par bya// dge slad dag de ltar byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag/ byad chub sems dpa' dang
lhan cig tu yi ge slob pa'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis// byis pas de dag la ga'i phyi mo slob cing gang gi tshe// A zhes brjod pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed thams cad ma rtag
pa'i sgra byung ngo// A zhes brjod ba dang/ bdag med pa ba sgra byung ngo// a zhes brjod pa dang/ dbang po shin tu yangs pa'-i sgra byung go/ A zhes brjod pa dang/ 'gro ba na yams kyi nad

mang ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// u zhes brjod pa dang/ 'gro ba ni 'tshe ba mang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// A zhes brjod pa dang/ 'gro ba ni dam ba ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgo byad ngo// e zhes/
brjed pa dang/ tes pa na btsal ba las 'byud ngozhes bya ba'i sgra byud nga// a zhes brjod ba dang/ 'phagasaM pa'i lan ni dga' zhes bya bab sgra phyud do/ o zhes brjod pa dang/ chu las

rgal ba'i sgra byung ngo// o zhes brjod pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul ba'i sgra byung ngo// u0f00 zhes brjod pa dang/ bdag gi ba ma babyung ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// azhes brjod pa dang/ nub pa zhes bya
ba'i sgra byud da// ka zhes brjod pa dang/ lasakyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung do// kha zhes brjod pa dang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i sgra byung/
ngo/ ga zhes brjod pa dang/ chos zab ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// gru zhes brjod pa dang/ ma rig pa dang/ gti mug gi mun pa dang/ lang rtog stug po bsal zhes bya ba'i sgra byur go/ nga
zhes brjod pa dang/ yan lag rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// tsa zhes brjod pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sa byung ngo// tsha zhes brjod pa dang/ ba dod pa'i 'dod chags/

sangs pa'i sgra byung ngo// dza zhes brjod pa dang/ rga shi las yang dag par bdas pa'i sgra byung ngo// dz+ha zhes brjod pa dad 'chi byed kyi rgyal mtshan can gyi dpung tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo/
nya zhes brjod pa dang/ shes par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo// Ta zhes brjod pa dang/ lam shan tuchad pa ba'i sgra byud dang// bla zhes brjod pa dang/ dra ba bzhag pa sgra
byung ngo// zhes brjod pa dang/ dkrugs ma dang bodud tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo// b+hu zhes brjod pa dang/ yu la ma gtsang ba'i sgra byung ngo/ Na zhes brjod pa dang/ nyon mongos

pani phra ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// tra zhes brjod pa dang/ de bzhin nyidani 'dres pa med ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// tha zhes pa rjod ba dang/ mthu stobs dang shugs dar ma la jigs pa'i sgra
byung ngo// dazhes brjod pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa dang/ des pa'i sgra byung ngo// d+ha zhes brjod pa dad/ 'phags pa rnams kyi nig ni rnam pa bdun no zhes
bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// na zhes brjod pa dad/ ming dang gzugs yongs su shes pa ra bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// pa zhes brjod pa dang/ don dam pa'i sgra byung ngo// pha zhes brjod pa dang/ 'bras
bu snyad ba mden du bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// ba zhes brjod ba dang/ bcings pa las rnam par thar pa'i sgra byud do// bu zhes brjod pa dang/ srid pa 'jig pa'iskabyud ngo// ma zhes brjod ng/
dad/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyugs pa zhi bar byaba'i sgra byung ngo// ya zhes brjod ba dar/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i sprubyung ngo// ra zhes brjod ba dad dga' ba la dga' ba med par
don dam par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo// la zhes brjod pa dang/ 'khri shing chad ba'i sgra byung ngo// zhes pa rjod pa dang/ theg pa'i mchog gi sgrakhyud ngo// sha zhes brjod pa dang/
zhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong gi sgra byud ngo// kha zhes brjod pa dang/ skye mched drug gzhom zhing ma ngon par shes pa drug dang/ ye shes thob pa'i sgra khyud do// sa zhes brjod pa dang/ thams

cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya pa'i sa byung ngo// ha zhes brjod pa dang/ nyon mongs ba bcom zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra byud re so// klu zhes brjod pa dang//
ya ga'i mthar phyin te chos thams cad brjod du med pa'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung da/ de ltar byis ba de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob pa ba tshi/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de dag la sogs pa///
chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med du byud par gyur te/ byang chub sems dab 'a ya ga'i grwan 'dug pa'i tshe/ byis ba sum khri nyis stod rim gyis bya named pa gad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yongs su smin pa ra byas so// byang chub sems dpa' lobs par gyur kyad/ yi gab grwar 'jug pa shi rgyun de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// yi ge bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/
dge slong dag gzhon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes nas/ dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu de/ gzhon nu gzhan dag dang/ zhang len gyi bu dag dang lhan cig tu
zhed pa'i grod lta zhing dad ste/ grong bltas nas zhing byas kyi mtha'i bskyed mos tshal gcig tu phyin to// den byang chub sems dpa ba gcig pu/ gnyis sumed/
par pha zad 'khyam zhing so dgod pa dang/ 'dzamadungashad ljon pa mdzes pa// blta na sdug pa zhig mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i grib ma la skya la mo krung du bcas te 'dug go/
'dug nas byang chub sems dpas sems rtse gcig pa red de/ rnyed nas kyang sdig pa ma dgorab tshes rnams las dben pa// rtog pa dang bcas ba/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa Da dben pa las/
skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de rtog pa dang/ dpyad pa dang brala'ang nang yongs su dang// sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur bas/
rtog pa med pa/ dpyad pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bdeb can/ bsam gtanaganyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so// da dga' ba'i 'dod chags da ra bral bas
ba tang snyoms la gnas shang/ dran pa dang/ shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis khyod la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran ba dang ldan pa// bde ba la gnas pa btang snyan
pa 'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dgab ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba pad spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang su ngas shade/ yid bde ba dang/ yid mi
bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba dang yani/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa// btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa// bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas sa// de'i tshe phyi rol gyi
drad srong mngon par shes pa lnga yod ba/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa// nam mkha' las 'dod ba lnga nyag/ lho phyogs nas byad phyogs 'gos su dang dod ba las/ de dag tshal stag po de'i sku da du
phyin pa dang/ phyir phul ba ltar 'dod ma nus nas/ de dag mi dga' zhing ba spu g.yos te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag cag 'di na'i rab nor bu rdo rje brtsegs ri shan tu
ngoms sdug pa yad thal phyung si/ glang bo a ma'i shing ljon yal gsagawas lo mang po bcom nas 'gro ba bzhin du dong dong le/ bdag cag 'di na lha la khyim la'ang thogs med gnod sbyin dra
za'i khyim steng nam mkhar gnasa gnas na/ tshal stug 'dir phyin nas ni sgyid lug gyur pa su yi mthu zhig gis na rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog gyur// de nas tshal sdug bden
lha mo zhig gnas pa des/ drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de sbas pa/ rgyal po'i gtso bo'i rigs byung gAkya'i rgyal sras nyi ma shar ba lta bur rab tu snang ba'i 'od// 'jig rten gtso bo
mkhas pa zla zhal pad+ma rgyas pa'i snying po'i kha dog lta burab mdzes pa// lha dang klu dbang gnod sbyin drizas mchod pa de ni bsam gtanadagongs shar tshal stug 'di na bzhugs// srid pa bye ba brgya
dag tu na bsod nams spel ba de ya mthu yas rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog go/ de nas de dag gis 'galegs su bltas pa dad gzhon nu zhig dpal dang gzi brjid/
'bar ba mthong nas/ de dag 'disnyam du su zhig 'di ltar gnas/ noragyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu 'am ci gam lan nam/ 'on te 'dod pa'i dbang po bdud lta bam/ yang na lto 'phye chen po'i
dbang po 'o ma/ 'on te dbad ra dzi'achang ba 'am/ ya nga nag la da dam/ grul bum gyi bdag pa 'an/ 'on te sbyob chen po dang ldan pa nag bo 'am/ 'on te lha'i bu zla ba 'am 'on te bod
zer stong dang ldan pa nyi ma 'am 2 'on te 'kher les sbyar ba'i rgyal po zhig yin nam su zhig yin snyam mo// de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang sgyus so// gnyen nu 'di ni rnam thos bu yag zug
las 'phags par gsal bar snang bas na// 'di ni sgra gcan yin nam 'on te rdo rdzo'achadu gzugs sam nyi zla'igazugs// 'dod mchog dbed po'i gzugs sam gu lang gzugs sam
'on te nag po'i gzugs lan nam// yang na 'di nidapal ldan yan lag mtshan sbas stag med sangs rgyas 'gyur pa zhig/ de nas tshal gyi lha mo des drang srong de dag la tshigs
su bcad de slar slas pa// rnam thos bu dang mig stod bdag la dpalan gang yod gyur pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lha min dbang la dpal ni gang yod dang// mi mjed bdag pa tshadas pa
khagaza' rnams la yang dpal nang yod pa// dpal de shAkya'i sras pa 'di dung phyin na gang gi chan ma yod/// de nas drang srong de dag gas rtswa mo de'i tshig thos nas sa la babs
pa dang/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba'i lus kyis bsam gtan byed cing/ me'i phung po ltar 'barab mthong nas// de dag byang chub sems dpa' las mas shang/ tshigs
su bcad pas bstod de/ de la gcig gis sbas pa/ 'jig rten nyon mongs mes gdungs khar// mtsho 'di rab tu byung gyur te// gang gis 'jig rten sam 'gyur ba'i// chos de
'di yis bar s par 'gyur// yang gcig gis smras pa/ mi shes rab rab 'jig rten du// sgron ma 'di'i rab tu byung// gang gis 'gro ba sna 'gyur ba'i// chos de 'di yis brnyes
par 'gyur// khang pa gcig pas lcas pa// mya ngan rgya mtsho bdal ba las// gru yi dam pa 'dibyung ste/ gang gA 'gro ba sgrol 'gyur ba'i// chos de 'di yis b.res bar 'gyur// yang
gcig gis sbas pa/ nyon mongs 'chings bas bcings pa la// 'grol bar mdzad pa 'de byung ste// gang gis 'gro ba 'grol 'gyur pa'i// chos de 'di yis b.ris par 'gyur// yang
gcig gis smyos pa/ rga dang nad kyis gzir bal// snyan pa dam pa 'di byung ste// gang gis shi thar bya ba'i// chos de 'di yis res par 'gyur// de nas drang srong/
de dag gis byang chub sems dpa ga la tshugs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod de// lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ nam ma'ab las dong go/ rgyal po zas gtsang
ma mang byang chub sems dpa' ma ma thong zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' med pas m dga' ste/ des smras pa// gzhon nu de ma snangan gar song/ de'i tshe skye bo phal ba tsho gzhon nu tshol du
dong dong ba dang/ de'i cha blon po gcig cag gis// byang chub sems dpa' la dzam bu'i shing ga grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te/ bsam gtan byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo// des de'i
tsho shing thams cad kyi grib nan yol na/ 'dzam bu'i shing gi gra ba ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus ma gtod par 'dug par mthong na/ de nAtshar du gyur te/ tsham zhing mgu la yid rangs
nag/ rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yad bde ba skyes nas/ radas shing myur ba myur ba'i gzugs kyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i thad du phyin te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
rgyal gzhon nu de la gzigs// 'dzam bu'i shing grib bsam gtan mdzad// brgya byin tshadas pa ji bzhin du/ gzi brjid dpal gyis rab tu mdzes// zhugs gang gang gi grib ma la/
[E ]mtshan rab mnga' ba de bzhugs pa'i// grib ma de ni de mgatang// skyes mchog bsam gtan mdzad la sgrib// de nas rgyal po zasagatsang ma 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa ga la kha
0 der sang ste phyin na// byang chub sems dpa' dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de mthong ba dang/ tshags su bcad pa 'di snas so// ri yaspro lam rtswa 'bar 'dra ste// zla ba skar ma'i
chogs nang 'jug 'drazhing// gzi brjid sgron 'dra bsam gtan byed mthong na// nga yi lus 'di shin tu 'dar bar gyur// de skad ces smras nas// des byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag
byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di lcasaso// thub pa gar tsho bltams pa dang// gang tshe bod ldan bsam gtan mdzad/ 'dren pa 'di ltar lan gnyis su// mgon po khyod zhabs phyag
'tshal go/ de'i tshe byas ba khrib thogs pa dag ca co'i sgra 'byin bar gyur nas/ de dag la blon po dag gis sgra ma che sgra ma che zhes byas pa dang/ de dag ci zhig nongs zhes zer ro// blon po
dag gis smras pa/ rgyal po'i sras don thams cad grub pa dge ba'i mtshan bzang po mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing/ bod 'dom gang ba mang ba ba bdu ri ltar mgayo zhi de bsam gtan mdzad pa ma
nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yol te song yang/ shing gi grib ma de ma yol zhing sgrib par gnas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dpyade 'dus dbyar gyi dus bab byar zla ra ba la// me tog rgyas shing mi
tog yal gas khebs gyur te// khrung khrung rma bya ne tso'i sgrigs skad 'byin par/ (kanAkya'i bu dag phal cher mngon du 'dod bar gyur// 'dun pa can gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu nags tshal dag ni
gzigs pa mdzad slad du// byis pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor te gshags pa'i rigs// bram ze lta bur khyim na bzhugs pas ci zhig bgyi// bdag cag rnams ni/
bu mo'i tshogs rnams sngon du mchi/ nyi ma'i gud la sems can rnam par dag pa de// byis pa lnga brgya dag gis bskor nas lhan cig tu// mag la ma gsol yum la ma gsol ma tshor bar//
de ni byung nas zhing pa rnams kyi grong du song// rgyal po dam pa'i zhing pa dag gi grod den// 'dzam bu'i sdong chen yal ga mad pa rgyus yod pa/ gzhon nus mthong nas nyam thag sdug bsngal
phog gyur te// 'dus byas ci rung sdug bsngal mang zhes snying rje byed// dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'a dzam bu'i grib mar song// rtswa dag bsdus te bdag gis gding ba bting nas na//
skyil mo krung bdug drad par lus bsu da pasam gtan bzhi// dge ba dag la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan byed// drang srong lnga zhig nam mkha'i dkyil nas dong dong na// 'dzam bu'i
shing gi stod du phyin nas 'dor mnus// de dag thogs nas da rgyul dregs pa spang byas shing// de dag thams cad bathun par lhan cig lta bar byed// bdag cag ri mchog ri rab de
! bzhin khor yug dag/ thal phyung thags thogs med par shugs kyis dang dod na// bdag cag de rang 'dzam bu'i shing ljon 'di las na/'da' bar ma nus 'dil rgyu rkyen ci zhig yod//
(babs te sa steng 'dug nas 'dzam bu'i shing drung na// shAkya'i bu bo byang chub sems dpa b.lagazi brjid can// 'dzam glad gser gyi 'od 'phro badra ba 'od zer ldan// skyil mo krung bcas
bsam gtan byed pa de tshe mthong// de dag rmad gyur spyi bor sar bcu thal sbyar te// thal mo sbyar ba rkad par gtugs nas phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro la shin tu bde mdzad legs par bltamA
pa legs// myur du rnam sangs rgyas te bdud rtsis sems can thul// stod po mchog na bad ma 'dra ba'i spyan la 'dud// gdugs yolagyur kyang grib mas bde bar gshegs ma gtong//
lha rnams stong phrag mang po gnas pa tal sbyar nas// des par byas pa de ma rnyed pa'i phyag khyad 'tshal// zas gtsang rgyal bo bdag gi khyim na yongs tshol zhid// nga yi bu gzhan de ni gang du
so zhes rmad/ su mos smras pa bdag gis btsal kyang mared nas// gzhon nu de ni gar bzhud rgyal pos smra bar gsol// zas gtsang rgyal pos nyud rum dag la rings par smras ka
nga yi ga zhon nu 'di nas byu da bar la las mthong ngam zhes// sgo ba rnams dang de bzhin nang ma kun la'ang snyas// lha cig khyodagason mchog de zhing pa'i khrod du bzhud// de ni yongs
par shAkya rnams dang lhan cig tu// byung nas dpa la zhugs gyur pa'i zhang ba'i grong du bltas// ji ltar nya ma bye ba khrag khrig shar ba ltar// de ltar dpal gyi 'bar zhing phan byed
0 11/ 'dug pa mthong// cod panaral gri lham dag pha zad phog phud de// mgo bor sar bcu thal mo sbyar nas phyag rgyad 'tshal// drang srod bdag nyid chen po legs/
ba yang dag smra// gzhon nu byang chub don du mngon par 'byung du nges// rab tu dad lho brgya phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dang// de bzhin shAkya lnga brgya nyakhar 'ongs pa dang// bde gshegs
yon tan rgya mtsholdan pa'i rdzu 'phrul mthong// bsam pa brtan pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyang bskyed// de nas stong gsum ma lus sa rnams rab bskyod nas// dran dang
shes bzhin ting nge 'dzin las langs gyur te// mdog bzang ldan pas yab la tshadas pa'i tshig brjod pa// yab gcig zhud pas thod la gzhan la tshol ma mdzad// gal te gser
zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gas gser char dbab// de ste na bza' 'tshalanabad bdag gis na bza' dbul// 'on te 'bru zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis 'bru char dbab// ma dbang khyod
kyis 'gro ba kun la yang dag sbyor// yab dang de bzhin skye bo 'khor la bstan byas nas// skad cig de la de slar grod khyer mchog tu zhugs// 'gro dang mthun pa tsam du grong khyer der gnas
kyi 1sems can rnams dag mngon par 'byung ba'i yid dang ldan// zhing pa'i grong gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o///'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg
nga chen po'i mdo// bam po bdun pa// dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de de bas ma zad skyes pa dang// dus gzhan zhig ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma shAkya'i tshogs dad ldan/
cig tu 'dun sa na 'dug 'dug pa de'i tshe/ shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs kha cig gisargyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu don
thams cad grub pa 'di ni/ bram ze ltas mkhan rnams dang/ blo nges pa dang ldan pa'i lha mad pas 'di skad du bstan te/ ga zhon nu bdagal te mngon par byung bar gyur na ni/ de bzhin gsheg

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// ji ste mngon par ma byung na ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal bo tshos dang ldan zhing/

rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po tshadad/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta rin po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang bud med rin po che
dang khyim bdag rin po che dang/ blon po rin po che dang bdun no// de la budapa' ba/ rtul phod ba/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu bajoms pa skong tshadab 'byung ngo//
de gnod par bya ba dang/ mtshon cha med par chos dang mthun pas/ sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di las mngon par rgyal bar byas te/ gcig pu gnas par 'gyur lo zhes mchin/ de'i slad du gzhon nu do'i
btsun mo blang bar bgyi'o// de ltar mdzad dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ dgyes pa longs spyod cingel ba nas mngon par 'byung bar yang ma 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa

dang bdag cag gi bakhor la sgyur ba'i gdung yad ma 'chad/ khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyisakyang ma snyan bar ma brjod pa'i sim gro bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal bo bras gtsang mas smras pa// gal te de ltar byan

pa'i phyir ga zhan nu'i tshul dang mthun pa yi bu mo gang zhig yod khyod kyis ltos shig/ de'i tshe shAkya lnga brgya tsam so so nas/ 'di skad du bdagab bu mo na gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun no// bdag gi
bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthunano zhes zer ro// rgyal pos smas pa/gzhon nu de ni shin tu phul che ba yin gyis/ gzhon nu nyid la khyod bu mo gad 'dod ces bar bya'o// zhes de dang/ kun spyod
bdun te gzhon nu la dngos po de brjod do// gzhon nus smas pa/ da ste dgung bdun na bde'i lan gsan par gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'disnyam du bsams te//
'dod ba'i skyonanag dag gas mtha' yas rag/ 'thab mo 'onobacas mya ngan sdug bsngal rtsa// 'jigs byed dug ga la ma 'dra ba ste// me dang 'dra zhing ral gri'i so dang badra// 'dod pa'i yon tan/
bdag 'dod ma yin te// bdag nabud med tshogs dang mdzes ma yin// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde bsazhasems su// bdag ni mi smra nags tshal gnas par bya// yang des brtags nas thabA
mkhas pa mngon du byas te// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la bltas nas// snying rje chen po bskyed de/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skas so// bdam dang lcags lcag khrod nas
pad+ma rnam par 'phel// ma rnams gad ba'i nad na rgyal po mchod pa 'thob// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' bakhor na chog thobagyur pa// dmasems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med 'dul//
sngon gyi byang chub sems dang ba mkhas pa gang byung ba// de dag kun gyisabatsun mo sras dang slas kyang bstan//bon kyang 'dod pas chags med bsam gtan bde ma nyams// bdag kyang de dag yon tan
rjes su bslab par bya// gang la spyod lam yon tan bden pa'i tshig med pa// bud med phal pa gang yang bdag gis tshul mthun min// gang zhig bdag gi sems na mngon par dgab byed tsang// bag
mod gzugs dad na chod rus rigs dag pa 'os// des ni yon tan tshigs su bcad de yig der bris// bde 'dra'i bumo mchis na bdag la bka' stsol cig/ skye bo phal pa ma bsdams bdag la
mkho ma lags// yon tan brjod pa 'di ldan mchas na bdag stsol cig/ dar cing gzugs bzang ldan yang gzugs kyi drigasadang bral// phunun 'khyams ltar byams pa'i sems ldan zhing//

gtong la dgab ste dge sbyong bram ze sbyin tshul can// de 'dra bu ma mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig/ gang la nga rgyal khengs dad zhe sdang ma mchis shing// g.yo dang phrag dog sgyu sadas drang ba'i
ngang tshul can// rmi lam na yad skyos pagazhan la chags dad bral// bdagag khyos ni tshog 'atshal rtag sdom bag mchis la// rgyugs pa nA ma ches ma gamed rdud
blo thub tshula'achad zhing// nga rgyal ma mchis 'gying dang bral bas bran mo bzhin// sgra dri rol ma chags chad la ma chags te// 'dod bul brnab sems nan chas 'dag nor gyis btsal//
ba'i bden la gnas shing ma 'phyarag yod pa ma lags pa// ngo tsha'i gas 'tshal nod dang khengs pa ma mchis gnas// lha dar bkra shas ma chags rtag tu chos la brtson// lus dar dag dad
yid kyi dngos po rab dag pa// gnyidadang rmug pa ma mngab da rgyal glen bral zhing// rtog sa dang ldan la legs pa'i las rnams rtag spyod de// gyes smyug gnyis la'ang ston pa bzhin gyi
rim gror ldan// bran dang dran mo kun la ya nga ba dag bzhin byams spel pa// smad 'tshod bzhin du bstan bcos che ga 'tshal tsade mkhas// slad kyis nyalaM shad ston du ma la nas ltad bgyid pa/
rgyu byams pas rjes snyegs ma bzhin tshul 'chos ma mchis pa// de 'dra'i bud med mchis na yabakyis bdag sul cig// dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang masatshigs
su bcad pa de dag thos nas// mdun na 'don la sgrus pa/ bram ze chen po khyodaser skya'a gnas kyi grong khyer chen por gdod la/ khyim thams cad du'ang sad ste/ bu mo dag ltos la gang la'ang
rung ste/ yon tan de lta bu dag yod na/ rgyal rigs kyi bu mo yad rung/ bram ze'i bu ma yad rung/ rje'u rigs kyi bu mo nad dud/ dmangs rigs kyi bu mo ya/nga nud gas/ bum de dag 'dir
'on cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di ni rigs don du gnyer ba ma yin/ rus don tu gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ gzhon nu 'di ni yon tan don duganyar b.lan go/ de'i tshags su bcad
pa 'di dag kyang smras so// rgyal gyis bram ze'i bu mo dar/ rje'u rigs dmangs rigs de pa zhin te// su la yon tan 'di yod pa'i// bu mo de ni 'dir 'on cig/ nga yakhu 'di rigs dag
dang// rus la ngo mtshar 'dzin ma yin// yon tan bden pa'i chos kyi rnams// de la 'di yi yid dga'o// dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na 'don des/ tshigs
su bcad pa yi ger bris pa de khyer te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen par sad nas/ khyim nas khyim du yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo lta zhing tshol du sod song ba las/ yon tan de lta
bu dar ldan pa'i bu mo ma mthong ste/ de nas rims kyis shAkya lag na ba can can gyi khyim du phyin nas der bltas na/ bu mo gzugs mdzes shing blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ mdog bzar
po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ hacad yad ma radeb/ ha cad yang ma thudab/ ha cad yang ma sbom pa/ ha cad yad ma snyim pa/ tacad mang ma dkar ba/ hacad lad mgonag pa//
gzod ma dar la bab pa// bud med rin po che ltar snad ba zhig mthod ba dang/ bu mo des bram ze mdun na 'don deb rkad pa gnyis nas bzung ste/ 'di skad ces smras so
kyi bram ze chen po khyed la dgos pa ci zhig mchis/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ zas gtsang sras bo gzugs ni mchog tu mdzes gyur tshud shu/ sum cu rtsa gnyis
mtshan ldan yon tan gza brjid can// de las bud med rnams kyi yon tan mgar bris// su la yon tan 'di yod de la chung mar 'os// zhes smras te/ des de la yag de byin no//
danas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa'i yi ge de klugs nas ]bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/ bram ze mdun na 'don de la tshigs su bcad de snus pa/ bram ze yon tan
'di dag bdag la kun tshang gis// des pa 'gazugs can de na bdag gi khyim thab bgo/ gal to gzhon nu bzhed na bla bshol ma mdzad gsungs// brgyalaskye ba phal dang bzhugs
par 'gyur yang gda'// de nas bram ze mdun na 'don de/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drud du song ste/ don de brjod do// rgyal po chen po bdag gis gzhon nu'i tshul dad
mthun pa'i bu mo mthong ngo// rgyal pos smras pa/ su la de lta bu zhig yod smras pa/ lha shAkya lag na be con can la bu med lta bu zhig mchis so/ de nas rgyal bo zos
gtsang ma bdi snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de shin tu phul che zhing/ bzang ba la mos pa yin/ bud med dag ni phal cher yon tan med pa dag kyang/ bdag la yon tan yod par khas
len gyi/ bdag gis yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad dag cig bya ste// gzhon nu 'di bu mo thams cad la sbyin pa byed du gzhug go/ bu mo de dag ga nang nas gang la gzhon numag mngon par chags
par gyur pa// gzhon nu la sbyin par bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas yid du 'od ba'i yo byad ]gser dang dngul dang/ rin po che sna tshogs las byed
du btsu gnas / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyeratshon por dril sgra bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na/ kun gyis khyad gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur te/ yid du 'ong ba'i yakhyad dag kyad bu mo dag
la sbyin pa byed kyis/ bu mo thams cad kyad 'dun khang du shog cig ces bsgo 'o// dge slong dag de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang/ byung chub sems dbang 'dun khad du yod
seng ge 'i khri la 'dug go/ de'i tshe rgyal bo zas gtsang mas byar ba dag bkodanas/ gzhon nu 'di bu mo gang la mag chags pa de nga 'gyis shig ces bsgo'o// dgeslong
dag de nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po don bu mo gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bdun khang ga la ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der byang chub sems dpa' lta ba dang/
[@]/// yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad blang ba'i phyir dong ngo// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas bumo ji ltar 'das pa de dag la yid du 'ong bab yo byad rnams byan no//
de nas bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid ma bzod nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag blangs shada myur ba myur bar phyir dong ngo/
de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya babran mo'i tshigs kyad paskor cing mdun du bdar te 'dunakhang ga la ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der
song ste phyin pa dang/ mig mi 'dzum par byed chub sems dpa' 'akalta zhing phyogs gcig tu bdug par gyur to// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag byin zin pa/
gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du res nas 'dzum dmul te/ byang chub sams dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag gis khyed la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na/
bdag la de ltar dngan sdang mdzad/ smras pa/ ngas ni khyod la dngan sdang byas pa 'a bamedan/ khyod shin tu 'phyis to 'dos zhes smras nas/ des sar brdub srang brgya stong du mar ba phun
da de la byin no// bu tshe rib smras/ [﹙]gzhon nu khyod las bdag gis 'dilta bu zhig 'tshal ba 'os sam/ lcas pa/ ba na rgyun gzhan dang gzhan dag yod pa 'di dag kyang khyod khyer cig/
das sbas pa/ gzhon nu bdagan rgyan ma mchis par bgyin pa na lags kyi/ rgyan dang ldan pa bgyid pa 'a gsas zhes smras nas bu med song ngo/ 'di nas bya ra bar bkod

pa'i mi de dag rgyal po zasagatsang ma'i drung du sa nas//largyus de dag smos pasmras pa/ lha shAkya lag nabe con can gyi bu ma sa mtsho ma zhes bgyi ba de la gzhon nu spyan chags par gyur la/ cung zad
cig tu bka' mchid kyang bgyis so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas/ shAkya lag nabe con can gyi gan du bris ze mdun na 'don pa nyar btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo
zhi ga yod pa de nga'i gzhon nu la byin cig ces smreng ngo// lag na pe cinagyis smyos pa/ 'phags pa gzhon nu de ni pho brang na skyid de bar 'khrungs pa lags la/ bdag cag gi rigs kyi chos ni bad lta
bu 'a gas te/ sbya rtsa la shes pa la bumo gtong gi/ skya rtsal mar shes pa la ma gtong ba lags na/ gzhon nu de skya rtsal shes pa yang ma lags la// ral grib thabs dang/ 'phong dang// stobs
dang/ gyad kyi 'dzin stangs gyi tshul shes pa yang ma lags na/ bdagagis sgyu rtsal shes pa ma lags pa la bu mo ji ltar gatang/ tshig de rgyal po la bzlas pa dang/ de nas rgyal 'di snyam du/
sams te/ nga la des 'di dang lan gnyis su bsdos te/ gang ga tsho ngas shAkya gzhon nu dag/ gzhon nu'i rim gro byed du ci'i phyir ma 'od zhes byas pa de'i tshe'ang/ ci jid lug gi rim gro byed du/
@#// 'od dam zhes zer la/ da'ang 'di skad zer ro snyam du sems shing 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas khyad gtam de thos nas/ rgyal bo zas gtsang ma ga la
ba song ste phyin nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// ci nongs te de ltar zhal zung gnag par bzhugs rgyal pos smras pa// gzhon nu de dra bas ci zhibe bya/ gzhon nus sbas pa/ lha den
bka' ma stsal du ma rung ngo zhes lan gsum gyi bar du byang chub sems dpas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la dris pa dang/ de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dar ba la dngos po ro
dag brjod de// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha grong khyer 'din bdag dang sgyu rtsal gyis 'gran par nus pa 'ga' mchis sam/ de nas rgyal bo zas mus ba gdan s/ byang chub sem

dpa' la bdaskad ces smras so// khu khyod kyis sgyu rtsal bstan par nus sam/ smras pa// lha de ni pa dag gis legs par rngo thog ge/ de bas na skya rtsal 'tshal ba rnams kun kyang bsog tu gsol/de dag gi
mdun du bdag gse sgyu rtsal bstan par bgyi'o/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na gzhon nu rad gasgyu
rtsal ston gyis/ der sgyu rtsal shes pa thams cad shog ca ga ces bsgo'o/// de nas zhag bdun lan pa dang/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam tshogs par gyur to/
0 de nas/shAkya lag be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du ba zhig ste/ 'dir ral gri'i thabs dang/ 'ong dang/ stobs dang/ gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyis su rgyal ba de ni ba de khyer
cig ces dam bcas nas/ de'i tshathams cad kyi thog ma la gzhon nu lha sbyin grong khyer nas byad do// de'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzhon par glang po dkar po bod shin tu che ba zhig grong khyer du
khrid pa// gzhon nu lha sbyin gyis mthong nas/ phrag dog dang/ shAkya'i nga rgyal dang/ stobs kyi nga rgyal gyis dregs nas/ des glang po do lag pa g.yon bas sna nas bzung ste/ lag ra
g.yas bas thal mo lan cig bsnun pas bsad par gyur to// deb 'bog tu gzhon numadzes dga' bo byud pa dang/ des glang po chen po de grong khyer gyi sgor bsad pa mthong nas/ sus bas daces
dris pa dang/ smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis bsadado// skyas ba/ lha sbyin gyis de ni ga legs ba zhig byas so zhes des gad bo do'i mjug ma nas bzung ste/ grong khyer gyi sgo nas gud du bor ro//
de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpashing rtul zhon te byungab dang/ byang chub sems dpas glang po de ltar bsad pa na thod dro// mthong nas kyad sus bsad ces dris pa dang/ smras pa/ lhasbyin
gyis bsad do// smras pa/ lha spyin gyis de ni na logs pa zhig byas so// grong khyer 'di'i sgo nas sun bar zhes dris pa dad/ smras pa/ mdzes dga' bos bor ro// smras pa//
mdzes dga' bos de ltar byas pabad 'gas na/ sems can 'di ni lus chen po dang ldan pa ste/ rul na grong khyer thams cad dri ma zhim pas gang bar 'gyur ro zhus nas/
de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rtal bdug bzhin du/ rkang pa ya cig sa la brkyang ste/ rkang pa'i mthe bos glang po do blangs te/ ra ba bdun rim dang/ 'obs bdun ras
bzla nas/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol rgyang grags cag tsam du 'phangs so/ glang po de phyogs gang du lhung ba'i phyogs de gshong chen po zhig tugyur nas/ da ltar glang po'i gshodazhes bya ba
yin no// de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong mad pa a ma a la la zhes zer zhing/ ca ce dang ga zhabi sgra stod 'byin la/ gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i
bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gad po'i dbang po bdo ba bzhin bzhud pa// zhabs kyi mthe bos gang po'i dbang po bdas// ra ba bdun dad 'obs bdun yodas bzlas/
nas grong khyer 'di ya phyi rol rgyur dang 'phrengs// mkhyen pa mchog mdabang 'dis ni gdon nad u0f7ara/ nga rgyal stobs kyis ma tho ba'i lus can rnams// 'khor ba'i grod nas phyi rol
rgyang ring du/ shes rab stobs kyis bdes ni 'phen par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam grong khyer nas ma thon nas/ sa'i phyogs gang du shAkya
gzhon nu dag sgyu rtsal ston pa der dong ngo// rgyal po zas gtsangam dang/ shAkyargan rabs rgan rabs dag dad/ skya bo phal bo che dag kyad byang chub sems dpab dang/ shAkya gzhon nu
gzhan dag gi sgyu rtsal gyi khyad par mthong bar 'dod de/ sa'i phyogs der dod de/ 'di nas thog mar shAkya gzhon nu yi ge mkhas shing ya gi'i cho ga shes pa de dag dang kA
byang chub sems dpa' ya gi 'gran to// de'i tshashAkya de dag gis slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen dpang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu'adi dag ga nang nas/ ya gi 'du 'am 1 paga'i
sna grangs kyi mthar phyin pas khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin khyod kyis bye brag phye shog/ de nas slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen byang chub sems dang ba yi ge la mkhas pa mngon
du mthong bas bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ma ya 'jig rtan lha ya 'jig rten nam// lha min 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rtan nam// 'jigarten
kun gyi ga ja sI da gang// de lasems can dag pa 'dis mthar phyin/ 2mi'i zla bu ba yas gang mkhyen pa'i// yagadag dang la gi 'dzin grangs kyi// mang yang khyed dang ngas
ni yod ma shes// bad la mngon sum ngas shes 'di rgyal 'gyur// shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu bdi yi ge'i shes pa la khyad par du 'phags ba lta bang 'phags par chug
[s ]// ste gzhon nu bdi grangs kyi shes pa la khyad par ci yod bskrun par bya'o// de nas shakya srid sgrub cig bub e ra chen po byed pa// bgrang ba dang/ rtsis kyi pha rol/

blo tu phyin pa zhig yod pa de dpad du bzhags/gzhon nu 'di dag ga nang nas grangs kyi shes pa la khyad bar du gang 'phags khyed kyis ltos shig ces byas te/de nas de'i tshabyang chub sems dpas ni rtsis
mgo phog/ shAkya gzhon nu gcig gi na brtsis pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la sleb par ma nus so// de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang/ gsum dad bzhi dad lta dad bcudang
nyi shu dad sum cu dad bzhi bcu dad lnga bcu dang/ brgya nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu brtsis kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' la ma slebs so// de nas byang chub
sams dpas smras pa/ khyed kyis ni rtsis mgo phog shig/ kho bos ni brtsego/ de'i tshe shAkya gzhon nu gcig gas rtsas ma ko phag na/ byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyis chod pa la ma slebs so//
de nas nAkya gzhon nuganyis dang/ gsum dang bzhu dang lnga dang/ bcu dang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang bzhi bcu dang lnga bcu dang brgya nas shAkya gzhon nulnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu
rtsis mgo phog kyang/ byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyis chod pa la ma slebs so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dil brtsad de ya datsanung gis/ khyed thams cad gcig tu 'dus te rtses/
mgo pheg shig/ kho bos brtsi'o/// de nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas tshagatsag tu brjod pas snga phyi med par rtsis mgo phog nas/ byang chub sems dpas rmongs pa med par brtsis te/
de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad ni phug thug par gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' la ni thug pa'i mtha' mad par gyur to// de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub ngo mtshar du gyur da tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// legs pa'i blo mang ba 'di dris na//mkhyen pa shin tu myur ba ste// shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsan/ kun kyang rtsis kyi lam la thug/ de yi shes ra ba 'di 'dra ste//
ye shes blo gros dran ldan yang// rtsis kyi mkhyen pa rgya mtshodo// da dud sbyong zhing slob pa mdzad// de nas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad ngo na tshar du gyur te/ shin tu rmad du byung bar sems
shing/ de'i tshe thams cad mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad cesas so// kye donagrub gzhon nu khyed ni rgyal la rgyal 'goms thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub
sams dpa' la phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyed la sras de ltar dris pa la spobs pa myur zhing mgyogs la/ mang zhing shugs dang ldan pa can/
ma pa'i ba ni bar s pa legs par b.res so/// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// bu rtsas pa chen po sridi sgrub grongs kyang shes ba
brgya cu kasum
la mkhas pa dang rtsis kyi lugs 'gran nus sam/ smras pa/ lha rdo thog go/ snyas ba/ 'o na mus shig/ de nas rtsis pa chen po sradi sgrub kyis//
byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces sa so// gzhon nu khyod kyis bye las brgyan god du bsgres pa zhes bgyi ba'i dus kyi lugs mkhyen ta ma/ snyas pa shes so// sus pa/ 'o na de bye
ba la [']brgyur gang du bsgres pa 'i rtsis kyi lugs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi// byang chub se nas dpas sgras ba/ bye ba phrag brgya naser ba bum zhes bya'o// ther 'bum phrag brgyan khrag
khri la/ ces bya'o// khrag khrig phrag brgya na pa tams pa zhes bya'o// gtams pa phrag brgya na dkrigs pa zhes bya'o// dkrigs pa phrag brgya na ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o// ma 'khrugs pa

brag brgya na khyad phyin ces bya'o// khyad phyin phrag brgya na yang steng zhes bya'o// phang steng phrag brgya na mang 'dzan ces bya'o// mad ba dzin phrag brgya na glang po'i stobs shes bya'o// glang po'i
stobs phrag brgya na ngogs 'thob ces bya'o// ngogs 'thob phrag brgyun rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa zhes bya'o// rnam par gzhag pa gdags pa phrag brgya na rgyu rig ces bya'o// rgyu rig
phrag brgya na sgrib pa zhes bya'o// sgrib pa phrag brgya na stobs zhes bya'o// stobs phrag brgya na kun stobs shes bya// kun stobs phrag brgyan rnam par brda shes ldan zhes bya'o//
rnam par brda shes ldan phrag brgyan brda shes kun tsas bya'o// brda shes kun phrag brgyana rnam 'byung zhes bya'o// rnam 'byung phrag brgya na de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste/ 'di ltar deb semtshan
nyid ces bya ba'i lcand kyis ni/ ri'i rgyal po ra ba brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo/ 'di'i yad gor na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs des nagapa'i

klung ga bye ma snyed brtse ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par dung ngo// de'i yang gang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nges par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de// dab yang btong na ded 'dren gdags pa zhes bya
ba 'i gras yod do// de'i yang gong nagatan la 'babs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang gor nag/rtsod rtogs zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang gong na gtsed rtogs ldan zhes
bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang gong na thams cad rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'ags yod de/ grangs des ni gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang tshad par rung ngo// de'i yang

gong na snying po na chog ces bya ba'i grangs yod do/ grangs des n gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dang mnyam pa brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo// de'i lad gong na rdul phra rab la 'jug
pa'is su song ba nas bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs de la nad ba zhin gshags pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying pa na chog dam pa gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang//
chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba mngon du gyur pa'i byang chubs nas dang ba ma gtogs par/ gnas can gyis ras na grangs de shes pa ni pa dang/ gzhan yang nga dang 'dra ba srid pa bam par
gyur pa// khyim gyi gnas nas ngon par phyung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs pa gang yang med do// sra ra sgrub kyis slas pa// gzhon nu rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba'i
grangs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul bdun la ni rdulaM phra mo gcig go/ rdul phra mo bdun la ni rdul chung du gcig g/ rdul chud//
du u la ni nyi zer gyi rdul gtsa'i ko/ nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig go/ ra bod rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig ga/ lug rdul bdun la na glang rdul gcig go/ glang
rdul bdun la ni ma lagacig la// sro ma bdun la ni yungs 'bru gcig ga/ yungs 'bru bdun la ni nas gcig ga/ nas bdun la nasor gcig g/ sor bcu gnyis la ni mtho gang ngo//
mtho de la na khru gang ngo// khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo/ gzhu stod la ni yul ma d+ha'i rgyang grags gcig go/ rgyang grags bzhaladapag tshad gcig go/ de la khyed kyi nang nas rang ga tshad la
rdul phra rab de lta bu du yod sus shes/ srid sgrubakyis smras pa/ gzhon nu bdag nyid kyang de la ma ge rmongs na/ gzhan blo chung ngu dang ldan pa lta smos kyad tsa ba tshal de bas na gzhon
nus dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du mchis bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa// de la dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab ma 'khrugs khrag khrig cig dang/ bye ba khrag khrig
'bum phrag sum cu dang/ bye ba drug cu phrag brgya dang/ bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'bum phrag lnga dang khri nyis stong yod da/ dpag tshad la na rdul phra rab de ga da cig yod do//
de ltar 'jug pa des 'dzam bu'i gling 'di la ni dbag tshadabadun stong yod da// nub kyi ba lang spyod la na dpag tshad brgyud stod yod do// shar gyi lus 'phags la ni dpag tshad dgu stong
yod do// byang gi sgra snyan la ni dpag tshad khri yod de/ de ltar 'jug pa nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la sogs pa/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba

phrag brgya dang/ rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang/ 'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po byi ba phrag brgya dang/ 'i rgyal po ri dang bye ba phrag brgya dang/ rgyalachen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag
brgya dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya dang/ 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang/ dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgyadang/ 'phrul dga' bye ba phrag brgya dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag
kha
skyo
0 @#// brgya dad/ tshangs ras bya ba phrag brgya dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun 'don bye ba phrag brgya dad/ tshangs 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang/ tshadas chen bye ba phrag brgya dang
mo 'od chud bye ba phrag brgya dang/ tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang/ 'dogs la bye ba khrag brgya dang/ dge chud bye ba phrag brgya dang/ tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang/ dgergyus kyi
ba phrag brgya dang/ named bye ba phrag brgya dang/ bsod nams skyas bye ba phrag brgya dang/ 'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang/ sems can 'du shes ni da pa bye ba phrag brgya dang/ na cha ba nga

ba phrag brgya dang/ mgadung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang/ gya nam snang bcu ba phrag brgya dang/ shin tu ma thong bye ba phrag brgya dang/ 'og man gyi lha'i ris bya ba phrag brgya la stong gsum gyi stodachen
po'i 'a jig rtenagyi khams gcig ces bya ste yas shing rgya che ba'o// de la dpag tshad du yod pa dang/ dpag tshad brgya phrag du yod pa dang/ dbag tshad stong phrag du yod pa dang/ dbagatshad
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod do// byang chub sems dpas rtsis kyi 'bu 'di bstan pa ba tsha/ rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub dang/ shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyad tshan
zhing mgu la ma rangs te/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung bathobonas/ de dag thams cad kyang gsar re zhig bzhag ste/ gos dad rgyan lhag mgazhan byang chub sems dpa' la yon du phul lo/
da nas rtsis pa chen po sridi sgrub kyis tshags su bcad pa bde dag smras so// 'di ltar bye ba brgya na ther 'bum de bzhin du/ khrag khrig dang na gtams pa'i rgyud dang de bzhin du/ dkrigs
pa ma 'khrug sa bdag gis shes thug de gong man/ mtshungs pa med kyis mkhyen pa rtsis la de bas lhag/ yad kyi shAkyadag/ stong gsum dag gi rdul dang rtswa dang nags tshal dang/ sman dang chu yi

thigs pa ji snyed yod pa yang/ gung zhes bya ba gcig la 'di yis mi nus na/ lnga brgya tsam dgag lta ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ pa gcig la 'ad yas rtsa nus na/ lnga brgya tsam dgag lta ngo mtshar ca zhig che// de nas lha dang mi brgya stong ga/ e ma sa la la zhe
zer zhing/ ru tse dang/ ga zha'i sgra stod 'byin par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do// dus gsum sems can ma lus ji snyed gad yod pa'i/
samasadang sa mas byung 'du shes rnam par rtog pa ga/ mchog dang tha ma de bzhin rgya chung yangs pa dag/ thams cad sems kyi 'gyur ba gcig gis rab tu mkhyen// dge slong dag
de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad zil gyis non par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig khyad par du ba phags par gyur to// de'i rjes la ma chodas pa dang//
rkyal dang/ bang la sogs pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' nyid khyad par du 'phags par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/
brtul zhug/sa dka' thub sdom pa'i yon tan dang// bskal pa bye bar brjod dul byams stobs kyis// lus dang sams ni can s yad mdzad pas// da pa shugs kyi khyad par mnyan par gyis
sems can mchog 'di grong khyen 'di na bzhugs par khyed kyis mthong// 'on kyang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// skadacig gcig la rin chen ga sar dad mchor
pa sna tshogs kyis/ rgyal ba dpag tu med po dag la mchod par mdzad du bzhud// 'on kyang rdzu 'phrul de 'dra b.ros pa de// byon tam bzhud par khyad kyis yongs ma shes// ji tsam zhugs shig
de la ci zhig bskyed// 'di ni mtshungs pa med kyis rim gro skyid// da ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig bu khyad par 'phags par gyur to// de nas shAkya de dag gis smras pa/
gzhon nu 'di la stobs kyi khyad par ci yod pa'i ngasad par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ shAkya gzhon nulnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gcig tu
so so nas stobs 'gyed par gyur te/ shAkya gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis shig tshogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la brgal ba ltar chas te 'bod do// de'i nang nas dga' pa dang/ kun/
dga' ba gnyis kyis byang chub sems dang 'a la stobs brgal ba'i phyir drud du phyin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa gi lag gis regam thag tu/ de gnyis kas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang
gzi brjid ma bzod de sa la 'gyel to// de'i 'og tu shAkya gzhon nu lhas sbyin nga rgyal can/ mthus bsems pa de stobs kyi nga rgyal dang/ shAkya'i nga rgyal gyis bsnyams la/ byang chub sems
dpab la sde zhing/ thams cad dang ldan bab ltad mo pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskor te/ bskyings nas byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal to// de nas byang chub sems dbas ma
brta bas shangam rangs par/ stangs bzad s por gzhon nu lhas sbyin lag pa g.yas pas bteg sta/ bsad pa'i blos ma yin gyis/ dargyal bcag pa'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyi nam mkha
las bskor bskor te/ sa'i stang du bar yang de lus la gnod par gyur pa med do// de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de lta bu ganod par 'gyur bas chog gis thams
cad gacig tu 'dus te brgal bar gyis shig 'de nas de dag thams cad nga rgyal gyis rlom nad byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur to/ de nas de dag byung
ka @#// chub sems dpa' la rig ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa ba dpal dang gzi brjid dang lus kyi mthu ma bzad r/ byang chub sems dpas reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel
bar gyur to// de nas lha dang mi brgya stong de dag a maa la la zhes zer zhing/ ca co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stod phyung ngo// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis
kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab sta/ dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa'i di dag smras so// phyogs bcu'i sams tsan pa gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgyud chen stobs po che
badral/ cig char skyes bu'i mchog la rub gyur kyang// rig bcom gyis sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// lhun po ri rab rdo rje'i khor yug dang// phyogs bcu dag na gzhan gang yod pa//
lag pas mnyes shing darmag med phyir slog na// ma lus snying po med ba mtshar che// 'di ni shing dbang mchog dud sdang ba'i rgyan// dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mdzad sder bcasapa//
nag po'i rtsa lag byams pa'i stobs kyis 'joms// bla med byang chub zhi bar 'tshang yang rgyu// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to//
de nas shAkya lagan be con can gyis/ shAkya gzhon nu de dag la 'di skad ces skyasaso// 'di dag na sad kyan zin/ mthong yang zenagyis/ dana'aphong zhig bstan par gyis shig/ ba/
tshe kun dga' bos rgyang grangs gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rdza gcig 'ben du btsugs so// de'i 'og tu lhas sngon gyis rgyang grags ba zhig pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du/
btsugs so// de'i 'og tu mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi nga ral tu lcags kyi rdza gcig 'ben du btsugs so// de'i 'og tu shAkya lag na ba con can gyis rgyang grags brgyad kyi nga rol
tulcags kyi rdzag cage 'ben du btsugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs te/ de'i drung du shing ta la bdun
dngar nas/ de'i pha rol tulcags kyi phag rgod gyagazugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa gcig btsugs so// de nas kun dag ba bas rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rolan rnga' 'ben 'dug pa la kho rangs
nas bog khar gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so// lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i thal na rnagi 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs nas 'og bar gyur ta/ de phan chad kyi la shog par ma nus so
mdzes dga' bas rgyang grags drug gi pha rol na rngab 'ben 'dug ba la 'phangs nas phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog bar ma nus so//lag gapo can can gyis rgyang grags brgyad kyi pha rol
na rdza'i 'den 'dug pa 'o phangs nas thog bar gyur ta/ thal byung du phyin nas de phan chad kyi la phog par na nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la gzhu gang dad gdabyin pa de
dag la la ni gzhu nga tshan/ la la ni cha gnas / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grong khyer 'di na ba/ zhu gzhan la la bdag gas brdung bzod pa 'ag/ lus kyi stobs
dad mthu bzod pa mchis sam/ rgyal bos smras pa/ bu yod do// gzhon nus smas pa/ lta de lta bu gang na mchis/ rgyal pos sas pa// bu khyod kyims sangaga'i 'gram zhes bya ba byung
ste/ de'i snapa ru da ltar lha khang na spyos dang phreng bas mchod rte/ de ni sus kyang brdud mar yang mi nus na/ dgang bar lta smos kyang ci rags pa zhig yodado// byang chub sems dpas smras M
lha dpang du gsol// sad par bgyi// de nas gzhu de blangs te 'das pa dang/ shAkya gzhon nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi mchog gis bsgrims kyang gzhu de brdung bar yang
ma nus na/dgang dag lta smos kyang ci dgos tam nus so// de nas gzhu de shAkya lag nab con can gyi lus kyi mthu stobs thams cad phyud sta/ gzhu de brdung bar brgal na ma brdudas so// danas
zla gzhu de byang chub sems dpal sbyin no/// de nas byang chub sems dpas gzhu ra blangs te/ stan lasam la des par skul ma krung phyed bcas te/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas/

! lag pa g.yas pa bsor mo khag cig gas brdungs so// ga zhu de de ltar brdungs pa'i tsho[7 ]ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad du sku mngon par grags par gyur to// grong khyer gyi sa thimA

cad kyang skrag skrag por gyur te/ gcig la gcig 'dri zhing ba de ltar su'i sgra zhig ces zer ro// de la la na re gzhon nu don grub gyis mos kyi snyam du brdungs nas/ de'i sgra byung ba ni 'di yin no//
zhes zer ro// de nas lha dang ma ba stod dag ]a ma a la la zhes zer zhing/ na co dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byon par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil na'akhod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang/
rgyal bo zas gtsang ma dang/ spyi bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de sdus pa/ gdon las ma bzhengs brtsol ba ma mchis su/ rtsub pas snyam du 'di 'dra brdungs pa las// gdon ma
'tshal bar dgongs pa rdzogs gyur te// bdud kyi sde bcom myur du thub pas byon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas mda' blangs nas gzhu de dad sbyar te bkangs nas/
'phadas pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ kun dga' po'i 'ben du rje btsugs pa dang/ lha sbyin gyis 'ban du rje btsugs pa dang/ mdzes dga' bo'i 'ben du rdza btsugs pa dang/ lag na be con can gyi 'dzin
du rdo btsugs pa de thams cad las thal nas/ rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu bdag ga'aben lcags kyi rdza btsugs pa dang/ shing ta la bdun dngar pa dad phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas
las kyad thal te mdab de sa la ga zug nas ma snang bar nub par gyur to/ sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nub pa'i sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas/ da ltar yang mda' khron pa//
zhes bya ba yin no/ de'i tshe lha dang ma nga rgya stong dag a ma a la la zhes zer zhing catso dang/ ga kha'i sgra brgya stod bdun par gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang/
ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob ste/ kye ma ngo mtshar to// 'dis ni bslabs kyad mabaslabs par rtsal gyis shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes rje// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod
pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang/ skyeba'i tshogs phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// de lta bu ngomatshar yang ci cha ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdi nis la snying po
sngon gyi sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs// zhi gnas snam ru thog sarashing stong pa bdag med mdab rnams kyis// nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra badral nus su// byang chub dam
pa zhi ba rdul me ra mya ngan med pa 'thob// de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la lha' mi tog dag gis mngon par gtor te dang ngo// de bzhin du mchongs pa dang/
yi ga dang/ lag rtsis dang/ rtsis dang/ grangs dang/ gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang/ rgyang nas phog pa dang/ bang dar 1 tshar dang/ rgyal dad 'phong dang da dang/ glang po che'i gnyar bzhon
pa dang 2 rta rtsal dang/ shing rta'i thabs dang/ mda' gzhu'i thab sa dang/ brtan pa dang/ mthu dang/ dpa' ba dang/ gyed stobs dang/ lcags kyus sbyar thabs dang/ zhags pa'i thabs dang
mdun du bsnu ba dang/ phyir bsnar ba dang/ bzun ba dad/ badzan stangs dang/ goms stabs dang/ thor tshugs dang/ bcad pa dang/ dral kha dang/dbu shus pa dang/ gzhig pa dang/
gshog pa dang/ ma 'chor bar bag pa dang// nad duphogapa dang/ sgra grag par phogapa dang/ tshabs che ba dang/ cho lo'i rtsed mo dang/ snyan dngags sbyar ba dang lam dang/ ri mo dang/
gzugs dang/ gzugs kyi las dang/ thags kyi dpyad dang/ mgi les dang/ rol mo ba dbyangs sgra dang sgra dang/ ga' dang/ glu dad/ ya gi bklags pa'i mgo bor dang/ gtam dang/ bzhadag dad

rtsed mo dad bro dang/ sgrig pa dang/ 'phreng brgyu ba dang/ rlung yab g.yob pa dang/ nor bu tshor gyis bsgyur ba der/ gos tshin gyis bsgyur ba dang/ mig 'phrul gyi cho ga dang rmi lam gyi dpyad da nga/
bya'i skad dang/ bud med kyi mtshan dang/ skye sa pa pa mtshan dang/ glang po ba mtshan dang/ rta'i mtshan dang/ saM lang gi ma tshan dang/ rab mtshan dad lug gi mtshan dang/ khyi'i mtshan dang/ shes
sal dad/ sgra nges par sbyor ba dang/ ngar sgyur ba dang/ sngon gyi rabs dang/ sngon byung ba dang/ rig byer dad/ lung bstan pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ yi ga lca yad dang/ tshig sdeb pa dang
mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang/ skar ma'i lugs dang/ grangs can gyi lugs dang/ rnal 'byor gyi lugs dang/ las kyi tshogs dang/ bye brag pa'i 'u gas dang/ non gyi rig pa dang/ phur bu'i lugs
dang chu'i lugs dad lha ma yin gyi lugs dad/ bya dad/ ri dgas kyi skad dang/ gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang/ rgya skags kyi 'khrul 'khor dang/ sbra tshil gyi las rang
'dra shur dad brko bzhag dang/ lo na phra ba dang/ spos sbyar ba la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal 'jig rten pa dang/ lha'i dang/ ma'i las 'das pa thams cad la 'ad byang chub sems dpa' 'bashig khyad

par du 'a phags par gyur to// de'i tshong+kashAkya lag na be con can gyis rang gi bu mo sa 'tsho ma bya da chub sems dang ba la phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang de'i rim gyis bag mar blangs te/
byang chub sems dpa' la bu la lo// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang mthun pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang du 'dug ste/ dga' zhing rtse la
yongs su spyod pa ston to// bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nang nas ngashAkya'i bu mos mtsho ma btsun mo'i mchog tu dbang bskur bar gyur to// de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho mgyos
sgrug gam/ nad mag nga mthod yad nung ste/ gdong mi srid do// de dag kyang de la bag sar mo na zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/ 'di ni rtag tum ga logs so zhes 'phya smod cade mi snyan par
zir ro// de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho mas gtam de byas nas/ nang ma rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dug dang 'greng dang 'chag pa la// 'phags
0 ba dag ni ma g.yogs mdzes// nor bu rin chen 'od gsal ba// rgyal mtshan rtse mor gsal na mdzes// 'phags pa bgro na'ang mdzes pa ste// 'ong na'ang de bzhin mdzes pa mne/ ]
'agleng ba 'am de bzhin 'dug pa dang// thams cad du'ang 'phags ma mdzo/// 'phags pa smanabad mdzes pa ste// ma sbyar 'dug kyang de bzhin mdzes// dper na ga la bang ka ni//
mthong dang sa tsam thos bzhin no// ku sha'i gsan gyon pa dang// gos ngan gyon dad lus rid pa// de ni rang gi gzi yis mdzas// yon tan ldan dang yon tan brgyan// gang la sdig
pa med gyur pa// 'phags pa kun tu dge ba yin// byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni// ji snyed brgyan kyadamadzes a yin// gang dag snying la sdug pa yod cing tshig 'jam pa// de dag dug gi
bum par bdud rtsi blug sa ba bzhin// brag gsar ga rtsub pa lta bu nang yang rtsub// de 'dra de dag sbyalagyi khal rtug pa bzhin// des pa de dag gan du kun 'ong kun phyag 'tshal// 'bab
stags thams cad lta bur 'gro ba kun gyi gsos// 'phags pa dag ni rtag tu kho zhes bkang bum 'dra// bdag nyid dag pa de 'dra mthong na bkra shis dag/ gang dag sdig pa'i grogs
ba yun ring yongs spyod zhing// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin po ches ni yongs bzung la// sdig pa rnams snod sangs rgyas chos la mdon chagasal// de lta bu dag mthong na bkra shis
'bras bu yod// go rag lus bsdams lus kyi skyon rnams rab bsdams dang// gang dag tshag bsams rtag tu tshig 'chal mad gyur la// dbang po sbas shing/
shin tu bsnams la padi dwang ba// de lta bu dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya// gal te lus la gas na stong gis g.yogs gyur kyang// gang dag sems bshus ngo tsha mad cing khrel
mad dang// gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med// de dag sgronamo bus kyang sgren mor 'jig rtenargyu// gang zhig sems spus rtag tu dbang po bsdams gyur cing// bdag
gi khyo chog sems can ga zhan la ma sems pa// de 'dra ba dag nyi zla bzhin dum g.yogs snang// de 'dra ba dag gdong g.yogs ti ni su zhig bya// gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid cha/
dang gzhan sems blo ma khas dang// de bzhin lha tshogs drug gi kho mo'i bsam pa dang// kho mo'i tshul khrims yon tan snyom dang bag yod mkhyen// de lta bas na kho mos gdong bkab ci zhig
ragos// dge slong dag rgyal po sa gtsang mas shAkya'i bu mos mtsho ma'i slobs pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad rab rnam pa bad lta bu padi thos so// thosanas kyang tsham zhing mgu la ya
ras te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ mad pad pa skyes nas/ ras bcos khubazad po rin po che du mas nas bzung rig rang/ mu tig gi do shal sradabye ba brgya stod na ba dang// mu tig

dmar po bzang pos spras pa'i gser gyi phreng bas shAkya'i bu mo sa mtshom la bkab nas ched du ba rjod pa la de tshad dub rjod do// kho bo'i bun yon tan ci ba dus brgyan pa dang// mnab mas rang gi yon/
tan ji ltar rab smras la/ sems can dag ba da ga nya phrad par gyur pa na// mar dang mar gyi snyed bu ji ltar 'dra ba bzhin/ sgyu rtsa la bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis rab/
'phags pa rgya che la pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po brgyud pa// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsunamo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa na/
gang dag byang chub sems dpab pa mtshon pa ba las byed par spro bar gyur pa/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri ba dar lha ma yan dad/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye

chen bo dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang [7 ]'jig rten skyong ba du ma de dag rang rang ga dga' pa'i sgra byani tsa ri lhags par gyur to// de la dge slong dag dus gzhan zhag na/ lha dang klu dad lta
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ltad dang/ ma 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgya byin dad/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyod pa mang po dag bde sAnaM du
sems par gyur to/ ma la skyes bu dam pa 'di btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ha cang lun radi du thogs par gyur na/ sems can gang dag 'dis yun rang po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bo sbyin pa dang snyan
par smras pa dang/ don sbyad pa dang/ don mthun pas longs su smin par byas pa dang/ gang dpa da 'dis byang chub thob nas tshes bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba/ chos kyi snod du
gyur ba'i sems can de dag med par gyur nas/ phyis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par phyung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gcig tu
mi 'gyur grangs snyam mo// de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas/ rjes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas/ nam zhig na bdag cag gis
byang chub sems dar ba dam pa mchog rab dag pa 'di mngon par 'byung ba dang/ mngon par byung nas kyang/ shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du 'jug ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul nas
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ da bzhin gshegs pa 'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang/ de bzhin gshags pa 'a ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan
pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang/ lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa skor zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam

par rol pa chen pos lha dang ma dang lha ma yin du pa byas pa'i 'jig rten chos pa ji lta bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa'i bsam pa de lta bu s sdod tsade 'khod par
gyur to// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ yun ring por rtag par rgyun du 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par gyur cing/ dge ba'i ngos sbyod pa thams cad la bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur yin la/ yun ring po nas dus shes pa dang/ tshod shes pa dang/
na ba shes par gyur pa dang/ mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pa dang/ mngon par shes pa lda dang ldan pa dad rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba dang/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang/
dbang po la mkhas pa dang/ dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa dang/ dus la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar dus ran pa las ma yol bar gyur pa'o// de mdon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan
pas 'dinirab tu bzung ba dus so// bdun tshar bcad pa'i dusaso// 'di na bsdu ba'i dus sa// 'din pan gdags pa'i dus so// 'di nibatang snyoms su bzhag pa'i dus so//
'di ni smra ba'i dus so// 'di ni ma smra bar bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di na rab tu 'byung ba'i dus so// bad ni' ton byakha' dus so// bad ni tshul bzhin
yid la bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu dben par bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni bram ze dang/ khyim bdag gis bar gyi nang
du bgro ba'i dus so// bdi ni lha dad/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dad nam mkhab ldang dang/ ma bam nyi dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgya byin dang
tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong bdad/ dge slong dang/ dge slong mdang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi nad du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshes bstan pa'i dus so// 'di ni nang du/
yang dag par gzhag pa'i dus so zhes bya ba thams cad bdag nyid kyis shes so// byang chub sems dpa' dus thams cad du rtag par dus shes par gyur par/ dus la lta ba yan yad/ dag slong
dag ba de ni chos nyid kyis thob pa yin te/ srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo' 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa ba sas rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams glu dbyangs dang sil snyan gyi sgra las/ chos kyi sgo rnam pa bdi lta bu 'di dgags yang dag par skul ba mdzad do// de la 'di skad ces bya sta// sems can mchog gang phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs// de dag mthu yis sal snyan sgra dag las/ tshigs bcad sgra snyan 'di dag byung ba las// ma mchog dam pa rnams la yang dag skul// sdug bsngal brgyas gang
sems can mthong nas ni// 'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs dang gnas 'gyur zhing// phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces/ khyod kyis sngon na smon lam de skad btab/ dge ba dbab bo sten gyi
spyod pa dang/ 'gro phan bya zhes smon btabadran par byas// 'di ni khyod kyi dusaman tshod yin gyis/ 'drad srong mchog rab mngon par 'byung bar byas// sangs rgyas lham 'dul byed 'jig rten
mchog/ yon tan brgyus gang bar ni gyur cig ces// de'i phyir khyod mngon mgo dang rkang lag dang ]/nor gyidam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang// khyod na khrims kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub
sbyad// khyod ni bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed// khyod ni brtson pas yon tan brgya yasad dang// bsam gtan shes rab srid gsum mnyam pa med// khro bas non cing tha ba'i dra mang pa//
de dag bde gshegs khyod kyi byams pas khyab// dge ba'i yon tan bral ba log par nges// mi mkhas rnam mang dag la khyed snying rje// bsod nams ye shes dag pas lus khyab cing// rdul
bral bsam gtan mngon shes lham mer 'dug/ phyogs bcu 'di dag rnams su rab tu gsal// srin mad zla ba dri ma med pa 'dra// 'di dang gzhan yang snyan ba rnam mang gis// la snyan
las dag rgyal bas sgra bsgrags te// mngon par khyod 'byung dus nibad yin zhes// lha mas mchod par 'os la skul ma 'debs// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khyim dam pa
mchog yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa de bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bde bar gnas pa dang mthun pa// lha'i khang khyim lta bu stags bu dang/ sgo khang dang rta babs dang/
skar khung dang/ bsal ba dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang/ khang bzangs mchog dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba/ gdugs

dad/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du mas legs par brgyan pa/dar gyi lda lde brgya stong du ma mngon par dpyadas pa// na po che sna tshogs kyis sbras pa'i mu
tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu dpyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi spang leb can gyi zam pas mdzes par byas la// me tog gi phreng ba dang/ rgyun bo mang pos dpyangs pa/ bog snod nas spos kyi
bdugs pa/ dar la'i bla re bres pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog dri mchog tu zhim zhing shin tu mdzes pa dag bkram pa/ ljidam tog pad+ma dkar po dad/ pad+ma dad ldan pa'i chu'i gnas
yongs su spyad par bya ba mang ba/ bya 'dab skyong dang/ natse dang/ ri skogs dad/ khu byug dang/ ngang pa dang/ rma bya dang/ dud pa dang/ kun la dad/ ka la bang ka dang/ shang shang
te'u la sogs pa bya rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ ban sngon po'i sa gzhib gnas yongs su sdud par bya ba/ gzugasathams cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun tu ston pa//
lta bas mi ngoms bar nyams dgarab dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' dam pa'i bskyed pa'i khyim dam pa mchog da na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dbang khang po mdzes ba chen po mchogan
gnas pa/ dri ma med pa/ drim dang bral ba/ yan lag dri ma med pa/ phreng ba dag dang/ rgyan mabar ba/ dra mchog tu zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas lus bskus pa/ dkar zhing bzang/
la dri ma med cing rnam par dag la dri ma dang bral ba'i gos gyon pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ mal cha lhab nas bcos bu bzang po phra bdu ma btid pa// 'jam pa gtsa lan+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/
yan lag dam pasasngasama'i mal bzang po'i stong na 'dug pa btsun mob ser khar dam pa lha'i bu ma dang 'dra ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa// blta ba dang mthun pa/ spyod pa bzang pos mdzes
par byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba'i nang na bdug pa/ dung dang/ rdo dang/ rdza rdza dad/ kha rnga dang/ pa wang dang/ rgyud gsum pa dang/kharab ' sam khrol dang/ phag rud/ kim la dang
na khul dang/ sgrasnyan dang/ gling bu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs dad/ sil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bslab pa labud mad kyi tshog sakyis kyang/ sgra mnyan zhud bajam pas na
la yid du 'ong ba dang/ gling bu 'bud pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slong ngo// phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gsabyin gyis brlabs kyis
sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba'i sgra skad de dag las byang chub sems dpa' la skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo// bud med gang dag rab tu yade dga' sems dang bas//sil snyan pad
nyid kya@#// 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin tshe/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dam pa dag gam thu yis ni/ tshigs bcad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i
'gro ba 'dim thad nas/ go 'phang ma dag mo d mchog rdul med sangs rgyas te// skye dang rga dang sdug bsngal dag las sgrol lo zhes/ dba' bo khyod sngon smon lam de skad btab par gyur/ de phyir
dag myur grong khyer mchog 'di nas// byung la sngon gyi drang srong zhabs bcags pa/ sa phyogs dgarab tumanan nas su// rgyal ba'i ye shes mtshungs med 'tshang rgyar gyis// khyod kyi sngono
chad sna tshogs rin chen nor// rkang lag phangs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur// drang srong chen po de rang khyod dus 'di// chos kyi chu bo mtha' yas 'grol phye// khyod kyi tshul khrims m
nyams dri med dag/ sngon chad khyed ni rtag tu mchog gi rgyan// drang srong chen po khyod khrims 'dra ba med// 'gro ba nyon mongs rnam pa mang las khrol// khyodakyis srid pa brgya ni bzod ba sprad
khyodani'agro bas ngan brjod rnam mang bzod// bzod pas bzod cing dul bas res pa'i bdag/ rkangaganyis dbang po mngon par 'byung blo gyis// khyod bcon brtan zhing ma g.yo g.yo ba med//
! ]bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya chen gyur// g.yon can bdud na sde dang bcas btul te// ngan song gsum po mtha' dag skam par gyis// gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka ba thubaslad//
dus ngan nyon mongs snyigs ma bsregs gyis la// khyod kyis bdud rtsi chu bob char phob ste// mgon med rang nas skam pa tsham par gyis// 'cha dmya ngan med gnas sangs rgyas te//sog/
pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhes// khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mchog dran byas te// grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung// khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa mkhas// khyod kyi yi shes
mtha' yas dratshadache// rmongs pa'i yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la// shes rab bod dge dam pa mdzes par gyis// khyod kyisad pa brgyar ni byams pa spyad// snying rje dang ni dga'
mchog btang snyoms dang// khyod kyis spyod pa dam ba gang spyad pa// spyod pa de nyid 'gro la rnam par du// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dag gi gzi brjid kyis// yon tan me tog sna tshogs tshigs
bcad 'di// sil snyan dag las rnam mad yid bod grag/ mal na 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la skul// gang tshon dga' byed bud med rab tu dga' ba rnams// gshin tumadzas shing rab tu
snyan pa'i sal snyan sgrog pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba lha ma 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang// sil snyan dag lasagasung mchog ha cad ma tshe rjes su sgrog/ 'gro la phan byed yon tan mdabo
ldan khyod 'gro rnams su// rnam par rgyu bab tshe na rgyal ba'i yon tan gnyug mar byas// sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka'adzub sbyad pa dran gyis te// shing mchog drung du myur sod 'chi med go 'phang thob
par gyis [“]lha ma dag ni shin tusnyom zhing rgyal ba'i yon tan bral// khyod ni shin tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i ro bro rtag tu sbyin// stobs bcu'i ro bro dam pa mkhas pa rnams/
kyis mchod byas pa// bdud rtsa don ma bdag khyod kyis myur du rnam par phye// rgyal ba'i yon tan 'gro la phan pa byed la dga' ba po// khyod kyis sngon gyi srid pa nor dang nor bu gsar rnams batang

chung ma bu sdug dag dang grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa dang// rang gi mgo dadamag dang lag pa dag dang rkang pa'i ng btang// ma mchog khyod ni gna' ston rgyal po dag bar gyur pa'i tshe// ma zhig khyod/
la mngon du phyogs nas 'di skad tshag smas te// grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho la byin zhes byas// de yi tshe na rab tu dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa med// gna' sngon khyod ni rgyal
po'i bram ze dge bar gyur pa'i tshe// skye bo bla ma bsnyen bkur byed cing gzhan la 'khu ma byed// bram ze dam pa dag dang skyo ba mang po dag la bkod// de nas shi 'a pos srid pa'i 'gro balha
yi gnas su skyes// sngon khyod rgyal po'i bu las drang srod dam par gyur pa'i tshe// rgyal po dan pa khros pas khyod kyis yan lag bcad pa na// khyodan yid 'khrugs gyur pamed par 'chi ba'i dus
byas te// de ma tsho na khyod kyi rkang lag dag la ba ma zag/ khyod sngon drang srong sde bsadas zhes byad gang tsha gyur pa na// d mchog gnas na brtul zhugs dga' zhing bla ma la yang dga'// ma yi
bdag pos dug mda' dgags khyod la bstan pa na// khyod ni rgyal po de la yid 'khrugasamed cade snying brtser gyur// khyod sngon ri dgas bdag po yon tan can du gyur pa'i tshe// ra gza 'bab/

chu chen pos ma zhig khyer bar gyur pa na// phan dad ldan ba khyod kyis mi de phyud ste thang la bzhag/ khyod dag khrod de bdas pa na yang yad ma 'khrugs// ma mchog khyod sngon bram zib bur nagang rma

gyur pa na// khyod kyi nor bu rgya mtsho chen po yangs par lhung ba'i tshe// khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po zad par bya bar brtsams pa dang// stobs brtan khyu mchog khyod kyi nad bu de tsho phyir yad red// skyes
bu mchog khyod gna' sngon drar srod dam par gyur pa'i mi// bram ze zhig gis bdag gi skyabs gyur shog ces khyadag na bongs// smras ba bram ze dam pa kho bo dag las byung zhes byas// khyod kyis
rad lus btang gi bram ze dam btang ngo// gna' sngon shang ga gnas su drang srong sngo bsangs dud 'ongs te// 'dod pas snus pa shing 'di la mdu yodagrongs shesaM byas// shing 'di lo ma

ji snyed yod par rab grangs rab mkhas pas// khyod kyi de bzhin nor pamed cing mthun par tshig tu brjod// khyed sngon ni tsa yon tan ldan gyur shade la gnas pa'i tshe// zad par gyur kyang sngon gyi dzAn
la bsams te de ma spangs// lha yi bdag po khyed kyi yon tan dran nas rab tu dga'// snga mkho bzhin du shing mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par byas// khyod kyi brtul zhugs dkabazub sbyad pa de
dag mtshungs med de// yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pas yon tan mang// khyod kyi dus la8 bab grong khyer lta cas pa'i ngos/[' ]3 na pa[”]gni rgyal po'i
yon tan spyod la myur du khod// gang gi tshe na bud med rin chen bzang po'i gos kyis lus brgyan te/ sal sAn dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba sgra ni rab sgrog pa// tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dag
yis tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs pa// sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sal snyan dag gis sgra las rab tu byung// rga dad sha bas zin pa'i ba ji'i rten dag la bdag ni skyabs gyur cas 'jin

sgron ma khyod kyis bskal mang snga rol smon lam de sadabatab// mi yi seng ge khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam dag medran gyis shig/ rkang gnyis dbang po khyod du mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni 'di lan no//

khyod 'dir srid pa khrag khrig dag tu sbyin pa mang bo du mkhyen// nor dang rin po che dang gser dang gos bzangs rin chen spras pa dang// rkang lag dag dadamag dang phas pa'i bu dang rgyal srade 'byor pa pa/

khyod kyis btang yang khyod ni slong ba rnams la tha ba zhe sdang med// khyod 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mche ba bzang dang rgyal po zhi bar gyur// snying brtse snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na ro bur gyur//
rgyal po dpa' bo brtan dang mag bzangs dang ni ri la sogs pa byas// rgyal po khrag khrig mang po sbyin dga' rnam par 'phrul pa de nyid khyod// bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyis bskal pa mang por

tshul khrims sbyod pa sbyad// nor bu rin chen dri ma mad pa lta bur tshul khrims rnam dgagyur// khyod kyis 'bri yi rnga ma ci 'dra de 'drar tshul khrims bsrungs shing sbyad// tshul khrims dga' bas khyod
