kyis 'dir ni 'gro la rgya chen don yang byas// 'dir khyod glad po mchog tu gyur te rngon pa dgra yis mdasabastan tshe// gtun po dgra lasnyed brtsi snying rje bskyed nas de ni khyodakyis bskyabs// bzad re
mdzes pa'i mche ba yodas su btang sta tshul khrims yongs ma btang// khyod kyis de la sogs pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// brjod la dga' bas khyod kyis 'gro bab mi phan
sdug bsngal stod mid dang// tshag chub dag dang bsad pa dang na bcud ba mang po bzodapa byas// khyod kyis gna' sngon ma gang dag la bde ba kun gyis rim gror byas// de dag phyin s khyod kyagashed

mar gyur kyang khyed kyis de dag bzod// mgon po khyod nani mchog gnas ni gang tshe dred mor gyur pa'i tshe// kha ba bab cade chu phrug pan 'jigs shing skrag pa'i 'bazung ste// rtsa ba 'bras bu rnam pa/
mang dang bde ba kun gyis ri grobyas// de yis myur du khyod la gsod pa khrid 'ongs khyod kyis de la bzed// byang chub btsal phur brtul zhugs dka' thub yon tan rnam mang ye shes la/ khyod
kyis brtson 'grus shin tu brtan par gnas shing ma ba/yo g.yo ba med// dbang sbyar bdud kyang khyod kyi brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs named par byas// ma yasangag khyed 'di'i mngod par
'byung ba'i dusal da bab po// khyod 'dir gna' sngon kha ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchogagyur pa'i tshe// snying rje bskyed nas nam mkha' lasan srin po'i gling du myur du song//
de tsho ba phongs shing 'dug pa'i mi de blangs te bde la rab tu bzhag/ khyod kyis 'di la sogs pa brtson 'grus rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// myur du 'gyur zhing g.yo la yul la dga' zhing rgod pa'i
sems btul te// bsam gtan par gyur dul des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtso bo bcom// khyod 'di'i bsam gtan dga' bas rang gi g.yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas// da bde sem
can mchog khyod bsam gtan rnam 'thul bya ba'i dus la bab// gna' sngon khyod ni drang srong bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur// rgyal pamed pad ma dgags na khyod khrod rgyal srid
'a dbad yang bskur// khyod kyis skye ba dag ni dge ba bcu dang tshadas pa'i lam la bkod// de yi tshanam las ngasha 'thos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su dang// phyogs dad phyogs mtshams
bgro ba rnam mang shes pa'i chog khyod rab mkhas// gzhan gyi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skad shes pa dang dad po shes pa dang// tshul dang dul dang blo gros rnam mang rgyu bab phalo khyod phyin gyur//
rgyal ba'i sras khyod 'dir ni mngon bar 'byung ba'i dus la da bab pa// khyod kyis gna' sngon skye bo lta ba 'go bar zhugs par gyur pa dag/ rga sha sdug bsngal rnam ba sad pas nyam thag
wa/ 'khod pa 'di mthong nas// srid pa rnam par bzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud byas te// mun pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don chen rab tu byas// tshigs bcad/
rnam pamad po ma dzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis// sil snyan sgra bsgrags de las rgyal ba'i gzi yis dpa' bo bskul bar gyur// blo mchog ldan pa khyod bdare mngon par 'khyud ba'i
dus nad bab kyis// sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo' de dag mthong nas btang snyoms ma byed cig/ bud mad gos dang rin po tshe dong do shal sgos srid snyatshogs kyis// brgyan pa dag kyang
sems dad phangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams// sems can mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgrog cing sladabar byed pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu yis salasan dag las gas su bcad
pa 'di 'dra byung// gangagi don du khyod kyis 'gro la phan phyir bsal pa du mar ni// btang bar dka' ba btang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin tu sbyad// bsam gtan shes rab
shin tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi dus la da bab kyis// 'dren pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la myur soms phyi shol ma byed cag/ sngon chad rin chen mdzod dang gsor dang dngul dang rgyan rnams rab

tu btang/ skya ba de dang de dag tun mchod sbyin rnam pa mang po byas// khyod kyis rgyud ma bu bo bu mo lus dang rgyal srid srog btang ste// byang chub don du gtad par dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyis
nyu@#// btang khyod ni rgyal po ma dman bsod nams dpal gyis rnam par grags par gyur// mu khyud 'dzin dang mu khyud nag pa tshangs pas byin dang ral pa can// mchod/
sbyin sod ldan dang ni chos sems 'od 'phro can dang nor bstan dang// shin tu don bsanas gyur te sems can dman la gtong bar dka' ba btang// zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang/
bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur/ gtong ba chedang ldan zhing mthu ldan khyod na byas pa babar gyur// rgyal po drang srong zla bgazugs ldan dbababaden pa 'phel ba dang// rgyal po legs
par smra bcol dang blo gros bzang dang des par gyur// zla ba'i 'od dang khyad par 'gro dang rdul dang phyogs kyi bdag por gyur// rab sbyin dpa' bo ka shargyal po rin chen gtsug phud zhi ba ston// mi/

dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan du gyur te btang bar dka' ba btang// khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i char phab de bzhin tshes kyi char pa pheb// khyod kyis sngon chad sems can sAd po gang+ga'i bye ma snyed cag
mthong// sems can thar par bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i m chog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyis mchod pa dpag med bsam ma khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod// dpa'o grong khyer dam pa 'ad nas
'byung ba'i dus la dbab po// thog mar khyod kyis don yod byed lasA la'i ma tog gis ni mchod// rnam par snang mdzad la ni dang ba'i sems kyis skad cig bar du bltas// ja dbyangs ldan pa

la ni khyod kyis a ru ra yi 'bru gcig phul// tsan dana mthong nas khyod kyis rtswa ya la sgron blangs te khyim dubazung/ rdul bo grong khyer 'jug pa mthong nas phyi ma spar gang rab tu gtor// chos kyi dbar/
phyug chos 'chadapa na legs shis bya ba rab tu byin// kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod// 'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bsagaser phreng
gtor// 'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha tshar khul zhing gsalal bal sran gtor/ yi shes tog la mu med pa'i me tog kha lo sgyur la 'jams// na chen gtsug tor can la mar me pad+ma ldan l

sman yadaphul// thams cad zil gnonamu tig do shal rgya mtsho la ni pad+ma phul// pad+ma'i snying bo lani bla ri seng ge la ni char pa/deng phul// sa la'i dbang po rgya la la mar phul me tog rgyas la' ma phul
grags sbyin kun ta'i ma tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul// ye shes lhun la lus btud klas byin la nin bza' dbul ba byas// rab mthor gshegs dad tsan dan mchog dang bod ldan
la nitshwa sAr ra// bkod pa che la pad+ma dbul byas 'od zer rgyalal rin chen phul// shAkya thub lasar gang gsor phul dbang po'i tog la bstod ba byas// nyi ma'i zhal la ma tog rna rgyan blo gros bzad
la gser cod pan// klu zil gnon la nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding ba phul// sman gyi rgyal la zhe chen gdugs phulasad ga'i tog la khrigan phul// yon tana mchog ldan rin chen dra
'a// ba 'od srungs la ni glu dbyangs kun// spros mchog me tog phul zhing 'od 'phro'i tog la rtag tu me tog phul// ma 'khrugs rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'jig rten/
zla mchod la phreng ba phul// rgyal sras gtsug la rgyalasud dbul bus rgyal bar dkab la stos kun thul// sgron ma la bdag phul pad+ma' mchog la rgyan rnams dbul ba byas// chos kyi tog la che
tog sna tshogs sgronan mdzad la ut+pal// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs thadad gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa na// khyod kyis sems can sIng po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon chad mtshod/ 2'das
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ston pa de dag khyod mchod dran par gyis// sems can mgon dmya nganagang ba ma dor mngon par byung// mag ma mdzad pa mthed ba tsam gyis khyod kyis bzod pa mchog/
thob ste// rjes su mthun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa thob// de nas rab tu dga' bas bskal pa grangs med ba jig rten khams kun tu // sangs rgyas dag ni ri de la yang
mchod pa bsam gyis ma khyab byas// bskal ba dpag med de dag bod gyur sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das// khyod kyis lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag nang yang gang du song// dngos bo
thams cad tha mar mdzad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med// 'dod pa rgyal srid longs spyod rtag pa man gyis grong khyer mchog nas byung
0 'jigs pa' mi bod ltar// rga dang na dang 'chi ba ma bzad 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur// dag po thams cad tha mar mdzad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pached// shan tu sdug bsngal 3
sems can ltos la yon tan ldan ba mngon par byung// rgyal po bde ba'i mal na nyal gyur cing// gang tsha mo tshogs gling tu rgyud gcig dang// sil snyan sna tshogs sgra yis slong byed pa// de/
sal snyan sgra las 'di dag byung// srid gsum rgadangand kyi sdug bsngal 'khar// 'chimad rab 'bar 'di ni mgon med la// srid las 'byung la 'gro brtag tu rmongs// bum par chud pa'i
bung ba 'khor ba bzhin// srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra// 'gro ba'i skya 'chi gar la lta dang mtshungs// 'gro kha'i tshe 'go nasaM mkha'i glog 'dra ste// rigazar 'bab chu lta bur
myur 'gyogs 'gro// srid sred ma rig dbang gis skyo bo rnams// mdang lha gnas nigan song lam gsum po// bgre ba lnga po dag tum mkhas 'khod// dper na rdza mkhan thad lo sko ba bzhin//
rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang// dri zhim ro mchogarig pa bdebyed pa// dus ngan sA te 'gro ba 'di dag thogs// dper na rngon pa bar la sprubu thogs bzhin// 'dod pa'i yon tan
mya ngan gnod pa mang// 'jigs bcas rtag tudag byed nyon mongs bcas// ral gri'i so badra dug sdong la ma mtshungs// ngan skyugs snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bas spangs// 'dod pa'i
bya// yon tan 'jags bcas nyon mongs bcas// rtag tu rjed pa ra byed pa kun ba badra// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa/ sud pa'i srid pa'il khri shang 'phelabar
byed ji ltar ma 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs bcas pa// de ltar 'dod bde 'phags pa skya bos rig/ 'dam rdzab cha 'dra ral gyi gshagasanas bdu// ralagi so la sbyang rtsas bskus dad mtshungs//
ji ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs snod// de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig/ bya sha kham bu 'dra shade gsal shade 'dra// rol khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin// 'dod pa'i yon
tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra// gzugs brnyan ma tshungs shang brag cha 'brang dang/ mig yor 'dra zhing gar la blta 'dra dang// rma lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skye bos dag/ 'dod pa'i yon tan
skad cig ya ma brla// sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can// chu bur dbu ba lta bur yang dag man// yongs su btags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs// na tshod thog mar gzugs
mchog 'dzin pa'i tshogs 'khosdug bdod 'di na byis pab spyod// rga na sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas// rnam par sbyong ste rigs kyang skam bzhin// nor 'bru dam pa'i rdzas mang stobu
ldan tshe// phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod// nor nyams sdug bsngal bar na gyur pa'i tshe// rnam par stod ste ma las 'brog stong bzhin// ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras
bcas shing// de ltar sbyin bdod ma la dga' bar byed// nor nyams rgya bas nyan cing slong ba na// de tsho dga' bar mi 'gyur byargod bzhin// rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dbon po bzhin//
phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed// rga na sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na// de tshe'adod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin// rga bas rma byas na tshod yal gyur na// stod gnam lcags
kyisani bcom pa bzhin// rga bas 'khogs nas 'jig pa khang rul 'dra// rga las byung ba thub pa myur du skyes// bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rga bas sgoms/ ma lu'i 'khri shade sa
la'i nags stag bzhin// rna bas brtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste// dper na skyes bu bdum du bying ba bzhin// rgya bas gzugs sdug gzugasani ma sdug byed// rgya bas
gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs 'phrog/ rga bas bde ba 'phrog cade brnyas par byed// rga bas 'che byed dra bas mdangs kyang 'phrog/ nad brgya song dang nad thangs snag bsngal gyis//
'gro bgatsos te ma yig la dgas bzhin// rga dang na bos bcom kha'i 'gro ltos la// sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myugashod cige/ dper na dgun smad rlung dang kha ba che// rtswashang
gel ba nags sman mdangs kyang 'brog/ de ltar nad 'di 'go ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing/ dbang po gzugs dad stobasaM ni nyams par byed// naro'abru nor tshis thamar zad par byed//
nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed// gnad pa byed cing sdug la sdang bar byed// yongs su gdung byed mkha' la nyi ma bzhin// brgya dang kha pho dang bacha 'jo rus thudang
yas shing sdug pa'i spyi bo rtag tu 'bul// phyir ma 'ong zhing 'phrad par 'gyur ma yani// shing las la 'bru 'dra zhing klu yi rgyun dang mtshungs// 'chi bdabang yod pa dag dbad med byed// 'chi ba
'phrog byed chu bos shing dad bzhin// ma ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pu 'gro// rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dpang yang med// 'che bas srog chags brgya phrag mad 'dzin te// 'byung

po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho 'i chu srin bzhin// klu la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra// rtswa rtsi 'byung po' tshogs la ma dang mtshungs// skyon brgya mad po 'di 'dra 'di dag las// 'gro ba sgrol zhes
khyod kyis smon lam btab// sngon gyi smon lam spyod bde dran byos// khyod ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab// gang tshe bud med tshog sanarab dga' zhing// sal sA na dgags thub chen slong
byed pa// de tshe bdab gshegs pa rnams kyi mthus// tshigs bcad sna tshogs sa la snyan sgra las byung// 'dus byas thams cad myur du 'jig pa ste// mkha' la glogargyun ring du ma gnas bzhin
khyod kyis dus 'di nye bar gnas gyur gyis// brtul zhugs bzang po mngon 'byung dus la bab// 'du byed ma rtag brtan pa ma yin te// rdza so ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag/ gzhan gyirdzas/
[4/ ]ni brtan po byas dang mtshungs// bye ma'i grong khyer lta burang mi thogs// 'du byed bad dag 'jig bab tshos kund// dbyar gyi zhal la ji ltar 'gogs pa bzhin/ ]chungogs bye ma yod pa 'dra ba ste//
rgyun la rag las rang bzhin nyam chung ba// 'du byed mar me'i 'od 'phro 'brab ste// myur du 'byung zhing 'gag pa'i chos can yin// rud dang mtshungs par rang du ma gnas la// dbu ba lta bur nyan chung
snying bo med// 'du byed g.yo ba med tsang stod pa ste// brtags na chu shing dag gis phung po 'dra// sgyu ma lta bur sems na rmodas par byed// lag bcangs stod pas byis pa 'brid dang mtshungs// 'dus
byas gyur pa thams cad rgyu dag dang// rkyen rnams kyis nirab tu 'byung ba ste// gcig gis gcig rgyu byas te brten nas byung// byis pa'i spyi bos bdi 'dra du ma rtogs// dper na gres ma mun dza
brten byas la// rtsol ba'i stobs kyis thag par sgyur bdang// zo chun rgyud mo 'khor lor bcas po yang// de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba med// de ltar srid pa'i yan lag kun grub pa/ 3
gzhan dang gzhan tshogs pa la brten nas na/ de dag so se ni rir 'grub par 'gyur// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmags// sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te// sa bon gang yin myagud nyid
min de las gzhan man de yang yin te// de ltar rtag min nad tshani chos nyid do// mdag pa ya'adu byed rkyen yin te// 'du byed de yang yang dag nyid du mad// ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang
rang bzhin stod ste g.yo ba mad pa yin// rgya las rgya yi 'bur na snang mod kyi// rgyu de 'phos par dmigs pa'i ng yod ma yin// de las de med gzhan las ma yin te// de ltar
'o dus byas rtag mad chad pa med// mag dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su// mgag rnam bar shes pa 'dir 'byung yang// mig ni gzugs la rten pa ma yin la// gzugs kyadamag la 'pho
ba yod ma yin// 'di dag bdag med ma sdug chos can yang// de dag bdag dang sdug par btags pa ste// nor pa yang dag ma yan btags yin yang// de las mag gi rnam bar shes pa 'byung//
rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te// mkhas pas skyedang 'jig pa rnam par mthong// gang du ma song gang nas 'ongs ba gan/ rnal 'byor pas na stong pa sgyu ltar mthong// dper na gtsub/
shing dang ni gtsubastan dang// lag pas btsal ba byas pagasum tshogs pa// de la brten nas man 'byung 'gyur te// byung nas ring por ma thogs 'gags par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las
brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na// de yi 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'dimags so// phung po dag dad skye mched khams
rnams kyi// rkyen ni ma rig pa dngasud dang las// de dag tshogs pa sems can zhes brjod kyang// de ni dam pa'i don duramags su med// mchu dang lkog ma dan la brten nas nalce bsgyur b.las
yi ge'i sgra 'byung yang// lkog mar bstan nas ma yin rkan las min// de'i lan ya gi dmags su med// tshogs pa de la brten nas ngag de ni// yid kyi blo ya dbang gis 'byung mod kyi// yod dang ngagan/
mi snang gzugs med du// nang dang phyi rol na yang dmigs su med// mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi// skye dang 'a ga la rnam par brtagasacasan// de tshe ngag kun brag cha lta bu dang//
skad cig pa dang snying po med par mthong// dper na shing dang rgyud la brten byas la// lag pas brtsol babyas pa gsum gsan// sgra snyan pa wad gang bu la sogs ba// de dag las ni sgra yang 'byung
bar 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gan gnas 'ongs lagar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun khyabartagasabyas na// sgra ya 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mdamags so//
de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rgyan rnams las// 'du byed gyur pa thams cad byung bsta// yang dag mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis na// 'du byed stong pa g.yo ba med par mthong// phung po dag dang skya mched
khams rnams na// nang mang stod la phyi rol stod ba ste// thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la// chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo 'di// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di badra 'di dag na/
mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyed kyis rtogs// ji lta'anyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin lha mir bcas pa rtogs par gyis// gnod pa yod dag ma yin brtags pa yi// 'dod chags
zhe sdang dag gas bgro bab/dungs// snying rje'ilngan las zha ba bsal ba'i chu// 'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun na rab tuphob// byang chub dam pa yang dag thob nas na/'phags pa'i/
nor gyis srog chags ba sdugazhos// mkhas pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyiphyir// bskal pa bye bamang por sbyin ng byani// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// 'phags pa'i dgagyis dman dbul
sdug bsngal la// sems can kha lo sgyur ba ma g.yel bar// 'phags pa'i nor gyis de dag bsdu bar gyis// ngan song sa ya lam ni bcas pa dang// mthar s bdud rtsi'i sgo mob mchog don
sems can bye ba mang la bstan zhes te// khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs// tshul khrims ldan pa'i bsam pa 'grub 'gyur gyis// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// n gnas ong
gsum po'i sa la sgo ched do// mtho ris bdud rtsa ba so na rubye bar gyis// srog chags rnams kyi khong khro khro gzhil dang// srid pa'i mtsho las sems can bsgral byas te// zhi bde dmas nad
mad la dgod do zhes// khyod kyis rtag tubazod pa shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// dgra dang gnod sems 'tsho bas dkrugs pas// 'tsho ba sbyod pa yal bar ma dor ba/
'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa la bod// chos kyi gru na legs par sbyar byas la// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba rnams bsgral te// zhi bde rims nad med la dgad de zhes// gangag don du khyod kyis
brtson 'grus brten// sngonagyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// 'gro ba chu bo bzhi yas khyer gyur pa// sems can mgon mad pa dag brtson stobs dang// brtul ba'i shugs kyis myur du'adi
dag thon// dbang po 'khrul dang phal pa'i dbang po dang// spre'u 'dra'i sa mas las zhi gnas ngas dgod byas// 'dren pa khyod kyis gangag ched kyi phyir// nyon mongs gzhal ba'i bsam gtan
sgoms gyur pa// ston gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// nyon mongs dra bas dkrugs par gyur pa yi// 'gro la ma g.yel nyon mongs gtses pa las// bsam gtan mchog la skye dgu'adi
dag khod// gti mug ma 'bag mun ba bsgribs ba yi// 'gro ba chos brgya mang po mthad byed pa// yang dag mthong ba'i mig ni sbyin n zhes// khyod kyis sngon chad shes rab shin tu bsgoms//
sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa la// 'gro la shes rab dam pa 'od bzad ba// chos mig dri med nyon mongs mdab byin// bud med rnams kyi
sil snyan glu dbyangs las// tshigs su bcad pa'i di 'dra 'di byung ste// de thos nas nirgyags pa rnams sbyangs nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems btang ngo// dge slong dag de ltar
byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khoragyi nangan 'dug pa'i tshe// chos mnyan pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// chos yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// daci'i phyir zhan/ dge slong dag 'di ltar
byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas tshug chos skya ba rnams la gus pa dang bcas par gyur rung// bsam pa thag pa nas chos don du gnyer ba/ chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi/
kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par gyur pa// chos tshol bas ngoms ma shes pa ji ltar thos pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa// bla na med pa'i chos chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa// zang zing
mad par chos ston pa// chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna med pa[”]slob dbon gyi dpa mkhyud dang bralab// chos kyiN+Dis su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa// chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba// chos
la gnas su kha dzin pa/ chos la skyabs su 'dzin pa// chos la dbung gnyen du ba dzin pa// chos la brten pa/ chos langs par semaMs pa'i bzod pas nges par byung ba// shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyad pa ste/ thabs la mkhas pas rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing btsun mo'i
'khor thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam ni bstan// sngon gyi byang chub sams dpa' 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'dus pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang/
mthun par bya ba'i chos nyid dang mthun par ni byas// yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i skyon shin tu rtogs pa yin yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni kun
[ro]tu bstan// dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi tshogs kyi khyad par gyis 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba mtshungs pa med pa ni kun tu bstan/ lha dang mi'i las

shin tu 'das pa snyad po dang ldan zhing rgya che la/ rnam pa tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyigazugs dang/ sgra dang dri dang/ ro dang reg mchog tu dga' ba nyams dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba bde ba ni bstan/
'dod pa'i dgababa'i yul thams cad la 'dzin pa med ran rang gsams la dbang sgyur ba nabastan/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis grogs su gyur pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i son
can rnams mtshungs par gnas pas yongasasu sman par byas nas/ 'jig rtenogyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis nasams la kun nas nyon mongs pa med par btsun mo'i
'khor gyi nang na gnas te/ ji ltar mgron du gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la lta zhing/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i shin tu rgya cher sngon gyi dam bcas parjes
su dran no// sangs rgyas dang chos kyang mngon du byed do// smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon par sgrub pa// sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po gtong ngo// sems can rab tu thar par bya bar
yang sams so// 'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa yin pa yang so sor rtog ge/ 'khor ba la gnod pa dang/ 'jigs pa mang po du ma yod pa yang rtog go/ bdud dang nyes pa'i zhag
gapa yang yang dag par gcod do// 'khor ba'irgyud las kyang bdag nyid bda' bar byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa la yang sems ya ra dag par gtod go
ga/'phags pa rgya cheral pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dgu pa// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' n sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang
'khor ba'i skyon shin tu rig pa yin// 'dus byas la bsam pa thag pa nas don du mganyer ba yin/ nye bar len pa yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad don du mgar ba lan// sangs rgyas kyis
don du gnyer ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'khor ba la rgyab kyis bltas pa na/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i spyod yul la mngon du dga' ba yin// bdud kyi spyod yul
dang ma 'dres pa yin// srid pa la 'bar bar skyon du mthong pa yin/ khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmags dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin//
rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin// mngon par babyung ba'i bsam pa can yan// dben pa la gzhol ba yin/ dben pa la bab pa min/ dgen pa dang bas mtha' la mngon par dga' ba lan/
rab tu dben pa bstan pa rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin// bla na med pa'i nan tan la dbab ba yin// 'jig rten gyi don du 'dod ba yan/ phan par/
'ded pa yin/ bde bar 'dod pa yin/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtsa ba can yan/ phan par 'dod pa can yin/ byams pa la gnas pa can yan/ snying rje chen po
dang ldan pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin rtag tu yid yongs su ma g.yo ba yan 2 sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ 'dul ba la mkhas pa lan/ sems can thams
cad la bugacig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par sems pa yade la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad la ma lta bar yodas su btang ba yin/ sbyin pa 'gad pa la dga' ba man/ lhag par gtong
ba yin/ lag brkyang ba yin/ gtong ba la dpa' ba yin/ mchod sprin byas pa yin/ bsod nams shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin (bsod nams kyi yopyad shan tu bzung ba yin/ dri ma dad ser
snadang bral ba yin/ sams kun tu ma bzud po yin/ blun med pa'i sbyin bdag chen po yani/ byin nas kyang rnam par smin pa la ma ra ba yani/ snun pa la dpa' ba yin/ 'dod pa dang 'dod pa
che ba dang/ chags pa dang zhe sdang dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ gti mug dang/ ser sna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i phyir/
mngon par byung ba yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rgyun las mi g.yo ba yin gtong ba chen pob samasakyi ga cha shani tu bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la sAng brtse ba can yin
u// phan pa 'dod pa can yin/ ya lad bgos pa yani/ go cha bgos pa lan/ sems can rab tu thon pa bya ba la dmags pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs dang rnam par gnonapa/
kyi rang 'a rol gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyir mi ldog pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ gtod ba'i lag cha can yan 2 sems can gyi bsam pa dad ra ba ji lta ba bzhin du/
ma par byed pa man/ byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa yin/ dus dang phyed par chos rtogs pa yin/ smon lam byang chub tu yongs su khasngos pa lan/ rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal ba yin/ 'khor
gsum longs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs sugatong ba dad ldan pa yin/ ma shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon chasrab dang ldan pa yan/ nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba shin tu tshar gcod pa yan/ tshul
khrims dang yon tan dang spyod pa la zhugs pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin// kha na ma tho ba phra ra ba tsam la yad 'jigs par lta ba lan/ tshul
khrims yongs su dag pa yin/ dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral la dri ma sbas pab sams/dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du sbas pa dang/ ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang/ brgyad pa dang/ sngo ba dang
smad pa dang/ bshung ba dang/ brdeg pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ bsad pa dang ( bcad pa dang/ gzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi so mas ma rtogs pa yin/ sems ma 'khrugs pa
[4 ]yin/ bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gnod par ma sems pa yin/ gnod pa ma byed pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams/
cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pa lani/ yi dam la brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa la phyir ma ldog pa yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa lan/
shes bzhin can yin/ shin tumanyam par gzhag pa yin/ sems ma g.yengs pa yin/ bsam gtan la rtsa gcig tu yid la byed ba yan/ chos rab rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa min/
snang ba thob pa yin/ mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin/ ma rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal bdang/ bdag med pa dang/ ma sdug pa'i rnam par sems yongs su bsgoms pa yan/ dran pa nye
bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spyong bdang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ byang chub kyi phyogasakyi chos thams cad
shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa' yod la byed pa dang ldan pa yan/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis shin tu dkar bar byas pa yod dang ldan pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byed bar lta ba lan
bden pa rjes su rtogs pas gzhan gyi dring ma 'jog pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis rnam par rtsa ba yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul sgyu mdang/ rmig rgyu dang/ chu zla dang//
ku@#// khrag cha dang/ mig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa ba dan de ltar rang bzhin gyis tshes la gnas pa yin/ de ltar ye shes la gnas
klo pa yin/ de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas ba yin/ de ltar soms can gyi don la brtson par gnas pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs
ba'i sal snyan dang/ glu dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis rgya cher bskul ba dang/ de'i sngonagyi don gyi byang chub sems dba' srid pa tha ma par gyur ba rnams kyi
btsun mo'i 'khor longs su smin par bya ba'i chos kyis sgo bzhi mngon du byed do// bzhi gang zhe na// bdi lta// sbyin pa dang/ snyan bar skya ba dang/ donabya ba dang
no don mthun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sbyor ba/ bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i bsam
ba chud mi za ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i soms smon laMmagyi stobs bskyod pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su
ma btang ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad tshig rab tu dbye ba dang/
la rnam par nges pa'i yashas kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyi khyad par yang dag par bsgrub pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa// byang chub sems dpas chos kyi sgo/
bzhi bo de dag mngon du byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad yodas su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe rnam ba ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/
byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sel snyan dngaglu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu brgya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byab mngon par byed do// mos pargya chen
dar nabasam pa dang// lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snying rje bas// byang chub dam pa'i mchog tu sems skyo zhes// de 'dra'i sgra dgasal snyan rnams las byung// dang zhang dadadad mos dang
gus pa dang// nga rgyal med cing bla la 'dud pa dang// dri dang dge bsazhis tshol ba dang// rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i sgra byung ngo// sbyin dang dul dad sdom dang tshul khrims sgra/ bzod pa'i sgra
dang de bzhin brtson 'grus sgra// bsam gtan mngon par bsgrub dang tang 'dzani sgra// shes rab dang na thabs kyi sgra yang byung// byams pa'i sgra dang de bzhin sang rje'i// dga' dang btang
snyoms mngon par shes pe sgra// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po rnam nges pas// sems can yongs su smin pa'i sgra yad byung// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rab phyi sgra// yang dag sbyong dang de
bzhan rdzu 'phrul dang// dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga rab dbye dang// byang chub yan lag sgran sil snyan byung/ yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam mchog dbye dang/ za
zhi gnas sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong sgra// ma rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag med sgra// ma sdug sgra lags l snyan rnams las byung// 'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pab sgra// zad
ma shes pa'i sgra dang ma spyi sgra// 'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhi gnas med sgra// mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang salasnyan byung// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// sal snyan
dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste// sgra de thos nasabud med thams cad kyis// sems can mchog rab rjes brlabs byang chub smon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' datsun mo'i
'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas/ bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ lha'i bu brgya stong mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i khyad chub tu yongs susmin
par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi pA'ilukhrel yod pa'i lha zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog pa des mtshan mo ma nyal tsam na/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya
ba phyir 'bazangs ga la ba derasong ste phyin nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na bdug ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i la tshigs su bcad de snas pa/ sha 'kho ba ni shin tu bstan skyes busang ka
gas tsho yang bstan// btsun mo'i 'khor kyang bstan pa mdzad// khyod kyis 'jig rten rjes mthun mdzad// 'jig rten chos ni rjes thobo bas// lha ma mang po yongs sman mdzad// mngon
par 'byung ba'i blo dgongs pa// de ya dus la rang bab pa// ma grol bas ni sgrol ma nus// long bas lam yang ston ma nus// grol bas sgrol bar byed par nus// mig ldan yong ba lam
ston nus/ sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'khol// khyim nor bu dang chung ma chags// de dag khyod kyi rjes slob cing// mngon par 'byung ba bzhad par mdzod// dbang phyug 'dod pas rtse
ba dang/ gling bzhi rin chen bdun spangs te// khyod ni mngon par 'byung gnas// lha mar bcas pa'i 'jig rten mas//khyod ni 'dod la ma dgyes te// bsam gtan bde bas gnas mdzad
kyang/ sbrulha mi brgya phrag mang po dag/ gnyid kyis log nas sad par mdzad// dar la bab 'di shin tu 'dab// ragazar 'bab chu mgyogs 'gro bzhin// dar la bab pa ya'agyur nas//
mngon par 'byung ba mdzes ma lags// de slad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe// dbabab dam par mngon byung ste// thugs dam nyam 'ogochud mdzod la// lha ma'i don na mdzad pa'i rigs 'dod
[z]0/ @#// pa'i yon tan ma chos te// dper na lan tshwa'i chu dang mtshungs// 'phags brdulamar 'jig rtan 'das// shes rab gang ldand dag ngoms// khyed 'dir rgyal bo zas
gtsar dang// yul 'khor rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug/ dbam brgya yi zhal 'dra ba// mngon par 'byed bar dgongs sugasol// nyon mongs gdung bas rab gdungs shing// 'byung med
bcar bas dam bcings rnams// dba' bos myur du mtshungs med pa// thar lam zha sel dgodadu gsol// khyod nasman pa khams la mkhas// sems can yun radi na rnams la//
chos kyi smanan sbyar mdzod de// mya ngan 'das pa de myur 'khod// mag med mun pa gti mug glags// lta ba'i dra bas dkris pa yi// lha rnams dang ma yi mig/ shes rab sgron masa myur
du sbyongs// byang chub thob par blta bya zhing// bla na med pa'i chos mnyan ces// lha dang lha min klu dag dang// gnod sbyin dri ba mang po sdod// klu la rgyal pos rang ga gnas// khyod kyi dpal
gyis snang bar mthong// mchod pa dag ni mtha' yas dgyed// de yi brtul zhugs bsam pasongs// byang chub shing drung pad rdzogs la// lhung bzed bzhin dbul lo zhes// 'jig rten
! sbyor bzhi sder bcas pa// de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis// tshangs pa rab tu zhi spyod pa// byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang// bla med 'khor lo rab bskor bar// ma dbang gsol snyam sdod
[p ]/cing mchis/ byang chub bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha/ khyad chub sAd por gnas rnams kyang// byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba// blta'o zhes te sdod cing mchis// byang chub sems dpa' bsun/
mo'i nang/ bya ba ston pa gzhan yang mchis// de dag thog mar khyod gyur mdzod// de dag 'og tulus sar// dbyangs snyan rung na dbyangs 'jam pa// mar ma mdzad kyis lung ston dgopa/
yang dag de bzhinam da ba// rgyal ba'i sgra dbyangs bsgrag tu gsol// bskul ba'i re lta bcugasum pa'o//dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu des byang chub sems
dpa' bskul ma thag tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rmi lam 'di bstan to// rgyal po zas gtsang ma gti a log pa'i rmi lam du rmis pa// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo ma nyalatsaman/ lha'i
tshogs kyis bsor to/ mngon par 'byung zhi mdon par byung nas kyang rab tu byung/ gos ngur smig gyon pa rmis so// de nas de sadapa dang/ rings par ngs bar nyung dum la rdas pa/
gzhonanu btsunamo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ des sas pa lha bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'disAmadugazhananu gdon ma 'tshal bar mngon par 'byang bar 'gyur te//
snga ltas su snang ba na bad dag yanasAm nas/ khongos pa'i snyid la mya ngan gyi zug rngusazug par gyur to// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu na skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang
'gro bar ma gyur te/ bud med kyi tshigs kyi nad na mngon par dga' bas 'di nyid du chags par 'gyur te/ mngon par 'byung bar gis 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas rgyal po
zas gtsang mas gzhon nu'i langos spyod kyi phyir/ dbyi dang dbyar dang ston gyi dus ji lta ba bzhin du khang bzangs gsum byed du bcug go/ de la dpyad sa gang yin pa de ni shin tu bsal ba'o//
dbyaras gang yin pa de ni da dro ran pa'o// dgunas gang yin pa de rang bzhin gyi drob// khang bzangs re re'i gru skas rnams kyang ma lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'dzugs shing 'dogs so//
de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing bdegs pan gzhan nu sus kyang ma tshor bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur du bod ngo zhes sgra dpag tshad phyad du grag ba byung ngo// ltas pa dang/ mtshan mkhan kun gyis kyang
gzhon nu na chab sgo bkra shis pa nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo'i sgo 'phar chen po byed du bcug ste/ sgo

'phar re re yang ma lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byed cingagacod do/ de dag gi sgra yang dpag tshad phyed du grug go/ de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa gang sbyor ro// glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len
ba dang/ gor byed pa'i na chud dag kyang rtag tub zhag bar gyur to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas kha la sgyur ba la snus pa/ deng bskyed mo'i tshalagyis 'gres shing rta myur du sbyor
cig da nas ba 'a sgyur rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon nu skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar 'byung ngo zhes gsung ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di/
snyam du sems te/ bdagag gzhon nu skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar nam yang ma byung bas sa bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mo'i tshalagya sar phyung na/ 'on tang gzhon nu bud/
med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dga' ba myong bar 'gyur pas mngon par ma 'byung do snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byams pa dang/ rim gro byed pas da
sa zhag bdun na gzhon nus bzang po lta ba'i phyir spyad mo'i tshal gyi sar 'byung gas/ der khyod kyis gzhon nu mag tu ma 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur bar yid dus bod ba thams cad nisol cig/
yid du 'ong ba dang/ yulanyams dga' ba thams cad ni sbyor rug ces grod khyer du spel bsgrags so// de nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par grong khyer thams rud brgyan te/ skyed mo'i
tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ ras bcos bu kha dog thadad pa'i bu ra ni bris/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyis na legs par brgyan te/ byang chub sems dpa' la mgang

nas 'gro ba'i lam de yang chag chag btab ste/ phyogs nas spos chu'i chag chag btab ste/me tog sil ma na rgal bar bkram/thos bo'o nas na ba dugs/ bum pa gang bas na mdzes par byas chu shing ljon pa ni bslang/
dar tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi bar ni bris/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kab dra ba dang/ rgyan 'phrang dang chun po na sbyangs/ dpung bzhib bkod pa na byas so// g.yog/
'khor kyang ga zhon nu'i btsun mo'i 'khor brgyan pa'i phyir btson par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mo'i tshal gyi
sar 'byung ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyidakyi mthus gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ ma rgan po gtugs pa/ 'khogs pa/ lus la rtsargyus mthon pa/
so rgal yaM/ lus gnyer mas ba nga pa/ spabyang/ sgyur ba/ gdung rten ltar dgu ba/ zhom pa khar ba la rten pa/ mthu zad pa/ dar yal ba/ mad pa nas sgrangar dag po 'byung
ba lus dgu bas khar ba la brten nas/ yan lag dang nying lagathams cad bdar ba zhig/ lamakar bstan par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du la lo
sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha la sbyor ba marade nyam chung zhing// sha khrag skams la rgyus lcags nye tsus dkris// mgo dkar so rgyal lus narab snyam la// khor ba rten cing
rmo bder 'byor 'gro su/ kha la sgyur bas smyos pa/ lha cig ma 'dirga bas zil gyis non// dpong po nyams shing sdug bsngal brtson stobs nyams// gnyen gyi skyo bas brnyas shang mgon/
mad gyur/ don bgyid ma nus nags khrod shing ltar bor// byang chub sems dbas skyas pa/ 'di'i chos 'di rigs kyi yin nam bon taman/'gro ba 'di kun la yang 'disrid de skyes
shig/ tshig 'di yang dag ji bzhin myur du smos shig dang/ thos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin bsam// kha lo sgyur bas skyas ba/ lha bad rigs chos ma lags yul 'khoratshos
ma lags// skye bo kun gyi dar la bab po rna bas 'jom// khyod kyi yab dang yum dang nye du gnyenatshogs kyang// rgya las mthar 'gro ba thabs nag zhan ma mchis// byang chub sems dpas
smras pa// kha lo sgyur ba'i byis pa'i skye ba ma mkhas pa'i// blongan gzhon pas rgyags shing myos pas rga ma mthong// da na sar 'gro nga yid shing rta myur du sgyur// dbang na la gnas pas rtse
gas pa zhig bya// danas byang chub sems dpas shadi rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te// phyir grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na/ bkod pa

chen pos grong khyeragyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mo'i tshal gyasar zhugs ba dang/ des lamaka na ma nad kyis nyen pa/ dmu rdzong can lus nyam chung ba/ rang ga gtsan rgyag tu byang ba/ mgon med pa/
skyabs med pa shin tu sha thang bar dbugs dbyung zhing brngub dgos pa zhig mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ya dbyang chub sems dpas[︽]shes bzhin du kha losgyur ba la 'di skad ces skyas so// kha lasgyur
'a@#/ bam rtsub lus kyi mdog ngan la/[7 ]dbang pakhams cad nyams shing dbugs dbyud rab tu dka'// yan lag lus skams lta bas dkrugs shing nyam thag gyur
rang ga gcani rtug snyad ba'i gnas na bdug 'disu// kha lo sgyur bas skyas pa// lha cig ma 'di shin tu nad kyis btabapa ste[7 ]nad kyi 'jigs pa nye bar mchis pas 'gun la thug/ nad med
gzi brjidam mchis stobs kyang rnam par nyams// mgon dang skyabs dang gleng dang dpung gnyen ma na ches lags// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nad med pa yang rmilam na na rtsi dang mtshungs
nad kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin tu ma bzad pa skyes bu mkhas pas gnas 'di mthong nas ji lta bur// rtse la dgab dang sdug pa' 'du shes spyod pa 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas byang chub
sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yad grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na bkod pa chen pos/ grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi
sgo nas skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang/ des lamaka na ma shabar gyur pa/ khyegs la bzhag pa las kyi bla re phub pa nye du'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ kun kyang du zhang skad phyung ste gdul

skye sngags 'don cing/ skra ga shog la mgo la sas 'thor zhing brang brdung la cho nge 'don cade phyi 'brang gyur pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur pa la/
'di skad ces sa so// kha lo sgyur ba ma 'di khyegs la bzhag nas ni/ ma rig skra bshag mgo la sa las 'thor byed cing// sna tshogs dag ga tshig ni brjod la bud brdung bas// kun nas gso
byas te khyer ba su zhig yin/ kha lo sgyur bas smras pa// lha cig ma 'di 'dzam bu gling du gum pa sta/ slan chad pha ma mchis brang bu rnams mthong mi 'gyur// longs spyod khyim dang mdza'agashas
ga rten tshogs spangs nas ni/ 'jig rten pha rolo mchis te sanachad gnyen ma mthong// byang chub sems dbas sbas pa/ rga bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i gzhon pa cir ma rung// snyatshogs
nad kyis gnod 'gyur nad med tsar na rung//rang du ma gnasagason ba mkhas la par ma rung kago la chags pa skyes bu mkhas la car ma rung// gal te sgra med nad med 'chi ba med gyur kyang//
'on kyang phung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal che yin na/ rga na 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos ci dgos/ legs par slar zlog rab tu thar par bya ba bsam// dge slong dag de nas byang chub ci nas
dpab shing rta mchog de slar zlog ste/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dbab dus gzhan zhig na grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas/ skyed mo'i tshalagyi
sar zhugs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu de dag nyid kyis lam ka der dge slong zhig bden par sprul pa dang/ byang chub sems dpas dge slong zhab rdul ba mang dag par
bsdams ba tshangs par spyod pa bag thab pa/ gnya bshadi gang tsam du lta ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa// phun sum tshogs pa/ 'gro ba dang ldog pa mdzes pa phun sum tshog
klo/ pa mdun du lta ba dang/ g.yas g.yon du blta ba mdzes pa/ bskam pa dang bsnyung ba mdzes pa/ chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung bzed dang/ chos gos thogs pa mdzes pa zhig lam ka na 'dug pa
d mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur bo la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu sems zhar ba zhi zhing// mig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang
tsam lta byed srid// dur smigags gyon shin tu thab tu zhi bar spyod// lhung bzed thogs nas ma rgod ma khangs su zhig yani// kha lo sgyur bas snus pa lha gcig ma 'di dag slong zhes n bgyi ba
lags/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba sbangs shang shan tu dul bar spyod// bdag nyid zhi ba 'tshol zhing rab tu byung bar gyur// 'dod chags zhi sdang bralab bsod snyoms sbyod tsa rgyu// byang chub sems
dbas smras pa/ 'di ni dge bar legs skyas nga yang 'dod ba ste// rab tu byung ba mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags// da ni bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhan la'ang phan/ 'tsho ba bdo
zhing nyams mthun 'chi med 'bras bur 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dang sa shing rta mchog daslar bsgyur te/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slod dag
de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la bskul ba rnam pa bad lta bu 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas mthong zhing thos nas// byang chub sanas dpab yongs su bsrung ba'i phyi/ ra nga rgya chen po byed du/
bcug ste/ 'obs kyang rkor bcug/ sgo brtan po yang 'dzugs su bcug/ srungs ma yang bkod/ dpab ba rnams kyang sbyin/ bzhon pa yang stagon byas g tshayang gyen du bcug go/ byang
ba sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ grong khyer chen po'i sgo bzhi'i lam gyi sum mdo rnams su dpung chen po'i bkod pa bzhag ste// byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung nga de naM sa de/
dag de bsrung du bcug go/ btsun mo'i 'khor la yang des bgalatsam yad glu dbyangs kyi rgyun 'chad da re/ dga' ba dang rtse bathams cad kyang sbyor dug/ can s kyang gzhon nu chags nas/
rab tu 'byungabar ma 'gyur bdang/ mgu bar 'gyur bar bud med kyi rgyu pad ston cig ces bsge'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thab mo mas pa'i skyes bu lag na ral gri mtshon thogs sgo gar
bkod// ga bgos me rta glang po shing rta ma bskyon glang po'i 'phreng ba'ang bkod// bobs dad shang thags dag dang rta babs phyir mthon po 'ong byed du bcug/ sgo mo rgyang grags grag pa'i
sgra 'byung ba yang gtan pa dam po bcug/ shAkya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yid ma dga' zhing nyin mtshan bsrung bar byed/ dbung chen de dag rnams kyang sgra snyatachen po shin tu grags par byed//
des pa bdenas 'byung du 'ong zhis grong khyer 'khrugs shaji pade sngangs skrag/ shAkya'i rigs su song na rigs 'di chad pa'i m 'gyur grang snyam byed/ skye ba du
dag la bsgo ba rtag tu glu dbyangs rgyun ma bcad// rtse bas dga' ba rnams kyis bsnyen bkur gyis shing yid kyang mgu bar gyis// bud mad sgyu thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du ma mang
po ston// des pa 'gror ma bgyur bar bsrung bar byos shing bgags kyang rab tu byos// kha le sgyur ba mchog de mngon par 'byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag ste// dang pa khrung khrung dag dang
rma byas stegs dag dang ne tso rnams// khang bzang skar khung rta babs mchog dang yang thog dra la 'khod nas ni// dman zhing dman la ma dga' ma bde mag smad sems shing sgra ma 'byin/
rdzing dang rdzong chen dag gi brlu dag kyang nas shang nas par 'gyur// gshang ldan sams shing mal gal tog lhags la me tog slar ma 'chags// pa wang gling bu rgyud gsum gyis nibargyan pa de tsho glu/
bur chad// rdzad ng rdza rnga dag kyang lag pas brdzusan 'chag cing sgra ma 'byung// grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cad shin tu gnyid kyis non// gang gi yid kyang gar byed pa dang
glu len pa la dga' ba med// rgyal bo 'ang mchog tu rab tu yadedaman gyur te sams khongs tshud cing 'dug/ oM ma ma rud shAka rigs rdzu [“]phrul rgyu chen ma tshog grang snyam byed gas 'tsho ma dang
rgyal bu mal cag nan nyal zhade 'khod pa'i tshe// nas phyed tsam nas mtshon pa rmi lam du ni 'di dag rmis// sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i 'i dang bcas te ga yis bgyur// sha mi len
rnams kyad rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa nas mthon tes la skyel// nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang bcas te mkhab las sa la lhung// lag pa g.yon pas sku yad rab tu 'bal zhang cod pan lhang
mthong// lag pa chad la de bzhin rkang pa 'ang chad pa de ba dag ni sgren mor mthong// bdag gamu tig do shal nor bu gser gyi 'og pag chad par mthong// nyal khri de yi rkang pa bzhi chags la stangon
nyal ba mthong// rgyal po'i gdugs kyi nor bu nor bus spras pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chag bar mthong// rgyan rnams kun kyang rnam par thar tsade chu las khyer bar gyur pa dad// khyim thab rgyan ya nga

gos dang cod pan bcas te ma la stod 'thor bar mthong/ 2 grong khyer dag nas ma sgron phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang// ran pa tshe las byas pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'i ng chad par gyur pa rmis//

mu tig dngoshal 'phyang bsnyad nas rgya mtsho chen pos dkrugs pa dang// de yi tshe na na ya rgyal po ra rib gnas nias g.yos pa rmis// shAkyag pa so'i rmalam du na 'di 'dra bde jag rmisagyur nas// de sad
mag nas mchim zag tsango rang ga khul 'di skad smras// lha cig rmi lam 'di 'dra rmas pa tsa'i 'gyur pa bka' stsol cig/ bdag ni dran pa 'khrulatsang mig kyang 'khrul la yodon mya ngan nan
u// de bas da thos ka la bad+marnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan pas// sa mtsho mal skas pa/ khyed na rab tu dga'agyur sngag ba med// sems can gang dag pasod nams mngon spyad
de dag rmi lam de 'dra rmi// sdug bsngal dums ten pa rma lam bad 'dra ba ga la yod// khyod kyis sa 'di rab tshugayos pa dang/ skar rtsis bcas te sa la lhung rmas pa// lha dang klu dang srin
po ba byung bo'i tshogs// kun gyiso khyod mchog gtse ma byed par 'gyur// khyod kyis shing rnams rtsa nas mthon rmas shang// lag pa g.yon pas skya bab la rmis pan/ sa mtsho myur du nyon mongs
drab bcad// 'dus byas dag las lta bab dra ba 'byin// khyod kyis nyi zla sa la lhung rmis shing// skar ma rnams kyang lhung bar rmis pa na// sa mtsho myur du nyon mongs dgra bcom ste// khyod ni
'jig rten mchod pa bsngags par 'gyur/ khyed kyis mu ga dngashal 'thor rmas shing// lus kun chad dang sgron mo rmas pan// sa mtsho myur du bud med lus spangs te[“ } ]/ring por ma thogs
skyes pa'i lus su 'gyur// khyod kyis khri rkang chag par rmis pa dang// gdugs yu ran chen smras pa chagarmas pa// sa 'tshe myur du chu bo bzhi rgol cig/ nga ni 'jig rtan gdugs gcig 'gyur
ba mthong// khyod kyis rgyan rnams chus khyerarmis ba dang/ gang yab sa dang cod pan khri steng rmis// sa mtsho myur du mtshan gyis brgyan nas ni// 'jig rten kun gyis nga la bstod ba mthong// khyod
kyis me sgron brgya phrag bye ba dag/ grong khyer byung nas mun nagagyur rmis pa// sa mtsho myur du ma rag rmongs pa'i mun// badzayig rten kun la shes rab snang byed 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig de
shal chad pa dang/ gser gyitsod tsong sprus pa chad rmis pa// sa batsho myur du nyon mongs dra bcad de// 'dus byas dag las 'du shes skud pa 'byin// sa 'tsho gang phyir nga la gus par na// rtag
tu rim gro mchog gis mchod byed na// khyod la ngan 'gromad cade mya ngan mdo// myur du dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba 'thob// ngasan sngon chad sbyin pa gya nom byin// tshul khrims bsrung dang rtag tu
bzod ba bsgoms// de bas nga la dad pa gang redapa/ de dag thams cad dga' zhing rab dga' med// 'khor bar bskal pa bye bamatha' yas su// ngosan byad rgyu lam mchog rnam par sbyangs//
ra bas nga la dad por gad byed pa// de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po tshad// dga' ba thob kyis ma dga' ma skyed gi/ tshar ba thob par gyis la mgu skyod cig/ dga' dad mchog tu dga' ba
myur 'thobaste// khyod kyis rmi ltas bzang gis sa mtsho rdol// sngon chadapag 'a'i 'a san gang dag bas kas gyur ba// ma mchog rnams ni mngon bar 'byung ba'i dus bab tshe// mtshan ma 'di
dag ba sod nams gzi brjed bsags pa dang// dpal gyi gzi brjid snying bo can des rma lam bgyur// de ni nang ba dag dang lag ba chen po yis// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag ga chu dkrug dang//
sa bad thams cad sna tshogs mal charagyur pa dang// ri bo lcan po mchog kyang sngas su gyur pang// rmi lam nan bod rab bkye bas 'jig rten na// mun pa mun nag chen
po rnam par bsal ba dang// sa las gdugs shag byung bas 'jig rten gsum khyab dang// 'od kyis reg bas lego lcang sdug bsngal rab zhi rma// dkar gnag srog chags bzhi zhig rkang
pa ldag pa dang// kha dog bzhi pa'i byas 'ongs kha dog gcig gyur dang// mchog tu ngan ba smad pa ngan skyags ra la yang// 'jigs nas 'gro yang ri nas gos pa med pa// rmi lam na ni/
chu bo'i chu yis rab gang nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba las// don gyur byas bsgrol de gzhan dag bsgral nas ni// de yis 'jigs med mya ngan med mchog thang bkod/
rma// rmi lam na na nad pa mang po nad btab pa// nad med gzi brjid bral zhing stobakyang nyams rnams la// de na sman par gyur nas sman mang byin pas// nad btabs mas can khrag
khrig mang po thar byed cad// rarab ngos la seng ge 'i khri la 'dug nas ni// slob ma thal mo sbyar cing lha rnams phyag 'tshal la// bdag ni g.yul las rgyul zhing lha rnams nam mkha'
las// kun tu dga' ba'i sgra sgrog par ni rmi lam rmi// bkra shis brtul zhugs bzang po yongs su rdzogs bar yang// byang chub sems dpa' rmi lam rnam pa de dag rmi// de thos nas ni 'di
ni ring por ma thogs par// maya lha yi lhar 'gyur snyam sta lha ma dga'// rmi lam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o////dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
disnyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po tshon po zas gtsang ma la ma byas shang// phas gnang ba med par mngon par babyung ba 'di ni bdag la ma lags te// byas pa gzo ba ma yin par 'gyur
ro snyam nas/ dmtshan mo ma nyal tsam na// rang ga gnas kyi khang bzangs nas byung ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khang bzangs su phyin nas 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa bdug
ma thag tu khang bzang thams cad kyang 'od kyis gsal bar gyur to// danas rgyal po sad pa dang 'od de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang myur ba myur bar tung rum la sbas pa/ kyi nyung
rum ru nya ma shar tam/ gang gis na bad 'od kyis rnam pa mdzes/ nyung dum gyis smras pa/ lha da dung du dgung phyed kyang ma bas so// lha gzhan yang 7ma'i 'doneshong dang rtsag pa thal mo/

phyin// lus la gdud por bgyid cange tsha bar rab tu bgyid// nang par dus na dang pa dag dang cha byadang/ na tso khu byug ngur pa dag kyang rang sgra 'byin// 'od 'di lha ya yid du mami zhing bde ba sta
rab tu sam bgyid dge bgyid gdung bar byed ma lags// shang dang rtsig pa thal phyung sgrib pa yong[']ches/ yon tan lnga bgacig cig de nga 'dir byon des// rgyal bo da na mi dga' phyog
'bcur bltas pa dang// sems can dag pa pad+mab mag can de mthong nas// de na mal nas ldang bar 'dod nam nus te// rnam dag blo can dam pa pha la gus pa skyid//
de ni rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras// lha cig bdag na mngon par 'byang ba'i dus bab rigs// bgegs kyad ma mdzad ma dgyes pa yang ma mdzad cig/ rgyal paganyen/
bcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod par gsol// rgyal po de ni mchi mas mig gang 'di skad smas// khyod ni phyi'i lo ldog nga 'a dgos pa ci zhig yod// bdag la dam pa ru slong smos shag
thams cad sbyin// bdag dad pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor 'di phan thogs// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas snyan pa'i tshigs smras pa// lha cig dam pa bzha 'tshal de ni bdage la chu lo//
N+NaM gal te skal bar spyodan ma nga'an khyod la mchis// 'on tang rtag tu khyim na gzigs shing 'byung ma 'gyur// lha cig bdag nargya bso tshugs par ma 'gyur hung// rtag tu mdog bzang der
la bab par gnas pa dang// nad ma mchis par thob cing nad kyis ma btab dang// tshe dpag ma mchis pa dang rgud par ma 'gyur 'tshal// rgyal pos tshig thos shin tu sdug bsngal nyamathog
sta gzhon nu gnas man slong bas bdag la mthu med de// bskal par gnas pa'i drang srong rnams kyang nam du yang// rga na 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgyud las ma thar te// rga na 'chiba'i
'jigs dang rgud par ma 'gyur ba// lha cig gal te mchog bzhi 'di dag ma stsalan// gzhan yang mtshog cig gsol gyis rgyal po gsan du gsol/ 'di nas shi 'phos nying mtshamA
sbyor ba ma 'gyur mdzod// mi yi dam pa'i tshig ni de skad thos pa dang// srid pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongs su gcod// phan byed 'gro ba thar byed rjes su yi rang ngo// khyod kyi bsam
pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs gyur cig// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' spur song// rang gi khyim du phyin nas/ mal na 'dug pa dang/ de song ba 'am//
'ongs par sus kyang ma tshur de dge slong dag de'i nam nangs pa dang/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad sogs te/ de'i lo rgyus rnams smyos nas/ gzhon nu nan/
par 'byung na da ji ltar bya zhes smras so// shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shAkya'i tshogs ni mang la/ de ni gcig pur gyur pas//
mthus mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa de la ma mchis so// de nas shAkya de dag dang rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya gzhon nu 'grub chos sbyangs pa// 'os su gyur pa// 'dong bslabs pa/
tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya byang chub sems dbang bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar sgor bkod de/ byad tshubasems dang 'a bsrung ba'i phyir/ shAkya gzhon nur re la yang
'khor shari rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang/ shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod de// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir de bzhin du grong khyer gyi
lho dang/ nub dang/ byang gi sgor yang shAkya gzhon nu 'thab tshes sbyangs pa bos sugyur pa// 'ong bslabs pa/ tshan mo cha chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang/ shAkya/

'thaM gzhon nur re la yang 'khar shing rta lnga brgyalnga brgya dang/ shing rta ra ral yang 'khor dpud bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod de// byang chub sems dpa ba bsrung ba'i phyir/ shAkya rgan rabs rgan
rabs rnams kyang lam gu pa zha mdo dang/ mad sum dod/ lam bo tsho mang po thams cad na 'khod de// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas bskor cang/ mdun gyis bltas
tatadang grung po ma dag la ba zhon nas rang gi khyim sgo na mel tshe byed do// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gabu ta mas kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smas ba// mar me dri ma med pa bus la nor bu
thams cad rgyal mtshan rtse mor thogs// mu tig rgyan 'phreng rnams kyang sbyongs la khyim 'di kun tu bod kyis snang bar byas/[”]glu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la dmod g.yel ba med pa'i mel tsha dam
du gyis// gzhon nu nas ma tshor bar ni 'gro bar ma 'gyur tshul du bsrung bar gyis// go bags lag na lag char ral gri dang// mdung thung mda' dang mtshon cha rtsa gnyis thogs// sdug pa'i thun
bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po gyis// sgo kun chod la gtan pa dam pa chug/ sgo 'bar su bkod par gtan chug la// dus la ma bab par ni sgo ma dbye// sems
can dam pa 'di ni shor ta ra// nor bu'i do shal mu tig do shal thogs// me tog zla gam sang gshing la sa// ska rags sor ba rna rgyun chingasashing thogs// rkang rdub dag kyang shin tu leg
par thogs// lha ma phan pa mang po glang po drogs bzhin 'gro/ gal taglo bur mngon par byung nga ra/ 3ha nas ma bad red par ma gyur par// de ltar de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig/ bud me da
gang dag mdung thung thogs pa dag/ dri ma med pa lan na 'dug paskor// ca nas gnyid kyis leg par ma gyur pa// phyi ma leb bzhin mgags bsrung bar gyis// rgyal bu 'di ni bsrung
bya ba'i phyir// khyim 'dir rin po che yi dra ba bres// glang budagakyang rab tubud cing lang// dmod rdul dang bral ba bsrung bar gyis//phan tshunagacig la gcig ni sbren byas te// de med ma 27
shin tu bsrung bar gyis// rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spa ngas nas su// khyim nas mngon du babung bar gyur ta re[7 ]/'dani mngon par byung bar gyur nage/ rgyal po'i pho brang bde kun nyams na
dga'// rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun rang gnas pa yang// rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud na chad par 'gyur/ 'dag slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dbon ltas rtse na la sogs pa//
0 nyu// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang/ 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas/ 'di skad ces sas te/ grogs po dag do nub byang chub sems dpa'
po mngon par 'byung gis// khyed cag de la mchod pa byed nga 'a las la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po bzhi ya nga lcang la can gyi pho brang du zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor chen la smras pa/
! grogs po dag de med byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gse/ khyed kyis bcibs pa'i rkang lag nas thag la 'byang bar gyis shig/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis sbas pa// sku na sred med
bu yi stobs ldan rdo rje lta bur ma phyedas la lci// sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// ra yi dam pa lhan pa chen po rmang nas byung ste nam mkhar gzung nus
kyi rgyal ba'i yon tan sbyang ba lhan po 'a yi lca bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gong du bkur mnus/ rnam thos kyi bus lcas pa/ ma gang nga rgyal 'gyong ba de la ston partswa// gang dag
dga' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor// bsam pas thags pas btsan par byas la gus pa ya// bya yasangasha kham bzhin du yang bar shes par gyis// kho bo mdun nas 'gro yis khyed cag
rnams kyis bcibs pa theg/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung tshe bsod nams mang po sogs// dge slong dag de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sumacu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams lasmras
[o ]pa/ kyi grogs po dag de nub byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gas/ de la khyed thams kan chod pa 'a las la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros sa byab des
ces snyas so// bdag gsi ni sor skya'a gnas kyi grong khyer chen pa skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bum thams cad gnyid kyis lag na bgyi'i// lha'i bu rtsa ba bkod pa zhes 31
des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni rta dang/ glang po che dang/ bod du dang [7 ]rdza mo dang/ ba lang dad ma hadang/ skyes pa dang/ bad mong dang chu nga nga/ dume / pa sa mi
grag pa ra bgyis// lha'i bu bkodapang blo gros zhes bya bdes 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni nam mkha'i dkyil na shing rta chen po bdun rin pa cha' snyigs dus 'khor
nor bu rin po che ma shel gyi 'od 'abar ba// gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bas+saM dab 1 ma tog sna tshopa/ 1 05 33[… '' ]wa[' ] ba a ta ya la sems bag lam pa la ya
dar dgod par bgyi'o// klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu zhes bya bas bde skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni bdag nyid kyi sna la khang pa brtsigs ra dang gdung shum gnyis ba bgyis te
der lha bu mo dag bkod la sil snyan dang glu dbyangs len du stsal zhing/ glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra chen pa sa/ byang chub sems dar['] grwa ra bgyid cing mchi bar bgyi'o//
lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos ni sgo dbya'o// lam mtshon par bya'o// lha'i bu mos sbyod kyis bde skad ces smras so// bdag/
gis ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ma sdug par bstan par bgyi'o// lha'i bu yang dag skud pos smras pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpab gzams mal nas bzhengs gsol bar bgyi'o/
de nas klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang/ klu'argyal po gzi can dang/ klu'argyal po rgya mtsho dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ 'od ga' bos 'di skad ces smras so//bdag
cig gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi sbyin mngon par sprul te/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phyi ma'i char dbab po// dge slong
dag de ltar lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drawa rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa des par bsams te brtsoms so// byang chub sems dpa' chos sems pa la zhugs ba glu dbyang

len ba'i khang bzangs mal bde ba la 'dug pa// btsun mo'i 'a khor gyi nan 'dug pa sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems shangesems can la phan babya ba rjes su sngon gyi smonalam tsho tshig sa'i
mngon du byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon nga rang byung gis bdag 'dod pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid don du gnyer ba na/ ga cha 'di lta bu bgos par gyur te/ sems can sdug bsngal bdag mthong
[e ]nas/ kye mkho bdag gis 'jig rtan gnas pa bcangs te 'khor ba'i btson ra chen por bcug ba la// 'khor ba'i btson ra dral te bcangs pa bkrol ba'i sgra sgrog go/ sred pa'i zhags pa dang/
sgrog dam pos bcings pa'i so mas can rnams kyang rab tu dgrol le zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon du gyur to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten ma rig pa'i mun pa mun
nag thibs po chen por zhugs pa ma shes pa'i lang tog dang// rab rib kyis mig bsgribs pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba/ ma rig pa dang/ gti mug gi rdzongs pa la chos kyi
snang ba chen po bya zhing ya shasakyi sgron ma mang nye bar bsgrubs la rnam ra ra thar pa'i sgo gsum shes pa'i mig sman la lu dad/ sman thabs dang/ shes rab dad ye shes dang ldan pa
btang sta/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang/ gti tshug gi mun pa dang/ rab rib dang/ lad tog dang/ rtog pa thams cad bsal nas shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang do zhes bya ba
sngon gyis smon lam gyis tsha ga nyis ba 'du mngon du gyur to// kyi mgo bdag gis 'jig rten da rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon bar
shes pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can 'du shes dang/ sems dang lta ba phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ gzung ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags pa'i
[s/ ]@#// lam bstan te/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal bar l bar bya zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshagagasum pa bad mngon du gyur to// kye ma 'o bdag gis 'jig rten/
[F ] rnam par ma zhib/ thags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur pa/ dru gu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur pa/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur ba/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang/ 'jig rten pha rol
nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug pa'i 'khorol 'khor ba las ma ldogapa/ mgal me'i 'khor la lta bur gyur pa la/ nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab kyis chog par byed pa'i chos kyang
bstan to zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi bo 'di mngon du gyur te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon du gyur to// skad cig de la lhabu chos spyod pa dad/ gnas
gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis btsun mo'i 'khor ma sdug par bsgyur tam sdug par gnas pa dang 2 snyad pa 'gazugs su bstan nas/ nam mkha' la 'khod de/ byang chub sems
dpa' latshigs su bcad de smras ba// de nas lha brdzu 'phrul tshe rnams kyis// pan+targyusal yangs la spyan la sbas/ dur khrod dbus 'dir zhugs par gyur lags
na/ khyod na ji ltar dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur// lha ma dbang phyug rnams de bskul nas// yud tsam btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing rtogo/ bltas nas smad pa gyur pa de dag mthong/ 'dur

khrod gnas par gyur pa bden snyam byed// byang chub sems dpas thams cad dang ldan pa ba bud med kyi tshogs rnam par bltas pa dang dpikani gos lhung ba rgyus/kha cig ni sku zhig/kha cig ni rgyan thul kha cig ni
cod pan myud/ kha cig ni brag pa sa sdug par gyur/ kha cig ni lus rnam par 'khrugs/ kha cig na bzhin ma lhag par gnas/ kha cage dmag gyur/ kha cig na kha chu zag/ kha cig na sdur/
kha cig ni lud pa lu/ kha cig ni rgod kha cig ni brdol/ kha cig na sa 'khrig kha cig ni bzhin mdog gyur/ khacag na gzugs ma sdug par gyur te/ lag pa dang por gyur/ kha cig
ni rkang pa phral/ kha cig ni mgo phyur kha cig na mgo g.yogs kha cig ni bzhan gyi dbyibs gyur/ kha cig ni lus ma rungs pa ragyur/ kha cig na lus spen mor gyur/ kha cig ni lus bsku

shing sbyar/ kha cig ni rdza rnal 'khyud nas lus gan rkyal du 'gyel// kha ci'i/ na pa wang dang/ rgyud gsum pa'i steng du lag pa brkyang/ kha tsag na gling bu la sos 'ded 5[？ ]kha cig ni rol mo'i cha byad
kim pa la dang/ na gu la dad/ khar ba'i sa la khrol dang/ phag la ba dzan/ kha cig na mag 'dzums shing 'byed la gyur/ kha cig ni la gdangs pa'i gyur te/ de ltar sa la ma lhag par gnas
par gyur pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi 'du shes bskyod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jig rten mgon des d mthong du byung ste/ sAng rjes shugs
'u// phyung nas ni 'di skad smras/ a ma skye dgu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur// srin mo 'tshogs la dga' ba ji ltar red// 'dod pa'i yon tan so dman man tan ba dzan/ gti mug
mun pas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan/ dper na bun bya rgyur chud pa bzhin/[0f10]nam yang 'byung ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin// 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg
ba chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu pa/ ga nas byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo 'dis/ yang btsun mo' 'khor la rtog cing/ sIng rje chen po'i skye bas/ sems can gyi phyi skye
sta/ 'di na byis pa de dag nagasod pa ste/ bsad pa'i gnas su bsad par bya ba gsod pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pade dag ni chags pa ste/ ngan skyags kyis gang ba'i snodar mo can rnams la

mi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so/'din byis pa de dag ni 'bud pa ste// glang po che chur 'bying ba dang mtshungs so// bdin byas pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ btson ra'i nang ga btsanabatsas pa dang mtshungs so/
'din byis pa de dag ni mngon par dga' ba ste// phag ma gtsang ba la dga' ba dang mtshungs so// 'don byas pa de dag ni chags pa ste// khyi kong rusal chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'don byis
pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste// phyi ma leb mar ma'i me lcar lhur ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byas pa de dag ni thogs pa ste/ spre'u rnod la thogs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni
[o]yongs su bzung ba ste/ nya rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni yongs su gtugs pa ste/ sha 'tshong gi gnas kyi 'a ga dad mtshungs so// 'din byas pa de dag ni btsug pa ste//

sdig pa byed pa gsal shang ba rtsi mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byas pa de dag ni 'byung zhing thogs pa ste/ glang po che rgan po 'dam du song ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byas pa de dag ni

phongs pa ste// rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag 'phatu lhung ba ste/ dmus long g.yang sa chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su
thad par 'gyur ba sta/ sa'i gting ga mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so// 'din byas pa de dag ni du ba 'thul bsta/ bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang mtshungs so/ 'din byas ba de dag ni
'khor ba ste/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag na 'brog 'tshol ba ste/ dmus long ri la phyin pa dang mtshungs so// bden byas pa de dag ni btags shang 'khor

ba ste/ khyi ltangags btags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa dedag ni ban+tis pa sta/ dpyid kyi rtswa dang nags tshal dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni yongs su nyams ba ste/ zla ba mar gyi

ngo'i zla ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la za ba ste// klu la nam mkha' lding dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'chab ba ste/ gru bo tsho la chu srin chen po dang mtshungs so//
'di dag ni byis pa rnams la'ajoms pa ste/ 'dren la chos po mang po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis ba rnams la 'jigs pa ste/ shing sAl la rlung dmar chen po dang
klo mtshungs so// 'di dag na byis ba rnams lagasod ba ste/ sbya ba po la sbrul mag gdug pa dang mtshungs so// byis pa rnams 'o chung ba'i 'du shes kyis tshonopa ste/ ral gri'i so sbrang rtsis bskus
khas chod pa bzhin no// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams khyer ba ste/ shing bag phud bal chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis ba rnams la rtsin pa ste/ byis bzhud du rang gi gcin rtag
la rtsa ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag na byis ba rnams kun tu sgyur ba ste/ glang bo tsho la lcags kyu dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la slu ba ste/ g.yon can gyis byis pa bar ng bzhin
can dag srid pa bzhin no// 'di dag ni byis pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed pa ste/ rgyan po la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshungs so// 'di dag gis byas pa rnams la 'chos bste/ srin mo rnams
kyis tshong pa 'chos pa dang mtshungs so// byang chub sems dpas rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dgags btsun mo 'khor la yongs su brtag pa byas nas/ lus la ma gtsang ba'i 'du shes
rnam par sgom/ ma mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar sgrub/ smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/ rang gi lus la yang de dang 'drab r sgom/ lus kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par mthong/ lus la lus su
[ns ]mngon par zhen pa las spyod/ sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ ma sdug pa'i 'du shes 'jug par byed/ bogo ga nang pa'i mthil nas/ steng gi klad pa man chad ma bgatsang ba las byung ba

dang [” ]mi gtsang ba las gyur pa dang/ rtag tu ma gtsang ba zag par mthong ngo/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang skyas sa// las kyi zhing las skyes shing sredabab chu las byung ba'i 'jig tshogs
mang du btags// mchi ma rdul dang mchil mas brlan la gcin gyis bsgyur cing khrag gathig pas gang// zhag dang rnage dar lhad pa dang ni klad rgyus dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang/ rtag tu ngan skyug
zag nyid kun kyang dri ma sna tshogs tha dad pa/ pags pa so dang sku dang sbu yis bsgyur cing pags pasagayogs la spu dang ldan// rgyu ma mchan pa mcher pa chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyam
chud ba/ nad dang chu rgyus dag gis sbrel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhingasha yas mdzes par byas// sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhad mya ngan khyab las bkres dang skom pas kun tu nyon// skye ba po
rag lus ni bu ga mang zhing 'chadang na baba gnas gyur pa// mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig red ga lus dgra dang mtshungs par sems ma 'gyur/ de ltar byang chub sams dang la lus la lus
su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to// nam mkha' dkyilana 'khod ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// gragos po don grub bden btsun mo'i 'khogal
rnam par lta zhing 'dzums yang ston/ sems na mi dgab mag ni phyi'i lta na phyi shol byed dam ca// gang 'di ni rgya mtsho'i zabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad gzung bar ma/
kyi nus so// yang na chags pa med pa bod yul rnams la yid chags par ni ma 'gyur grang// lha rnams kyis bskul bab la dam brjed par 'gyur grang// lha'i bu chos spyod gyis sbas pa
de skad smra ci dgas/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na par mngon par 'byung ba dang/ gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa med par gyur pa/ khyed la mngon sum du gyur ba lanan/ da srid
bab ma bar gnas pa chags par ma 'gyur ba lta smos kyadatsa regs/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dbab des par byas ba/ yid byung bar gyur pa/ blo brtul ba/ tshul du shes shing//
rangs thabs med par skyil mo krung bshig ste/ glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzas na/ shar phyogs su lta zhing 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yas bas rin po che'i drab smad d/ khang bzangasakyi
stang du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang/ des mthong ba nas
mkha'i dgyil na/ lha'i dbang po mgo stong dang ldan pa lhabargya stong gis bskor cing/ me tog dang/ sbos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gso dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan
0 dang/ ba dan dang/ me tog rna rgyan dang/ rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/ lus btud nas/ byang chub sems dang ba la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
yang gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang/ klu'i tshogs kyis bskor cing/ ga cha srab pagos/ ya lad bgos te/ ral gri dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ mdung thung dang/ mtshon rtsi
gnyis dang/ rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing tshul du shis par nor bu'i cod panadang/ gtsug phud 'phyang bar byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshagazhad 'dug pa mthad ngo// lha'i bu nyim
dang zla ba gnyis kyang/ glo g.yas g.yon na 'dug par mthong ngo// skar ma'i bdag po rgyal yang nam phyed na shar bar mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la smras pa/
nga yi bkra shas 'di ni don kun 'grub/ do nub gdon mi za bar don grub kyis/ 'dun pa phyi shel ma byed la gomadu/ to rgyal rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'dang la byin// de nas 'dun
pas tshig de thesanas/ yid ma dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so// smin ma ring zhing pad+ma'i 'dab rgyus 'dra'i spyan mdab ma yasong gi ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang// ma tog kuchu
dA dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba'i pad+ma'i rdzing bu gsar par 'jam pa'i pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal// sbyangs pa'i gsor dad nyi ma shar ma thag dang zla ba dri med gzi dang mar blugs ma ya bod 'phro
gnor buglog 'od 'a dar rab ba/za brjid can// glang po rgyags pa 'gying ba'i grung po ba stobs can ba lang khyu mchog ri dgas rgyal dang dad pa'i stobs can stabs mdzes
kyi shin tu zhabs legs gad du bzhud// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa gang gi don du nga yis sngon chad lag brkang pa mag dang de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhadi// chung
ma dang na phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor gser gas dpan chen gang ba'i shing rtaglang po rlung mgyogs shugs ldan rta pho rtsal mchog ldan pa btang// bskal pa bya ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul
khrims ngas bsrungs bzod pa yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang bsam gtan shes rab dag/ de lta modakyi byang chub zhi bshas pa thob nas rga sha'i rgya mor chud pa'i sems can nga yis/
yongs su dgrol ba'i dus la bab// 'dun pas smras pa/ jo bakhyod bltams ma thag tu blta ba'i phyir/ bram ze ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na/ de dag gis khyod rgyal bo zas gtsang ma'i
sbyan sngar/ lha khyod kyi rgyal bo'i pho brang 'phal bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan cas bdag gis thos so// smras pa/ ji lta bur 'gyur/ smras po/ gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams brgya
! mtshan ldan// khyod kyi bu btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can// de ni gling bzhi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur// nor bdun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyur// gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal bltas
nas ni// btsun mo' 'khorasbas mngon par byung gyur na// byang chub rga sha mad pa'i gnas thobaste// chos kyi chu yis skye dgu bad u0f7a cham byed// jo bo lung bstan pa 'di ni mchas te//
'di ma mchis pa nam lags mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang phan par 'tshalab bdag gi tshig gsan par gsol// smras pa tsizhig/ sbas pa/ lha tsag ga dag don du 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs dang
dka' thub rnam pa du ma rtsom ste/ ri dgas kyi lcags pa dang/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang/ rtswa dang/ shing shun gyon pa dang/ sen mo dang/ sgra dang ag tshom ring por 'jig pa dang/
lus lagadung ba dang/ yongs su gdung ba rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid de/ bdag cag ji ltar lta dad/ mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes brtul zhugs dang/ dkab shub drag/
bo rtsom mo// jo bo phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis b.rIs lags te/ rgyal srid 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing legs te/ nyams dga' zhing ma dang skye ba mang pos gang pa 'an dad bskyed
mo'i tshal dam pa mchog me tog dang/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gyis brgyan pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sgra skad 'ad du 'dab 'byin pa 'di dag dang/ rdzing me tog uta la dang/ pad+ma dang/
ku chudwa dang/ pad+ma dkar pos mdzes par gyur bangad ba dang/ rma bya dang/ khu byug dang/ dur pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ ngang skya sgra skad 'byin pa/ shang a ma dang/ mya ngan tshad dang/ tsam
pa ka dang/ ku ra ba ka dang/ ke sa ra la sogs pa shing me tog chags pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor ba/ rin po chab shing sna tshogs kyi 'phreng gis legs par nga rgyan pa/
me mig mangs ris su bkod ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyistags bus bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du yodas su sbyad pa// dag sun dang dbyar dang ston dang dpyad gnas par
bde ba rnams dang/ khang bzas chen po tshos dang/ chos bzang dad bde ba dang/ mya ngan bral ba la sogs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu ston ka'i sprin 'dra ba/ gangs te sa lta bu stegs
bu dang/ sgo khang dad/ rta babs dang/ skar khung dang/ bsal khong dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ khyams kyis legs par brgyan ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra 'byung ba 'di
dag dang/ patsun mob bo kher dang/ rol mo'i cha sprad rgyud cig pa nad/ pa wang dang/ khar rdzad ng/ glang bu dang/ khar ba'i sal khrel dang/ phag dang kam ba la dang/ nagu la dang
sgra snyan dang/ rdza rnga dang/ pa Ta hadang/ glu dang/ gar dang/ rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang/ glu dbyangs sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa dgad pa dang/ 'job dang/ rtso ba dang/ dga' ba dang
!/ tshul du shes pa dang/ spyod pa mdzes pa 'di dang nildan la/ lha khyod kyang dar ni ma yol te/ gzhon pa zer bu dar labab pa/ lus 'jam pa// lang 'tshol bab pa/ dbu skra gnag pa/
'dod pa la ma rol pa lags kyis/ sum cu rtsa gsum pab bdag pa mgi stong dang ldan pa// lha'i bdag po lta bur re shig dgyes bar rolal/ slad kyis bgres nas mngon par 'byung/
bar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe tshags su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// sum cu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbangaltar// dgyes pa'i chog mkhyen pa dgyes par l lo// sad kyis 'gres par
gyur nas brtul zhugs dang// dka' thub dag ni yang dag brtsams par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas lcas pa/ 'dun ba dgos te/ 'dod pa 'di dag ni ma rtag pa/ ma bton po/

zer zug ma yin pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can myur du 'gro ba g.yo ba ri gzar po'i chu'i shugs dang badra ba/thal ba'i thig pa ltar nang du mi gnas pa/yag ba bcangs pa stong pa btus pa ltar snying bo mdab/ chu shing g snyi
poltar mthu med pa/snod so ma btang bltar mthar 'jig pa/ ston ka'i sbyin ltar skad cig byung nas med par 'gyur ba [7 ]nam mkha'i glog ltar rang du ma gnas pa/ dug dang bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur
ba'i sdug bsngal can/ 'khri shang ma lu ta ltar mi bde ba 'byin ba/ byis pa'i blo can rnams kyas 'dod par bya ba/ chu'i chu bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can/ smig rgyu ltar 'du shes phyin ci
log lasabyung ba/ sgyu ma ltar sems phyin ci logags rnam par bsgrubs pa/ rmi lam ltar lta btsun pa 'gags longs su zin pa/ rgya mtsho dgad dka ba ltar rams ma shes bar byed pa
tsha chu ltar skom par byed pa// sbrul gyi mag ltar reg par byed ka' ba/ g.yang sa chen po ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su sbyangs ba/ shes rab can rnams kyis/
sko 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang/ rtsod pa dang bcas pa dad/ nyes pa dang bcas pa dang/ skyon dang bcas par shes nas/ rnam par sbyangs pa/ gi pa rnams kyis smad pa/ 'phags pa rnams
kyis bshungs pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma bsngags pa/ ma mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su bzudab/ byis pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin no// de'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di yang snus so/
mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul mgobazhin spangs// ngan skyugs snod bzhin ma gtsang rnam par sbyangs// 'dun pa dag bathams cad 'jig byed par// 'dod pa shes nas nga ni dga'
mi skye// de'i tsha'adun ba zug rngus zug ba bzhin du skad phyung ste du zhing de nas mag nas mchi ma zag la/ sdug bsngal zhad chag 'di skad ces smras so// lhacig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig
ri dgas lpags pa 'chang// sgra dang sen mo ag tsam ring dub jog cing de bzhin shing shun gyonal yan leg skams shing brtul zhugs gnas / srodapa
dar ni ldam lcamadag dang ma 'jus 'bras za kha cig sbyi'u tshugs 'dug dang ba lang brtul zhugs gnas// ji ltar bdag cag 'gro ba'i gtso bakhyad 'phags 'khor losgyurab mchog dang de bzhin/
'jig rten skyong ba dang// brgya byin rdo rje 'chang dang 'thab bral lha dbang 'phrul bar 'gyur snyam tshangs pa 'jig rten bsam gtan bdeb 'dod// mi ya dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'dinishin tu 'byor/
cing rab turgyas shin tu la legs ba// de bzhin kun dga' ra ba dag dang skyed mo'i tshal dang khang bzangs mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa mtshungs// bud med 'di dag rnams kyad pa wang dang ni
