gling du dag dang glu dang rol mo'i dbudas sgra len cing mchis// dga' bar bgyid dang gar dang glu dbudas sbyar ba shin tu bslabs pa 'di dag spyodatsang des la ma shazhud cig bya ba sogs bas lcam la//

'gal nyon cig 'do ba'i zhe sngogogyi tshor bas dga' 'dis de btsas dang kha rje ga da bsdegs sdug bsngal brgya dag pas ni bzod byas 'dus bya sna rnams la ra i du byung bya sa ma rgyas sngonod bag med dbangan patshig tilug dkrug la kha ba'i dra la sa dkris pa'i rgyur rna lodazhig kha la rgyung lta ba'ag tu du 'dzi'i nang

tshos ba las 'bangs dang po lo tig thams cad gayo zhing 'gyur la mi rtag sprin dang mtshungs shang glog dang 'dra ste zal pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gsogs gsob sId po med la bag yod ma yin stong par gyur ba ste/
nga yi yid ni yul la chags pa med kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan ng byin nga sngon bsams pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil gnon tshos kun dpang phug chos rgyal thub/
par 'gyur// 'dun pa sa skyas pa/ pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra bab mag ldan zhing// dashal nor bu rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// mkha' la skrun tshogs dag las byung ba'i
glog 'dra ba// mal na rnam par mdzes ba 'dalam gzigs sam// bar ldang dang brda dag dang sgrasnyan dang// rdo rje dag dang glang bu glu dbyangs len pa dang// bya khang
kyi rma bya kal ba sgra 'byin pa// mi'am ci'i khyim 'dra'adi yang der lags sam// su ma na dang ut+pa la dad bar sha ka/ tsam pa ka dang dri mchog 'phreng ba me togo brgyus// dusakyi a ga ru
mchog bdug pas rab bdugs dad// byug pa dam pa de dag la lad ma gzigs sam// shin tu dri bda' dri ldan ro bro gya nomo dang// skya num dag dang bshes gtsang shin tu legs sbyar dang//
skyams kyi ro yang ba ra bcas par rab sbyar ba// 'di la'ang ma gzags par ni lha khyod gang du bzhud// grang ba'i dus na byug pa bro ba dom pa dang// tsha ba'i dus nA tsan dan sbrul snying po/
dang/ ka shA pa ya na bza' bzang bo mang po dang// de dag la yang mgazigs lha khyod gang du bzhud// lha yul dag na lho rnams dag gi 'dra bar// 'dod pa'i yon tan lho po 'di dag
rab 'byor pa// dga' zhade bde dad ldan la dgyes par lomadzod de// de nas shAkya'i dam pa nags tshal bzhud par mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
'dun pa des ni bsal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dadad dang rig dang ma dang lha ya'adod ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyad kyang ngoms par gyur ba med// rgyal po'i
sras mchogagyur te dbang phyug byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi dag tu 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas don chen sna bdun ldan zhing bud med dag ga nang na 'dug ba dang// sum cu rtsa gsum
dbang dang 'thab bral rab kyilha dbang byas shing de dag nas ni shi 'phos 'di'i khongs stsal pa'i lha ya nang na yade 'do dbal ldan dam pa de las sngon chad spyad// lha la gnas su dbang sgyur
bdud kyi dbang po byas Shashing 'dod pa 'byor pa mchog tu spyad kyang ngoms ma gyur na da tsa naman pa 'di la bstan pas da ngoms 'gyur ram da nag nas man no// gzhan yang 'dun pa nga na sdug
bsngal mya ngan dgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyon mongs gtugs pas dkrugs shadi nyam des rtag tu khyir taman med skyabs med tsang// gti mug ma rig mun pa dag ning+ga dang na dang 'chi
bab 'a jigs pa dag gis rten la skye ba'i sdug bsngal dag yas kun tu gnon cing rnam par gnon pa'i 'gro ba 'dibaltas nas// ngas 'dir chos kyi gru bzang gtong dang tshul khrims brtul
zhugs bazod pa brtson 'grus stobs can dag gangashang tshogs gsogs te sbyar nasalhag pa'i bsam pa snying po ldan ba rdordzolta bu sagazugs btab sbyar// grudar nga nyid zhugs nas
bdag gis 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo'i dal bar che ba khro ba'i dba'arlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzin khri glanga'akhyil dag las rnam par dkrugs pargal bar dkalas
bsgral lo snyam sta ngasems de 'dra// de phyir srid mtsho dgur bcas lta bu'i 'dzin khri dang// nyon mongs sran po yod pa 'di las bdag rgyal te// bdag nyid
rgal bar gyur nas bgro bamatha' yas pa// rga med 'chi mdu zhi ba'i thad la dgod par bya// de'i tshe 'dun pa de bsakyang rab tung zhing 'di skad ces smras so// lhade ltar nges pa mdzad/
'a7 dam/ byang chub sems dpas smas pa/ 'dun pa da yas nges par byas pa nyon// sems can dgrol phyir phan par bya phyir brtson// ma g.yo las kyang ma gal gnod pa med//
ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtan mgayo// 'dun pas smas pa/ jo bo'i nges pa ci 'drab zhig lags/ byang chub sems dpas snus pa/ do rdzaganam lcags dgra sta mdung thung mdab char
dang/ lcagasabaskol glog ga tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang// ra rtsi kun tu 'bar ba mgo sad rab 'bab kyang// nga ni khyim la 'dod pa'i phyir yang ma skyed do// de'i tshe lha'i bu
nam mkha' la 'a bod pa dag gis rtsa rtsa dadag zha'i sgra brgya stong phyud ste/ me tog ga ra yAphab nas/ tshigasasubatsad pabade dag smras so// yul rnams la niya de kyang ma chags shing//
kyi sems can dag pa snying rje snyadi brtser ldan// blo gros mchog ldan rgyal gyur rgyal gyur cig/ mgon po 'gro la ma 'jigs sbyin mdzad pa// mkha' la rdul gnag du ba mjug rings dag pa
mi chags bzhin du skyes mchog khugs ma chags// dri med yul gyi bde bas ma ga sa te// chu las pad+ma dza ltar 'phags pa bzhin// dge slong dag de nas lha'i gu zhib/
blo gros dang/ lha'i bu tsa ba bkod bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa rig nas/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'iskyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khyabu dang/ bu mo thams cad g na
kyis le bar byas so// sgra thams cad kyang mgrags par byas so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer gyi skyab thams cad gnyid kyis 'dog par// namagyigu dal
bab par rig nas/ skar ma'i bdag borgyal dad ldan pa zhig/ da khon mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par rig nas/ bdun pa la smras pa// 'dun pa da skyopar me da par rta bsngags ldan legs
brgyan te/ ma thogs par nga la byin/ byang chub sems dar sa tshig de skad smras m thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal bo chen po bzhis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thos nas/ radadad
ga gnas nas byung sta/ byang chub sems dpa ba la mchod palas kyi phyir rad rang gi bkod pa sangs rings par ya nga ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por 'ongs so// de nas

driza'i bdag pa skyob bo zhim po yul 'khor srusanadri'abye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu sal snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshog salen tsang/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa gyur to//
'das nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ rje ltar 'ongs pa'i shar phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing

'dug go/ rgyal po chen po'aphags skyes po grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshog salag na 'byung ba nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ sbos chu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa thagos pa bye bakhrag

khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas 'das par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs ba'i lho phyogs nyid du gnas
nas byang chub sems dpal phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ rgyal po tshon bo mgi bzang ni klu mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'byung ba/ nor buran pa tshos tshogs thogs pa/ sosakyi phye ma dang/

me tog gi char gyi sngon kun nas slong btirung dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba byeb khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongos nas kyang ser skya'i
gnas kyi grong khyer chen pa la bskor ba byas taM/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po lus ngan na gnod sbyin
nor buran po tshe skar ma'i 'od zer thogs pa lag na mar ma thogs pa/ sgron ma 'bar ba lag na thogs pa/ mda' gzhudang/ ral gri dang/ mdung thung dang mtshon rtsa gnyis pa dang/
rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mtshon rtsa gcig pa dang/ 'phangs mdung la sogs pa/ mtshon cha sra bathogs/ go cha dang ya lad srab bgos pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma/
dag dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur to/ 'ongs nas kyang sar skyaba gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bsor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i bud phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems
dbab la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lang sum cu rtsagasum pa'i lha/ lha'i ma tog dang spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug bdad/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danadang/ me tog rna rgyan dang/ rgyan thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bdos bar gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyebachen bo la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar
'odos pa'i steng ga bar snang la 'khor dang bcas te/ byang chub sems dbab la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ dge slong dag de ltar bdun bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/
mig mchis mas gang zhid bya bcug sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// ngo bo khyed na dus mkhyen pa tsho mkhyen ba'amkhyen pa lags na/ daltar na bzhud pa'i dus dang tshodam lags na/ ci'i slad du/
bka'ade skad stsal/ byang chub sems dbas skyas pa/ 'dun pa da dus la bab po// smras ba/ jo bo gang dus la bab/ byang chub sems dpas bslus pa/ sems can rnams kyi dono
ni tshol ba na// byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob nas// 'gro ba dgrol zhes nga yas yun rang nyas// smon lam btab pa de ya'i dus la bab/ de la 'di ni chos nyid de//
del 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa blo pa dang bar snang de bzhin skyong// lha dbang brgya byin rang gi phyogs dang bcas// 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
lha rnams brtson par 'gyur// klu rgyal chu lha dang na gzi can dang// ma dris pa dang de bzhin rgya mtsho yang// mi mchog mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab pas// de dag rnams kyang machod phyir brtson
par 'gyur// gang dag gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang// rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab zhi sbyad// de dag rnams kyang 'jig rten gsum mchod pa// ma mchog de la mchod phyir
mngon par brtson// sngon sbyad spyod tshe grogs por gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bculhags pa yang// rgyal ba mngon par 'byung ba lta byed cing// rjes su mthun pas mchodapa
bya snyam byed// gsang ba'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po'o// rdo rdzo'abar thogs nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas// lus la go bgos stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan// gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'bar
ba thogs// lha'i bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis kyang// g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur// sor mo bcu ya thalamo sbyar byas te// mngon par 'byung la rjes su rtogs par byed// skar ma
rgyal de 'khor dang bcas pa yang// rangag lus na rgya chen sprul byas te// ma mdam ba de yi mdun 'dug nas/pad du 'ong ba'i sgra nirab 'byin te// skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa dus la bab//
donub khyod dge bkra shis thams cad grub// bdag kyang khyod dang thabs g mchi bar bgyi// 'dod chags sol ba bar chad 'byung mgyur// lha bu yad dag skul pos bskul byas pa// stobs
dang brtson 'grus la phags pa spyad du bzhengs// sdug bsngal nyan pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol// da ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus 'dab// lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang//
yid 'ong me tog chag pa bdebs shing lhags// de na skyil mo krung bcas mchog la 'dug/ lha yis bskor 'di mdzes la gzi brjid 'bar// gred khyer na na skyes pa bud med khye'u dang bu mo
gang yodapa// de dag thams cad yid ngal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams// rta dang glang bo ba lang na tso khrung khrung rma bya ri skyegs rnams// de ga kun kyang yid ngal gyur pa nyal te/
redapa gzugs ma mthong// shAkya'i bu gang do rdzogs sra ba mtshon na rtsiganyis sogs bkodadang// glang chen rta dad shing rta rta babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal// rgyal bo rgyal bu rgyal po'i
bokun kyang gnyid log par gyur// bud med tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral bcer bur gyur kyang yong ma tshod/ de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du bod tshogi kal ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis/
nam phyed 'das tanamagyigung la bab nas 'dun pa de la skyas// 'dun pa rta po bsngags ldan bzang ba legs par nga la byin// gal te da labyams par sems na
zla bgegs ma byed par myur dubyin// 'dun pas tshig thos mches mas mig gangarang gi jo bo ri la skyas// sems can khal sgyur mchog gar bzhud bsubs pas khyod la bzhag bgyi// dus
mkhyen cing na tshod mkhyen chos spyodagad du 'od gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ khyod kyi sgo bkum gtan pa dam stsal su yang chab sgo 'byed mi 'gyur// brgya byin gyin yid kyi sems pa'i
bdag sa sgo lad 'bye bgyur// 'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor// kyi dud bdag grogs su yodang ltar bya zhing phyogs ni gar bag snyam//
gzi brjid ldan bas drag shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin baba' shag thos// yan lag bzhaldan dapung bcas pa 'di ni ci zhig byed// rgyal bo rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye ba de dag rnams kyis de ma
tshor bud med tshogs kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis na grags ldan ganyid logabyas// kyi hud 'di las sngon chad bsams pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig/ lha stod byeb de dag dga'
ba'i yid kyis 'dun pa de la sgras// bdun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dun pa skyo mi bye// lha dang lha man dag gas rnga dung rdza rdo rol mo khrag khrig byas// 'on kyang
g+has bsnyal ba la grong khyer mchog de sad par yongamagyur// dun babad snyad dri ma med pa lha ya'od rab mdzes la ltos// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang/
lhags ltos// bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin dpud bskor sgon mdzes par 'dug ba dang// lha dang lha minam bam tsa tshogs gang dag mchod phyir lhags la ltos// 'dun ba des kyad lha
tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta po de la sgras// sems can kha la sbyar mchog 'dibazhud khyod ni rta skad sgrogs shing shog/ de yis dbyar gyi kha dog can de rmig ba gsar gyis brgyan byas nas/
yid mi dga' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i tshigs par dbul ba byas// mtshan mchog mang ba zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi bas 'di rigs bzang dga' lags// khyod kyis sngon chad gang
dgos smon lam de grubagyur cing gshegs sugasol// gang dag bgegs bgyid zhi bar gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grubagyur cig/ 'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho riso ba dang
zhi ba sbyin gyur cig/ de na gang tshe mal nas langs tshe sa 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos// rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de la zhon// skyong ba'i lag pa rnam dag
bad+ma dri med 'dra bas rta mchog btog/ brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de yi mdunan laman bdi zhes ston// de yis gsal badri ma med pa'i 'od btangs sa rnams snang bas gsal
dganyu@#// de tshe ngan song kun zhes ms can bde ldan nyon mongasaganodapa med// me tog char babasal snyan bye bkra byung lha dang lha min bstod// thams cad dag dang/
ldan nas grong khyer mchog la bskor ba byas te dang// skyes bu chen pos ngo bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha lang yang na riman par gyur nas 'os// mdun du 'dug nasasnying rjer du ba'i da
ldan de yis pad+ma 'dra ba'i bzhin la sgras// khyed bral sgron mer ma mdzes sa ba rigrong khyer thams cad mun pas kun tu rakrugs par gyur// do nub khyod kyis khrab 'di spangs nas bdag la
dga' bde bgyid pa 'din 'ga' ma mchis// slan chad bya tshogs rnams kyi sgra dag dang// grags pa mtha' las khyed nasad bgyud pa'i// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gling bu snyan pa dang//
bkra shis sgra dang glu sgra thos ma 'gyur/ nyon mongs bcom pa khyadanagshegs gyur na// gdugs mtshan khyod la mchodapabgyid pa la// lhadadagrub tshogs slan chad mthong mi 'gyur//
lha yi dri lad slan chad snum ma gyur// 'phrad babatags nas zhag lanagyur ba ltar// khyod kyis de nub bo brang de bzhin sbyangs// khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis// gar
! la lta ba bzhin du bag la lta// grong khyer kun gyi byin dang stobs phrogs te// 'di ni dgon pa 'dra zhing mdzes ma 'gas// gangags sa bde'i 'khor lostobs can du// lung bstan drang srong
tshig ni deng brdzunagyur// bsod nams stong patshon bo khyed byang na// sa 'di shAkya'i stobasan stobs ma mchis// rgyal bo ba pho brad 'khor 'dir gdung sad 'chad// shAkya'i tshogs 'di/
bsam pa rab tu nyams// drimad dri bral khyod nagar gzhud pa// bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi// 'on kyang thugs brtso khugs rje bskyar nas ni// khyod gyis pho brang 'di la gzigs
su gsol// blo gros ldan pa khyim la bltas nas ni// snyan pa'ing sa 'di skad tshig skyas te// skye 'chi mthar phyin ma thob bar dun// nga yis ser skya'igrong khyer 'jug ma bya// rga shi
med pa'i gnas mchog 'chi mi da// byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par// nga naser skya'i gnas su mngon phyogs te// 'greng 'dug nyal drang 'chag pa mabya'o// gang tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo/
ba byang chub sems dpa' de byung zhing// denamakha' la 'gro ba'i// lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod// 'dini sbyin pa'i gnas chen yin// 'di ni bsod nams zhing chen lan// 'di'i
bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing// 'chi med 'bras bu smin mdzad pa// sems can rnams la thugs bas// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// spyan dang dul dang sngom pa yas// 'disani
byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// 'di yi tshul khrims yongs su dag/ brtul zhugs bzang zhing spyod ma nyams// 'dod pa dag dang longs spyod rnams// don du ma gnyar tshul khrims srung//
sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir// 'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsungos// yan lag nying lagabacad gyur kyang// khro ba ma mngab snang ma mnga'// 'di na rtag tu
kyi brtson 'grus ldan// bskal pa bye bar skyomamopa'// 'di yis byang chub yan lagabasgrubs// mchodasbyin dgan byi ba mdzad// 'di rtag bsam gtan bsam gtan ba// thugs nizhi zhing
rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni// sems can bya ba 'grol bar 'gyur// bdi ni shes rab chagasam mnga'// rtogo dang rnam par rtog ldan las// grol 'di thugs
ni rnamagrol te// rang byung ba la rgyal bar 'gyur// bad ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan// thugs rje yi ni pha rol khyen// dga' dang btang snyoms bsam gtan pa// tshangs pa lam gyi cho
ga mkhyen// 'dinishin tu lha yi lha// lha rnams kyis nimachod pa'i 'os// thugs dag dag cing dri ma bral// yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byon// 'jigs pasaganyan pa rnams kyi skyabs//
mig meda rnams kyi sgron ma sta// gnod pa rnams kyi skyabasakyang lags// 'dis nas na ba'i sman pa lags// rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal// dbang po lta bur sbyan stong mngagu/ tshangs
ba lta bur rang byung gyur// lus dang sems ni ba sbyangs pa// brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang// dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod chags bral// nyon mongs 'joms pas dpa' bsko// margyal/
gra las rgyal ba lags// sangag lta bur bsnyengs pa spangs// glang po lta bur rab dul zhugs// khyu mchog lta bur tshog sakyis gtso// bzod de 'khrugs pa rab tuslangs// zla ba lta bur/
rab tugasal// nyi ma lta bur snang ba mdzad// sgron ma lta bur gsal mdzad pa// skar ma lta bur mun po bral// bar lta bur chags ma mang ba// me tog lta bur khrims dri gdab// ston ba lhun
po ltar mi g.yo// dog sa lta bur bsos su gyur// na chen 'byung gnas ltar m 'khrugs// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'din 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha yi bdud kyang
bcomo// 'di ni ded dpon chen po ste// lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la// yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog/ ring por ma thogs ston par 'gyur// rga shi nyon mongs 'joms pa po// mun
ba rab ripi rnam par grol// sa dang lha yulagrags pa yi// rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags// skyasabu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba// dpag tu med la bstod pas bstod// khyod la bstod
ba'i bsod nams das// smra ba'ising ga batrab r shog/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dang ba mngon par byung nas// shAkya'i yul dang/ ko'u ta'i yul dang/ gyad yulalas 'das
ta/ ma na ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas/ dpagatshadadrug tu byang chub sems dpa' phyin pa dang/ nam nangs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
rta bsngags ldan las babs te// sal 'dug nas/ lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma'am ci dang
lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs chen po sar bkye'o// slar bkye nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyan 'di dag dang/ rta bsngags ldan yang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de/ slar btangangosnyam mo//
de nas byang chub sems dpas bdun pa la bas te/ 'di skad ces snyasaso// 'dun pa khyod songalargyan 'di dag dang 2 rta bsngags ldan khyer to slar leg cag/ sa phyogs gang nas 'dun pa
slar log pa der mchod rten brtsigs te// ding sang du yang mchod rten de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/
ji ltar na gtsug phud kyang yodol rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yod 'gyur snyam nas/ des ra la gyis gtsugs pud bcad de bar snang la der ba dang/ de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i
phyir blangs te/ ding sang du yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gatsug phud kyi dus ston byed do// der mchod rtan yang byas te/ dingasang du yang mchod rten de gtsug phudablangs pa'i mchod na
zhes ming du chagasaso// yang byang chub sems dbab 'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung nas lad gas ka sha pa gyon pa ji ltar rung gagal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas/ tshul dang mthun pa'i gos shig
medan na legs so snyam du sems pa dang/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig bgos par gyur to snyam mo// de na lha'abu gcig
lha'i gzugs ma mngon par byas te/ rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu s gos dur smig bgos nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad cesasnus
sa do/ gal te grogs po khyed kyis gos dur smigs de rnams kho bo la byin n kho bo'agis kasha pa 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no// des smras pa/ gos 'di dag kyang khyod la mdzes la/ 'o no rnamA
kyang kho bo la mdzes so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bos khyod la bslang ngo// de nas lha'abu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smig rnams byang chub sems dpa' la phyin te/ gos
kag pa rnams kyang blangs so// de nas lha'i bu des gus pa bskyod de/ lag pa gnyis kasagos de dag blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/ de dag la mchod pa dang/ bkur bas bya ba'i phyir/ de nyid
nas lha'i 'jig rtan du song ngo// de yang bdun pas mthong bar gyur nas der mchod rten du brtsigs te/ ding sad du lad mchod rten dur sgrig blangs pa zhes ming du chags so// gang gi tsho byang
chub sems dpas gtsug bud bcad nas/ gas ngur smig rnams bgos pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgyastong dag dga' zhing mgu la chem zhing yi rangs te/ mchog turab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang/
yid bde bskyes te/ kye grogs po dgag gnyenanu don grub rab tu byung ngo// kye grog po dgagan nu don grub rab tu byung ngo// de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te soms can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skya ba las yongs su bgrol bar 'gyur ba nas/ rgo bo dang/
'chi ba dad/ na bdang/ mdan dang/ skye sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mabadab dad/ 'khrug pa dag ga las soms can rnams yongs su bkral te/ 'khor ba'
mtsho'i pha rol tu sgral nas/ bde ba 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan mad nga/ gnodapa med pa/ zhi ba rdul dang bralab 'chi ba med pa'i chos kyis dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro// zhes pa nas/
a la la zhes bya ba dang catso dang ga zha'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to// sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas/ beg man gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur to// de nas btsun mo'i khog
rnams kyisa gzhon nu ma mthong nas/ dpyad dang dgun dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang bzangs rnams dad/ khri rnams dad/ khyim rnams su tshol zhing gang gi tsha/ ma red nga po'i tsha/ gcig du'adus

! nas bya ku ra ra mo bzhin du sa mo mthon par gyur to// den bud med kha cig na shin tu mya ngan gyis nyam tha gnas /kha ciganyis ri ra bu zhes 'dzaming ngu'o// kha cig ni kyi gyid mang bo zhes 'dzer ring ngu'o// kha cig ni kyi hud khyim thabacas ]
'dzir to// kha cig ni rdzogazhis 'dzin to// kha cig ni sdug pa ba tshig sna tshogs snya'o// kha cig ni lus deb nyid du'o// kha cig nim go 'bal la go/ kha yig gcig gi gdod dgacig/
lta zhing du'o// kha cig na gcig bsgyur cing ngu'o//kha cig ni lag pa bar la rdzob cing du// kha cig nibrang brdung zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa dpung par rdzob cing du'o// kha cig ni mgo rdung
zhir du'o// kha cig ni mgo la sa 'thor zhing du'o// kha cig ni skabajig cad du'o// kha cig ni sku 'bal zhid du'o// kha cig ni lag pa bstod de bsgrung nas tshe de 'don taM 2 kha cig ni lo dgu
mo dug mdas thog tu glo bur rgyug cing du'o// kha cig ni gdongogs kyis g.yogs shad du'o// kha cig ni chu shadarlud dmar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'khyer zhing du'o// kha cig nas la

'gyel te nag tsam du gyur to// kha cig ni nya chunas bten ba bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog car du bko/ kha cig ni shing rtsa nas btonob bzhin glo bur du sa la 'gyel nas du'o//sgrade yang rgyal posawe gnas shAkya rnams la las pa

ci'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khoran sgra chen po 'di gragA/ shAkya rnams kyis she nas ni+nAms rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na ma gdab zhes gda'o// rgyal pos smras pa// myur du grong khyer gyi sgo rnams chodal nad/
du gzhon nu tshol cig/ de dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma red nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gabu tam skye sngags 'don tis la 'grog cing/ rgyal po zasagatsang ma la 'di skad/
ku@#// ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag budang myur du spyad du gsol// de nas rgyal pos phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye sto/ khyeng dang la gzhon nu/
blo ma red kyi bar du slar ma ldog shig/ mtshan mkhan dang/ ltas mkhaMn rnams kyis kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi chab skyonas mngon par 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas do
dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang/ lam gyi bar zhig na me tog gi char bab par mthong ngo// de nas de dag 'di snyam dusams te/ gzhon nu ni lam 'di dag nas byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag cung
zad cig la zad du song ba dang/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gsaka shi ba rnams mgo la thogs te/ 'gro ba de mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sams te/ 'di dag ni gzhon nu'i gos
ka sha ba rnams yin na/ gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bdamagyur tam snyam mo// de nas yang de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan
dang rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo// de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/ kye 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan khrid du 'ong gis de la ma dris kyi bar du tur 'dums ma byed ciganyis smras nas
de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/ kye bdun pa gos ka ga pa 'di dag kha sa phyir ma 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par mgyur grang/ 'dun pas smras pa/ de lta ni ma yin te/ 'dis kyang gzhon nu la
gos ngur smig rnams phul lo// gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka shi ba'i rnams la byon no// de nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir/ gos de rnams lag pa gnyis kas spyi bo la thogs te//
da ter nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo// de dag gis 'dun pa la yang dris pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog tu 'dongananus sam/ des smras pa/ ma nus so//

gzhonanus ni brtson 'grus dang brtul babartan pa yin te/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nga ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por
mi 'jug go zhes de skadagasung bas phyir mi ldog ste/ gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pas sa'am lcog
ga/ de nas 'dunapa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams khyer te/ btsun mo'i 'khor gnad du phyin to// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang/ rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang pa dang/ mang

chen dang/ ma bag/ba/sa pas btegs pa dang/ sred med kyi bu chen po ltar mkhregs pa dang/ sred med kyi bu phyed ltar mkhregs ba'i rgya nad rnams de dag gis ma thegag/ gang gi tshe de dag gis kyang theg par

ma nus pa de'i tsha/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go ta ma 'dasnyam du sems te/bdag gis ji srid du rgyun 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gi sAng la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzong du
dor ro snyam mo// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mas rgyan de dag da du dor tu ding sa dadu rgyanagyi rdzing bu zhes ming du chags so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang
byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa ba ba byung// de yis ser skya'i grong khyer pa dag mthab dag sad// kun gyi snying lama gzhon nu mal na nyal snyam sems// mgu zhang rab tu dga' nas ban tshun tshig
kyad sgra// sa 'tshom dang de bzhin btsunamo'i 'khor rnams sad// mal dubaltas nas byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas// kyi hud bdag bsus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces//
rgyal po'i khyim du su mo'i sgra ladabyung bar gyur// rgyal bos sgra de thos nas sa la 'gyel gyur te// e ma da ya bu gcig pa zhes dus ma byung// de nas de 'a bum pa'i chu blugs khrus byas nas/
gAkya mang po dag gis de ni dbug khyad phyung// sa 'tsho ma yang m la nas sa la lhung bar gyur// sgra rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur// sdug pa kun dang bral bar ng ngar mthogs
shes 'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kyi malegs par gsungs// gzugs mig zugs 'thad shan tu dri med yan lag smras// gsal zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi yid bod lcag//
dbal yon ldan pas bsngags pa lta mas mchod pa'i 'os// bdag ni mal du bor te khyod nagi/da du bzhud// yon tan mnga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma mnying bar// skoms yang mo
'tsha la rgyags ba rnams kyis rgyags ma bgyid// sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang thog gas par bgyi// khrus bgyi sbangs te brtul zhugs dkab thub spyad par bgyi// bskyed mo'i tshal kun
lam me tog babras ma mchis// rnam dag sa mo de yang mun rdul phyag dar 'dra// ma mchog dam pa khyed kyis sbas par gang gyur pa'i// grong khyer khyim rnams mdzes pa ma lags 'abrego dang/
mtshungs// kyi ngagyudabyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skadacan// kyi dur lhug lhug po yargyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor// khyedud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa ba bar snang yang// yon tan ldan dang bral
bas phyin chad 'di ltago/ su mo de yang shin tu sdug bsngal thob gyur cing// gakya ba bu mo mdung shig ces dbugs kyang 'byin// nga ni 'jig rten dag na zla sha tharabyed s// ma mchog dam pa des
ni sngon lad skyas pa yin// drang srong chen po dge ba stododag sbyar ba de// nam phyedanas ni dpag tshad drug tu sod gyur nas// 'dun pa de la rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams gtad// 'dun pa 'di dag
khyer la ser skya grong song shag/ yab dang yum dag la yadad pa tshig gas na// gzhon nu song gis slar zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ byang chub sangs rgyas nas na slar 'dir mche bar bgyi//
chos rnams gsan nas thugasakyang zhi bar 'gyur zhes smos// 'dun pas de bzhin 'dren [”]nis sbas pa// 'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dba' gar khrid ces// sa mchogagazhan
@#/ gyi tshogs rnams bdag la brtag 'gyur gyis// bdag la nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis// byang chub sems dpas slar skyas 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig
nga yi gnyen gyi tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur nas ni// khyod la ston pa'i bdu shes rtag tu sgom 'gyur te// nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur// 'dun pas rta mchog dang
ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su// ma mchog dam pa de ya skyed mo'i tshal du phyin// skyed mo'i tshal gyi srudas ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas// kun tu dga' ba'i sgranishAkya rnams la skyas//
gzhon nu 'di yin rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang// skyed mo'i tshal du phyin gyis thugs don ma mdzad cig/ rgyal pos de skad thos nas shAkyas bskor nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes
skyed mo'i tshal du phyin// sa 'chos byang chub sems dpa' blo grosabartan rag nas// tshig de la nA yid ma ches dgar mgyur// gzhon nu byang chub ma thob bar du phyir 'dir yang/ 'byon tsade
ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin// rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni bdun pa de mthong nas// dusamos btab sta sa ya steng du 'gyel bar gyur// kyi hud nga'i bu glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra mkhas
rgyal srid thams cad bor ta khyod ni gang du song// 'dun pa khyod kyis nga la legs par smyos// byang chub sems dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/ son su yis phye zhing gdags khrid par
gyur lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji ltar byas// 'dun pas smras pa rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la gson// dgung phyed grong khyer gyis rgan poganyid log nas// byang chub sems
rab 'a 'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skadadu// 'dun pa targyal nga la myur du byin zhes gsung// bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud mad tshogs kyang bsrung// de dgalog cing rab tu log pas
tshig ma thos// bdag ni duzhing bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul// phan par mdzad pa gang du dgyes pagshegs bgyis// brgya byin gyis ni 'khrul ba khod ldan pa'i chapa sgo phyi// 'jig rten
skyong ba bzhes ni bas kyi rkang lag bteg/ dpa' khacibs nas stod gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos// nam mkha' shin tu yangs pa 'di las gshegs gyur te// 'danorab tu btang bas
mun pa mun nag gsal// ma tog khabatsang sel snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung// lha dang de bzhin lha yabu mo rnams kyis bstod// nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs rnams kyis bskor tagshegs/

'dun pa rta mchog dang nirgyan rnams khyer nasasu/ don du zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang// sa 'tshos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas// rab tu brgyal bar gyur tes yi steng du 'gyel//
bud med tshogs mad thams cad rab tu brtson par na/ chu dag blangs shing hAkya'i bu mo 'khru bar byed// mya nganared pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur du'ang// phangs pa gnyis dang bral bar gyur
gdu 'ong snyam byed// shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyod nas// rta la rgyal po rta mchog de yi mgulanas 'jus// sngon chad dgab bas rtse ba dag kyang dran/
byas nas// mya nganagyur cingasnatshog satshig kyang rab tu/ kyi hud bdagagi dga' skyed kyi hud bdag ga ma mchog dri med zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba// kyid bdag gagazugasacan kyi rgyud
bdag gi mtshan mchog rnga medagazabarjid ldan// kyi hud bdagag yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrungs pa ramagyis 'phags pa mnyam medang/ dkyihud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lhames
mchod pa thugs rje chen por mchog ldan pa// kye hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgu yi tshogs bcom pa// kyatud bdag gshin tu 'jam dbyangs ka la bad+hi sgra
skad tshadas dbyangs snyan ldan pa/ dkyihud bdag ga grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po// kyi hudab dag kha bsngags ba mthalas lon tane
tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa// kyi hud bdag gi nags mchog bud ba sgrubyin lum ba ni der bltam pa 'gas bltams pa// kyihud bdag gi sgra grags lha ma rnams kyi
mngon par machod pa'i ye shes sdong bo che// kyi hud bdag ga'i bre dam ba bam pa'i sgros can pad+ma'i spyan mnga' gsor mchog 'dra// kyahud bdagag shin tu rnam dag tshems ldan zhi ba mo lta bu'i
tshoms ldan pa// kyi hud bdagagi shangs legs smin legs sman mtshams bar nadramadamadzod sa gnas pa po// kyi hud bdag gdabudagagarab zlum gzhu badra'i skad pazlum// kyi chud/
bdag gi glang po'i snabadra brlaldan phyag zhabs rnam ga mdzes pa'i son mo can// de yi rgyuna rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po'i rab tu dga' byed pa/ kyi hud bdag
gis glu dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzang po'i dus bzang ba// kyi hud ba dgag me tog sbas rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed po// kye hud bsngags ldan legs

skyes bas khyim thab grogs po yin na khyed kyis gang du khrid// kyi hud 'dun pa snying rje med pa ma yi dam ba bzhud tsha sngon cing slong ma yod// do nub grong khyer dam pa 'di nas ma ya nga 'a sgyur bcug
rje ldan gshegs te// phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs shes skabs der tshig cig tsam zhig ni lo phyir ma sbas/ phan ba mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shang rgyal po'i pho brab 'anas su yis
phyung ba byas// gang gi phyogs gshegs nags tshal de la kha'i lha mo de yi grogs su 'gyur pa dbal yonalen// 'dun pa kho mo shan tu sdug bsngal gter bstan nas ni mag phyung 'dra bas
mig byon cig/ 'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyi pha dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os shes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na// de dag rnams kyang sngangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos//
kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin badra ste rtags yin// byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung lta ba phyin na leg pas skye dang 'chi ba gnas par gyur/
bode yis sngon chad rgya ga ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bstan// khyed kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs nas shing nag drung du byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur//
rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir na slar yang gshegs su gsol// 'dun pa de yang mchog tu yid m dga' zhing sa 'tsho ma ya tshags posagyur nas// da ni nga ro/
mthon cong tshig tu smras pa sa 'tsho ma khyod bdag tshegalegs par gson// nam gyi gung thun bud mang tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid kyis log stedaben gyur pa// de la tshe na bsod nams
brgyas 'thags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhes gsung// de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod na gzims malagazims la bltas/ de tshe khyod gyi sdug pa'i di//
gshegs kyis 'tsho bzhengs zhes sgra skad chen po byung// lha yis tshag de bkag par gyur bar bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyad sa dA ma gyur// bdag ni rab tu du zhing rta yi rgyal po brgyan ba
bgyis nas mi mchogadol phul// bsngags ldan drag shul can gyi gzaldan sgra phyung des sgra rgyang grags tsamadugrags// 'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis legs par bgyis pas grong khyerapa
pa las 'ga' yongasad mgyur// gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyisagayogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rag tu brdabs// de las snyan dang ba 'jigs dang ma dzis pa'i sa byad
'on kyang mi 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur// dal bar skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla ba skar ma dag khyad mkha' la gnas// mkha' las lha rnams bye bas b.lamo sbyar te btudanas phyag khyong
rab tu 'tshal// gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams lta bar gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu'aphrul che ldan bzhis// pad+ma'i ze ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lags pas bsngags ldan gyi ni
rkang lag bteg/ kha sad nams gzi brjid brgyus 'bag sa de la nga ku mu da dang khar sha lta bu de lo bcibs// sa ba de rnam pa lugs gsos shang sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khya ba
bad sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha yi gtso bo nyid kyis de tsho 'chab sgo dbye ba bgyis// don bye ba khrag khrig lha las mdun du bdar te lha dang klu ya mchod nas gA/ bsngags lam gyis ni 'du
shis tsam gyis des pa 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes// lha dang lha ma yan tshogs dbang par bcas pa de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa ga rtogs// lha yi bu
mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing// de dag bsngags ldan la yang stobs btang bod la sAn la yid du 'ong ba'i skra yang 'byin/ kas/ 'a[E' ]mAn
bya// 'dren pa myur ba myur bar khyer la skye bar ma reg ma skyed ci'o// 'jig rten mgon po mnyes pa byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song ngan 'gro nad par 'gyur// lha rnam
nga yid bdag la 'jig rten mgon po bcibs par mngon du dga' bar gyur// yul sa 'di na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gi non par ma gyur cud zad med// bsngags ldan nam mkha'i skabs na sna
tshogs spras shing mas pa 'a lam gnas nani chen stegs bu na// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyanatsade lha ya 'dug pa snying po mchog bdugs 'di la ltos// bsngags ldan dge ba'i
las 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas shan tu legs par sprul pa der// lha yi bu mos bskor cing mdun gyis bltasal lha ya'i dad pa'i dga' bas dag/'a bar gyis// legs pas
mtsho ma khyod phyir share mabashums dgyes par mdzad cing mchog tu dgyis par mdzod// ma mchog byang chub brnyes nas lha yas mdun du bdar ba ring por ma thogs gza/sa pad gyur// sa mtsho
mi rnams gang dag legs pa 'i las bgyis de dag rtag tu bshums par bgyi ma lags// de ni bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyis dgyes par mdzod la shums mo ma
mdzad cig/ rgyal po mngon par byung ba de na lha dang ma yi mchod pa'i bkod ba gang lags pa// bkod pa de nas mtsho bdagags dbu nga bdun bar du bsdod kyang rdzogs par brjod ma nus// khyod
kyis 'grel phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas b.res mchog bsam gyis ma khyab brnyes// bdagags bsams na khyod kyang m yu dam pa de ni ci 'dra A bgyur snyams bgyid// mngon
par 'byung ba'ile'u ste bco lnga pa'o/// 'phags pargya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po bcu gcig pa/ dge slong
dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis// 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang/ shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang/ shAkya'i tshogs thams
cad kyi mya ngan bsang ba'i gtam smras so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la pa/saka sha pa rnams byin nas// de la gos dur smig rnams blangs
te/ 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba dang/ sems can la snying brtse ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid ra btu byung ngo// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' bram ze'i rigs ldan gyi gnas ga la ba der song ba dang/ des byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang/ zas la mgronadu bas so// de nas byang chub sems dapa' bram ze pad+ma'i
gnas su sodab dang/ des kyadabyang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya bdad zasal mgron du bas so// de nas bram ze drang srong nam gru'i gnas asu song ba dang/ des kyang de bzhin du
byang chub sems dbang mgron du bosaso// de bzhin du gdul ba'i be con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos te/ dge slong dag daltar/

byang chub sems dpa' ram gyi grong khyerachen po yangs pa can du phyin to// de'i tshe sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang/ slob ma sum brgya dang lhan cig tu grong khyer/
'tsha yangs pa can du gnas bcas shang gnas te/ de slob ma dag la ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ring po nas bong ba
mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te slob ma rnams la sbas pa/ skye 'di'i gzugs la ltos shig 'di dag gis sbas pa/ de bzhin du de la blta par bgyi ste/ bad na ya 'tshan che'o// dge
slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces smras so// kyi skya rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur khyod las bdag gis
tshangs par spyad pa sbyod do// des sas pa/ kyego'u ta ma dad pa'i rigs kyi bu gang la da na/ tshogs chung ngus la kun shas pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan ba/ de lta bu la spyod
cig/ dge slong dag ngas 'disAmadu bsam ste/ nga la mos pa yang yod/ nga la brtson 'grus kyang yod/ dran pa yang yod 2 tang nga 'dzani kyang yod/ shes rab kyang yod kyis chos de nyidi
[4s/ ]thob par bya ba dang/ mngon du bya ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu bag yod pa dad/ brtan pa dang/ dben par gnas bya'osnyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas nga gcig pu bag yod pa dang/ brtan pa dang/
dben par gnas nas// tshogs chung dus chos de khong du chud cing mngon du gyur te// ge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu dang 'phur ga la bder song ste// 'di skad ces smras so//
kya'ad 'phur byed kyus chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon du gyur tam/ des smras pa/ kyi ga'u tu ma[Y]de de bzhin na// ngas smras pa/ kyi kho bos kyang chos de mngon du byas shing
khong du chud do// des snyas la/ kyaga'u ta ma de bas na chos gang khebs shes pad byed kyis shes la/ gang khyod kyis shes pa de yang kho bos shes te// de bas na bdag cag gnyis kas
slob ma'i tshogs 'dilapostan to// dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal rags kyi bu ring 'phur gyis nga la mchod pa dam pas mchod de/ da slobam rnams la yang don mthun par byed du bcug go/ dge
slong dag ngas 'asnyam du bsams te/ ring 'phur gyi chos 'di na nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bdag gis de las
lhag pa zhig btsal zhing sbyad do snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas nga ji srid dga' ba'i bar du grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas nas/ yul mag d+har yu la rgyu zhing/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i khab
kyi grong khyer chen po thag la ba der song ste brgyal po skya ba ga la ba der song nas// rab rgyal po skya bo rab ngos la da gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par lha bu pa khrag khug
po brgya stong phrag du mas bsrungs shang gnas so// de nas nad par sham thabs dang chos gos bags lhung bzed thogs te[7. ]chu dron can gyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer chen po 'gro ba dang/
ldog pa dang mdun du blta ba dang/ g.yas g.yon du blta ba dang 2 bskum pa dang 2 brkyang pa mdzes pa dang/ snam sbyar dang/ thang bdad 2 lhang bzed dang/ chos gos badzin pa mdzas pa
dang dbang po ma g.yengs pa dang/ sprul pa bzhin du yid pha rol tu ma byung ba dang/ 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gang tsami du lta zhing bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so//
de nargyal po ba khab kyi mi rnams kyi mthengo nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ci 'di tshangs pa yin nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ len te rnam sbos kyi bu 'am/ 'on te ra lha khag zhig yin
nam snyam mo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med ldan// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab byung/sems ni zha u0f7azhade sbyong lam rab dul bar//
ya'i ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i ngos la gnas/ byang chub sems dpas nam nangs shes nas ni// mchog tu blta na mdzes par shams thabs bges lhung bzed thogs tadama' ba'i yid kyis
pa ni rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms zhugs// gser gyi sa la sbram bzhin nad dul la// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos pa// skyes pa'i tshog dang bud medakyis mthong na// su yang
blta bas ngoms par ma 'gyur ro// srung dag rin chen gos dad 'brus kyang brgyan// gdag mthus na grong khyer kun nadzes pa'i// sngon chad ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes// skya bsal
cidad ya phyi bzhin 'brang// bud med stongadag khang pa'i steng 'dug cing// de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skar khung dang// sra ngadag skangs khyim n stodabyas na// de dag las gzhan med pas ma
mchog lta// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe// nyo dang ba tshong pa dag kyang ma byed cing// chang dad can yang chang ni ma 'thung la// khyim dang srad na 'dug par ma dga'o// ranges bar/
ma zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste/ de dga' rgyal bo gzugs can snying pol// grong 'dir tshangs pa bdag nyid bsod snyoms spyod// lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa bar s shes zer// kha cig brgya byin
lha yi rgyal zhes zer// gzhan dag 'thab bral lha yi buzhes zer// de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'phrul ba dang// gzhan dag rab 'phrul lha la bu zhes zer// kha cig nyi ma zla ba dar zhun/
du sgra gcan stobs ldan thags bzangs rags zhes zer// kha cig dag na tshigs kyang 'di skad du// ri rgyal skya la 'dug pa 'di yin zer// rgyal pos tshig ni de dag thos gyur nas// ya
[7 ]/na mchog tu dga' zhing skar khung 'dug/ shin tu sbyangs pa'i gsar ltar dpal 'bar ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems can mchog mthadongo// rgyal po gzug
can/nga pos ma dil// bsod snyoms byin la gar sod ltos shes bsgo// ra ya mchog la de na sod mthong nas// kha cig ra yi ngos la de mchis smras// gzugs can snying pos nam
nadas shes nas ni// ma dbang skye bo mang pos yodas bskor te// de yi rgyal po skya bo'i drud du song/ shar de dpal ni rab tu 'bar bar mthong// bzhon pa las ni babs te rkung gis song
ji ltar lhun po bzhin du ma g.yo zhing// rtswa bting steng na skyil mo krung 'dug pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong// rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas te// rnam pa
snatshogs dag gagatam byas nas// khyod largyal srid kun gyi phyedasbyin gyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan bde spyod ma 'phyan smras// byang chub sems dpas 'jam po'i tshig smras pa// sa la
bdag bo yun ring tshe srungs shig/ kho bos rgyalasrid sdug pa bor nas su// reb med par zha phyir rab tu byung// gzhon nu thor bu dar la bab dang ldan// lus kyi kha dog mdzes shing shugs
! ldan ba// nor mang dge dang budamed tshogs bzhes te/ bdag la rgyal srid 'di'i bzhugs 'dod pa spyod// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal pos byang chub sems dpab la smras pa// bdag khyod mthong bas
mtshog tu dag/ bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig/ bdag ni khyod la mnga' dbul 'dod pa sbed// nab/sa tshal stod pa dag tum ba zhugs shig/ slan tshad sa gnas rtswastad
ma la zhugs shig/ khyod kyi sku ni mchog tu rab tu gzhon// bdag ga rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam zhing gya gyu med/ dag 'gyur phan zhing
snyang brtse'i tshig sbas pa// rgyal po khyed ni rtag tu bkra shis gyur// kho 'dod pa yon tan ma 'dod do// 'dod pa dug 'dranyas pa mtha' yas ldan// sems can dmyal dang la dgas
dud 'groraltang// mkhas pas smad cing 'dod pa 'phagasam yin// kho bos ngar snabs rul ba bzhin du de'o// 'dod pa shang gi 'bras bu bzhin du ltung// ji ltar sbyin dang char sprin bzhin
du bgro/ ma brtan 'gyur las ji ltarlud bzhin 'gro// dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing sku// de bzhin 'dod pa ma red phyir mngagadungs// rAd du zinakyang chog par 'dzin ma 'gyur//
gang tshadabang bo ma rung rab gyur pa// de tsho 'dod pa sdug bsngal drag chan skyed// rgyal po lha yi 'dod pa gang yin dang// mi yi 'dod pa bzang bo gang yin pa'i// 'dod pa thams cad mig gi/
gis thob kyang// de la chog pa med de yang tshol lo// rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing dul gyur pa// 'phags pa zag med chos kyi 'angashes kyang// shas rab mkhas pas chog pa de legs go/
'dod pa'i yon tan tshug pa cung zad med// rgyal po 'dod pa dag la bstan byas shing/ sngon chad 'dus byas pa ya mtha' ma mad// ji ltar ma rig lan tshub chu 'thus
pe bzhin/ 'dod pa bstan na phyir zhed sred pa 'phel// rgyal po'i lus la yang stobs de ma bstan// snying po med de sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin// bu ga dgu yi sgo nas rtag tu 'dzag/
rgyal po khe bo 'dod pa'i 'dod chags med// kho bos 'dod pa mang dang de bzhin du// blta na sdug pa'i bud med stong bor ti// mchog zhi byang chub dam pa thob 'dod nas// kho bo srid pa ma dga'/
nges par 'byung// dge slong phyogs ni gang dang gang nas byon// gang du khyod kyis yab yum gang na bzhugs// rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze 'am rgyal po lags// dge slong khur gyi 'du shes/
mad na gsungs// rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong// mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thosagyur tam// kho bo'i pha ya mang ni zas gtsang yan// yon tan 'dod bas kho bo der rang byung//
khyodam thong legs par mthong ste legs pa lags// gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de'i slob ma'o// 'dod chags bral ba 'dod par spyan drangs pa// thugs bas bdag la bzod pa mdzad
du gsol// gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub rnyes gyur tshe// chos rjes bdag la chos kyi bag bosha' mdzod// rang byung bdag ba yul nas bzhugs pa na// bdag gis mchog mchod rnyed par b
da do/ de nas kyang na rkang pa phyag byas te/ rgyal pos shan tu gus par bsko byas nas// ma dbang rang gi spyi bos yodas bskor te/ slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs par gyur//
'jig rten mgon po mag b+hayagung zhugs te// ji srid 'dod bar zhi ba'i yid kyis bdug/ lha dang ma rnams kyin don byas nas// ma dbang ni ra na'i chu bgam song// gzugs can snyad
po bodas pa'i mi bu zhes bya ba ste/ bcu drug pa'o/// dge slong dag yang de'i tsha// ras byed kyi bu lcag do/ rgyal bo'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gnas bcas nas//
slob ma'i tshogs chen po slob ma bdun brgya dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de de dag la 'du shes med mnagyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa ba chos ston to// dag slong dag byang chub sems dad bar ngs
byed kyi bu lhag spyod tshags dang ldan pa tshogs can/ tshog sakyi slob dpon grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa mkhas pa/ kun gyis shes pa mthong nas kyang de 'dasam
dusems te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyad 'ad tshogs dang ldan pa/ tshigs can tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod ba mkhas pa kun gyis shes
pa yin na/ gal te bdag de'i drung du song ste/ brtul zhugs dang dka'athub ma brtsams na ni/ bad dag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang ma skyed la/ mngon sum gyi shes pas
kyang shes par ma 'gyur ba dang/ 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas ba nye bar lenab dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun
ko phyung bar ma 'gyur gyis/ gang gis na de 'khasam gtan gyi spyod yul dag dad snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmags pa dag mdon sum du 'gyur ba dang/ 'jig rten pa'i tod de 'dzin dag
kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstan bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig bstan par bya 'am/ bdag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung du song// bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par
bstan pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/ 'dus byas kyi ting nge 'dzin snying po med par bstan par bya 'am snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas don de'i dbang du byas te/
rangs byed kyi bu lcags sbyod ga la ba degasong nas phyin pa dang/ rings byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smasas// grogs po khyod kyi ston pa na su zhig sus ston pa kun shes/ de skad ces
smras pa dang/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis byang chub ses dpa' la 'di skad ces smos so// grogs po khe bal ston pagang yang med de/ 'on kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong
du chud do// byang chub sems dbasasis pa/ khyod kyis su khong du chud/ smras pa/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyisnyams par bajug pa'i lam mo// byang chub sems dpas
smas pa/ bdag gis khyod las ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi gdan sa rig dang rjesasu bstan pa thob par 'tshal la// smras pa/ de ltar bya'o zhes byab nas/ gnams dag bun pa ba bdugo/
de nas byang chub sems dapa' phyogs gcig tusong ste/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go/ 'duge ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang/ deshes
kyi khyad par dang/ sngon spyod pa legs par sbyad pa'i 'bras bu khyad par dad/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dris pa'i khyad par dang/ de sams la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir bsam gtan la sog
pa 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgya stong thams cad rnam par dang bcas/ bu drag dang bcas par mngon sum du gyurato// de nas byang chub sems dbabadran ba dang/ shes bzhin du sta/
las langs te/ ras byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ rings byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs gong du shes med 'du shes med man skyamachad kyi
lam las gdan gazhan 'ga' zhig yod dam/ des smras pa mad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ lhag spyod 'ba' zhig la dad pa yod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/
dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/ bdag la yang dad pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzani dang/ shes rab bod dosnyam mo// de nas byang chub
sams dbasal des byed kyi bu lhag spyod la bde skad ces smras so/ grogs po khyed/da du nges par dbyadabab chos de bo pos kyab khong du chud do// de smas pa/ de bas na/
blo 'dod/ khyod dang kho bos tshogs bde dag la rjes su bslab po zhes byang chub sams dpab don mthun pa dang/ slob dpon gyi gnas su bzhag go/ byang chub sems dpas smos pa/ grogs la
lam 'di ni pad 'byung bar 'gyur pa ma lan/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur pa ma yin/ 'gag par 'gyur ba ma yin/ nye bzhi bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ mngon par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin/
rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ma yin/ dge spyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin no// ga slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag spyod slob ma dang
bca sa pa 'dun bar byas nas/ de tsam gyis chog ga zhes bya ba nas/ chog par byas te sod ba'akhar du'o// de'i tshe lnga sde bzang po 'das byed kyi bulhagasbyod las tshangs par
spyad pa spyod pa de dag 'di snyam dusams te/ bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring par btsal zhing brtson pa byas kyang mtha' dang mu khong du chud par mnus kyi/ dge sbyong go'u tams tshegs chung dus
khong duchud par mngon du byas la de de yad ma 'dod cing de las gong du tshol ba las thatsam med par de ni 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ro// gangadas mngon du byed par gyur ba de bdag cag la yang
'gyid par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de ltar dpyad nas lnga sde ba zad pos ras byed kyi bu lhag byed kyi drung nas dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi bzhin 'brang ngo// dge slod dag de ltar byang chub sam
dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab rtu gnas nas 2 lnga sde bzang podang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+har yul rgyu zhing song ngo// yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab dang/ ri g.ya'i bar na tshogs
gzhan dag gcig dus ston byed de// tshogs de dag gis kyang byang chub sanas dang 'a lnga sde bzang ma dang lcan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang zasal mgron du nges so// dge slong dag de nas byad
chub sems dpa'i yul ma ga d+har rgyu zhing/ yul ma ga d+ha'i ra ga ya ga la bder song sta/ don phyin par gyur te// rag yab rtsa modor byadu chubs mas dang sa slong ba'i phyir gnas te/ de den
gnas pa'i tshe/ sngon ma thos pa dad sngon ma shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to// gsum gang zhe na/ ga spyod dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag las lus dben par gnas//
'dod pa dag las sems dben par ma gnas shang/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang/ 'dod pa la chags pa dang/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa dad/ 'dod pa lakharkam pa dang/ 'dod pa la
yongs su gdung pa dang 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin ba de ni nye bar zhi bar ma yin la/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed bas/ sdug bsngal gyis tshor ba drag po
[p]// ma bzad ba tsha ba spyod ste/ bod kyang de dag ma'i tshos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so// 'di lta ste//
dper na/ skyes bu zhig ma 'dod la shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan dang/ shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing thogs la chur bcug sta gtsubs na des ma phyin par ma nus so// de bzhin du dge sbyong dang/ bram
ba de dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par ma gnas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par ma gnas te/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang/ 'dod pa la sred pa dad/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang/
'dod pa la sgom pa dang/ 'dod pa las yodas su gdungs ba dang/ 'dod pa labarkam pa dang/ 'dod pa la zhenapa gang yin pa de ni nye bar lta ba ma yin gyi// de dag bdag nyid kyi gnod par byed cing/
lus la gdung bar byed bas sdug bsngal gyi tshor bdug po mi bzad pa tsha ba myong med kyi/ 'on kyang de dag ma'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ya shes mtho ba'i khyad par mngon du byed ma
nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la pa mngon du gyur pa dang po'i do da ma de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dag sbyong dang bram ze bde dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sem
dben par gnas kyang/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' zhes byabanas/ ma tshol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ des shing rlon pa'i ba tsub stan thogs la thad la bzhag ste
shing rlon pa 'i gtsub shing gtsub san des ma phyin par ma nus so// de bzhin gang dag sbyong dang bram za'adi dag ces bya banas thams cad sna mabazhin du sbyar te/ mi'i tshos bla ma las mchog tu
gyur pa// 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par du mno bya bar ma nus so snyam ste/ 'dini sngonam thos shing gshes ba'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang gang
rag sbyado dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas shang/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya banas/ thams cad de bzhin du sbyar te/ de dag gi de ninye bar

zhi ba yon te/ de dag bdag nyid kyisaganod pa byed nyid lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa myong mod kyi 'okyang de dag mi 'i chos bu ma las cha gtugyur/ 'phags pa de shes mdzod du bskor
la 'i khyad khar mngon du bya bar mi nusaso// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig mi 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dad/ bod chol par gyur la/ des shang skam pos gtsubastan ngang/ gtsub shad thang la bzhag ste
gtsubs na/ des me 'byung ba dang 'od 'bar bar byed nus so// de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang/ bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/ tshor ba skyong zhes bya ba'i bar du stamabazhin te lor kang ra
mi'i tshos bla ma las mchog tugyur pa/ 'bags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam ste/ bden sngon ma thos shing sngon ma shes pa'i dpe gsum pa'i
bsla/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'dasnyam du sems te/ bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/ 'dod pa rna sa las sems/
dben par gnas la/ bdagag bdong pa la dga' zhes bya ba nas/ thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gdi yang nye bar zhi ba yan la/ bdag nyid kyis gnod par byas shange/ lus la
gdung bar byed pa sa/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba myong bzhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ 'on kyang bdag mi'i tshos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ya shas mthad
bab khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam mo/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar dug yab ra'i ga yab phyi ma la gnas te/ kong gas yul rgyu zhing sde dpon gyi grong
khyer stengargyas gal bar song ste phyin pa dang/ de na klung ne ran dzAn chu gsal ba 'bab stegs bde ba/ shing dang shang gel ba mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa 2 nyin 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa
mthong ste/ de la byang chub sems dba' mdashin tudagag bar gyur nas 'dasnyam du sems/ e ma ho sa phyogs 'di namanyam dang nyams dga' ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa ste/ rigs
kyi bu slong ba don duganyer b.lan 'a dis chogag/ bdag kyang spod ba don du gnyer ba yin gyis/ bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo// dgoslong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du
sams te/ par gan 'dzam bu gling 'di'i snyigs ma lnga ba dus la bab cing sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang/ mu stags can gyi sdes gang ba dang/ lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa dang//

lus la ril por 'dzin pa la zhen pa'i tshe 'ongs te/ blun po dag gdung bas yongs su gdung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dag pa tshol zhing ston pa 'di lta ste/ sngags la sbyod pa dang/ lag ba la ldag pa dang

mi slong ba dang/ ma skya ba dang/ rtsa ba du ma za bdad/ sha dang nya sa zab rad/ dbyar mi 'byung bdad chang dang phub ma dang/ chu yongs su spangs pa dang/ khyim gcig dang gsum dang/ lnga dang bdun/
nas/ zas len pa dang 2 rtsa ba de da/ 'bras bu dang/ nya lcibs dang/ rtswa ku shadang [0f10 ]la mdang/ ba lang gi lta ba dang/ bab gcin dad/ 'o thug dang/ zho dang/ maradang/ bu ram dang/
ma btags pa za zhing 'thung ba dang/ bya dang pa dang/ phug ron gyis zos te ba ba bkrus te za bdang/ greng dang dgon bas 'tsho ba dang/ ba lang gi brtul zhugs dang/ ri dgas dang [7 ]khyi dang/ pag
dang/ spre'u dang/ glang po che'i brtul zhugs dang 'greng ba dang/ ma smra bdang/ dpa' bo'i tshul du 'dug pa dang 2 kham gcig za bdang/ kham bdun gyi bar du za ba dang 2 zas lan tag za
ba dang/ nyin zhag gcig za ba dang/ bzhi dang/ lta dang drug gi skabs skabs su za ba dang/ zla ba phyed dang/ zla ba gcig za bar byed pa dang/ zla bal lta ba dang bya rgod dang/'u
gshogopa thogs pa dang/ shing leb dang/ rtswa mun dza dang/ zar ma shun pa dang/ rtswadud b+hadad gres ma dang/ rdo ba'agyil bdad/ ra b.largyu la kha dad/
zla skya la ba dang/ ka pags gyon pa dang/ gos gsher ba dang/ stags bu'i steng dang/ chu'i nang na nyal ba dang/ thal pa dad/ rdo dang/ gyom dang/ shing 'badad/ tsher ma dang/ rtswa dang/
gtun shing gi skad du nyal ba dang/ mgo thur du bstan pa dang/ tsog tsog por bdug pa dang/ thad la nyal ba dang/ gos gcig pa dang/ gos gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi dang/ lnga dang/
drug dang/ bdun dang/ gos mang po spel ba dang/ gcig bur 'jug pa dang/ 'khru bdad/ ma 'khru ba'i cho ga dang/ sbradad/ sen ma dad/ ag rtsom ring por 'jog pa dang/ ral pa'i
thoratshugs 'chad ba dang/ rgyugs shug dang/ til dang/ 'bras 'bru gcig za pa dad ]thal ba dang/ snag tshe dang/ me tog spyad spyad pa dang/ rdul 'thul ba dang/ rdul nag pa dang/ phyag
dar dang/ rdzob kyis lus la skud pa dad/ ba spudad/ mi'i thod pa dang/ sku dad sen mo dad 1 tsha bu'i smad g.yogs dad/ rdzob dang/ keng rus thogs pa dang/ chu dron po dang/
'bras kyi khu ba dang/ lag btsags pa dang/ khrud ma 'thung ba dang/ mdag ma dang/ tshon rtsi dang/ gos dur smrig dang/ khang ba gsum dad/ mgo 'dreg pa dang/ lo bar ng/ mi'i thod pa dang/

0 khri'i zur shing 'chad bas blun bo rnams dag par khong du chud do// du ba rdub pa dang/ me rdub pa dad nyi ma la lta ba dang/ gdung pa lta byed pa dang/ nang pa gcig dang/ lag ba gcig bstod pa dang/
rkang pa gcig gtsugs ba dad/ gnas gcig na 'dug pas dka' thub sogs dang/ phub ma la sogs pa dang/ mdag ma bsregs pa dad/ bum pa bsregs pa dang/ rdobasregs pa dang/ mi 'gal
bar 'jug pa dang/ zas ma za ba dang/ rgya dan dad/ 'bab stegs su song ste shi pas sdug pa'i 'gro ba tshel la// rab basngags shes bya ba dang/ gzhi ma 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang/ gzhi srung zhes
bya ba dang/ ga tshugs zhes bya ba dang/ smon lam dang/ bstod pa dang/ sbyin basreg dang/ dbab pa dang/ sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang/ klag pa' dzan bde byed pas dag par khong du chud do// bdag
dag par sems shing de dag la rten te/ 'dilta ste/ tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ gu lang dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ lha mo dang/ gzhon nudang/ ma mo dang/ ka t+ya'i bu dang zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang
rnam thos kyi bu dang/ chu lha dang/ nor can gyi budad/ tha skaragyi budang klu dad/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/
srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ grul bum dang/ yi dgas dang/ 'khor dang/ tshogs dang/ mtshan dang/ kha dang/ lha'i drang srong dang/ rgyal po'i drang srod dang/ tshangs pa'i drang srong dag
la phyag 'tshal zhing/ de dag la nying por 'du shes so// sa dang/ chu dang/ ma dang/ rludadad [7 ]nam mkha' la yang rten 2 ra dang/ ji sul dang/ klong dang/ chu/
mag dad ]mtsho dang/ mtshab dang/ rdzing dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ lteng ka dang/ khron ba dang/ rdzing bu dang/ shang dang/ shing gel ba dang/ 'khri shing dang/ rtswa dang/ sdong dum dang/
'tsho lhas dang/ dur khrod dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ sra dag la yang rten to// khang pa dang/ ka ba dang/ rdo ba dang/ tho ba dang/ ral gri dang/ gzhudang/ dgra sta dang/ mda'ad/
mdung mthung dang/ rtse gsum dag la yang phyag 'tshal la// zhi dang/ mar dang/ yus kor dang/ nas dang/ shing bal gyi phreng ba dang/ rtswa dur ba dang/ nor bu dang [7 ]gsar dang 2 dngul
la sogs pa la bkra shis par 'dzin te/ gzhan mustags can 'di dag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas/ rnam pa de lta bu dag byed cing rtenato// 'di na kha cig bdag cag gi mtho ris dang/
snyan pa yang 'di lta bu dag las 'grub bo snyam du sems te/ de ltar log pa lam du song bas/ skyabs ma yin pa la skyabasasu 'du shes shing/ bkra shis na yanar la bkra shis par 'du
shes la/ dag bam yan ba la gapar sems kyis/ bdag gis ca nas kyang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams kyis las dad
bya ba chud mi za ba bstan par bya ba dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bsam gtan spyod yul pa rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par khastan bas 'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtul zhugs dang dka na/
thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyam mo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas de 'di snyam du bsamasanas/ latsug tu brtul zhugs dang/ dkab thubashan tu drag po shin tu sbyad par dka'
ba/ shin tu byang bar dka' ba'i dka' ba spyad par brtsams so// ci'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya zhen/ de ni sbyad par dka' ba ste/ de bsan dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste/ byado chub sems
dpa ba srid pa tha ma pagang bsam gtan mkha' khyab la snyoms par zhugs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyis risan ma 'am ma ma yin pa sus kyang dka' ba spyad pa de lta bu spyod par nus pa med do
ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces bya zhe na/ de dang po nyid du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba lta bar 'gog kun tu 'gog sta/ bsam gtan de ni rtog pa yod/
rnam par rtog pa med/ g.yo ba med/ sems pa mod 'gyur ba mad cing/ thams cad rjes su song ba thams cad la ma rtan pa ste/ bsam gtan de la sngon slob pa 'am/ ma slob pa 'am/ rangs/
rgyas sam/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sus kyang snyems par ma zhugs so// mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ khyab par byed pa// byed pa med pa/ rnam par ma 'thor pa ste/
[r ]u@#// dus thams cad khyab par byed pas na/ bsam gtan de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sta/ de bas mkha' khyabacas bya'o// dge spyod dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig/
kyi rten pa rnams la ngo mtshar yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang/ mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa gzhil ba dang/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar bcad pa dang/ lha rnams 'dun par bya ba dang/ sems
gcan chad pa dang/ rtag par smra ba/ las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams/ las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang/ ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pa dang
bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang/ lus kyi stobs dang mthu yang dag par bstan pa dang/ sems kyi dpa' ba yang dag bskyed pa ba phyir/ byi dor ma byas pa'i sa la skyil mo krung bcas te
'dug go/ 'dug nas rang ga lus sems kyis tshar bcad cade gzar to// dge slong dag denas rwa dgun gyi tshes brgyad pa'i nub mo/ da ltar lus tshar bcad cing gzar bas brnyan khung nas gyad rdul

byung ste zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rdulabyung ste zags nas sa la lhung zal par chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo// 'di lta sta/ dper na gyes bu stobs dang ldan pas skyes bu shin tu nyam chung ba zhig
mgrin pa nas bzung ste/ btsar ba de bzhin du dge slong dag lus 'di sems kyis char bcad cing gzir na/ mchan khung nas kyang rdulabyung zhing zags dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags nas

sa la lhung ste/ zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo// dge slong dag de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/bdag gis bsam gtan ma pa'i bya ba la ba sam bton du bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas bsam/
gtanamakha' khyab la bsam gtan du byas pa dang/ kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur te/ rna ba'i bu gaganyis nas sbra drag po dang sku chen po byung ngo// 'di lta ste/ dper na
sbud pa bus pa'i/ sgra drag podang/ sgra chen po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dge slong dag kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur pa dang/ rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag pa dang//
sa chen po byung do/ dge slong dag de nas des bdasnyam du bsamasate/ yang bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyub la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam ba dang/ de nas nga'i kha dang sna dang/ rna ba 'gags par
gyur to// de dag 'gags bdang/ rlung gi ngo du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig gas mdung thung rtul pas mgo'i byed pa la btab pa de
bzhin du/ dge slong dag kha dang sna dang/ rna ba'i dbugs phyin ng du rgyu ba 'gags pa dang/ gad du ma'i bodapa la gnod par gyur to// der lta'i bu gcig gis khyad chub sems da pa' na ba de hakod/
nas 'di skad ces smras so// kyem phyogs kyi shu gzhon nu don grub 'di 'chiba'i dus byas so// gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so// bde ba'i dus byas pa ma yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa bsam
gtan la gnas ba rnams kyi tshul ni de lta bu gomos smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ma ya bag po shAkya'i sras po 'ad ]/ brnag pa ma rdzogs don/
sgo kyang m mdzad cing// 'jig rten gsum pa sdug bsngal mgon med par// mdzad nas mgen 'di'i grongs par ma 'gyur grang// kyi hudasems can sAng po thugs dam brtan// mgon pes sngon
chadabadag cag dga' ldan du// dam chos mchod sbyinu la na mgrenadu nges// sems can dag khyod dam bcas ta ga re// de nas lhadasum cu rtsagasum gyi lhagi nang du song ste/ lha masgyu 'phrul
la bzhin nu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes don de brjod de// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lha'i bu mob tshogs kyis bskor nas nam phyed tsam na/ klung naran dzAna'i 'gram gal ba dang/
lo byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ba dang des byang chub sems dpa' lus bskamaMs shang 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo// ma sa kyang mchi mas brnangs shad dus nas//
do'atshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyas so// lum pa na zhes bya ba'i tshal du da bu btsas pa'i tshe// song ge bzhin du 'dzin pa med par gom bdun khyod nyid song// phyogs bzhir bltas shi

'di ni nga yi skye ba tha ma zhes// khyod kyi tshig snyan smras pa de yang khyed la yodAm rdzogs// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'agyur zhes drang srong nag pos bstan pa la/ da ya lung bstan pa yang nyams la mi
rtagag des ma mthong// bus ni yad dgab 'khor la sgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la// byang chub kyang ni rjes su ma thobatshal tu 'gongs par 'gyur// bu phyir su la sgrub nang sdug bsngal su ya gan du
mdud// bdag gi bu gcig cung zad gson pa'i srog na su yis sbyin/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa// shin tu snying rjes bar na du byed cing// sku yad bshagi la mtshos pa rnams bor ba//
shin tu bu la stags 'don byed la// sa stangs 'dug rung 'greng ba 'di su zhig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis snus pa// bdag gis zla ba bcu bar du/ rdo rje badra ba mngal du bcad s// budab
ma nib dag yin te// rab tu sdug bsngal rnam par smra// de nas byang chub sems dbas mo'i dbugs 'byin tsade smras pa// bu la byams pa khyod kyi ngal ba 'bras bu yod par bya yas ma
'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas pa ru bya ba'i phyir yongs su btang ba'i don yod pa ste/ drang srong nag pos bstan pa yang mngon par gsol bar bya'o// mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa yang mngon par gsal
bar bya'o// sa ni rnam rgyan 'thor bar 'gyur yang srid// rin chen rtse mo lhun po chur 'phosridi// nyi zla skar tshogs sa la lta ba'agyur srid// so so'i skya bo yin yang du ma'achi// da phyir 'di la
mya ngan khyedam byed// ring por ma thogs pyadachub sangs rgyas mthong// lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis thos ma thag tu rob tu dga' ste/ ba spu g.yos nas byang chub sems dpa' la me tog man da ra bas
gtor te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas lhab sil snyan dkrol zhing dang ga gnas ga la ba der song ngo// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge sbyong dang bram
kyi/ thagang dag kha cig zas chung dus dag par sems pa yod kyis/ ngas kyar zas chud du la nan tan bya'osnyam mo// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ zas su rgyag shug 'bru ba cig du bon ste/

gnyis su med pa zos so// dge slong dag khyed kyi blo 'disnyam du da'i tsho'i rgya shug tshab snyam du sems par gyur na/ de ltar m lta stada'atsho/ rgyu shug kyang 'di nyade tsam mo// dge slong dag ngas
zas su rgya shug 'bru gcig kho na ste/ gnyis sumed pa thos bas/ lus shin tu1mchung zhing rad par gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na/ ldum bu a si tu ka'i tshogs pa dang/

ka la ka'i tshogs pa ci 'drab r ngab yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang de 'dra bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ srog chags kar ka ta ka'i rtsa be logs ci 'dra bar nga'i rtsib logs gnyis kyang de 'dra b.ru gyur
to 'di lta ste dper na/ bzhon pa'i bris khang ma/ glang po'i bris khang rnying pa ngos gnyis zhag bani gdung rten gyi bar snang zhing mngon no// de bzhin du nga'i rtsib logs gnyis ka nas lus kyi

nang snang zhing mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na/ lan bur byas pa ni mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang ma mnyam par 'gyur ro// dngazhan du ngab sgal tshig kyang mthon dman dang mnyam ba dang ma ma nyam bar
ba ]gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ ku ba kha ba gzhon nur bcad pa nirIs pa dang/ kun tu rnyes pa dang/ rtsub rtsub por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ngab mag yang rnyes pa dang/ kun tu rnyes ba dang/ rtsub/

rtsub bor gyur to// 'di lta stedaper na/ sos ka'i zla ba pha ma la khronopa'i skar ma dma' bar song ste/ tshigs chen por snang ba ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nga'i mig gi 'bras bu yang khung dusong ste/ tshogs

chen pos snang bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ rab dang po dang/ ra mo'i rkang pasu'adra bar nga'i mchan khung dang/ ltadad/ brang la sogs pa yang de badra bar gyur to// dge slong dag de nas nga gang gi
tshe lag pas lta ba la byug go snyam n sgal tshigs nyid la reg ge/ ldang ngosam nas langs na yang Da de bzhin du sgyur por gyur te 'gyel to// shathang ste langs na rdul gyis lus yog pa lag pas
phyis pa dang/ baspa rulab thams cad lus las lhags so// gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur ba de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid sbyong ba rtsub po btang bas med par gyur te// nga' med
lul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen 'khor pa rnams kyang da la 'di ltar e ma ho dge sbyong go ta ma ni gnagago/ e ma ho dge sbyong ge'u ta ma ni sngo bsangasaso// an ho dge sbyong gsum ni
mad gu ru'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes so// dge slong dag ngas 'disnyam du bsams te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung
ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag das mngon par shes te/ ngas zas su 'bras 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su med par thos// dmed slong dag khyed 'di

snyam du de'i tsho 'bras che ba snyam dusems par gyur na/ de ltar ma lta sta/ de'i tshi babras kyad 'di nyidatsam mo// dge slong dag ngas zas su 'bras 'brugatsug zes nga sa lus myur du snga ma bzhin du
gyur to// a ma ho dge spyong ga'u tum nya mdagu ra'i mdeg 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsamA
te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu nyid la nan tan bya'o snyam mo/ dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes pa/ ngas zas su til 'brugacig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su med pa bres pa nas/ de'i kha
! dogo 'jam bo med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge sbyong dang bram zegang dag kha cig zas ma za bas dag par sems te/ bdag gas kyang yang 'ayA ba
cad du zas ma za bar nan tan bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas zas ma za par 'dug ga/ dag slong dag ngas ma zos pas lus shan tu bskams shing nyam chung bo dang rad par gyur to//
'di lta ste dper na/ lcamabu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang/ ka la ka'i tshigs pa bas kyang nyes gyur dang/ sumagyur dang/ bzhi gyur dang/ lnga gyur dang/ bcu gyur gyis/ nga' yan lag
[4/ ]rad/ nying lag skum par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ rtsib logs na srog chag sa kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs dang/ gzhon pa'i bris khang lta buragyur to// sgal tshigs ni lan bu byas pa lta bur gyur to//

mgo'i thod pa na sku la kha ba lta bur gyur to// mig gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur to// dge slong dag da legs par ldang ngo snyam nas lus kyisabaskyod nas/ sgyur par gyur te 'gyel lo//
sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus log pa lag pas phyis pa dang/ ba spu rul ba thams cad lus las lhags so// gang sngonang kha dog mdzesashang 'jim par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar// bdag nyid

tsongo ba brtsubapor btang ba'i phyir mod bar gyur to// nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skya ba nyo kor ba rnams kyang/ 'di ltar so na ho dge sbyong gi 'u tam naganag go/ a ma hodage sbyong gabu khag
ni sngo bsangs so// e ma ho dag sbyong ga 'u ta ma ni nya mad gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur te snyan du shes so// de'i tshargyal

po zas gtsang mas kyang nyin re bzhin byang chub sems dba'i drung du pho nya btong ngo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du ba jig rten du bya ba rmad du byung nga/bstan paNan/ bya ba nyams pa'i
sems can rnams las dang bya ba la gzudapa dang/ bsod nams tshogs rnams brjod pa dang/ ye shes chen po'i yon tan bstan pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyi 1
[ns/ ]@#/ til 'bru gcig dang/ rgya shug 'bru gcig dang/ 'bras 'bru gcig ga le drug ga par du dka' ba sdud pa bstan te/ yidi dman pa med pa 'o// byang chub sems dbaladrugag

ka bar du skyil mo krung bcas nas ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du gnas te/ spyod lam nyams pa med do// nyams babanas kyang pha ma la ma song ngo// grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ga song ngo// rlung dang nye ma/
dang char pa'iskyabs ma btsal to// sha sbrang dar/ sbrang bu dang/ sdig sbrul ma khaskad do// bshang ba dang/ gci ba dang/ mchil ma dang/ snabs ma bar ro// bskum po dad sbyang pa ma byas
so/ glos phab pa 'am/ khas bub pa' ma/ gan rkyal ma yin par gnas las gnas so// sbyin chen po dang/ yul don chen po dang/ char pa dang/ sor ba dang/ ston dang/ dpyod dang/
dgun gang yan pa de dag gis kyad byang chub sems dpa'i lus l ma thog ga/ than byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang m skyabs so// dbang po yang ma bkagag/ dbang po'i yul yang ma
blangs so// gang dag der 'ongab grongaga gzhon nu 'am/ grong gi gzhon nu ma 'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rtswa 'am/ tsa thun nam/ shing thun nam/ gci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'

la dur khrod kyi 'dra yin pa snyam du sems shing de la rtson ta/ de la sas skud do// der byang chub sams ri 'alo drug po de dag gis lus ngan pa dang/ gong ba dang/ red par gyur to// de'i rna ba gnyis su
rtswa 'am/ shing bal bcug nas/ sna'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to// sna'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas/ rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to// rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas khar 'byin to// khar
bcug nas rna ba dang sna'i bu gar 'byin to// snar bcug nas 'byin to// lha dang/ klu dar gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dad/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen
po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon sum du gyur ba de dag nyin mtshan du gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed do// smon lam mang 'debs so// don byed tshub sems dpal
la drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa ston cing/ lha dngam khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis tshangs pa dgatheg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so// de la 'di skad cesabya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khyis
byung ba// yon tan dag dang ldan pa de// sems can don dang phan nga 'i phyir// thabs dang ldan pa'i bsam pa skyes// snyigs ma lnga ya dus kyi tshe// chos dman mos pa'i 'jig rten pa//
las dang bya bar 'jig rten du/ 'dzam bu gling 'dir skyes par 'gyur// mu stegs tshogs kyi rang tugang// ltad mo dang ni bltas sulta// lus la gnod pa bya ba byed byas pa de dag dag par mnas/
ga yangs ma dang mya ngan 'jug/ sprin mo sa dang thal ba skud// lus ni yongs su gdung ba'i phyir// gdung ba lnga la brtson dang ldan// lag pa brkyang stargyu ba dang// ma mkhas kha cig lag pa ldag/
shu@#// bum pa khar gzhobalas ma yin// sgo dang ka bas chos ma len// gang na lu yod pa nas mni// 'dug tsam tshur shog ces las mni// khyim nas kha cig kha zas
ga lenapas// bdag ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems// mar dang 'bru mar bu ram zho// nya dang sha dang 'o ma spongo// ldam lcam sre da brlab tsa/ gzigs dang ba langagatsa bza// rtsa ba
'bras bu lo ma dang// rtag tshal bu la ba sbags// srel khyed kha cig sgron mor rgyu// glen pa 'di bden gzhan brdzunasnyam// lag pa sgrung bar byed pa dang// ska bsgangara' bar bsgreng ba
dag/ lam las rab tu rnam par nyams// las mna gnas shing bde 'gro 'dodo// rtsa dang gtun shing thal bar nyal// ra mar nyal zhing tsog bur 'dug/ khacig rkyang ba gcig pus

'greng// gdong bstod nyi dang zla la lta// chu mig mtshodang lteng ka dang// rgya mtsho chu ba nya Do dang// shang dang 'a yi rtse mo dang// rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal// glen pa de dag tshand mang
zlags// lus na yongs su skam par byed// 'ag par lta dang ldan pa dag/ myur du ngan song rnams su ltang// nga ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dang// dka' spyad gang zhayig lha dang mas//
sbyad par nus pa ma yin pa'i// dka' spyad drag po rtsom snyam sems// bsamo gtan gang zhig rang rgyalegyis// blta bas nus pa ma yin pa'i// rdo rje lta bur brtan gnas pa// mkha'
khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// mu stags brtul zhugs ngan pa yis// dga' ba'i lham bdin yod// de dag yongs su smin bya'i phyir// dka' spyad brtul zhugs drag bo brtsams//
