sa stangs su ma ba ma bting bar/ skyil mo krung ni bcas te 'dug/ rgya shug til dang 'bras 'bru gcig/ tshapa'i cho ga rnam par ston// dbugs dbyung rngub ba rnam bsalcangs// stobs
dad ldan ba g.yo ba med// lo drug bar du bsam gtan mchog/ nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med// g.yo ba med pa sems rgyu mad// nam mkha'i kha
su khyab pa ya/ mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de ni nyin las grib mar ram// grib las nyi mar song ma byas// lcan po lta bur ma g.yo ba'i// mkha' khyab bsam gtan
bsam gtan byed// rlung dang char dang sha sbrang dang// sdig sbrul sbyang bu skyob mkhyid// rnam pa ma 'khrugs spyod pa yis// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// bdag nyid gcig pu'i
donagyi phyir// mkha' khyab bsam gtan byed paman// gzhan du snying rje'i sems kyis ni// 'jig rtan don mang ched du sgom// grongag byis pa ba lang rdza// shang thun dag dang rtsa tsun dag// de la dus
khroda'adre snyam sems// de las las skud byed cing// khe/tsadab yang 'thor bar byed// de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang// g.yo ba ni da cing 'khrugs med par// mkha' khyab bsam gtanabasam gtan
byed// mtho ba med cing gab pa mad// lus ma bsrungs bar chos ma reg/ bshang ba 'byed gsum byed// sgra yis mi'ajags gzhan ma lta// sha dang khrag rnams skams gyur/
bags ba rtsa rgyusanus pa lus// sgal tshigs dgan lta bar snang/ (lan bu blas pa ci bzhin no// gang dag lhag par byas lha dang// lha min pa gnod sbyin dri za klu// yon tan ldan pa mngon
'a sum pas// nyin dngamtshan du mchod pa byed// ji ltar mkha' 'dra'i sems ldan 'di// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de 'drarab dag cag myur gyur ces// smon lam dag kyang
'debs bar byed// snying rje blo yis 'jig rten gyi// don mang ra byed mgatogs par// bdag phyir ma yin bde blos man// bsam gtan ro naslad phyir min// phas kyi rgol pa rab tu bcom// su
stegs blo nyams zil gyis mnan// mgo ldog byang chub ga la yod// byang chub bskal mang rnyed dka' zhes// bod srungs la ni tshig smras pa'i// las dang bya ba rad tu bstan// skyo bdag ni ba/2
bya'i phyir// mkha' khyababasam gtan bsam gtan byed// lha ma khrag khrig bcuganyis tshang// theg pa gsum la rang du btul/ g.yached du blobras bzang// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam
gtan byed// dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o//dang slong dag bdud sdig can yang// byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'i
0/ tshe phyi bzhin 'brang ste glags bltas/ skabs btsal kyang/ nam yang grags cung zad kyang ma rnyed do// de glags ma rnyed nas/ ya chad de yad la gcags bzhin du song ngo// de la 'di skad ces
byas dgon pa nyams ni dga' ba dang// nags tshal gel ba sgra med dang// ltang rgyas kyin shar phyogs na// chu klung ne ran dzA na der// sbyong ba'i phyir ni brtson par byas// rtag tu mthu rtsal
brtan pa po// grub dang bdab thob bya'i phyir// brtson pas rab tu brtul de la// bdudan bajam zhing snyan pa'i tshig/ skya bar byed tsang 'ongs par gyur// kyi srog gces kyis 'tsho bar gyis//
gson na chos ni spyod par 'gyur// gson tshe bya ba gang yod pa// de dag byas nas mya ngan med// khyod dge mngag nyams dman pagyur// khyodanangesha la thug cade bdug/ 'chib tshan stong snyed
tsan mgacig tsam zhig gson par zad// sbyin pa dag ni rtag tubyin// ma ya sbyin bsreg sbyin bsreg byas// bon tang bsod nams chen por 'gyur// sbyong ba yis ni ci zhig bya// sbyong ba'i
lamani sdug bsngal te/ ]sems dulab nang dka' zhes// de tsho bdudakidi skad tshig/ byang chub sems dpa ba de la skyas// de skad smra ba'i bdud da la// byang chub sems dpas 'di skad
skyas// sdig can myos pa'i rtsalag bo// khyod ni rang gi don phyir 'ongs// nga la bsod nams cung zad kyang// don du gnyer ba med de bdud// gang dag bsod nams don du gnyer// dal
bde skad smra ba'i rigs// 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni ba mi yin bas// ma 'chi snyam du nga mi sems// tshangs par spyod la gzhol gyur pas// phyir ldog par ni mi bya'o/ zlunuklung

dag kha chu rgyun kyang// rlung gis rnam bar snyems byed na// spangs pa nyid kyi khrag tsam lta// 'di yas rtse phyir snyams ma 'gyur// khragani skams par gyur ba dang// de yi 'og tu sha skams 'gyur/[–]
sha ni zad par gyur ba dang// phyir zhangasams na dang bar 'gyur// phyir zhing 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang// ting de 'dzin kyang gnas par 'gyun// nga ni de ltar gnas pas na// tshor ba dam la
thob gyur kyang// lus dang srog la ma lta ste// sran thub dag par gyur la ltos// nga la bdun pa yod gyur cing// brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab med// nga ni brtson 'grus spyod nus pa// 'jig
rten de dag ngas ma mthong// srog chad sha ba ches bya ste// 'tsho ba ngan pa de ltar man// gamul don sha ba legs pa sa// pham nas gson pa de ltar mni// sngaram dpung las ma rgyal te// dpa'
bodabud las rgyal bar 'gyun// rgyal yang de ni rlom sems med// bdud khyod las ni mdo rgyal bya// 'dab khyod kyi dang po'i dpung// ma dag 'kha ni gnyis pa yin// khyod kyis gsum pa/
bkres dang skom// sred pa dpung tshogs bzhi pa lan// rmugs pa gnyis ni lnga pa ste// 'jigs pa drug bar brjod pa lan/ khyodakyi the tsom bdun pa ste// khro dang 'chab pa brgyad pa lan/ 'thab
dang tshigs bcad bkur sta dang// log par grags pa gang thebadang// bdag la bstod par byed pa dang// gzhan la smod par byed pa dang// de dag nag po'i rtsa lag tu// lhung ba'i bdud kyi dpung
yin no// dge sbyong bram ze kha cig ni// 'di na glags lta 'khod par snang// khyod dpung gang yin lhar bcas kyi// 'jig rten 'di ni rab 'dul ba// so btang ma byas snod rgyus zhing//shes
rab kyis ni de dag bshig/ dran pa legs par nyer gzhag ste// shes rab legs par bsgom byas nas// shes bzhin du ni spyad par bya// blongan khyod kyi ci byar yod// de skad ces smras pa dang/
bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bdas// ya ma rangs nas yid la gcags bzhin du// da nyid du ma snang bar gyur to////'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes
bya ba theg ba chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcugs pa// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' di snyam du sems te// dge sbyong dang/ bram ze gang dag kha cig 'dus pa dang

ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i dus na// bdag la gnod pa byed bdung (lus la gdung ba byed de sdug bsngal drag po tsho ba ma bzad pa/ yid du ma 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pas// de dag shan tu
sdug bsngal myong ngo snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas 'disnyam du bsamasataM/ sbyodapa 'di dang sgrub pa 'disaM/ mi'i tshos bla ma las mchog tugyur ba/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang
ma no du ma byas ta/ bdin byang chub kyi lam ma ni/ lama'adi ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang/ rgo ba dang Da 'chib 'byung banub par byed pa ma yin te/ byang chub kyi lam ma 'ongs ba'i
skye ba dang/ rgyab dang/ 'chi ba'i sdugabasngal 'byud banub par byed pa gzhan zhig yod de snyam mo/ (dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ ngas phab skyed mo'i tshal du/ de 'dzam bu'i grib
ma la 'jug ste/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i tshas rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas ba/ dpyod pa dang bcas ba/ dban ba las skyes bab dga' ba dang/ bde ba can bsam
gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas pa de byang chub kyi lam yin te/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dad/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin/
snyam nas/ de byang chub kyi lam yin no snyam sta/ ngo'i rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdaltar nyam chung bar gyur pas ni lam de mngon par rdzogs

bar byang chub par bya mi nus so// gal teng 'diltar lus ngan cing nyam chung bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang/ ya shes kyi stobs kyi byang chub kyi snying por song na ni/ ngas phyi ma'i spyi bo la snying
brtse ba byas par ma 'gyur te// 'di yang byang chub kyi lam ma yin gyis/ ngas kha zas rags pa zos la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/ de nas gdod byad chub kyi snying bor 'gro snyam mo// dge
bas slong dag don lha'i bu gang dag nga la mos pa de dag gis/ nga'i samasakyi yongs su rtog par sems kyis shes nas/ da ga la ba der 'ongs te/ nga la 'di skad cig sbas so// skyes bu dam pa
zhal zas rags ba ma gsol cig/ bdag cagalas ba spu'i khung bur mdangs stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni zas ma bzab b.rebadag nyid kyis dam bcas
la bdag gi spyodayul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyon 'khor pa rnams kyis kyar 'deltar dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni zas mi za ba yin par yang shes te/ de la mos pa'i lha'i bu bdi dag gis nga'i ba

spu'i khung bur mdangs bcug par gyur na/ ngas shin tu brdzunaslus par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i brdzun smra ba spang ba'i phyir/ lha'i bu de dag la tshig ma mnyan par kha zas rigs/
pa bzang bar sems btud do// dge slong dag daltar byang chub sems dbas lo drug kha bar du brtul zhugs dang/ dka' thub nyams su blangs nas/ stan de las langs te khazas rags pa
'di lta ste/ bu ram gyi dpu ba dang/ mon sun sdebu'i khu bcud dang/ ha ri nu ka'i khu bcud dang/ than dang/ 'bras chan dang/ 'dren mar bza'o zhas tshig tubarjod do// dge slong dag de nas
lnga sde bzang po dag 'disnyam dusams te/ dge sbyong gdu ta mas 2 lam 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthodapa'i khyad par gang yang
mngon du byed ma nus na/ khazas dgas ba 'di zos te/ bsod nams sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas bas su nus te/ mgasal ba byas pa mnanosnyam du bsams nas

byang chub sems dpa 'gananas song ste/ grong khyer wAr Na sar song nas/ drang srong lhung ba[']dgas kyi nags su gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid dudakab baspyad pa spyod pa na/ grong

pa'i bu mo gzhon nu buny+tsas blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba'i phyir bsnyen bkur byas so// lnga sde bzang po de dag gsakyang dzam blo byas shing rgya shug 'bru gsed dang/ 'bras 'bru gcig dang til 'bru gcig dbul ba
yang phulo// grong pa'i bu mo btsun bu mo stobs ldan ma zhes byakha dang/ stobs smodam dang/ shin tu sdug dang/ sde las rnam par rgyal dang/ a ti mug tu ka'i phreng ba can dang/ mdzes ma dang/
wArdzu byed ma dang/ sku lcang la rgyas dang/ ral ba can dang/legs skyes gzhis bya bste/ gzhon nu de dag gas byang chub sems dpa'i tshod ma'i rnam ba de dag thams cad byas te phul lo// byang chub
sems dpas kyang de dag zos nas rim gyis spyod yul gyi grong du bsod snyoms spyad pas/ mdog dang/ gzugs dang/ stobs dang ldan par gyur to// de tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' la
kyi dge sbyong mdzes pa/ dge sbyong chen po zhes 'dzer to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa'i dang po nyid dudaka' ba spyod pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs rd/ dka'
shul nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba dang lus rtas pa bya ba'i phyir grong pa'i bumo legs skyes mas/ nyin gcig bzhin du bram ze brgyad brgya zas byin zhing ba de skad du bdagagi zas zes pas/ bya ba
sems dpa' blo na me dab yang dag par rdzogs pab byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog cig ces smon lam yadabatab// dge slong dag la drug 'das nas/ dus 'di snyam du bsaA/
ta/ gal te bdag gis mdoms ba logs 'ga' zhig redan re ste snyam mo// dge slong dag de'i tshagling pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shanas/ de shan rasakyis
dkris te/ dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de ngas mthongonas/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan tadagus nas/ lag pa ba g.yas pa brgyang ba dang/
de nas sablab lhas bar snang lha rnams la sgra bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i shis su skyes pa 'khor 'osgyur ba rgyalasud khorate/ phyag dar khrod la soms btur pa ngo
mtshar te/ grogs po dag bdi ni rmad du byung ba'o// bar snang ga lha rnams kyis/ sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis lha rnams la sgra bsgrags so// rgyal chen ng zhi'i
ris pasakyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa la'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang 'thab bral ba la'o// bathab bral bas kyang dga' ldan pa la// dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o// 'phruladago ba
bya// bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs sa pa'i bar du'o// skad cig de dang/ thang cig de dang/ mud tsam de la grogs po
'di ltar rgyal bo chen pob rogs skyes pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid te/ phyag dar khrodapa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/ 'di ni rmad du byud pa zhes sbrag cig dang/ brjod pa gcig 'og man
gyi gnas kyi bar du grags par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyedan/ gal te tshuzhig rnyed na re sa snyam mo
de nas de nyid du lhus lag pa sa la brdabs pa dang/ der ljid bu zhig byud bar gyur te/ dngas du'ang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzung zhes grags A// de nas yang byang chub sems dpas bad snyam
du bsams te/ bdag gis tshurd na/ gal te phyag dar khrodaba'adebakru ba'i rdo leb cig rnyedanar so snyam pa dang/ skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis der rdo leb bzhag nas/ dal byang chub sems
dpas phyag dar khrod de bkrus so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dapa' la bde skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa 'di kho bal stsol cigadang/ kho bos bkru// de nas byang
chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bya ba bstan pa'i phyir/ brgya byin la ma byin bar bdag nyid kyis bkrus so// de lus ngal tachad nas rdzon gnas 'byung snyam pa dang/ bdud
sdig can phrag degag chos dad ldan pas rdzong du gad pa mthon po zhig sbrul te// rdzong de'i 'gram na shang sgrub byed ces bya ba chen po zhig yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dang mthun pa
bya bas/ lha mo la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ shing de'i lha mo la snus pa lha mo shangag yal ga snyed cig des kyang shang ga la la ga smad nas// byang chub sems dpas del 'jus te byung ngo//

byung nas kyad gang sgrub byed de'i drung du phyag dar khrod chos gos snam sbyar du byas nas drubs te ding sad du yang de phyag dar khrodab drubs pa zhes ming du grags so// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i
du 'od dril med pa zhes bya ba des lhagags dur sgrig ga tshon du btses pa dud pa// dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun bdag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag blangs te//
snga dro sham thabs dang/ chos gos bgos nas spyod yul gyi grong du phyogs pa dang// denalha rnams kyis lteng rgyas kyi sde dpon gyi gong na/ dga' byed ces bya pa'i grongam zhig yod pa'i bu mo lags/
skyes ma la nam phyed tsam na smras pa/ khyod kyis gang bag phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul zhugs de nyams 'og tu chud nas/ dakhazas rags pa bzang po bza bar soms kyis/ sngon khyedakyis
bdag gi zas zos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshangs rgyu bar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa khyod kyi bya ba de gyis
00[w]// shig/dge slong dag de nas grong ma dga' byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas lha de dag la tshig de thos nas myur ba myur bar bstod/ galan bdun du bsnyen bkur byas pa
thobazang bo mchog tu'agyur ba snying po can mu te/ bdas nas kyang 'o ma de 'bras gsar pa gsar pa dag dang/ phru ba gsar bar blugs nas khab gsar par btsugs te/ kha zas de sgrub bo/ daslab/
ban snga ltas 'di dag snang ste/ 'o ma de'i nang na dbal debu dang/ bkra shis dang/ gsung 'khrung 'khyil ba dang/ pad+ma dang/ sdong ras la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo// de nas
des 'dasnyam du bsams te/ ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag snang ba las na/ byang chub sems dbasazas zos nas khyadachub thab par 'gyur tu'i tshon med do snyam pa dang/ brgya mtshobashis shang
chog shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogos dar phyin par gyur nas des kyad bdud rtsi'athob pa nyid du lung bstanato// de nas legs skyes mas thug pa de tshos bdang thad la bzhag sta
ma tog bsal tor/ sdus chus gtor nas gus par stan bting// branamagong gzhes bya ba la sbas kha/ gong ma sod la bram za bsags shig/ ngas ni 'ogrub sbrang rtsacan 'di blta'o/
ngo legs so zhes de ltar ma nyan nas/ shar phyogs logs su songab dang/ de [”]byang chub sogs dba' mthong ngo// de bzhin du lha thog khog su song na mad byang chub sems dpa'
[nj]mthong ngo// de bzhin du nub dang byang phyogs logs su song na yod de dang der/ des byang chub sems dbab mthong ngo// de'i phyi na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis gzhan mu
stegs can thams cad tshar bcad par gyur pas 'ga'atsam yang ma gnang ngo// de nas de slar log ste jo me'a'adi skad ces smras so// gang dang gang du mchis kyang de dang de na dge sbyong/
mdzes pa gda'akha las 2 dge sbyong ngam/ bram zugazhan ning bar tsam yang mgada'o// legs skyes mas snyas ba/ de nyid bram rdo lan te de'i phyir 'di brtsams kyis/ gdam song
la de nyid bas shig/ jomalegs so zhes smras te/ gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te legs skyes ma zhes bgyi bas spyan 'dren to zhes smras so//
dge slong dag de nas byung chub sems dba'agreng ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i khyim du song sta stan bting ba la 'dug go/ dag/slong dag de nas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi can
gyis gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdesnyam du bsams te/ legs skyes nas kha zas 'di lta bu 'dabyin
pa 'di bdag gis debazos ta/ tho tsam med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas zas
de byas nas/ grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma la 'daskad ces smras so// che zhi gsar gyi stod chen go bde ji ltar bya/ sa smas pa/ khyod snyoms shig/ bung/
chub sems dbas smras pa/ kho bo la naganod 'di lta bu mdagos so// legs skyes mas smras ba/ tsadagyesasu mdzod cig/ bdagan snod ma mchis pa'i su la yang zas masol to//de nas
byang chub sanas dpas zas da thogs te/ steng rgyas nas byun gnas / dro la bab pa dang/ klubi klung chu bo ni ran dzAna'i gsasu sod ste/ zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs cig tu bzhag nas
byang chub sems dpa' lus bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ klung ne ran dzA nA'i nang du zhugs sa// dge slong dag byang chub sems dung ba khrus byed pa'i tshe/ lha'abu brgya stod du na
dag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i lasaM kyi phyir lha'i a ka ru dang/ tsan dan gyi phyi ma dad/ byugs pa dag klung du sdugs shang lha'i mi tog kha dog snatshogs kyang chu'i nang du
'thor ro// de'i tshe klung chen po norAn dzAnalha'i sras rnams rang/ ma tog rnams kyis gang bar gyur te 'bab bo// khyod chub sems dpa' skyes chugadags khrus byas btsun ba de lha'i bu bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong dag gas blangs te/ mchod rten du bya ba dang/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rang rang gis gnas su khyer ro// byang chub sems dpa'i skra dang ag tsam gang yin ba de dag kyang grong pa'i bu mo
legs skyes nas/ bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas/ mchod rten du bya ba dang/ mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// byang chub sems dbab klung nas byung nas 'dug par 'dod dgang la lta'o// de nas
klunganaran dzA nabaklub bu mo gang mnab de sa 'og nas byung ste/ yodi las byung ba'i sa nga ge'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dal 'jug ste/ grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes
ma la snying brtse bco bar bzung nas/ tsam dgos par 'brug sbrang rtsi can de 'thungs so// 'thungs nas kyang gsar gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur bar ro// bor ma thag tuklu'i rgyal po rgya
mtshos mchod pa'i 'os yin zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyadad byas nas rang ga gnas su song ngo// de nas ma stong pa grong khyer bajigs pa nam mkha' lding ba gzugs su sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mchu
bsgyur te/ klu'i rgyal ba rgya mtsho las gser gyi snod chen po de dbrog tu brgal na/ ma nus nas rang ga gzugs kyis gus par byas to/ bslangs nas mchod rten du bya ba dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir
sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su khyer ro// khyer nas kyang snod chen po'i dge 'dun gyis dus ston byas te/ ding sang du yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams legacig bzhin du stod chen po'i dus ston
byed do// seng ge 'i khri de yang klu'i bu mo de nyid kyis mchod rten du bya ba dang/ mchodapar bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// dge slong dag byang chub sems dbab zas rags pa zes ma thag tu/
[7 ]@#// byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyis stabs kyis skad cig de nyid la lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang bo rgyas pa dang/ skyes bu chen po' mtshan
pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dad bod 'dom gang pa yang byung bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ la drug bar du brtul zhugs nyams 'og chud byas bcom ldan blo gros
bsgo 'di snyam sems/ gal te bdag 'di ltar rid bzhin bsam gtan mngon shes la shes stobs ldan ba// shang gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni// de lta na ya

bdag gis phyi ma'i skye ba dag la snying brtse ma byas 'gyur/ bsod nams ngan ngon tsam dang ldan pa'i myu ma 'di dag ngan pa sa ye shes tshol// de dag lus na nyam chung gyur na dud rtsa ba tshang rgya byed par
yo mi nus pas// kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs skyed par byas nas ni// shang gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya bar bsams/ grong pa'i
bu mo sngon chad spyod ba spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de// 'dren ba brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de lta'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed// da ni lha yas bskul ba thos nas de tsho' thug

sbrang rtsi can blangs te// klung ga 'gram du song nas dga' ba'i yid kyis ne ran dzA na'i ngogs na 'dug/ bskal pa stong du spyod ba spyad cade dbang po zhi la rab tu zhib de// lha dang klu yi tshogs dang drang
srong dag gis bskor te ne ran dzA nar bdas// pha rol rgal nas soms can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byas bsams nas ni// thub ba dag kha dri med 'jig rtenasId phyir niklung du zhugs te 'khru
bye ba phrag stobalta dag dga' bab yadi kyis smos rnams dang ni phye ma dag/ klung du 'thor zhing sems can dam pa bkru ba'i don tu chu lagang bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'i dri med des pa bkrus
te 'jug par shes gyur nas// lha stoparab tu dga' sta sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu de mchod phyir khyer// ngur sgrig bzang po dri ma med pa'i gos dag lha la bu yis de la byin// rung
ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu klung dogs na 'dug klu yi bu mo dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis seng ge 'i khri yad bshams// de la 'jig rten dag ga zhig
byed med kyang rab tuzhi ba de 'dug nas// blo gros ldan pa legs skyes mdes gser gyi snod du kha zas blugs te byin// rkang par phyag 'tshal nas nad dag kha la sbyar ba bdag gis gsol zhes khyu
blo gros ldan pas jitsam dgos par zas kyang zos nas smad n chun bor te// de ni grong khyer 'jig pa lha yabla mas bdag gis mchod par bya zhes khyer// gang tshe rgyalaM bas khazas rags pa dam pa
zos pa de la skad cag la// de yi lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid dag dang dpal yang snga mkhobazhin du gnas/ legs skyes ma dang lha rnams dag la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas//
seng gdad pastabs dad grung po'i dbang po'i gros kyis byang chub shing drud chas/[7]na nan dzAnab le'u zhes bya bste bco brgyad pa'o/// dge slong dag/

klad ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung ne ran dzAnar khrus byas te zas zos nas// lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/ bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing/
gi rgyal po byang chub chen po' drud ga la ba der skyes bu chen po'i stangs gang yin pa'i skabs des sang ste ma bskyod pa'i stabs dad/ dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i stabs dad 1 ra'i rgyal po lcan/
po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i stabs dad mi ngom pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang/ ya yo med pa'i stabs dang/ 'tsho ba med pa'i stabs dang/ rings ba ma yin pa'i stabs dad [7 ]sded pa med pa'i
stabs dad/ 'khrugs pa med pa'i skabs dang 'khyorab med pa'i stabs dang/ badrud pa med pa ba stabs dang/ zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang/ hacad ma sdod pa'i stabs dang/ ma g.yo/
ba'i stabs dang/ tabatab po med pa'i stabs dang/ tshul du shes pa'i stabs dang/ ma med pa'i stabs dad/ dge ba'i stabs dang/ zhi snang med pa'i stabs dad/ gti mug mad
pa'i stabs dang/ chags pa med pa'i stabs dang/ sed ga'i stabs dang/ dad pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang/ klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang/ sred med kyi bu'i stabs dad/ sa la ma rig pa'i
stabs dad rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snyad pa'i stabs dang/ sor mo dra bas 'brel cing sen che thongs lta bu'i stabs dad rasgra 'byin nga snubs da/ rdeb
pa'i stabs dang/ mthon dman mnyam par byed pa'i rkang mthil gyi stabs dang/ dra ba'i bar nas 'od dang 'od zer phyud nas/ sems can la reg na bde 'gror 'grel stabs dang pad+mas
med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang/ sngon dge ba legs par sbyad pa 'gros kyi skabs dang ston gyi sangs rgyas sengaga'i khri la bzhugs pa'i stabs dang [' ]ro rdzoltar bsal

zhing ma phyed pa'i stabs dang/ ngan sod dan 'grothams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang/ bde khams cad skyed pa'i stagA dang/ thar ba'i lam ston ba las g+ha rar 'badud kyi skabs stobs med par byed pa'i stabs dad//
ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs phas kyi rgol ba tshogs dang mthun pas tshar bcad pab skabs dad mun pab ling ta'og dang/ nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang/ 'khor ba'i phyogs
phyogs med par byed pa'i stabs dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ dbang phyug chen pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i stabs dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chan
bo na dbab bogacig pu'i stabs dad/rad byang zil gyis ma non pa'i stabs dang thamasacad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i stabs dang/ dran pa dang blo gros kyistabs ngang/ bad
bya// 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang/ rga ba dang/ 'chi ba rab tu zhu bar byed pa'i stabs dad/ na ba rdul med pa/ bdud kyi 'jigs pa med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i gro ba/
kyi khyer du 'gro ba'i stabs te/ de 'dra ba'i stabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sAdo por chas so// dge slong dag de ltar klung ne ran dzAn dang/ byang chub kyi sad pa'i bar der/ rlung gi
! sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur to// char sprin rnams kyis spos chus chag chag btab// me tog kyang chalaM bar bkramam// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams 'di na shing ji sad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang/ shad byang chub ga la ba de logs su rtse mo 'dud bar gyur to// gang dag dab nyin par bcas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang 1 byang chub kyi
sAd pa legs su mgakhastan tu nyal lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde nas ra ba la sogs par gang dag yodo ba de dag thams cad kyang 1 byang chub kyi sAdi pa'i ba

da legs su 'dud par gyur to// klung ne ran dzAn nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snyed pa'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kha tshon rgyang grugs tsam tshun chad kyi laMm mngon bar bkod

par gyur to// lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yon du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho ba/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ lha'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/

ka/ ba dan gyis legs par rgyan ba sprul to// mda' rgyang gang tsam gdab rgyang gang tsam gyi zhing/ na po tsho sna bdun gyi nga shing ta la stags bu de bas mtho ba mngon pas sprul te/ shang ta la thams cad ldan pa cho
brgyus pas phan tshun 'brel par 'dug go/ shing ta laganyis gnyis kyi bar du ldang sbes chus yongs sugang ba gser gyi bye ma brdal pa kA me tog ut+pal dang/ bad dang/ ku chud dA dang [7 ]pad+ma
dkar bo la sogs pas gang ba rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che pa chus thems skas brgyan pa 2 chu sreg dang/ bya gar dad/ dang pa dang/ dud pa dang/ khrung khrung dad rma bya/
'byin pa'i rje ded dag byas so// lam de na lha'i bu mo brgyad khren sbos chus chag chag 'debs so// lha'i bu mo brgyad khri na mi tog sal ma lta'i sribasud dang ldan pa 'thor ro// gshing ta la khams
cad kyi mdun logs su rin po cha'imakha' rtan bzhi g go/ rin po che'i mkha' rtan thams cad lha'i bu mo tsan dan dang/ a ga rub phyi ma'i phung mthogs pa dang/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bdug

pa'i bog khor thegs pa brgyad khri 'bod par gyur to/ dazhi bo tshe ma ba la rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo lha'i glu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'bod par gyur to/ dge slong dag de ltar byed chub sems dar ba zhing

rnams na rab tu skyod/ da zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong na 'byin/ sal snyan brgya stong ni sgrogs/ me tog mang po'i char chen pon babs/ gos brgya stong gagayab mo na 'dor/ rnga bo che brgya stongan
@#// khardung/ rta dang/ glang po tsho dang/ glang khyu ba rnams ni sgra 'byin/ bya ne tso dang/ ri skegs dang/ khu byug dang/ ka la bad+hi dang/ shang shang te'u dang/ dad pa dang/ na/

pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya brgya stongan bskor ba byed/ bkra shis pa brgya stongani'abul zhang lam gyi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu des/ byang chub sems dba'i byang chub kyi snying por song ngo// gang

nub mo byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon bar mngon bar rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod par gyur pa de nyid kyi nub mo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dang bsgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i
'khor chen po dolabs te 'di skad ces skyas so// grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnabasab/ 'dom bcas pa chen po ma bar ba/
gachos ba banabs ba/thugs los su ma skyob/ byang chub sems dba'i spyod pa thams cad tshar phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byonob/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la
zla mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba shan tumkhyen pa// sems can thams cad kyi dbad po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad
la shan du zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las mang dag par bdas pa/ dgaba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring ma 'jog la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
ba00 (pa sems can thams cad la rab tu bar pa'i lam ston ba// ded dpon chen por gyur pa// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' po gcig bur gyur ba/
chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen bo rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa/ chos kyi rgyal bo chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtod pa tog chen po ba rgyal po//
'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mgos khaM/ bad+ma chen pa lta bu/ chos thams cad kyigazungs masnyes pa/ rgya mtsho chen bo dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mag lo ba
ma skyod ba/ ri ba chen po lta bu/ shin tu dril med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag la/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa// nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las/

su rung ba/ chadas kha chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu btul ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bar bzhedab dad [7]stobs
bcu dang ma 'jigs pa bzhidang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo chon babaskor ba dang/ seng ge 'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dad 1/
chos kyi sbyin pa sa sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mag rnam bar sbyang ba dang/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad pa dang
sngonadam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dad/ chos kums da la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes pa'i mdzad pa'i phyir// byang chub snying por bzhud kyis
de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' lan mchod pa dang/ rimago bya ba'i las thams cad la sbrebad gyisAshig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis/ rab tsha tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag snus so// gang ga bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byamasadang snying rje dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes
tshangs pa'i las snang ba// bskal pa stadod spyod pa spyad pa de ni bya ba shing drud chas par gyur// thub pa dul bsam pa'i brtul bzhugs sgrub par byed ba'i mchod pa legs par bya/ de la

skyab su song nangan 'gro la ji dngami phradami khomami 'gyur lha yanang du 'dod pa bad ba'adas tshad ' gnas ya du 'gruba'agyur 'dug khar du dka' bsdud de sbyar nas 'dan chub shing drung bzhud//kun kyang dar

'dirab tu gu ba'i yod kyis de 'amachod pa legs por gyis//de ni stong gsum rgyal ba dbang phyug dam pa tshos dbang phyugargyal bo ste// brgya byin tshadaso pa nyakhri grong khyer dgan de dang mnyam pa gdo lang med//
gang gtsasatshanazhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drugagayosagyur pa// de ni da red bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud// gang gagatsug tshangs pa'i gnas/
[s ]'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing// ga/ngag sku la na tshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sun cu rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la// gang gi gsung bder yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshadas
dbyangs sgrasnyan cing// gang gi thugs ni rab tu khro dang bral ba de lamachod ba byed du bdong// gang dag blo gros brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam/tan pa de bas 'da' byadang// nyon mongs dang
ba'i 'khri shar kun dang dra ba dgagacod par byed 'dod dang// gzhan las mdzes par rang rgyal byang chub zhib 'chi mad thob 'dod dang// gal te sa gsum dag nas nigs rgyas nyid 'dod dga' n
bam chod par gyis// gang gas rgya mtshor bcasapa' sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang// khad bzangs skar khudabasal khang mang ldan pa dad zung du sbrel dang bzhon pa dang//
ma tog 'phreng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa skyed mo'i tshal gyis rab brgyan dang// rkang lag mgo dang mag rnams 'das su btang ba dan byang chub snyade por gzhugs// dge slong dag de ltar stong
gsum tshas pa chen po de skad cig de la// stod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyir te/ lag mthaltar mnyan par gyur pa/ gyo mo dang rdo med pa// nor bu dang/ nu
tig dang/ bin+d+hachu dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ bya ru dad/ gser dang/ dngul mang ba/ rtswa sngo zhing 'jam la galas su 'khyil cing g.yung drung 'khyil ba/ ka tsa lin+d+ri ka'i so ltar rig
[3] ]/na bde bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyin to// de'i tshe rgya mtsho min pa thams cad salta bur gyur kyang chu na rgyu ba'i ri mas can na//
la gnod pa cud zad kyad med do// 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas byang chub sems
dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stongalegs par brgyan to// byang chub sems dang go la ma chod b.las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha'i
dar malas shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'is sa gsu/sa dus rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas sa ngas rgyas kyi zhingagag
lta khur snyad bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar dag dang/ ri nag pa dang/ khor yug dang khor yug chen po dag khyad ma snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub
sems dpa' 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo// byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyod ba'i lha'i du bcu drug yod de// bdilta ste/ lha'i bu ud ka lazhes bya ba dad/ lha'i bu
mudaka la zhes bya ba dang/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang/ dpa' stobs dang/ dpung rgyan stobs dang/ rab brtan dang/ sa 'dzin dang/ snang byed dang/ dri ma med dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang/

chos kyi rtog dang/ 'grogrub dang/ mge thogs pa med pa dang/ bkod pa chen po dang/ tshul khrims rnam dag rba ldan dang/ pad+ma'i bod du lha'i bu bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snyid po yongs su skyod//
dag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir ma ldog pa'i bzod pa thob ba sha stag go de dag gsakyad byang chub sems dar ba la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sAd bo brgyan te/ dpag tshad brgyad cu khor yug
tu rin po tshe sna bdun gyi stags bu rim ba bdunagyis ni bskor/ shing ta la'i 'phreng ba dam bdun dad/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun dang/ rin po che'i brgyud pa rim pa bdun gyis ni
bskor/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi glegs bam rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa dag dang/ gsar gyi tshong tshong dag dang/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi brgya dog gse ni khebs par byas/ sId po
mchog ga sbos kyis nibadugs/ rin po che'i dra ba'akhris so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dang ga na shari sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa// bzang ba man du mchod pa//
lha lul ba dang/ ma yul pa gang dag na yod pa de dag thams cad kyang// khyodachub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skyes pa dang/ thang las skyes pa'i me tog rnam
pa sna tshogs gang dag yodapa de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub kyi snying po dor snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad ba dgo na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
mthong nasasam gyis ma khyab pa legs so zhes galA me bzhi po de dag gis kyang/ byams pa/ khrun dang sboms phun sum gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun ga
wa ]@#// bsod nams dang ya shas kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gas byed chub kyi snying bo rgyan par byed pa de dag kyang/ byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// de ltar

lca'i bu byang chub kyi snyid po yongs su skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par gyur te/ de dag lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dgags
mthong nas/ rang rang gis gnas la dur khrod tsamagyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bkod pa de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin te/ e ma hobasod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'irgyu
mthun po bsam gyis ma khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod pa'i ng ched du brjod do// byang chub kyi shang ga lha mo bzhi yod de// 'di lta ste/ bod ma dang/ snyan ldan dang/ yade

! bzangs dang/ mdangs ldan ma ste/ byang chub kyi shang ga lha mo bzhi po de dag gis kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'a la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi shang ma ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun/
sum tshogs pa/ yal ka dang/ lam dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/ khrun dad sboms phun sum tshogs pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ shan tu 'gel ba/

ba[-]shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang [7 ]'an po tsho'i dril bu g.yer ka'i drab rim pa bdun dad/ rani bo che brgyus pa'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor cade phyi rim bskor ba/ shing yongs
'du sa brtol dang 'dra ba/ mig gis bltabs ma ngoms pa bskyod do// gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bar 'dod pas phyogs don/
stong gsum gyi stod chen po 'jig rten gyi khamasakyi rdo rje'i dkyil des ba/ snying po yod pa/ ma phyid pa/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems/
dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bod 'gyedadi/ 'ad des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur ta/ ma khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to// ngan 'gro'i tshor
ba thams cad bskams par gyur to// sems can gang dag dbang po ma tshadab de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to//
ma bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to// bcing bas bcig pa rnams bcings pa las grol bar gyur to// sems can
dbul po rnams ni longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to// nyon mongs pas gdungs pa ni yongs su gdungs ba med par gyur to// bkras pa rnams ni lta khags par gyur to// skom pa rnams ni/
skom pa med par gyur to// sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas bar gyur to// zhum pa nyam chung ba rnams na stobs phunasum tshogs par gyur to// da'i tshesems can gang
thol yang 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dud/ gti mug dang/ khro ba dang/ 'chab pa dang/ tha ba dang/ gnod sems dad/ phrag dog gnod pa med par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang yang
'chi ba mad/ 'pho ba med/ skye ba med do// de'i tshasems can thams cad byams pa'i soms dang/ phanapa'i sems dang ldan zhing gcig la cig ba mar 'du shes skyed par gyur to//
pa de la 'di skad ces bya sta/ mnar mad pa lathug pa'i bar/ dmyalab ma bzad snang ba la/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsnga la zhi// bad ba'i tshor ba phob par gyur// dud 'gro'i skya 'gro/
sems can rnams/ phan tshun gnod byad ji snyed ga/ thub chen bod kyis phog pas na/ de dag byams pa'i sems khyadas kA yi dgas 'jig rten ma dgas rnams// bkres skom nyid
ba rjes da pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dgu zas skom red par gyur/ tam khom thams cad chadagyuratsad// ngan 'gro rnams kyadaskams bar gyur// sems can thams
cad bder gyur to// lha yi bdabs rab tutshamag/ mgadang rna ba yod pa dang// gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams// de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shadi// yan lag thams cad mdzes ]
par gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa'i// nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang// gnod gyur de tsha nyon mongs kun// zhi bar gyur te bde dang ldan// smyos pa dag ni dran ldan/
zhing// dbul po dag kyang don dang ldan// nad kyis btab pand sos shang// bcing bas bcings pa grol bar 'gyur gsar stsa mdatsad dag med de// gnod sems dang ni rob dag/ ban tshan
byed ba med gyur te// de tshabyams pa'i sa mas su gnas// ba dang ma dag bu gcig la// ji ltar phangs par sams ba ltar// de bzhin sems can phan tshun du// da tshabu phangs bzhin
dusems// byang chub sems dba'i 'od dra yis// phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang// gang+ga'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi// 'di rnams bsam gyis mkhyab bsal// rabo nag po rnamA
dang ni khor yug dag kyang mi snang gyur// rgya chen zhing rnams dadag kun// gcig ba ji bzhin da lta'i snang// lag mthAl lta bur gyur ba te// byang chub sems dpa ba mtshod bcu'i//
zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyan pas// thams cad rin chen nyid du snang// byang chub snyad po'i rim gro ba// lha ni de ltar bcu drug yod// dpag tshad brgyad cu'i sa khyon nang// byang
chub snying bo brgyanapar gyur// zhire rnams bya ba mtha' yas na// bkodab chan po gang yod// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag thams cad der yang snang// lha dang
klu dang gnod sbyin dang// na 'am ci dang lta 'phye che// rang rang gzhal med khang rnams la// dur khrod 6ma du shes bar gyur/ bde ni bkod pa de mthong nas// lha
bo dang ma rnams ngo mtshar gyur// bsod nams gdang rgyu mthun 'dir// phun sum 'di 'dra 'dilegs mtshar// lus dang ngag dad yod rnams kyis// brtson par byed pa medang ra nang//
rtsod pa yid la 'dod pa dang// bsam pa thams cad rab tu bgab// ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang// sngon rjod tshe na rdzogs gyur pa// las de'i rnam bar sbyin pa las// 'di bdu'i yun
sum tshogs bde byung// byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhin// lha yi shing gi yongs 'du ba// de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis// byang chub snying bor rgyan par byas// byang chub snyid po'i bkod pa
ba'i gang/ lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa// yon tan de dag tshig gis ni// thams cad brjod par yong ma nus// dge slod dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba/
rnam par dag pa/ drim med pa/ lus dang sems rnam par byed cing dga' ba skyed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba// sems can la dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ dad pa dang/
mchog tu dga' ba thams cad skyod ba des/ klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas snang bar byas par mthod nas// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po radaga 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshig
ba (su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang phyir bdag gis gnas 'dir gsar gyi 'od kyi brgyan nga ra lhang nger gyur ba las// ji ltar 'khodapa 'jig ga 'damadzes mthad zhang gsar zhes bya ba
mthong ba dang// ji ltar 'od srungs chos kyi rgyal po'i skyon mad pa yi drand 'da mthong ltar// mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ya shes 'ad ldan pa zhig byung du the tsen med// sngon
chad nyes par byas pa las kyi bdag gi khyim na shin tu mun pas gang// khyim 'di nan te ma zla ba dag ga rgya chen 'od kyang yong mi snang// me dang nor bu dag dang dri mar klog dang skar ma rnam
kyi 'od ma snang// brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha man rnams kyi 'od ma snangan// de ring khyim 'di nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba ya de bas mdzes gyur la// sems kyang dga' ba spyod
cade lus khyad bde bar gyur la lus ni bsal gyur to// lus kyi steng du bye tshan ba bab pa de yang bdag la bsal bar gyur pa las// bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyad pa byang chub shang drung bzhud pa'od
gsal// klu'i me tog mdzes dang bzang la drazhim gas dang mu tig do shal dang// rgyan dang gdub bu dag dang phyi ma rnams dang bdug ba mchog rnams myur thogs la// glu dbyangs dag dang rol
mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs gyis shig rnga dang rdza rnga dag/ brdung zhing 'gro ba kun gyi mchod 'os than pa mdzad la mchod pa khyad du 'dang// de langs te klu yi bu mo rnams dad ldan ga phyogs ba
tha @#// bltas pa dang// de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur gzi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig/ lha dang lha man bya ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis
bskor// dga' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'di zhes ston cing 'dod ba mthong// klu yi rgyal de rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rtena mchog la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas
de ya rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug/ klu ya bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la mchod pa khyed// ma tog rnams dang sbos dang byug pa dag kyang 'thor zhing
'tsho sal snyan rnams kyang byed// klu yargyal po rab tu dga' nas thal spar yang dag yon tan rnams kyis stod// 'dren pa 'a jig rten dam pa dgung zla 1 bzhal badra mthong bar gyur pa legs//

bdag gas sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang do 'dra ste// de ring khyedakyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom sta bzhi dapa' ga 'phangs brnyes par 'gyur// gang gi don du sngon chad
dul dang sbyin dang bsdams shing bdog pa kun btang la// gang gi don du dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgom// gang gi don du brtson 'grus bstan dang bsam gtan dgyes dad
tsho shes rab 'bar mdzad pa// khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur// ji ltar ljon shing lo ma ma tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shangal 'dud// jalta bu s/

ba chab kyis gang ba stong dag khyod la skor ba rab bgyid cing// ji ltar tsam shi'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang// ji ltar ngang pa khrung khrung tshogs kyad mkha' la mchazhing
tshul du shes ldan pa// dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni skor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur// ji ltar gsar gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes pa'i bod rnams zhing na brgyar mchis// ji ltar na

song mtha' dag zhi bar gyid cing skye dgu'i sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang// ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnasagyis rgyun chadasar ma'ang dal bus 'dang ba las// srid ba gsum du skye dang rga ba thar mdzad pa la/
ded dpon da ra'i 'gyur// ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te khyed la mchod du lhags pa dang// tshangs dang tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam gtan bde basbadas pa dang//
gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyag dam pa thams cad 'dir lhags las// srid pa gsum du skyo ga thar bar mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal bod na de byon// ji ltar lha rnams dag gas phyag dar bgyis
pa'i shul nges nas na khyodagashog sal// bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srungs dag kyang de nas gshegs// ji ltar pad+ma bzang po dra ma ma mchis rnam dag dog sa
brtol byung ste// de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor las de rang dgra bcom 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du mab gang+gA'i klung gi sa snyad gyi bdud// de dag rnams kyis khyang

bya// chub shing drud nas ni khyod la kha skyod pa 'am ga/chub shang drung nas ni cumnus// mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa dus gang+gA klung gis bye ma snyed// khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir
sbyad des na bdadi na rnam par mdzes// rgyu skar zla ba bcas shang skar ma nyi mar bcas ba mkha' las sa lungagada'// ra mchog chen po rang ga gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams khar
zlo'agyur yang gda'// skyes bu mkhas pa bzhi bo dag re re nas niston nus gda'// khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob bzhings lagadab// gang gi slad du kha losgyur/
kha mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang// byang chub tu yang sbra bas bdag gis dod pa 'bal brgya chen rnyed par gyur// bur bcas bdag dang klu yi bu mo thams cad skya pa gnas 'ad lasaM
thar gyur cing// glang po dregs pa'i stabs su bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchis par bgyi// ga slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal bo nag po chud ma dam pa gsar 'od cos bya ba/ klu'i
bu mo rin po che'i gdugs snatshogs thogs pa dang/ sil snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ mu tig gi do shalasna tshogs thogs pa dang/ nor bu rin po tsho sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ lha dang ma'i phreng
ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ bog bor sna tshogs thogs pa dang/ sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems
na/ dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin po cha'i ma tog sna tshogs mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bas kyang bstod do// 'khrul pa ma mnga' ma bsnyesal 'dzams dag ma tsha// ma zhum pa
mnarab tu dgyes par gdul dka' ba// ma chags ma sdang ma rmongs brkam pas mnga' ba/ chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sman pa zug rdu bral ba gdul ba gagadul mdzad pa[P/]
'grol ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad sman pa mchog/ gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa ma byin nas ni// 'jig rten gsum 'di'i gnas dang skyabs su khyodabyung ngo// ji ltar
lha tshogs rab tu dad cing dag 'gyur te// ma tog char pa chen po mkhalas 'bebs pa dang// bde dag ji ltar gas chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las// de ring rgyal khag 'gyur gyis rab tu gyos
ba medzod// shing dbang drud du gshegs la kharedas pa ma mngab bzhugs// bdud kyi de las rgyal mdzod nyon mongs dral ba drol// sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar//
byang chub zhi ba dam pa mchog tu 'tshad rgyur mdzod// khyod kyis gang gi don du bskal pa bya mang du// 'grobasgrol ba'i don du dka' spyad ba mdzad// khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs tedus lad bab kyis
shing dbang drung du gshegs de byang chub mchog rig mdzod// dge slong dag de nas byang chub lams dbang 'di snyam du bsamasate// sngonagyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni
utu// zhig la bzhugs nas// bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo// de nas des na nga 'disnyam du bsams te// nubating nas
bzhugs so snyam mo// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tshogs brgya stong bar snang la 'khod pa dag gis// byang chub sams dpa'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shesanas ga
'di skad ces smras so// de de bzhin no/ skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rtsa btid pa la bzhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas lam gyi g.yas rol na 'tshod bkra shis pa zhes bya bsdu sde ba 'jam ba/ shin tu gzhon pa/ nyams dga' ba/
! lcang lor 'khyil par 'dug pa g.yas su 'khyil ba/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu [7 ]ka tsa lin+di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ rab tu zhim pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa// yid du bod ba dag rda zhed 'dug
pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas lam bod rtswa 'tshong bkra shas pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni/
kun shes par byed pa dang/ rnam par shes par byed ba dang/ rnam par gsal ba dang/ ma tshod pa dang/ chags par byed pa dang/ snyan cing 'jebs pa dang/ mnyan par 'os pa dang//
snyam pa dang/ go bar byed pa dang/ sku la bdad/ tsham par byed pa dang/ dga' bar byed ba dad/ ma rtsub pa dang/ sha sha bo malan pa dang/ ma band bdad/ mabarkam pa dang/
'jam pa dang/ snyan pa dang/ rnar bde ba dang/ lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhesdang dang/ gti mug dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtog pa sol
ba dang/ kal pang+kabs skad lta bu dang/ bya kun la dang/ shang shang te'u lasogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i ng dolta bu dang/ rnga po tshe dang/ glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang/ ldan pa dang/
gnod pa med pa dang/ bden pa dang/ gsal ba dang/ yang dag pa dang/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang/ rgya mtsho'i sgrub shugs lta bu dang/ ri rdeb pa'i sgra lta

bu dang ldan pa dang/ lha'i dbang po dang/ lham yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bkod pa dang/ zab pa dang gting dpog dka' ba dang/ bdudakyi stobs skabs med par byed pa dang/ phasakyi sgrol ba'i smra ba 'jom

ra dang/ seng ge 'i sgrub shugs lta bu dang/ rta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin ba'i nga ro lta bu dang/ glu sgra sgrogs ba lta bu dang/ 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhib
thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang/ gdul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dad/ tab tab po ma yin pa dang 2 'tshe ba med pa dang/ ma shal ba dad/'tsham pa dang/
rigs pa dang/ dus su sba ba dang/ dus las ma yol bdang/ chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang/ gtem pa dang/ thogs pamed pa dang/ rgyun chad pa med
pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang/ skad cig gis skad thams cad sgrogs pa dang/ bsam pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang/ bde ba thams cad skyed pa dang/ thar pa'i lam yang dag par
ston pa dang/ lam gyi tshogs skya bdang 'khor las ma 'da' ba dang/ 'khar thams cad tshim par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungasapa dang mthun pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas

da lta bu'i tshig gis rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bkra shis rtswa dag nga la myur du byin// de ring nga la rtswas ni don chen 'gyur// dpung dang bcas pa bdud ni bcom nas
su byang chub la pa zhi b.reg par 'gyur// gang gi ched dung yas bskal stong du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang stod byas dang// tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub rab spud pa// de ni
ring nga yis thob par 'gyur// bzodapa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs// bsam gtan stobs dang de bzhin shes rab stobs// bsod nams dang ni mngon shes rnam thar stobs//
band ring nga la 'grub par 'gyur// shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs gang dang// rdzu'aphruladang ni chags med byams pa'i stobs// so so yang dag rig dang bden pa'i stobs// de ni dang/

nga la 'grub par 'gyur// de ring nga la la sbyin byas na ni khyed la bsod nams stobs nam tha ba las te/de ni khyod kyi ngan pa bsgyur ma bsgyur/ khyod kyang ston pa bla na med par 'gyur//bkra shis dag ni 'dun pa tshig snyan rab tu mdzes thob
nas/ dga' zhing mgu la yi rang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyisanaM// rtswa 'jam gzhon zhing bzang la reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs// mdun du 'dug nas ragatu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skad
skyas// gal te rtswa yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa// mchog gyur zhi ba blta dka' sngonagyi rgyal ba lam 'thob na [7]yon tan chen bo rgya mtsho'i grags ba dpag med khyod bzhes shig/
bdag gsago 'phang dam pa 'chi med thog mar 'tshang brgyar bgyi// brtul zhugs dka'athub rnamamang bya dka' bskal mang ma spyad pa na// bkra shis rnamatshog bting bas byang chub 'di ni thob ma'agyug
gang tshe blo gros ldan pa/ shes rab pasonganams thabs kyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba thub pas rdul mad 'gyur zhes lung ston to// bkra shas ga 'gate byang chub skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na//

srog chags bsdu ba byas te sbyin par yade gnyis khyod mazag/ gang tshe nga yis byang chub thob shes bdud tsa rnam par dbyes// khyed bongos tshes kyi dam pa ton dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur// 'dren pas
shin tu mchog tu 'jam pa'i rtswa ni spar gang blangs// sengag ngang pa'i stabs kyis chas nas ni rab tu g.yos// lhaklu tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar ta rab tu dga' yid kyis// deng bas bdud
]/dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na/ lha'i bu rnams
dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ byang chub kyi shing brgyad bris

brgyan par gyur to// de nas bya chub kyi shing kha cig na me tog garang bzhin can la 'bang du dpag tshad brgya pa lad yod/ byang chub kyi shang kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhinatsan la/ baphadu dang ga tshad

btsa stod pa mang yod/ byang chub kyashing kha cig nitsan+dan gyi rang bzhin la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bumar yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni shes kyi dad pa zhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad lnga 'bul ba

yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing khacig na rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phad du dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shang kha cig na rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can la ba pang
du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa yang yod de// byang chub kyi shing do dag thams cad kyi drung na yang dziltar 'tsham pa'i seng ge 'i khri/ lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba bshams

bar gyur to// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ga drung du na pad+ma'i khristan bshams par gyur to// khatsog gi drung du na sbos kyi khri stan no// kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshog sakyi khri stan
no// byang chub sems dpa' ni ril ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa gzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan rolo ba bkodapa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms//
par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dba' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyi byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng ge 'i khri de dag thams cad la
'dug par kun tu snang sta/ byang chub sems dbang dang/ lha'i bu so so'i yid la yang/ byang chub sems dbab nibadag med kyiseng ge 'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'jug gi/ gzhan
gyi la ni ma yin par shes so// ji ltar de dgags shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dba'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkodapa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye
gnas pa dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa thams cad dang/ lhadang ma thams cad dang/ 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi
shing drungan song ga'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo// de lta mod kyi 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongs suches par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rtsa
gang thogos te/ byang chub kyi sharig la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bdag nyid kyi rtswa brtsi mo nanang du bstan/ rtsa ba'i phyir bstan nas
ba bya lcab/ deng pa kun nas bzod po btang ste/ song lta bu dang/ dpa' bo lta bu dang/ stobs lta bu dang/ brtan pa lta bu dang/ brtson 'grus lta bu dang/ mthu lta/
bu dang/ glang po lta bu dang/ dbang phyug lta bu dang/ rang byung lta bu dad/ ya shes can lta bu dang/ bla na mad pa lta bu dang/ khyad par du 'phags pa lta bu dang/ mngon par 'phags pa lta bu
dang/ grags pa lta bu dang/ brjod pa lta bu dang/ sbyin pa lta bu dang/ tshul khrims lta bu dang/ bzod pa lta bu dang/ bca na 'grus lta bu dang/ bsam gtan lta bu dang/ shes rab lta bu
dang/ ye shes lta bu dang/ bsod nams lta bu dang/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang/ tshogs lta bur skyil mo krung bcas nas/ rtsa bting ba de la shar phyogs su ltas te 'dug nas/
lus drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon dung zhag nas 'di 'dra ba yadam brtan po byas so// stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang dud/ pags pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung/ bskal
mang red dkar byang chub ma thob par/ stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o// byang chub kyi sAd por bzhudapa le'u zhes byas bcu dgu'o/
[z/ ]'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris drug gala rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed pa ma 'byung grang snyam ste/ shar phyogs legs su gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byed phyogs
kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrung bar gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dba' byang chub kyi snying pal 'dug pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba zhes bya ba 'ad byung nas/
bod des phyogs bcu kun tu grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ chos kyi dbanges kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas shing thams cad sna da bar gyur to// de nas shar
phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs ba dri ma med pa 'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par byad chub sems dbang mas dpa' chen po bad ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas
byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing na dun du bdar te/ byang chub kyisAde po ga la ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba so'i sa ban nan/ byang chub sems
dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas phyogs bcur nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad 'khor gyi khyams yi cha rgya sngon po dag las byas pa gcig tu bstan to// 'gro ba ldan skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mdun du pa da/ byang chub sems dpa ba byang chub kyi snying
ba// bo la 'dug par bstanato// sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du song mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' ston tsang sems can tshul du shis pagazugs 'di lta bu dang
ldan pa 'di su zhig/ 'di ltar rnam par mdzas pa'i sems can 'di su zhig zhes 'dzin to// sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa ba des byang chub sems dbab rnamA kya sprul
dan byang chub sems dpabagazugs de dgagis tshigs su bcad pa 'di lcas so// ci yang med pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rtog pa gang yin bag chags bcas bton pa/ gang gis lus las 'od/
phyung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'di na med par byas// gang gis bsod nams tang 'dzan ye shes tshogs ni skal pa mang por kun spel ba/ shAkya thub pa thub pa chen po dam ba 'di na//
phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes// de nas lho phyogs nad bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhange 'jig rten gyi khams ran po tsho bkod par/ byang chub sems dpA
sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs brtsogs kun tu ston ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bs/ byang chub sems dang ba bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cad mdun du bdar te/
byang chub kyis dpo ga la ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dbabal mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i gdugasagacig gas thams cad dang ldan
pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de na brgya byin dad/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rtenaskyong ba dag phan tshun bde skad 'dzer to// gang gi phyi rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'adi
snang bar gyur pa 'di su 'brasabu zhes 'dzar to// de nas rin po che la dur sa de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo// gags rin po che dang spos gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag/ byams
pa yid kyis do zla med par bzhugs dang mya ngan bdas la phul// de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa than mdzad sred med bu la mthu ldan pa// yon tan mnga' ba byang chub shang dud gshegs pa de la
mchod pa byas// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin ga[︽]shegs pa me tog phreng ba dang nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po'i dra ba can zhes bya ba 'dadus bskul bas/ byang chub sems dbab bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis
yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi sAng pog la ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa las phyi'i rin po tsho'i
dra ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams te bkab bo// de na phyogs bcu'i lha dang [7 ]klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dag phan tshun du 'di skad 'dzar te/ 'od kyi bkod pa rnam
pa bad lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzon to// de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las gas su bcad pa 'di byung ngo// rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chan
to rin chen dam pa rin chen grags pa de chos dgyes// dkon mchog gsum po rgyun ma 'chad pa'i brtson 'grus brnyas// byang chub mchog brnyes 'gyur ted la mchod pa bod

de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla zil du rlag pa byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jigarten gyi khams nyi ma 'khor bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i
rgyal po zhes bya ba bod des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ta/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la bo dad byang chub sems dpa'

ga la bder dong ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mched pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sa das rgyas kyi zhing la yon tan bkod pa ji snyed bde snyid 'khor skye khams/
der kun tu bastan to// de na byed chub sems dpa' la cig bdaskad ba dzar te/ bkod pa rnam pa 'dilta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzar to// de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su
bcad ng 'di byung ngo// gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mad pos lus ninam sbyangs shang/ gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis ngag spangs la/ gang gis
khrel yodamos pa byams dang de bzhin snying rjesasams spyas pa/ de ni shang rgyal drung gshegs sha khyu mchog de lamachod pa byed// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na de/
bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal bo snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas su byang chub sems dba' samasarapa ba chen po yon tan gyi gros zhib bya ba
'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgad ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdarati/ byang chub kyi snyid pa ga la ba dang/ byang chub sems dbang ga la pa
der song ste phyon nas/ byang chub sems dba' la mchod pa las kyi phyir/ 'khoragyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad dad ldan pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa mngon par sbrul te khang/
pa brtsegs pa de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo// gang gi yon tan dag gis lhadang lha min dang/ gnod sbyin lta'aphyi che dag rtag tu yon tan bsgos/ yon tan can de yon tan
ldan pa'i rgyal rigs skyes/ yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing drung na bzhugs// de nas lhodang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srongashang ga sangs rgyas
kyi zhang 'jig rtenagu khams rin pa che 'byung bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dba' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dadas bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las
'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdur te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang/ byang chub sems dpab ga la ba der song sta phyin nas// byang chub
sams dpa' la na bod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams der rin po tshab mkha' rten grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprulate Da rin po tsho'i mkha' rtan de dag las tshigs su
bcad pa 'di byung ngo// gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin chen rnam dag dang// khang bzangs skar khung bsil khong chog dang zud dang bzhon pas mkha' rten brgyan// ma tog
phreng ba mdzes dang bdun sa dag dang bskyed mo'i tshal rnams dang// rkang pa lag pa mgo dang mag btang pa de byang chub snying por 'dug/ de nas nub dad byang gi phyogs mtshams na
pa[%, ]de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsogs 'brug bsgrags dbyangs
shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dba' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ta/ byang chub kyi snying pog lab dang/ byang chub sems dpagag la pa
der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dba' la mchodapa'i las kyi phyir/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i las a ga ru'i sbyin mngon par sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams der tsan dan sprul gyi snying po'i phyi
! mgi char mngon par phab ba// dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di byang ngo// rigs dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi sngon gyis sud gsum thams cad
khyab dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das bar thob byed char pa 'bebs// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba 'khri shing thams cad bag chags bcad de gsod par 'gyur//
bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me togargyas pa dad par byed ba 'byin// de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon
par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas khebs pa na/ byang chub sems dpasems dpa' chen bo gsar gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des
bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpababagrad ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ti/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang/ byang chub sams dpag la ba der song ste phyin
nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyin/ khang pa brtsigs pa de dag thams cad dang/ rin po che'i mkha' brten rnams su byang chub sems dba'agazugs mtshan sum cu
rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag mngon par sprulate/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang lta dang mam tog ga phreng bgos shing/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba
[g7 ]/der logs su lus btud nas/ me tog gi phreng ba dpyangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang gis sangs rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod cing gus dang
ba nus pas dad pa che bskyed la// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa/// byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal// danas 'og gi phyogs na deng zhin gshegs
pa kun tu gzugs kyis ngas rgyasnyakyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rnam par bltas bar byang chub sems dba' sa mas dpa' chen po'an po che'i snying po zhes bya ba bod des bskul bas/ byang
chub sems dpa' bgrang ba la 'das pa dag ga yongs bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po la 'a ba dang/ byang chub sems daba'ag la ba der sod ste phyin nas/ byang chub sam
dpa' la mchod pa'i yas kyi ya ba/[“] gyi ma yer ma bu'agling gi gser gyi pa d+ma shul tu gad bar ba stan to// pad+ma de dag ga snying ba la bud med lus phyed snang ba//
kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs po/ rgyan thams kyis brgyan par bstan te/ lag pa sa g.yon na mgul gdupa dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpud rgyan dang/ gser skud dang/ mu tig
tsho gi do shal lasogs pa rgyan rnam pa mang po thegagashing/ su topa dang/ dar gyi lta dpyangs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lags su lus btud
tu tshags su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud/ khrims ldan rtag dran dag la nga rgyalamed/ yon tan ldan pa de la/
'dud pa byos// de nas steng ga phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam par/ byang chub sems dbabasems
dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba bod des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dbab bgrang ba las 'das pa dgags yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po gal ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi mos su bskor cing/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
zhing thams cad na sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ bdug sbas dar/ gos dang/ rgyun dung/ gdugs dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa dang/ rin po tshe dang/ nor bu dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ mu tig dang/ rta dang/ glang po tshe dang/ shing rta dang/ dpung bu chung
dang/ bzhon pa dang/ shing ljonapa dang/ la ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yan dang/ nam/
[27 ]/mkha' lding dad/ ma ban na dad lto 'phye chen bo dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ mdang/ ma ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa dag thams cad
nam mkha'i dkyil nas char chen po mngon par phab ste/ thams cad dga' ba dang/ bde ba skyed kyi/ soms can gang la yang 'jigs pa bam/ gnod par ma byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te//
de la 'di skad ces bya'o// phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang// phan pa byed pa mchod par byang chub lhags gyur pa// 'gro la phan pa de dag rnams kyi bkodarami dang// rtsa la
dang rim pa mdzes pa dag ga u0f7adpa tsam nyon// kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu spyad byas te// nam mkha' las ni 'brug ltar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig mkha' las me tog gzhal/
med khang ston cing// cod pan nan chen thegs la gtsugs pud 'phyang zhing lhags// kha cig stong pa mtshan med smon med mchog brjod cing// sa las sang ge lta bur shin tu sgrogs shing

lhags// kha cig sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes 'thor zhing// khyu mchog 'dra de 'drar shin tu sgrogs shing lcags// kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stod ston cing// rma bya lta bur mkha' las shin tu
sgrogs shing lhags// khacig bde gshegs srasakyi yon tan phred brjod cing// zla ba lta bur mkha' las shin tu rgyas shing lhags// kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'byed de// bdud
kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed nyid lcags// bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbud po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i// dri med tog phegs byang chub snyade po don yang lhags// khache'i
mkha' las nor bu de chen 'dra ba 'thor// zla bzla bzangs thang skyes rnams mdzes man+dA ra// bar ngasha tsamaka dang snama'i me tog phred// byang chub sems dang ba shing rgyal rung na bzhugs la
mthor// kha nag rkang ba gnyis kyis sa ster ba bskyod la// sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags// khatsag ri bo lhun bo lag na thogs byed la// bar snang gnas te me tog sken du
'thor zhing lhags/ 'kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgal glob gsanas ni// sa la spos chu 'thorate chag chag 'debs shing lhags// kha cig rin chen mchod sdod sna tshogs thogs nas ni// rgyang ra ris
'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' ston tsad lhags/ kha rug tshadas ba lta bu zhiba'i gzugs bsgyur te// yid zhi dbazhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan ba// de dag kha spu dag las
byams dang snyad sdudang// dga' dad btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ongasgra 'byin lcags// khamig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi/ lha rnams dgasamadun du bdag nasalhagasagyur
cing// de dag byang chub shing drud phyin nas thal sbyar te// brgya byin thegs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor/ khacig phyogs bzhi dgag skyod ba ji lta bar// drib srin po mi'am rtsa las
yongs bskor te// glog ltar gsal ba'i me tog char ba 'babs shing lhags// dri za ma 'am bu skad kyis ston pa stod// kha cig me tog rgyas pa'i lten shing 'bras/
kyi/ bur bcas// me tog bcas shing mchog gi dri na ba 'byin la// lo mar sangs rgyas sras bo lus phyed gnas thogs lhags// btud nas sa ya snyad bod ma tog rnams kyang 'thor// kha cig
utu la pad+ma dkar po rgyas// bad+ma'i sId par sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas // de 'drar me tog rgyas ba'i rdzing bu thogs te lhags// chags medayad ldan byang chub sems dpa'
mkhas la stod// kha cig lhunabaltabu lus chen bskyar te lcags// bar snang ba/nas nias rang galus kyad rab tu 'dor// bod ma thag tu ma tog 'phreng ba rnams su gyur// stong gsum
dag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khobs par byed// kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu dang// de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig bar ston 'di lhags// de dag lus las ngos kyi sgo/
mo mang grag[“w]// de dag thos pas sems can khrag khrig sred pa skyed// kha cig mchu nibs pa 'dra la bzhin mdzes shing// kha bzhin rdzogs 'a ma'am ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags/
doshal sna tshogs legs brgyan bu mo chas pa 'dra// de la lta bas lha la tshogs rnams ngoms ma 'gyur// kha cag rdordzolta bur ma phyid lus can te/ rkang pa sa 'og gi chu ya phung po 'bog cing
lhags// nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin rgyas sna du byed la// 'od byed nyon mongs skyon nas btsem pa bcig lhags// kha cig don bo tshes brgyan lagan na chen phyogs// hare ma pu pa
stod dag khebs par byed cid lhags// sems can mang la phan dang bde dang zhi bya'i phyir// rin chen ni tapa/dam pa dri zhim chad pa 'bebs// khanyag gzungs chen rin po tshe lo mdzod gyur cing//
ba spu rnams nas mdo sde brag khrig rab brjod la// spobs par ldan zhing blo gros ldan la blo mchog ldan// rgyags shing ra ba dregs skye bo rtogs par byed de lhags// kha cig ri lhun po dra
ltar thogs nas ni// rab tu brdung zhing mkha' las yid 'od sgra 'byin lhags// de la sgra ni phyogs bcur byeba' zhing sod sta// bdud rtsag thob sten ba da yod 'tshang rgyar sgrog/ byang chub
kyi snyid por bkod pa'i le'u zhes byab ste nyi shu pa'o//kadage slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dba' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dang ba dag gis
byang chub snyadi por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang phyogs bcu dag ga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang/
ma byon pa dang/ daltar byang ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ byang chub kyisAd po'i rgyan pagodapa ji snyed cig yong ba de dag thams cad byang chub kyi sad po der kun tu
. ]/bstan to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sad ngo la'adug nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i
sgo bdag po dbang phyug dbad sbyar ba/ bdud sdig can de la bdag gis ma sbran par/ bdag ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab de na bdag gis mi chas
bdagags bdud sdig can baskul bar bya'o// de lasa rnam par rgyal na/'dod pa na spyod pa' lhal sogs pa thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang bdud kyi khedon bdudakya ras kyi
lha'i bu sngon dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dgags/ ngabasing ge rnam par rol ba mthod na/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems baspyod par 'gyur ro snyam mo//
dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar ba sams nas/ de'i tshosmin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig/
phyung ste/ 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'dithams cad kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ mog mog porabyas te/ radatug ngos par byas
par yang gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ba diwams cad kyang snang chen pos yongs su khyab par gyur to// bdud sdig can gyis bod de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i
sgra 'di yang thos so// sems can shin tudag pa bskal mad spyod spyad pa// zas gtsang sras pos rgyal srid dag ni'i ba sbyang sate/ phan byed de ni bdud rtsi na ngon par 'dod pas byung// byang/
chub shing drung 'ongs kyis de ringesapasgrim khabagyis/ de ni de dag kyang sbal la gzhan ya da sgrol bar byed// de ni bdag nyid grol bas gzhan yad grol bar byed// de ni bdag kyang dugs phyin gazhan
dpag dbugs kyang 'byin// yongs sumya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan zla// n gnas o nga gsum bon lus stongs par byed par gyur// lha ma rnams kyi grong khyeg dbar byed par 'gyur//
phan pa byed pa de ni bdud theb gyur nas// bsam gtan mngon shes bdud rtsa bde mchog sbyin par 'gyur// gang tshor dbyung nyid kyis chos char mngon phab tsho/ nag po'i rtsa lag khyed kyi grong
khyer stongs byed 'gyur// stobs med pas kyang stobs med 'gyur te dpudasanyams 'gyur phyogasani phyogs man su du gar 'gro shis ma 'gyur// dag spyod dag de ltar bdud sdig can bskul
ba'i tshigs subatsad pa 'di dgags bskul nas/ rmi lam rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rmis so// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdagaba gnas mun pas khyab par rmis pa ded
rang gi gnas rdulagyis gang zhing gyi mo dang/ gsog mas gang bar rmis pa dang/ bdag nyid stangs skag nas phyogs phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang/ bdag rtsodapan dang bral zhing rna cha lhung bar rmis
po dad/ bdag mchu dang/ gre ba dang/ rkanaskams par rmis ba dang/ bdag snyad kun tu gdungs par rmis ba dang/ skyed mo'i tshal gyi lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu
rnams rnyes par rmis pa dang/ rdzing rnams skams te chu med par rmis pa dang/ dad pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ ka la bidadang/ ku na ladang/ shang shang ti'u la sogs/ bya'i tshogs
rnams 'dab gshog cigs par rmis pa dad/ rje dang/ dung dad/ rdza rda dang/ khar rnga dang/ rgyudagacig pa dang/ pa wang dang/ rgyud gsum pa dang/ pheg rdob dang/ khar ba'i sa la khrol la sog
pa rol mo'icha sbyang rnams chag grugs te/ sa la lhung bar rmis pa dang/ 'khor sdug pas kyang bdud sbangs te ngo 'dzumasaganag cade phyogs gcig du deng nas/ soms shing 'khod par rmis pa dpa chung/
ma'i dam ba phreng ba can yang mal nas sa la lhung ste/ lag pa gnyis mgol rdob par rmas pa dang/ bdud kyi bu gang dag shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rad/ shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dad shin tu

gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang/ shin tu shes rab dad ldan pa de dag kyang/ byang chub sems dba' byang chub kyi snying bo mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmi lan/ bdag bu mo rnams kyang kyicud yapa/
kyi hud yab ces chod de 'don bar rmis pa dad/ bdag lus la gos dram can gyon par rmis pa dang/ bdag mgo rdulagyisagangal skya'o bsadabasong pa dang/ nyamachung ba dang/ mdangs nyams par
rmis pa dang/ bsil khad dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang/ skar khung dang/ rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gdan s rjeb par rmis pa dang/ de'i sde dpon gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/
grul bum dang/ driza'i bdag po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang skom tshugs bcas te du zhing cho nges btab nas bye bar rmis pa dang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lhab bdag po 'di lta ste/
yula 'khor srung dang [？ ]'phags skyes po dang/ mag ma bzang dang rnam thos bu dang/ brgya byin dang/ rab 'thab bral dad/ yongs su dga' ldan dang/ rab 'thul dad/ dbang sgyur la
sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bdud la ma dus shang/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang/ 'thab mo'i nang na de'i ral gri shubs nas ma phyin cing/ bdag ma shis
pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis pa dang/ nad ga 'khor gyis bdag bor bar rmis pa dang/ bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis ba dad/ bram ze mas bun bu yad bkra ma shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa
dad Dasgo ba kun tu dga' byed kyang kun tu ma dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang/ nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis ba dang/ 'dod pa'i gnas na ba gnas pa'i dbal skad du bar rmas
pa dang/ bdag ga dbad mdadabang med par gyur par rmis pa dang/ rang ga phyogs kyang phyogs ma yan par rmis pa dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang chad cing rnam par chad nas 'khrubar/
ba// rmis ba dang/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tugalos par rmis pa dang/ shing rnams kyang bcad ng ba gam yang lhung bar rmis ba dang/ bdud kyi sde bkod pa
thams cad kyang khas bub tu skyel bar rgyas pa ste/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta burmis so// de sad pa dang/ 'jigs skrag sngangs nas
nad ma thams cad bsogs te/ dpung dang bcas pa dad/ 'khor dang sde dpon dang/ sgo ba dang/ de dag 'dus par gnas/ tshags su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdud des rmi lam de dag
mthong nas nyam thag ste// sde dpon bdud po sid be za 'gram zhes bya dang// bu rnams dag dad bakhor rnams gang dag yin la smras// nag po'i rtsa lag de dag kun la longs su dris// shAkya'i
nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras// lo drug bar du bya dka' rtul zhugs drag pa spyad// byang chub shing drung bongs kyis rab tu sgrims shig ces// mdad sum bar snang las na tshogs
