bcad de skad grag/ byang chub sems dpa' de 'ang rnam par sangs rgyas nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang bo rnam rtogs byed// gang tsho bdud rtsa thob ste bsal ba'i dngos reg tshe// des ni
nga gnas ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur// dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni rab dong la// shang dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong gcig de gzhom par bya// 5/na lag bzhi ba'i sde rnams myur
dud btubasgrims// gal te nga la spu ga sems shol ma byed cig (dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang// mya ngan 'dang bas bdag dpung nyam chung yong ma 'gyur/
de yad cig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni// bgrang las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rag ni gzhar ma 'chad// dge slongadag de nas bdud kyi bu dang dbon zhes bya bas/ bdudasdug can de la tshigs su
bcad de smras pa// yab nubeg ca nongs zhal gyur cang zhal mdog nyams// thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan lag nyid la 'dan// khyod kyis gsan nya gzig sa myur du bka' stsol cig/
yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyor ba 'tshal bar bgyi// nga rgyal med bdud smas pa bu gcig da las nyon// des na sdig pa barmi lan shin tu mi bzad rmis// de ni 'khor 'dir de kun ma
lus smras na ni// khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tusmyalabar 'gyur// ded dpon gyis smras pa/ gal te 'thab dus bab ste brgyal na nongs ma mchis// gal te der ni bcom par gyuran
nongs dang bcas// gal takhyod kyi rmi lam de 'dra'i ltasalags na// gzhagon dge ste g.yul ngor yongs su gnas ma 'gyur// bdud kyis smas pa/ brtsal ba grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul don
grags par 'gyur// gal te brtan la brten te legs byas bdag cag rgyal// kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su/ kho bo'i rkyang par mgos phyag ma 'tshal des ma nus//
ma/ @#// ded dpon gyis skyas pa/ rgya chen dabung bdog kyang nishin tu mthu chud sta// stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis naag yul las rgyal// gal tesrin bu me khyer stodagasum//
gdagyur kyang// nyam gcig lu'i zilatu rlag ste 'od ma bgyid// gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti tshug mchas la dpyod ma mchis// mkhas dang mi mthun bgyid pa de gsom nus// dge
slong dag de ltar bdud stagacan gyi ded dpon gyis tshig ma ma nyan nas/ yan lag bzhi pa'i dbun chen po stobs che ba/ thab tsho la dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba/ spu zing zhes byed nus pa dang lta ba

ma rnams kyis sngon ma mthong la thos ba bzhin bsgyur ba// rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ rkang lag sprul brgya stod gos dkris pa dad ldan pa (ramapadad
ts+tso mda' gzhu dang/ mdung mthud dad/ mda' bo che dang/ sta re dad/ rtse gsum khagadeng dang/ bod ba dang/ gtunashing dang 2 ba tsan dang/ zhags pa dang/ phyag to dang/ 'khor/
la dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa thogs pa/ lus la go cha bzang po bgos pa/ mgo dang rkang lag dang ma log par bdug ba/ mgo dang mig dad gdod 'bar ba/ lta dad na/
lag dbyibs ma sdug pa/ bzhin gzi brjid drag po dang ldan pa/ ]shin tu bzhin bsgyur cing so btsagis pa/ 'jigs su rud bar ma che ba gtsigs pa/ lce stag cade zhing che ba mang po
'phyang ba[7 ]lce'abar 'bur can re lde dang 'dra ba/ mig med/ sbrul nag po dug gargyas pa'i mig ltar dmar ba dag char bcug ste de la kha cig ni sbrul gdug pa skyag/ kha cig ni
nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho nas phyung ba bzhin du lag mthil du sbrulaM gdug pa bzhag ste za/ kha cig ni mi'i sha dang khrag dang/ rkang lag dang/ mgo dang/ mkhal mo dang [7 ]nad grol dang
ngan skyags la sogs pa za/ kha cig ni gzugs ste bsangs dang kham pa po dad sngon po dad/ dmar pa dang/ ser por 'dug ste/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshog sacan
kha cig na mig zhags pa dad/ mayig khron pa lta bu dang/ mig phyung ba lta bu dang/ mag 'bar bdad/ mag gzur nyanang ma sdug pa/ kha cig ni mig leg pa dang/ 'bar bdad/ ma sdug pa/ khasug
ni 'bar ba thogs te/ 'gying zhing ri gzhan la zhon te 'ong/ kha cig nishad rtsa thon byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i go sa surgyug cing 'od/ kha cig ga rna ba phag rna ltadudang/ zhebem lta bu dang
glang po'i rna ba lta bu dad/ 'phyang ba dang [0f09 ]phag rna lta bur 'dug pa/ kha cig na rna ba med pa kha yig niked nus mang po sprul nas/ lus 'di nang gsus pa che la sna zhen pa/ gsus pa bum pa
lta bur 'dug pa/ rkang pa mgo'i byed pa lta pa'i dug pa/ pags pa dang/ sha dang khrag skams pa/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ rkang lag dang/ mgo dang/ mgo bcad pa/ kha cig ni khrab ka'athung 'dod
pasagacig la gcig pa gcod pa kha cig ni sgra sha sha po dang/ sgra mi snyan pa dang/ 'jigs su rung ba dang/ sgra rtsub pa dang ldan pa/ hu tuzhes bya ba dang/ pi tsha zhes bya bar ng
hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pa dang/ sbyags pa len pa dang dge sbyong ga'u ta ma 'di shing dadas te 'on nub/cas zar ba dang/ 'dicig ces zer ba dang/ rgyugs shig ces zer ba dang/
rab tu rgyob cig ces zer ba dang/ chedis ngoshag ces zer ba dang/ zug shig ces zer ba dang/ chod cag cesazer ba dang/ gtubasashig ces zer ba dang/ gtogs shig ces zer ba dang/
bababab tu 'or cag ces zer pa dag go/ kha cig na wa dang lce sbyang dang/ phag dang/ bod bu dang/ ba lang dang/ glang po che dad/ rta dang/ rnga mo dang/ rkyang dang/ ma hudang/ri bong dang/
rgyu g.yag dang/ bas dang/ ri dgas/ ldad sko skal sogs pa'i ba gdengasna tshogs 'jigs su rung ba[7. ]sngangs par byed pa/ ma sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go/ kha cig ni seng ba dang stag dang/
phag rgod ded/ dredadad/ spre'u dang/ gzig dang/ bya la dang/ ra dang/ lugadang/ sbrul dang/ ne'u le dang/ nya dang/ chu srin dang/ chu srin byis pa gsod dang/ rus sbaladang/ bya rog dang
kyi bya rgod dang 'ug pa dang/ nam mkha' ltang lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa dag ge kha cig ni gzugs ma sdug pa dag ge/ kha cig ni mgo gcag pa dang/ mgeganyis pa nas mgo brgya stod gabar dang
'a ldan pa dag ge/ kha cig ni mag med pa ga go/ kha cig ni lag pa gcig pa nas('a ga pa brgya stod gabar dad ldan pa dag ba// kha cig ni lag pa med par ga ge/ kha cig girkang pagacig pa nas rkang pa/
brgya stong gi bar dang ldan padag go/ khacag na rkang pa med pa dag ge/ kha cig ni rna ba dang/ kha dang/ snadang mgadang/ lta ba budabunas sbrul gdug ba 'byin to// kha cig na ral gri dang/
mda' gzhu dang/ mdung thung dang/ rtsagasum kha gded dang/ dgra sta dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mdab be cho dang/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang/ rdo rdzogs dang/ bongodang/ mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa
mtshon cha sna tshogs sor zhing gar byed la/ byang chub sems dpa' la sdigs mo byed do// kha cig nama'i sor mo bcad nas 'phredab brgyus te thogs so// kha cig ni kad nus dang/ thod pa dbabreng ba lta
bur brgyus te thogs so// khacig ni lus sbrul gdugabs dkris so// kha cig ni mgol zhugs lang ma can thogos te/ glang bo da/ rta dad (rda mo dang/ ba lang dang/ bong bu dang/ ma hal zhon/
no/ kha cig ni spyi'i tshugs su 'dug la kha lta bu'i spu can g go/ kha cig ni ba lang dang/ bong bu dang/ phag rgod dang/ rnabu 'dang/ ra dad/ lug dang bya la dad/ spre'u dang/ sbyang kadang/
lce sbyang gi spu lta bu dong ldan la sbrul gdug pa skyugs tsang/ lcags kyi thu lum mdi pa dang/ me'abyin pa dang/ lcags dang/ zangs 'bar ba'i char 'bebs pa dang/ lce 'bobs pa dang/ dordzo'i
kha
[331/]lce 'bebs pa dang/ lcags kyi bye mtshan po tsho'i char 'bebs pa dang/ sprin nag po bsdus te rlud ga tshar 'bebs pa dang/ mda' spran bsdus te char du 'bebs pa dang/ khun/
sho nag ston pa dang/ sgra 'byin cad byang chub sems dpa' lags su rgyug pa dgag/ kha cig ni zhags pa skor ba dang/ tshen po nAl bar byed ba dang/ rgya mtsho tshon pa 'khrug par byed pa dang/ mi
rje chen po las mcher ba dang/ ra'i rgyal po lhun po sprul ba dang/ rgyug ba dang/ 'bros pa dang/ yan lag dang/ nying lag 'thor ba dang/ lus skor ba dad/ gad mo cher rgod pa dang bud brdung ba
dang/ brang la rdzob pa dang/ mgo gsag pa dang/ nag 'bar zhing skra gyen du 'greng ba dang/ phan tshun shugs zhing rgyugasang/ wa' mag lta bu s byang chub sems dpa' la'ajigs par byed do//
ts+tso bud med rgan mo dag kyang du nyid byang chub sams dpa'i gan du lhags te/ 'di skad du/ kyi hud bu kyi hud nga' bu/ longs shig longs la myur du bros shig ces 'dzaro// srin mo gzugs

dang sha za mo'i gzugs dang/ yi dgas lang ba theng pa zhi babakres pas 'di pa lag kha sgreng/ (kha bsdus pa dag kyang ngu zhing 'jigs ba ston te/ sngangs par byed cadi byang chub sems dbang mdun na rgyagage/ bdud kyi dbur
kyi dpung dag gas/ thad ka dang steng gang bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya sta/ gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/ srin ya ngegs sha za'i gzugs dang bcas/ 'jig rten
ma sdug drag gzugs ji snyed pa// thams cad sgyu yis de na sprulab byas/ mag gcig ma gnyis ma gosum ldan pa nas/ bag stong bar du ldan zhing gnod sbyin mad// lag gcig lag gnyis/
lag gsum ldan pa nas// lag stod bar du ldan pa rab tu mang// rkang gcig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas// rkang stong bar du ldan pa lag zhan yang mang// kha bzhin sngo la lus naser ba dang
khabazhin ser la lus n snga ba dang// kha bzhinadakar la lus naganag ba dang// kha bzhin gnag la lus ni dkar ba dang// kha bzhinagazhan lalus kyang gzhan pa dang// de 'dra'i gzugs
brnyan dag gi dbung rnams lhags// stag dang sbruladang bag gagadong can dang/ glang po rta dang bod bu rdza mo'i gdong// sbubu nad seng ge dradakya gdod can dang// de 'dra'i kha gdod ldan pa dbud
rnams lhags// ral bsdus la 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mang// lus mgo rus sa 'bar 'bur sba bcan// lus na ma las khrag gis rab tu sbags// gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag de yang
lhags// rkang pa dag ni dge ba'i rkang pa 'dra// mig gi 'bras bu spre'u ya mag dang mtshungs// mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra// kha mdog de 'dra'i dbung rnams der yang lhags// lus kyi
dbyibs ni chu sra na 'dra ba ste// mag gi 'bras bu gnyis ni rab tu 'bar// rna bdag ni ra ya rna ba 'dra// kha dong de 'dra'i dpung rnan sa der yang lhags// kha cig dag ni lag na
dbyig pags// kha mdung thung gsum lagan thogs// kha cig ra ba lcan bo lag na thags// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can ganadasbyin lhags// gshol thogs 'khor lo thogs shing
mig bsgyur dang// ri rtsa chen bo lag na thogs pa dang// rlud dang rdo dang gnam lcags rab babebs shing// gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung pa der yang lhags// rud grwa rib tu gtor zhad char mang
'bebs// brgya phrag stong gi glog kyang btu'abyin// 'brug gi sgra yang sgrog cing shing ljon sgyel// byang chub shing ga lo ma tsam ma g.yo// char ba rab tu 'phebs shing rlung yang gtong// chu bo
'bebs shang chu yis sa yang gang// de ltar 'jigs su rung ba mtshan mo byung// de la nub ma sems med shad yad skyel// thams cad dbyibs ma sdug cing gzugs ma sdug/ 'jigs
pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong nas kyang// yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa'o// lhunapa lta bu nasems ni g.yo ba med// sgyu ma 'dra zhid rmi lam mtshungs pa dang// sbyin dang 'dra bar/
zlachos rnams kun la rtog/ de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtog bas na// legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas// gang zhig de dang da la snyam sems shang// dngos dang lus la mang
dag mngon zhen pa// ma mkhas kha dzin bdag nas des ma thod nas na// 'jigs par gyur cing bdag kyang rab tu myos// shAkya'i sras pos chos rnams brten byang ba// dngos po med pa'i
ngo bo nyid du rtogs// nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang rab tu ldan// dbud pa cas g.yo sgyu mthong yod myos pa med// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi bu stodape do dag ga nang nas ded dpon/
la sogs pa bdud kyi bu ga nga dag byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa de dag ni bdud kyi g.yas rol du 'khod par gyur to// gang dag bdud kyi phyogs byed pa de dag ni bdud sdig can gyigalon
rol du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu de dag la sbyas pa// yu bu cag tsa'adra ba'i dbung gis/ byang chub sems dpa' gadul bar bya/ de nagayas rol nas/
bdud kyi bu red dbon zhes bya bas/ ba la tshigs su bcad do smas pa// klu yi dbang po gnyid lag slod 'dod dang// glang po'i dbod po gnyid log slong 'dod dang// ri dgas rgyal bo gnyid
'bag slong 'dod dang// de ni ma dbang legs gnas slod ba'odod// g.yon rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros ngan pa zhes bya bdes/ 'di skad ces smras so// bltas pa tsam gyis snying yang rab
tu 'gas 'gyur la// 'jig rten dag na snyad bo ldan pa'i shing chen 'gas// bdag ba lta bas phog na 'gro ba 'chis phog ltar// 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i mthu ni dal ga la mchas//
tsa ]/g.yas rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas sbas pa/ bltas pa tsam gyis shang yad 'gasan ma rnams la// bdag bsgrim bya dgos shes smas snyade bag la
klo yod galate bltas pas ri bostun bo 'jigs 'gyur yang// de yi mdun du byed na mgo 'byed yod mnus// gzhan yang Da ma gang rgya mtsho lag paganyis kyis rgal 'dod cing// de yi
chu brngubs te 'thung bar nus 'gyur gyis// de ya de bzhin dran nad la mngon sum du// blta ba de na de bas sdugapasngal che zhes smras// g.yon rol nas lag pa brgya pa zhes bya bas lcas
'a6 pa// bdag gsalus lag pa brgya mchis pa// gcig gas kyang na mda' brgya 'phang bgyi ste// dag sbyong de yi lus ni dbug par bgyi/yab rgyag bdar 'gyur ma shel khyod gshags
( shang/ g.yas rol nas blobazang po zhes bya bas snyas pa// ba spu rnams kyang bu phyir lag pa mni// lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod// lag pa re rer de ltar mdung med kyang// de dag

gis kyang de la ca ma nus// ci'i phyir zhe na/ des na 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams ba bsgoms byams ldan thub pa de la spu lan/dug dang mtshon dang me pas ma tshugs pa mtshon cha phangs pa rams cad me tog 'gyur/gzhan
rmayang mkha' dang sa dad chu la stobs ldan gang// ma 'am gnod sbyin ralagradagra sta thogs// ma dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de dud phyir// stobs chen stobs ldan de kun stobs chub 'agyur//
g.yon rol nas gzi brjid drag shul can zhes bya bas smras pa/ bdag da ya lus bzang gis// khong du zhugs te bsre bar bgyi// 'brog gzhi ltar chung du yas// nang dang/
bcas pa'i sha yang skam// g.yas rol nas mag bzed gsasnasapa// khyod ni ri rab sa la nang zhugs// thams cad ma lus bsreg par nusagyur kyang// khyod dang 'dra ba gdab
bya gad kyis// rdo rje shugs ldan de nibasreg ma nus// gzhan yang/ ra bo thams cad 'gul mang srid// rgya mtsho chen po zad kyang srar// nyi zla sa la ltar yang srid// sa na zhu bar 'gyur
mdasud// 'jig rten don du rtsom mdzad pa// thugs dam nges par mdzad pa po// byang chub dam kha mthog pan// shing chen drung nas bzhengs ma sridi// g.yon rol nas lagu rings kyis
bskyings te sas pa/ khyod kyi gnas 'dir mchis bzhin du// bdag gi sug pas nyan dang// zla ba skar ma rnams kyi gnas // thams cad rab tumanyapar bgyi// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi
po las// tshul du shis par chab kyidablang// yabacag dag spyod de bzung ste// rgya mtsho'i pha rol derobar bgyi// yab gcig dbud na bzhag tu gsol// khyod nathugs ngan tshe ma mdzad/
byang chub shing de drungs phyung ste// sug pas phyogs phyogs gtong par bgyi// g.yas rol nas dad pa thob pas smras pa// gal te khyod ni dregs bsgyings te// lha dang lha min dri zag bcas//
sa dang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// de dag lag pas phyir glog kyang// khyod dang 'dra ba stong phragan/ gang+ga'i bye ma snyad rnams kyis// byang chub sems dang ba shes rab
tho can de yab spu g.yos mi nus// g.yon la nas 'ji'i sa khyed kyis smras pa/ dpung ga nang na bzhugs bzhin du// yab khyod tsa sud rab tu bsnyedas// de la dpud grogs ga la mchis/
su slad khyod 'dir dal bsnyengs// g.yas rol nas blo gros rtse gcig gis smras pa// 'jig rten dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis// 'khor la sgyur dang sing ge dpungom mchis// byang chub sems
dpa' 'di na dpung ma mchis// 'on kyang gcig pus bdud nag zhom par spyod// g.yon rol nasaklags ltas smras pa// mdud zung rtsagasum dbyug thoralagra rta// glang po shing rta rkang thang ma mami
pa/ dge sbyong gtsag pu mchis pa de dag gis do medadagum gyis cung zad ma bsnyengs yab// g.yas rol nas bsod nams brgyan pas smras pa// sred mad bu ltar ma shigs sku dang ldan
bzad stobs gemanabs brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gri mda'// rnam par tharagasum gzhom pa shes rab gzhu lags yab// bsod nams stobs kyis de na bdud kyi dpung las rgyal// g.yon/
rol nas phyir ma ldog pas smras pa// 'brog mo snul tshig ba phur ma ldog/ lobs pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir mi ldog/ mkha' las rdo rje 'bab pa phyiram ldog/ shAkyang bu las ma rgyal
tsha bdag gnas med// gams da lonas chos 'dod kyis sas pa// gsher ba'i rtsa dang phrad na ma yad ldog/ brag gi rtsa mo khab na mda' mdaldog/ rdordzosar bab de nas gad du 'gro/ zhi ba bdud
rtsi mthob de ma ldog// ci'i phyir zhen/ yabagamig bar snang la der mi khri bar nus kyang gda'// sems can ji snyed kun gyi sems ni gcig bsdud nus kyad gda'// mabacago nyi zla rlung ni zhags
bas bcings du nus kyang ga dang// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sAng pa lasan bskyod ma nus// g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa/ lta ba'i bdug pa chen pos lhun po bsreg bar gyi//
rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang skam par bgyi// bdag gis do med de gnyis thal bar rlag par bgyi// la ba gcag byang chub dang na dag da gzugs sugasol// g.yas lo nas don grubakyis
smras pa// gal te dug gis 'di kun dgyur la// stong gsum dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur kyang// yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gzigs tsam gyis// dug na dug ma yin par rab tu 'gyur//
srid pa gsum na gdug pa drag po ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhinagati mug ste// de dag da ya sku dod thugs la mad// mkha' la rdzab dang rdul na med pa bzhin// sku dang gsung dang thugs
kyang rab tu dag/ sems can kun 'khyams pa'i thugs dang ldan// de la mtshon dang dug gis yongs ma tshugs// de bas yab gcig thams cad bzlog tugasol// g.yon rol nas dga' ba chags
gapas smras pa// bdag gis sal snyan stong dag la bgyi ste// lha yi bu mo brgyan pa ba stong gis// chags par bgyisatu grong khyer mchog tu bkra/ 'dod la dga' bar khyod kyi
lo dbang du bgyi// galas rol nas tshes dgas smras pa// de 'dir rtag tu chos la dgyes pas dgyes// bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud rtsa don la dgyes// sems can thar bar mdzad dang byams la
gyis// 'dod chags dag 'a la de ni dgyes ma mdzad// g.yon rol nas rlung gi shugs shes bya bas sbyas ba// bdag gis shugs kyis nyi zla mde bgyis la// nam mkha' las ni rlung lad rab btang zhing/
yab cig do medadage sbyod bzung nas na/rlung gis phub ma bzhin du gtor bar bgyi// g.yas la nas bdud kyi bu blo gros ma g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar khyodakyi shugs
mgyogs drag pa ltar// gal te lha dang ma rnams de 'drar 'gyur// de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas kyang// zla med gang zag de la gnod ma nus// g.yonengol nas tshangs pa'i blo gros kyis smras
pa de 'dra'i drag po phal cher gyur kyang ni// khyod kyi nga rgyal cung zad 'jomAm nus// bgyi ba thams cad mngapos 'grub lags na// gcig pus khyod las bgyi smos mu 'tshal// g.yas rol

nas sang ga'i blo gros kyi snus pa// sa la seng ge khyud 'khod sngon ma byung// lta ba'i gdug pa dag kyang khyus ma 'khod// gzi ldan bden pa pha rol gnon pa po/ skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyang khyus mi
lakhod g.yon rol nas thams cad du gdol pa zhes bya bas smras pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sa sa po brtson 'grus dang// shugs dad stobs dang ldan pa sgra sgrogs pa// rig 'bar de 'dra yab kyis
sngon gsan tam// myur du dge sbyong de ni gzhom du bzhud// g.yas rol nas song gi sbasgrogs shes bya bas snus pa// nags tshal dag gi khrod na wa mang po// sa da ga mad ba de na sgra yang sgrogs//
seng ge sgra sgrogs 'jigs pa thos pa dang// slag nas phyogs phyogs dag tu rab tu 'bros// de ltar bdud bu ma mkhas 'di dag kyang// ma mchog gsung ni ma thos de bar du// de dag spyi dol byed/
cing byung rgyal smra// ma ma sang ge gsung bsags 'bros par 'gyur// galen rol nas nyes par bsam pa sems pas smras pa/ bdag gis gang bsam myur du 'dir 'grub na//nga ni rusrid dpung

tshig 'di na//gang phyir lang te myan du ma'i gros pas//don gyin dpachog ma kha tsharol ba/g.yas brel nas don legs par bsam pa sems pa zhes bya bas smas pa// de ni ma glen pha rol gnon pa ste// khyed cag gun
zhingashin tu ma bsdams pa// khyed kyis de yi mthu rtsal yod ma shes// de yi shes rab stobs kyis thams cad pham//bdud kyi bu na gang+ga'i bye ma snyed khyed cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu rtsal
nyan// de yang sbu gcig kyang g.yos ma nus// bsad par bsams pa ma 'grub smos su dgos// khyod na de la yad kyis gnod ma sems// gus dang bcas par dad pa'i sems su gyis//
[22] ]/'di na srid gsum rgyal por gyur pas na// thab mo ma byed par ni slar log cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa dang/ nag yong phyogs/
pa stong du tshad pa de dag thams cad kyis/ so so nas bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras so// de nas bdud sdigacan gyi sdo dbon sde bzang po zhes bya ba des/ bdud stag
can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag khyod kyarjes 'brang brgya byin dang// skyod dang ma 'am ci ya tshogs rnams dang// lha man dbang dang mkha' lding dbang po rnams// thal mo sbyar te/
de la phyag 'tshal na// khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma lags pa// tshangs po 'od gsal lha yi bu rnams dwang// gnas gtsang ris kyi lha rnams de dag kun// de la phyag 'tshal ba ni smos ci 'tshal/
khyodakyi sras po shes rab can// stobs dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' la// snyade dang mthun gyur phyag 'tshal lo// dpag tshad brgyad cur khyab pa ya/
gnod sbyin la sogs bdud dbud 'ad// phal cher rab tu dang yid kyis// kun kyang nyes pa med pa lta// 'jigs su rung zhing drag bsgyur pa// dbud tshogs ma bzad 'di gzigs nas//
ngo mtshar ma gyur zhum ma mnga'// nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung de gnas pa der// wa dang 'ug pa sgra 'byin la// bya rog bong bu sgra 'byin pas/ myur du slar na/
0 ldeg pa ba rigs// byang chub snyade por gzigs su gsol// pa ta kun tu dad pa dad// khu byug rma bya mngon skor bar// nges par do mor 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung 'de/
gnas pa de// rdul dang stag tshab char 'bab la// sa dkyil me tog char 'bab pas// bdag gi tshig bzhin ldog pa'i rigs// gang na dbu'adi gnas pa de/ bshad shong gyur
cang tshar mas gang// sa dkyil dri med gser gyur pas// shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs// gal te ma'adongasngar rmis pa'i/ rmalam de dag mngon sum 'gyur//
drang srong rnams kyis yul brlag pa// de bzhin dpung 'di thal ba blog/ rgyal bo 'gro ba drungasrong mchog/ tshangs pas byin gyis khris byas pas/ 'dan ta ka yi nags tshal mag/
la ma zhig tu rtswa ma skyes// drang srongabartul zhugs spyod pa bo// dka'athub ldan pa'i 'jig rten na// ji snyed 'khod pa kun gyi mchog/ 'byung po kun la mi 'tsha 'di// gang ga
lus la mtshan rab 'bar// khyim nas kyang ni byabab der// nyon mongs pham byas 'atshang rgya zhes// khyod kyi sngon chad ma gsan nam// rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don du//
'byor pa 'di 'dra 'di dag sprul// de bas des par sems can mchog/ sbyin sreg dmal len par 'gyur// 'di yi mad spu dri med pa// bye ba khrag khrag zhing du mdzes/
[#29] ]]de yas bdag cag mog mog bgyis// bdud dpung des bcom gdon ma 'tshal// srid pang rtsi gnas lha rnams kyis// de yas sba gtsug blta ma nus//
ba nges par gzhan gyis ma bstan pa thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par 'gyur// ji ltar lhun po khar yug dang// nyi zla brgya byin tshangs pa dang// shing ljon rnams dang ri mchog kun//
sa dkyil phyag 'tshal brgyud las na// bsod nams stobs can shes rab stobs// ye shes stobs can bzod pab stobs// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa de/ bdud phyogs
stobs med mdzad par nges// glang pos so mkhatangasnod dang// seng ge s ji ltar wa gtsam dag/ nyi mas srin bu ma khyer ltar// bde bar gshegs pas dpung bcom 'gyur/
zlotshig deskad thos pa dang/ bdud kyi bu gzhan zhig shin tu khros nas mig dmar por 'gyur te smras pa/ khyod ni gcig po de ya bsngags pa dag/ shin tu dpag tu med par brjod byed na
gcig pa des ni cu zhig bya bar nus// 'jigs su rung ba'i dpung chen ba mthong ngam/ de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu bdu rab tu 'jom bzhis bya bas lcas pa// 'jig
rtsorten nyi zlaseng ge dang// 'khor lo sgyur la grogs byed med// byang chub zhugs nas nges pa med// byang chub sems dpa'i grags ma dgos// de nas byang chub sems dwapas 'dud
mthu chung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gang mthong pas bdag gso dpung byang chub sems dpa'i khab nang du zhugs so snyam du sems shing/ bdud bres par gyur ba dang/ bros nas spyad pa yang ma
yan no snyam nas/ yang slar log ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs byed chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phen rung/ re ba tsam gyis de dag kyang/ byang chub sa/
dba'i seng du 'phangs pa dang/ me tog gi bla re dang/ gzhal med khang du gyur te gnas pa dang/ gang dag mag gdug pa dang/ myur du gdug pa dang/ dbugs gdug 'gayu tshe rtsa gtor ba'i me'i
dkyil 'khor de yang/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ bar mdab ma brgya pa/ rgyus pa lta bu'i bzhin bskyod de/ de nas
byang chub sems dpas lag pa g.yas pas mgo la byugs pa dang 1 bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lag na ral gri thogs par mthong nas/ lho phyogs su bros pa dang/ ci yang ma yan
nosnyam nas yang slar log go/ slar log nas byang chub sems dpa'i seng du mtshon cha rnam pasna tshogs/ ral gri dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ mdung thung dang Da mda' bo che dang/ dgra sta dang /
bong ba dang/ gtun shing dang/ rdo blo rtse gcig pa dang/ dbyug tho dang/ 'khor lo dang/ tho ba dang/ shang drungs phyud dang/ pha bong dang/ zhags pa dang 1 lcags kyi thu lum ga tu
ny+tsa// 'jigs pa du ma 'phen de dag kyang 'phangs ma thag tu me tog gi phreng ba dang/ me tog gi bla rer gyur tu gnas so// ma togagasal mar yang gyur nas sa la 'thor
sgo bdang/ 'phreng ba'i chun por yang 'phyang bas/ byang chub kyi shing brgyanang ra gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bkodapa 'byor pa de dag mthong nas/ bdud sdig can phrag dgo par/ sor snas
sems la gnod de/ byang chub sems dpa' la skyas pa/ kyirgyal bu gzhon nu bzhengs bzhengs rgyal srid spyod cig/ khyed kyi bsod nams de tsam gyis/khyod kyis thar pa ga ya 'thob/de nas
byang chub sems dpas brtan la zabatsar rgya che ba dang/ 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad sa so// sdig can khyod kyis gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig gis
'dod pa'i dbang phyugathob tu zad do// ngas ni mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stodophrag du masagatan pa med pa'imatshid sbyanabyas so// lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mag dang/ ma ga dag kyang
bcad cangoslong ba rnams la khyen no// sems can rnams thar bar bya ba'i phyir// khyim nang/ nen dang/ 'bru dad/ mal cha dang/ gos dang/ 'chag sadang skyed mos tshal rnamar du/
ma dag kyang slong ba rnams la byin no/// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad de byang chub sems dpa' la slar smras pa/ sngon chad kho bos mchod sbyin kha na ma tho med//
( gtan pa med pa byas pa khyod 'di'i dpang du yod// khyod la 'di ni dpang po gang ya nga yo da ma bas/ sbas kyang phan pa cu yodakhyod ni pham pagyur// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ snga
can s ni de'i dpang yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpas bdudasngaganyan dang bdud kyi 'khor la byams pa dang snying rje sngon du 'gro ba'ims kyis khyab par byas nas/ seng ge ltar ma 'jigs
ma sbrag la bag tsha ba med cing/ ma dman la ma zhum pa dad ma 'khrugs pa dang/ ma snyogs ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ spu zanges zhes byed pamad par lag mthal na/ dung dang//
rgyal ma tsha na dang/nya dang/ bum dad/ bkra shis pa dang lcags kyu rad/ 'khor lo'i mtshan ma yod ba/ sor rtogs bar dra bas 'brel ba/ sen mo shin tu mdzes shang zangs
kyi mdog ltar 'dug pas brgyan pa// 'jam zhing mnyen la shin tu gzhen pa/ bskal pa dang ga du med par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pas grub pa'i lag pa g.yas pas lus thamA
cad la byugs nas/ tshul du shas par sa la brdabs te/ de'i tsha tshigs subacad pa 'di yang skyas so// sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te// rgyu dang ma rgyu snyoms shing nyi ma gan mid
'di ni bdag gi dbang sta bdag brdzun med/ 'di la khyod ni bdag gi dpang byos shig/ byang chub sems dpas sa chen po 'di la reg ma thagatu rnam pa drug tugayosarab tu g.yos// kun tu
rab tu g.yos so// chom tshem rab tu chem chem mo// kun tu rab tu chem chem go do 'di lta sta dparan/ mul ma ga d+hA'i brdab khar sgra 'byung nyid/ sgra rgyan
ring ba de bzhin dus chen po 'di lad byang chub sems dpa'il ga khas bsnyan mkhag tu sgra 'khyud zhing sgra rgyun ring du byung ngo////'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes
bya ba theg pa chen po 'a mdo/ bam po bcu ba zhig de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sa'i lha mtshon mo ban+tan ma zhes bya ba sa'i lha mo'i
'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang ldan pa ga da yin pa de/ sa chen po thams cad gayos par byas nas/ byang chub sems dbab dar ha cad la'am range ba zhig tus brtol te 1 lus rgyan thams cad kyis
brgyan pa phyid phyung nas/ byang chub sems dpab ga la bde legs su lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dba' la 'di skad ces skyasaso/ de da bzhin no// skyes bu chen/
ba de de bzhin no// khyod kyis ji skad gsungs ba bzhin te/ 'di ni bdag la mngon sum mo// de lta lags mod kyis don gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
dbang du gyur pa dang/ tshad mar gyur pa dam pa lags so// sa'i lha mo chen mo brtan mas de skad ces smras nas/ rnam pa du mar bdud sdig can gyi grugs na med par byas/ byang chub/
soms dpa' lanibastodad/ rang ga mthu rnam ba mang po bstan nas/ 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// g.yon can dpung bcasas sgra de thes nas// nags su seng ge s sgra
bsgrags was thos dang// bya rog rdo'adza ngas mod la 'bur ba bzhin// sngangs skrag sAng gas thams cad rab tu phyir// de nas bdud sdegacan sdug bsngal zhad pad ma bde ste 'di ma 'dA
la skye de bzhin du/ do rgyalagyis zil gyis non pas ma song la/ phyir yang ma log sodi/ bros kyang ma bros te/ phyir bltas nas labadabung rnams la sbas pa/ khyed lhan cig 'dus te/
cung zad cig sdod mi/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems can rin po che bdun du chud ma gzan par kho bos rjes su chags pas 'dibaslad bar nus sam ma nus sad bar bya'o/
de nas bdud sdig can gyis rad ga bu mo rnams la sa pa/ bu mo khyed da ste/ byang chub kyi sAd por sod la/ ci byang chub sems dba' 'dod chags dang bcas pa bam/ 'on te 'dod
chags med/ cigati mug can nam/ 'an te shes rab can/ tsa ldongs ba zhig gam/ 'on te phyogs shes pa zhig gam/ 'on te dbung gnyen med pa zhig gam/ dman pa zhig gan
brtan pa zhig yin pa goms shig/ tshig de thosanas/ lha'i bu mo de dag byang chub kyi da pa ga lab dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sem
ha bya/ dpa'i mdun du 'khod de/ bud med kyi skya rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nye bar bstan to// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i nang nas kha
tshe cig nabazhin phyed 'gebs pa dang/ kha cag ni kha mkhrang zhing 'bur ba ston pa dang/ kha cag nicubazad 'dzugs bas sob 'phreng ba ston pa dang kha go ni' ga ba brkyang sta
bya snangs byed nang mchan khung ston pa dang/ kha cage ni shing tog bim pa ltar dmar ba'i mchu ston pa dang/ khag nibag byed btsums te byang chub sems dpa' l lta zhing
bltas nas myur ba myur bar 'dzum pa dang/ khacib nanu ma phyed g.yogs te ston pa dang/ kha cig gis sA la bar byas te/ gser gyi bag ska dang bcas pa'i rgud pa ston
ba dang/ kha cig ni gos dug ku la sra mo gyonate/ gsaragyi phag skadang bcas pa'i dpaston ba dang/ kha cag na rkang gdub sgra sal sal 'byin pa dang/ khacugan nu ma'i
bar nas/ phreng ba gcig rtelar ston ba dang/ kha cig ni brlabyed tsam brdzis pa nye bar ston pa dang/ bcag na mgo dang brag pa dag la bya 'dub skyed dang na mo dang/ ri sgrigs 'dug
! par nye bar ston pa dang/ kha gnod chub sems dpa' la mag zur gyis lta ba dang/ kha cig nags legs par bgos kyang/ mgo ma legs pa lta bur bcos pa dang/ kha cab/
nirked pa dang/ gser gyi thag skaskyod pa dang/ kha cig ni 'khrul pa ltar 'chos shing sgeg ste/ phan tshun 'chag pa dang/ kha cig ni gar byed pa dang/ khacag naglu len pa dang/ kha
cig na bsnyeg cing ngo tsha ba ltar yang 'chos ba dang Da khacag ni chu shadi rlung gis bskyod pa ltar bar sprul la dad/ kha cig na brjid pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang/ kha cig ni seng ras bgos te/
gser gyi gas dril bu can bcanges nas rgod cing 'chag pa dang/ kha cig dgos dang rgyan rnams sa la 'dor zhing ngo tsha ltar slar yang len pa dad [？ ]kha cig na gsang ba dang/ gsal
ba'i rgyan thams cad nye bar ston pa dang/ khacig ni lag basposakyis bskus pa ston pa dang/ khacag ni mkhurapa bskus shing rnacha yad ston pa dang/ kha cag nim go yad g.yogasashade bzhin

yang galogs la skad cagatsamagyisaston pa dang/ khacig ni sngonargod rgod pa dang/ dga' dga' ba dang/ rtsa rtsi la phan tshun dran par byed cade yang ngo tsha ba ltar 'dug pa dang/ kha cig na gzhon nu'i
gzugs dad/ bu ma btsas pa 'i gzugs dang/ na chung tshad la bab pa'i gzugs ston pa dang/ kha cig na 'dod pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' la sgugs bdud/ khacag ni byang chub
sems dpa' la me tog sa'i mas 'thor ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dang 'i mdun du 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsams pa la rtog cing gdod du yod lta ste/ 'di ci chags pa'i dbang/
pas lta 'am 'on te mi nga rang du lta 'am/ g.yo bam ma g.yo zhes bltas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin dag cing dri ma med la/ sgra gcan las thar ba'i zla ba'i dkyil
tsho 'khor lta bur 'dug pa dang/ nye ma thog ma shar ba lta bu dang/ gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang/ pad+ma 'dab ma stod rgyas pa lta bu dang/ gtor bar bya ba gtor ba'i me lta bu dang/ lhun po
ltar ma g.yo ba dang/ khor yug ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang/ dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang/glang po ltar soms shan tu dul bar mthong ngo// de nas bdud kyi bu mo
de dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu chags par bya ba'i phyir/ glu dang bar du sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smas so// dus kyi dam ba sosaka pozad la bab// zhugs shing me
( tog rgyas kyis dgyes par rol// khyod kyi gzugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste/ 2mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdage cag gyur ]/bdag cag skyes pa legs skyes dbyibs legs te//
lha ma bde ba 'a skyin du bdag cag byung// byang chub rAd dkas thugs ni slar sgyur la// myur du bzhengs te dar la bab pa spyod// khyod kyi ched du chas nas rab tu brgyan te lhagasagyur ba// lha yi bu
mo legs par brgyan pa 'di dag rnams la gzigs// gzugs 'di bltasanas shade rul lta bur srog tsam lus pa yang// chags par gyur na chags pas dga' ba su zhig chags mi
'gyur// skya 'jam shan tu dri zhim sridang ldan// rtsod pan rna cha'adab ris bzhin rgyas la// 'phral ba legs shing 'gas byags bzhin dang ldan// pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur mag yas leg
kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu/ 2shang tog bam pa sman 'a dra'i mchu dang ldan// dung dang kun da kha ba dkar so ldan// sdug pa dga' la chags pa rnams la zags/nu ma shan tu mkhrang
'ang rgyus la 'bur// lto ba'i rked na gnyer gsum shin tu mdzes// rked pa 'khor sa lta bu yangs shing mdzes (na chung shin tu mdze la mgon pagazigs// grung po gasna 'drab ya bar
ldan zhing// lag pa gdu bus rgyal par gang ba can// rked pagaser gyi pha ska rab mdzes brgyan/ khyod kyi bran mo 'di la mgon pos gzigs/ ngang pa'i stabs ldan da la gyis mami bgyid ba/
'jam zhing yid 'ong 'dango ldan mdzes sbyab/ rnam pa 'diltar shin tu legs brgyar la/ lha yi dga' ba rnams shin tu mkhas/glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgragar rab bslabs// dga'
ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs can skyes// 'dod la rab dga' gal te ma bzhang na// 'jig rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bsus/ malen ner gyis bde ba ma shes cagab// gtor mthong
nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar// khyod kyang 'dod chags ma mkhyen rang lhugs pa// na chung rnams la ma sbyong de dang 'du// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sams dpa' mig ma'adzum par
@#// 'dzum dmul te/ bzhan gyi 'dzum phyung shing/ dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs ba dang lus ma bcos pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ ma chags pa dang/ mi sdang ba dang/ ma rmongos
pa dang// ri'i dbang po ltar mgayo ba dang/ ma zhum pa dang/ ma gyur pa dang 'dzem pa med pa dang/ blo shin tu legs par gnas pa dang/ nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu sbyang ba'i phyig
rang ga kha na las pa 'a ya shes kyi sgo dang/ 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang/ tshangs pa las lhag pa'i da ro dang/ bya ka la 'di'i sgra dbyangs dang/ snyan pa dang mad du 'ongs bas bdud kyi
bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ 'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po sa gas shang sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste// ma mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dka' thub nyams par byed//
bud mda'adod pa'i yon tan tshog pa med ces mkhas pas smyos// ngan ma mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur// 'dod pa bsten na srid pa phur zhing rnam par 'phel 'gyur te
dper na ma 'ga' la latshwa chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin// de la zhugs pa bdag gi don mni gzhan gyi don kyang min// da ni bdag ga don rang gzhan gyi don la spro ba yin// khyod kyis gzug
ni chu bur dog dang dbu ba mtshungs shang 'dra// sgyu ma'i tshon ltar rang gi blo yas rnam par bsgrubs pa ste// rmi lam dag na rtsa ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang// byis pa ma mkhas rnams kyis mA
[ni rtag tu rmongs par byed// mig ni chu la chubur mtshungs shing 'dra ste pags pas g.yogs// khrag brlang mkhrang zhing 'bur ba dper nad kyi 'bras dang mtshungs// lta nigacin dang phyi
sa sogs shin tu mgatsang ba dang ldan// sdug bsngal khu tshul 'a khor las da pas nyon mongs pa las mang dag byang// byis pa'i blo can dag ni rmongs gyur phyin ni 'go ba yis// lus
gang la ni sdug par rtog pa mkhas pa de lta min// sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar yun ring 'khar byed na// sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal ma bzad mar po
myong/ 3rked pa nas rab tu yid mi 'ong ba'i dra can 'dzag/ brla dang byin pa rkang pa ngag de'akhrul 'khor lta bur gnas// nga yis khyed la yang dag brtags nas skya ma ji/
bzhin tu/ phyin ci log gargyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa lan// 'phags pa'i yi shes lam las gol ba phyin tsalog gyur pa// ma dad dug gi lo ma 'dra zhang sbal chen khroso 'dra ba//
'dod pa'i yon tan man zhing yon tan nyamasaM mthongon// de la byis pa bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed cing rgyal bar gyur// ma gang 'dod pas bud med rnams kyi khol por gyur pa dang/
gang zhig tshes kyi dga' ba bor te 'dapas dga' byed cing// dga' la brkam pa don tshul khrims lam las gol gyur cing// bsam gtan lam gol blo nyams yang shas las ni rab
ba/ rad gnas/ nga na 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te// rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas par byed m yin// ma dga' ba dang dga' dang/
lhan cig gnas pa ma yin la/ nga dpe[… ]btu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 'dra// gal te khyod 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'di ni gang gyur la// bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan cig
'dri zhang gnas kyang ni// da la tha pa med tu med gti mug min 'gyur te/ rgyal ba rnams kyis thugs ni nam mkha' mtshungs zhing 'dra phyir ro// lha dang lha mashan du dri med la
khrag dang rus pa med cade rab bzang ba[：] rab kun kyang 'jigs pa cher gnas te// rtag dngos bral zhing ther zug med phyir dko 'de nas bdud kyi bu mo bud med kyi rgyu
rnams shin tu bslabs pa de dag de pa nga char 'dod chags dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pa bskyed nga steg pa bstan nas/ lus rnam sa ngargyun te/ bud mad kyi g.yo to bar bstan/
nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la rdzor de 2 de 'di skad ces bya ste// bu mo'i nad na gces mchog sred dang dga' dang dga' can lhan cig tu// bdud kyi btang ba shin tu tshuladungashas par/
rgyu rings par lcags gyur te[+ ]gtam/ cus/ par/ pad danu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shang dung 'dug la rjod par byed// dus kyi nang na dam
pa mchog tu bgyi ba sos ka'i dus 'daste// skyes pa dag dang bud med dga' bar bgyid cing mun pa rdul yad bcom ：]khu byug dang ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byin bya tshogs rnams kyi gang//
'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la dbab po// bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa// dar ya rgyal po lta bur ma g.yo nyam
shar mthag pa'i gzugs// 'brug bsgrags lta bur sgra snyan r dgas dbang pos sgra bsgrags 'dra ba po// 'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa 'dod pa rtsod
dadadag dad 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa/ byis pa'i skye bos rta bar bsten gyi mkhas pa skye bos rtag sbangs la// gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsakhares pa'i
dus la bab gyur kyis// de mod bdud las rgyal te stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom par// sgyu rnams bstan nas smras pa zhal ras pad+ma 'dra ba bstan du gsol// khyod ni
rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas bdag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ bud mad dam pa'i tshogs kyis sa le sAn stong dag rab tu bgyid 'gyur na// thub pa'i cha byad gyis na ci bgyis sbyongs la
ngaga' ba bstan du gsol// byang chub sems dpas smas pa/ nga ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lha dang ma rnams kyis mchod la// chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stabs btsustobs dang
ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/slob dang mi slob bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed[3]ches kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i yul la da ya yadani dga' ma lan// de dag gis
smas pa zhag dar la bab pa ma lo lo dang bor bur gyur pa dang/ khyod ni'i 'ge snyan gyis ma bta' ma shis bgres pa ra mgyur dang// srid dar la bab cing bdag cag gos kyang dar la
bab gyur pa// de srid bar du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod ba dga' ba spyad du gsol// byang chub sems ngas smras pa ji sra de med dul ba dam pa 'chi med dkon pa rnyed pa dang// ji srid/
lha dang lha min grong khyer ma khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang// ji srid rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i dgra/sa dkrugs par ma gyur pa// de srid nga ni 'jigs med grong khyer 'gro ba'i
lam mchog bsgom par bya// de dag gis sbas pa lha yi gnas na sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mos sbyor ba dang/'thapa bral bathab bral rab dang dga' ldan rab rang bdud kyi grong
khyer na// lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud me da dbang du gyur nas 'dodo dga' la// rolatsang spyod la bdug rnams dang lhan cig dgyes pa rgya chen mdzad// byang chub sems dpas smras

kyi kha/ 'dod partswa rtse'i zil thig bzhin du myur la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs// klu yi bu mo khro ba lta bur shin tu 'jigs par byed pa yin// brgya byin 'thab bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag bdung/
kyi dbang du song// 'phags man rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la su zhig dga'// de dag gis sbas pa shing mtshog 'di dang lo ma gzhon dad ldan nang me tog rgyas gyur na/

shang shang te'u dang bukhyug sgra 'byin bung ba sgra 'byin ldan pa gzigs// sa las rtswa 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing ma la lcang lo can mchis pa// gnas mchog ma su tshogs kyis brtan par n chung rnams dang
gyes par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ le mar bcas pa'i shang rnams 'di dag dus kyi dbang gis me tog rgyas// bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyenanas me tog rnams
su lhags// gang zhig dus nas las skyes pa rnams kyang nyi mas skams bar gyur// nga 'di'i sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsadzes par spyad// bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis/
snyas pa/ zla 'dra'i zha la mnga' gzigs shig pad+magasar pa 'dra pa'i kha bzhin can// snyan can yid du 'ong ba'i tshogs ldan so nadabul dang kha ba 'dra// 'di 'dra lca las gnas na dkon/
na ma'i gnas na ga la mchis// gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rtag tu 'dod par bgyi ba khyodakyis res// byang chub sems dbas snyas pa/ lus ni ngan skyugs ma gtsad srin bu'i rigs kyis
gang kha shig shig po// myur du 'gyis shing 'jigs pa ba bam yani rnams dang ldan par mthong// rgyu bar bcas dad margyu ba la 'gro la bde ba mchog byed pa// go 'phang 'chi 'i tho med pa
skye bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya// de dag 'dod pa'i sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa ban myong bar gyur pa sta// rkang gdubagasar gyi phag sa 'khrol zhing des kyang shag shag sa
nas ni// 'dod pa'i mda' las phog ba rgyags pa'i dzum zhing 'di skad smas// jo bo byed la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bstan ma bgyi// srid pa kun gyi nyes par ga nas rdul dang bu
bas 'di skad smras/ 'dod pa ral gri mdung thung rtsa gsum sbrang rtsi can gyi sdug 'dra// sbrul gyi mgo dang ma nur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu dag pas na da med yon tan 'phrogs pas/
phyir da yas budamed tshogs rnams sbyangs// bud med yon tan rnam pa mang po khrag khrig bya ba de dag gis// gangag tsha naglang bo phrug gu'i stabs can de da la dus tsho ngo tsha bskyengs nas
thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// dga' zhing mgu ba bskyod nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas// pad+ma drim med pa'i snyaTi re 'dra zhung ston rgyu la pu zhal ]/mar gyis sbyin
bsreg bgyis pa'i 'od 'abro mo 'dragasar gyi ri 'dra ba// srid pa brgya nas spyad cade dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig/ bdag med zla la nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan ba'i 'khos
bsgral du gsol// de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shad dad tsam pa ka 'dra rnams na da bstod// mchog tu gyur ba ra ltar ma g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni/ sod ste pha ma rkang lamago bos
raphyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras/ yab cig lha dang ma yi bla ma de la khong khro sangs na legs// bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas padrub ma dang ma 'dra ba'i mig gso lta// de ni chags
pas skye bo ma lta de la khro gnyer ma chas ma lags/ lhun po g.yo nade rgya mtsho skams la6nyi zla lta bar 'gyur 'dagadu'o/ sude ba gsum gyi nyes mthong ba ni bud med rnams kyi dbang ma'agyur
de nas bdud sAgacan gyis tshigs de skad thos nas// dbas kyang cher lcag bsngal zhad mdam bde la/ yid ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yade kyis rangag bumo de dag la
snas pa/ dkyim shis shad glenata/ khyod kyi gzugs dang da red ma mthong ngam/ ji ltar gyur na/ dbyang chub kyi snyid po las bslangs par ma nus/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis/ rang
gi pha la chags su bcad pas slar smus ba/ sAn cing 'jam don sna lad chags pa ma mchir te/ gsang ba chen po ltar mang sdad pa mchas ma lags/ spyod lam dag dad skyed pa lta yang
rmongs ma mchis// lus rnams thams cad rtags kyang bsam pa rAshin tu zab// bud mad nangs ba rgya chen the tsom mamachis rtogs// 'dod lasadaben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags chags/
ma mchis// gang zhig de la sems dad sbyod pa yos 'tshal ba// lha yul mi yul 'di na lha ma de ma mchis// de la bud med sgyu rnams gang lags bstan na yab// chags bcas gang
ka @#// las de yi snying zhu 'gyur rigs na de dag mthong yang de yi sems na gcig ma g.yos/ ri dbang rgyal po btsan du de ni ma go mchis// bsod nams gzi brje
brgyas bltams yon tanagazi brjid rdzogs// bskal ba bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul zhugs spud// lha dang tshangs pa sems can gazi brjid rnam dag dag/ de dag de ya rkang par
mgos gtugs phyug kyang 'tshal// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi// rgyal bas bzhad pa byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur nges// mab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor
'thab pa ma 'tshal te/ stobs ldan bdag dad 'thab par sbyor 'di tshogs rab che// yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen gtsug phud can rdzogs pa'i byang chub sams dpa' khrag khrig
kus bar gnas// rin chen 'byung gnas yan lag ma tog phreng bas brgyan// stobs bcu mnga' bas mchor phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs/ gang dag sems pa mas dad
gang sems ma mchis// shadar lha dbang gnod sbyin mkha' lding dbang po dag/ yon tan ri bor mngon par 'dud cad phyogs pa las// ya ba cag da mdo smar lag na na legs pa 'dra//
par gzhan yang gang gi pha mthar ma phyin der na rgyal ma bgyi// gang zhig rtsa nas ma phyin de ni brko ma bgyi// gang la bzod pa yang gsol de ni dkrug ma bgyi// gang gis yid ma bde bar 'gyur
pa de ma bgyi// dge slong dragade nas de'i tsho shang gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ dbal ldan dad/ 'phal mo dang/ dka' thub dang/ dge mdang/ mkhas ma dang/ mdangs
stobs dang/ bden sbyas dad/ ldan ma ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas/ dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed/ mngon du
stod par byed de/ sems can dag pa khyod ni dgun zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o// blo rnam par dag pa khyod/gdugs dang po shar ba ltar lhad ngeba'o// sems can dag pa khyer ni chab kyi
nad na pad+ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni nags dang nags mdab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o// sems can dag ba khyod rgya mtsho'i dbus na ra'i rgyal bo ltar
mdzes pa'i// sems can dag pa khyod ni khor yug pa ri ltar mngon par 'phags ba'o// sems can dag ba khyod na rgya mtsho lta ni ba chos bltams zhing gtid dbag bar dka' ba'o//
'jig rten gyi mgon po khyed ni nam mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shas shugs kyi rgya che ba'o// sems can rnam par dag pa khyoda'adogs ltar som sa can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cade
shugs shin tu brtan ba'o// sems can dam pa khyodan mtsho ma dros ba ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rtog pa mi mnga' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rlud mar ltar 'jig rten gyi khamA
thams cad la rtag tu ma chags nagashad thugs gnas pa ma mchis pa'o/ sems can dam ba khyod na gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems can thams cad spangs[y]
tho bsnyen por dka' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu ltar thul bar dka' shAde stobs dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod na byang chub kyi sA de po las ma bzhengs pa/
dam bcas pa bstan pa'o// sems can dam ba byed na dbang po'i lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar mi ldog pa'o// sems can dam ba khur na dang po ma thogs par stobs dang ngang
ldan par byin pas brnyes pa 'gas par brtes pa// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi shang gi lha ma rnalaakya'i// dpal rnam pa bcudrug gis grang chub sems dpa' 'phelabar byed do/
dge slong dgade na gnas gtsang ma ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi rnam pa bcu drugags bdud nyams dmas par byed de/ rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can
khyod na khrung khrung rgan pe ltar sems khong du chud cing dmas pa'o// sdig can khyed ni glang po rgan po 'dam du byed bltar nyam chung ba'i// sdago can khyod ni dpang bor khas 'ches pa
kyi pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o// sdig can khyod ni nad kyis rten pa 'brog tubor ba ltar gnyis su med pa'o// sdig can khyod ni gling bu khol gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs mang pa'i
sdig can khyed na shing rlung gis btab pa ltar skyel pa'o// sdig can khyed na 'dron pa las ster ba ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o// sdig can khyed na mi dbul ba bu len can ltar dman pa bas/
kyang dman pa'o/ sdog can khyod de bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor sna ba'o// sdig can khyod na ma dul ba byas pa mag khro bltar da rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'i// sdig can khyed naseng ge 'i
sgras 'bres pa ltar dang 'bros par 'gyur pa'o// sdig can byed na rnam par 'thor rlung gas gtor ba'i bya bzhin du der 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sbyang bo bsod nams

zad ba ltar dus ma shes pa'o//sdig can khyod na snod chag brdulagyis gang ba ltar deng rnam par spyad par 'gyur ba'o/ stagacan khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sprul la bab ba ltar dang tshar chod par 'gyur pa'o//sdig can khyod ni ma rkang lag bcad pa ltar

stobA tham cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o//dge spyod dag lta ra gnas gtsang ma'i risakyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gas bdud sdig can nyams smad par byas so// dge slong dag de la byang chub bsnyen bkur
ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gas bdud sdig can zlog bar byed do// bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni dpa' bo pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar/ byang chub sems dbasad
mod pham par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni gyad stobs chung ngu la gyad stobs chen ngo bapa pa ltar dmed byang chub sems dpas tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// sdig cano nga na sun bu ma khyer
tsa/ la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar/ de med byang chub sems dpas nga la glob chen pa 'gyurar// sdig can khyod na phub ma sngar ba gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar do med
byang chub sems dpas gter bar 'gyur ro// sdig na khyed na wa la sa dge bab pa ltar do med byang chub sems dpas sngangs par byas par 'gyur ro/ sngago can khyod ni sha'i nA'ache ba
rtsa ba nas bcud ba ltar do med byung chub sems dpas bstsal bar 'gyur// sdig can khyed na mi mdzababab grod khyer la rgyal po chen pa bab pa ltar domado byang chub sems dpas ngarlab par
'gyur ro// sdig can khyed nib rjes kyi chu la 'dzin chen po bab ltar de med byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par brus pa 'gyur ro// sdig can khyedanam g.yon can bsad par bya ba dang
ltar do med byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni mi'i tsha bas bung ba'i khyu ltar de med byang chub sems dpas mo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// rgyug
can khyodan chos kyi rgya la pa rgyal srang nyams ba ltar da medabyabachub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa lta 3da med bya rgyu
tshesems dpas sems khong du bcug par 'gyur ra// sdig can khyod ni 'brog dgon par lam brgyags chad pa ltar/ do med byang chub sems dpas phongs par byas par 'gyur ro/ de

[+27/ ]can khyad na rgya mtsho chen por gru zhag pa ltar da med byang chub sems dpas sne sngags 'don du bcug par gyur ro// sdig can byed na sreg pa ba ba skal pas rtswa dang nags tshal ltard med byang
chub sems dpas rUs par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtsomo la rdo rje bab pa ltar/ domed byang chub sams dngas b.rul bar 'gyur bo zhes bya ba'o// dge slong dag de ltar byung
chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lcab bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drugags bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang/ bdud sdig can pa ma 'gag/ de la 'daskad ces bya ste lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag pa
bskul ba thos kyad bdud na phyir log ma gyur te/ slongs shig rgyob shag 'di ni brlag par gyis shag srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig/ 'di ni rang nyid rgyal nas nga yi yul nas ga zhan yang sgrol bar
byed par 'gyur// langs te bros ba ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan cud zad mod ces smra/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa// ra'i rgyal po lhun po gnas nas gso srid 'gro ba
thams cad med 'gyur srid// skar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par mkha' las sa la ltad yang srid// sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po
skam srid kyi// da 'dingashang ba rgyal bo'i drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yod mi srid// bdud kyis smras pa/ kho bo bdod ba'i dbang phyug 'jig rten bad kun dbang/ lhadang lha mni tshogs
bcasam dang dud 'gro rnams/ kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du gyur/ kho bo'i yul na gdugs pa 'ongos la tshag bzhin gyis// byang chub sems
rab sags pa/ gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang min// yang dag nga ltos nga mang chos kyi dbang phyagayani/ gal te ngan 'gror mi 'gro khyod na 'dod dbang phyag/ rab ng
med khyod ni lta bzhin byang chub ngas thob 'gyur// bdud kyis sbas pa/ dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig bu dgon pa'i bu zhig byed// khyod kyis gang btsal de dang phrad par sla [”] ma yan//
rab 'gro shas ldan la sogs dka' thub rapa sgrimasakyang// go 'phangs mchog de ma thob merigyur khyod su re smyos// byang chub sems dbas sas pa/ kho bo'i zil non blo dang lha yul
'dod pa dang/ bdag la rtag snyan du gnas pa dang/ yul du 'gro bas gnas ba thar snyam gnas pa yi// drang srong ma shes sngon du'agro bas dka' thub spyad// de dag yang dag don dang bral
zhing skyes pa skya/ khyab dang phyogs gcig ches dang khacig rtag ces smra// lus can lus min yon tan man dang yon tan can// byed pa po dang byed po min zhes gzhan dag 'dzer/
stan 'dir 'dubed ste nga rgyal bcom pa sde dpung bcas// khyod pham byas te byang chub rdul med dang thob nas// 'gro pa 'ad la 'byung dang byang dang mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal zhi babasil
ba'i dngos bo bstan par bya// b.rung na khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nad mdun du rtsub pa 'i tshig tu smras pa dge sbyong 'di bzung ngashag/ gcig pu dgon par bor bar gyur pa 'di'i nga yaM
mdun nas zung la song ste myur du dbang du gyis/ ngam khyim du myur du song la shang sgrog dang na lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste sgo babyed du chug/ sdug bsngal nyen nasakurtsa rnams pa mang po
'don cing lha ya khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byas// byang chub sems dpas smas pa/ nam mkha' la na re bo rnam pa sna tshogs cha cha ris ras phye ste so sor bri bar nus kyang sung
phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung na ma yis rab tu bsgrims te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid/ de ma zla ba mun pa rab rib med byed mkha' las sa la ltung bar byed
par nus srid kyi// khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang bo bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas nang bskyod nus ma 'gyur/ bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs ta ha zhes zer/ dung dang
rnga dang rdza lnga mchog gi sgra 'byin langs/ bdud dbung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas na// kyashud bu sdug khyod dus ma rung gyur ces zer 'dzam glingagasab dang tsam pab sAng po
'dra bar ser// shin tu gzhon nu lha mas bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os// khyod ring g.yul ngo mon po rab tu brlag 'gyur te// dbang pos lha min lta bur bdur kyi dbang du 'gar dza
mtha'[p7 ]/pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping+ga'i sgra skad kyi// bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la snas// ma mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa//
lo de ni shade mchog drud nas nga 'dra slong bar 'dod// gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grad dang// gang 'ge ba sgra yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin dang/ skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang
bzhan ra ba thor ba/des kyang shade drud 'dug pa da la 'tsha ma nus// bdud khros soms kyis gnya' shing gang ga bar tsama'ag shubs nas phyung ba ral gri rnon po lag na thogs/
dge slong tshud du las la nga yi bsam pa bzhin du song// bod ma'i myu gu sngo ltar do med bcad da re// byang chub sems dbas smras pa// gol te stong gsum sa rnams bde dag thams cad/
bdud kyis rab tu gud gyur la/ kun gyi lag na ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba la ral gri thogasagyur kyang// de dag da ya ba spu bskyod par ma nus nga la gnod byed smos ci dgos// sun 'byin/
ma rang sa zhig dang debu ro brtags te nga yas brtan por dran par bya// ja mo ba lang glang chen mag dang 'jigs mag dang/ myur gdug sprul dang mag gdug ma bzad 'dra ba dag/ ma 'bar
tshe kha dog rtse mor bcas pa'i de'aphen cing/ rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen// sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrog cing// ngordzo'i lce dang lcags
kyi'u lum char pa 'debs// ral gri mdung thung rna dang dgra sta dug can 'bebs [7 ]/sa na brtol par byed rung shing dag rab tu 'joms// kha rub lag pa brgya dag gis ni lo dra ka ban rin
kha nas myur du gdug pab sprul dad me ya/da 'thor ka/ chu skyes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtsho nas len// kha cig nam mkha'alded du bsgyur nas kra mda'aphen 1 khacig khresanas lcags
kyi shu lum ri rab tsam/ mi 'bar kha dog rtsa skor bcas ba rnams kyang 'phen// sa la lhags nas sa narab tu'akhrugs par byed/ ga ga chu sa phung po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug//
kha cig de yabadun dang de bzhin rgyab tu mchong// kye ma bu zhes gams dang de bzhin g.yon du mchong// rkang pa log pa leg par 'dug cademag 'obasal// glog ltar rab tu 'bar ba
ma de gnas ma ngon du 'byon/ bdud kyis dpung nabasgyur ba ma drug byas mthong nas// sems can dag pa skya ma byas pa ji bzhin go/ de la bdud mad stabs med 'gro med bdag kyang
mad// chu zla'i tshul 'drab ya 'jig rten gsum po 'khor// mag dang skyes pa bud meng med cing bdag gi med// rna bsna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus/ ches bad byed pa po dang
tsher ba po dang bral// brten nas skyes te nang yang stong zhade bu yang stong// bden tshig gang gis 'ding chos shin tu stong zhe na/ 'dul mthun gnod sbyin dos pa gang yin de dag gis
lag pa'i mtshon cha me tog phreng bar mthong gyur ces// rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa tshig byas te// de yis lag mthil g.yon pa dra ba mchog spras pa/
son mo zangs mdog rab mdzes rtsanges stong 'khor lo can/ 'dzam gling gser 'bar 'dra ba bsod nams brgyas bsten pas// tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs//
mkha' las glog 'dra bar na lag ba brkyang byas nas// tshig tu skyas bas 'di ni du yus dpad yin te// des na sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag khrig sna tshogs byas/// slong la ma sbyin snyam
ste don med gzhan ma byin// chu dang me dang rlung nang yi dpang yin te// tshangs ba skyes dagu bdag dang skar bcas te zla dang// gang dag phyogs bcudag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
bdag khrems brtul zhugs byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dpang// sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa da yadabang// brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de ltar shes rab dang//
tshad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes dam dpang// rimagyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad da ya dpang// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can ma thabadag ji snyed pa// de dag rnams
kyi bsod nams tshul khrims ye shes dang/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bsdoms kyang ni// de dag ra yab spu'i brgya yis char ma bod// de yis tshuladu shis par lag pas 'bardabs pa
khar ba'i snod ltar sa bad sgra yang byung nga ra gyur// bdud kyis shes nas des skyel gyur te// nag po'i rtsa lag skyob shag ltud shag sgra yang thos// lus las rdul byung gzi brjid nyams shad/
bzhin ma dag gyur// rga bas bcomo ba'i bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur// khrang brdud tsho bdon tsade ba jigs rten mgon yang med// bdud kyi 'di 'khrul gyur cade sems ni myos kha'agyur/
glang po rta dang bzhon pa shang rta sa la lhung// srin po grul bum dag dad sha khra stangs shang grug/ mgo rmos lam ma skad cing gnas med skyabs kyang med// rlud btab nags mes byas ltar

bltas nas song bar gyur// pha ma bu dad sring mo de bzhin phu nu dag/ gang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes 'dri bar byed// de yi rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur
ta 'tsho ba'i bskabs kyang med/ bdud dpung rgyu cha mang ba mi 'khrugs skyed pod// thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing thadagudagyes 'gyur te/ zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du thon tshun phradam
gyur// mthong nas smras pa gal tagason na dga' zhes 'dzar/ shang gal mos de tshe de la snying rjebyas// chu yi bu ma ba thogs te nag po'i rtsa lag gtor// myur du longs la phyi shol ma
bya skyen du song// bla ma'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur ba yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag las bu pa snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te/ sems can shin tu dag las pa/ d+ha sa
zla// sdug bsngal 'jigs la bodas mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang/ cir ma rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag gas thob// lha mos smras pa/ mi mkhasagang zhig nyes pa med
zla lanyes byed pa// da ninyis dang sdug bsngal ba dang 'phongs pa dang/ ci ma rubazhes bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang// bsad dad btsang dang nyes pa du ma red par 'gyur// lha dang lha mnamakha'

lding ma ci sun po'i dbang// tshas pa brgyabanagazhan 'phrul 'og min bcas ba dag/ 'di ltar khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi dbud bcom pas// 'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal zhes de yi rgyal ba brjod rgyan 'khyer rgyun
pa zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul/ me tog a ga ru da rgya sbos tsan dan bye char 'bebs// sal snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing tshig brjod pa// dpa' bo dag tshogs rgyal rnams
khyod la dgab pa mdzad par 'gyur// stan mchog 'di ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs// rgya chen tham mdzad dpa' be do med byang chub b.res// stobasabcu ma 'dres sas gang dag
rig pa dang// sangs rgyas yul rnams thams cad do med brnyes par 'gyur// bdud 'dul ched du bdar ni g.yul ngor rab tu nyugs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stobs rtsalasus
mthong ba// bya ba sum cu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shubazhi// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon// bdud btulakha' le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa ga cig pa'o/ gdage
slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa 'a bdud phyi rgol ba bcom pa// dgra btul ba/ g.yul dor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng bas 'dod pa//
rnams las dben pa/ sdig ba ma dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can// bsam gtan dang po/
rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyadapa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog ba med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/
bde bcan/ bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de dgab pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas// btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bdeb
lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste// gab pa med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas
te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs ta/ snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shang yid bde ba dang/ yid mi pa de ba yang nub pas/ bde ba gdam yin/ sdug bsngal la dam lan ba/ btang
snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhib yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i son
[y ]/yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba// mnyen pa las su rung bar gnas pa/ ma g.yo
bar gyur bas nam gyi cha stod la lha'i mig las cha shas mthong ba'i rig pam ngon du bya ba'i phyir// sems mngon par sgrub cing/ nangon por gtodado// de nas byang chub
soms dpa' lha'i mig yongs su dag pa/ mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can sha 'pho bdad/ skye ba dang kha dog bzang bo dang/ kha dog ngan pa dang/ bzang po dang/ ngan ba rnams
mthong ngo// las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'isems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ kye ma soms can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes pa ma spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par
[– ]spyad ba dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa// log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las mang dag par blangos pab rgyus lus zhig ste/ shapa'i 'og tungan so
'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dgag/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa// dag dang yid kyis legs par
tshe spyod pa dang ldan paM/ 'phags pa rnams la skur ba ma 'dobs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de dag yabadag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas//
0 bde 'gro mthorasakyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dug ces bya bar rab tu shes so// de ltar lha'i mag rnam bar dag ba ma'i las shin tu 'das bas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang/
skye ba dang/ kha dog bzang bo dang/ kha dog ngan ba dang/ bde 'gror song ba dang/ ngan 'gror song ba dang/ ngan pa dung/ bzang po dag dad/ las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong
ngo/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do// mun ba phul to/ snang ba skyed do// de nas byang chub sems dba' de lta bur snyon
par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa// yongs su byang ba/ bodagasal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/mnyon ba/ las su rung bar gnas la
mi ga yo bar gyur bas nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjesasu dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rigi ba mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do// dadag dang/
sems can gzhan dgag ston gyi gnas rnam ga dum rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gdug dang/ gnyis dang/ gsum dang/ bzhi dang/ lnga dang/ bcu dad nyishudang/ sum cu dang/

bzhi bcu dang Da skye ba lnga bcu dang/ skye ba brgya dang/ skye ba stod dang/ slob brgya stongodang/ skye ba brgya stong phrag dum dad/ skye babye ba dang/ skyob byel brag brgya dang/ skye bathab phrag stong
dad/ skye ba phye babargya stong dang/ skye bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang/ skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang/ skye ba bya ba steng phrag du ma dang skya batre ba brgya stong phrag du ma
skye ba bye ba khrag khrig nga rgya stong khrag dum nas/ 'jig pa'i bskal ba dang/ chags pa'i bskal pa dang/ 'jig pa dang/ chags pa'i bskal pa dang/ 'jig pa dang/ chags pa'i bskal
bdum dag kyang rjes su dran no// bdag ma ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ mang ni 'di zhes bya ba'agyur to/ rus na'ang zhes bya'o// kha dog ni 'dilta bu 'o// kha zas na 'di lta bu zhig
za za'o// tsho'i tshad bdatsamazhag thub bo// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnasa gnas so// bde ba dang sdug bsngal na 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo// bdag de nas shi'athos nas che ba'i go zhes byang
zhig tuskyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phosanas kyang 'di skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas pa bdag dang sems
can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam ba dum rjes su dran no// de nas byang chub sems dbab de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sams yongs su dag pa// yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/
nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba 2 mnyen ba/las su rung bar gnas pa ma rig yo bar gyur pas/ nam gyi cha smad skyaring 'char ba'i dus kyi tsho/ rnga brdung ba'i nam tshod
! tsam na/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung ba nub par bya ba dang/ zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya bker sems mngon par sgrub cing mdon par btod de/ de 'disAm du
sams te/ kyi ma 'jig rten 'di na 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang/ rgya ba dad/ na ba dang/ 'chi 'pho ba dang/ skye bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yin na/ 'on kyang rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba la
sogs pa 'a sdug bsngal gyi phung bo chen po 'ba' zhig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba yishes te/ e ma ho rga pa dad/ na ba dad 'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shag btsanA
cad zad par bya bar shes na ci ma rung snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rga bdang/ 'chib 'khyud/ rga ba dang/ 'chi ba'i rkyen gang lan snyam
nas 'di snyam du sems te/ skye ba yod pas na sha byung ste/ rga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yan no/mamo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du sams te/ gang yod pas skye ba byung//
skye ba'i rkyen na gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ srid pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid ba yin no snyam mo// de nas 'dabyang chub sems dpa' 'ad snyam du
sems te/ gang yod pas srid pa byud/ srid pa'i rkyen ni gad yan snyam nas/ des 'ad snyam du bsamasate/ len pa yod bas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rgyan nilen pa min nosnyam mo//
de nas yang byang chub sems dpa ba 'di snyam dusams te/ gang yod pas lenab byung/ len pa'i rkyen ni gang lan snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ srid pa
klo khod pas lenab byudas/ len pa'i rkyen nasrid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dbab 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod bas sred pa byud/ srid pa'i rkyen ni gang man snyam nas
des 'di snyam du bsams te/ tshor ba yod pas srid pa byung ste/ sred pa skyonan tshorab lanano snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gad yod pas tshog babyung
tshor ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ rig pa yod pas tshor bakhyud ste/ tshor ba rgyan rig pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lad byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
lca du sems te/ gang yod pas rig pa byung/ rig pa'i rkyen gang yin snyam nas/ des 'disnyam du bsams te/ skye mched drug yod bas reg pa byung ste/ reg pa'i rgyanan mched drug lan
nasnyam mo// de nas lad byung chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gad yod pas skye mched drug byud/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gang yin snyam nas/ das 'dasnyam du bsams te/
ming dang gzugs yod pas skye mched drug byung ste/ skye mched drug gi rkyen ni mang dang gzugs yin no snyam// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam dusams te/ gang yod pas
mang dang gzugs byung/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ rnam par shes pa yod pas ming dang gzugs byung ste/ mdi dang gzugs rkyen
ni rnam par shes pa yin nosnyam mo// de nas med byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod bsa rnam par shes pa byung/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang lan snyam nas
des 'di snyam du bsams te/ 'du byed yod pas rnam par shes pa byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i skyen ni 'du byed ni snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dba' 'di snyam du sems te/
gang yod pas 'du byed byung/ 'du byed kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa yod pas 'du byed byed ste/ 'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa la ni na sAm mo
de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes rnam par shes pa'i rgyan gyis mang dar gzugs/
ming dang gzugs kyi rgyan gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis rig pa// rig pa'i rkyen gyis chor ba/ tshor ba'i rgyan gyis srid// sred pa'i gyis len pa len pa'i
rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ skye sngags 'don ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ mdem bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams
'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phud bo chen go 'bab ngashag 'di 'byud bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// dag skyed dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'byung kun
babyung zhes tshul bzhin 'di la khyad cang mad du byed pas/ byang chub sems dpab la shes skyes/ ga po skyes/ mad bo ngashis pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so//
snang btud do// de nas mad byang chub sems dbab bdasnyam du sems te/ gang med pas rga shi med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas rga shi 'gag snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/
skyo ba med na rga shi med par 'gyur te/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'disnyam du sams te/ gang med pas skye ba med par 'gyur// gang
( 'gags pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ srid pa med naskyab mad par gyur te/ srid pa 'gags pas skyab 'gag gosnyam mo// de nas nad byang chub sems
dpab 'di snyam du sems te/ gang mad pas shes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te/ 'du byed med par 'gyur/ gad 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag snyam pa'i bar dug/ des 'disnyam dubasam/
te/ ma rig pa med pas 'du byed med par 'gyur te/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag go/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag ga nas bya ba nas/ skye ba'agags
pas rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bab dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshon go 'ba'/
zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// snyam pa'i bar du'o// dge slong dag de ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin 'di la byed par mang du byed bas/ byang chub sems dpa' mngashes skyes
mig skyes/ yig pa skyes// mad bo shes pa skyes yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so// snang ba byung ngo// dge slong dag ngas deb 'di ni sdug bsngal la zhes yang dag pa ji lta
ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni zag pa'i kun 'byud ba// 'di zag pa 'gag pago/ 'di thog pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so//
'di na 'dod pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'izag pa// 'di ni ma rig pa'i zag ba'o// 'di ni lta ba'i zab kha zad pa'o// 'dir thag pa ma lus par 'gag go/ 'di'i zag ba ma
lus par ma snang bar 'gyur zhing/ nub par 'gyur ro// 'di ma rig pa'o// 'di ni ma rag pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ma lag pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa 'gag par
'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'dir ma rig pa ma lus pa mi snang bar 'gyur te/ nub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de bzhin dusbyar go/ 'di dag ni bdu
byed rnams so// 'di na 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di 'dubyed 'gog pa'o// 'di ni 'du byed 'gag par 'gro ba'olam mo zhes yang dag par ji lta ba
sgo bzhin du shes so// 'di ni rnam pa shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes ba 'gog bar 'gro ba'i
(lam mo zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni ming dang gzugs so// 'di ming dang gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog pa'o// bden

mang dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/ zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni skye mched drug go/ 'di skye mched drugakhakun khyung bo 'di'i skye ba da dug 'gog pa'o//'di ni skye mched/
drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shas so// 'di ni rag khago/ bad ni ga la'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rig pa 'gog pa'o// 'di na rig pa
'gog par 'groba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shos so// 'di ni tshor bgo/ 'di tshor ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di nitshor ba 'gog bgo/ 'din tshor ba 'gag/
na 'gro ba'i lam go/ 'di ni srid pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i kun 'byung ba// 'di srid pa 'gag pa go/ 'di srid pa 'gag par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni len pa'o//
'di nilen pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di na len pa 'gog pa// 'dini len pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo/'di ni srid pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'danasrid/
ba gshog pa'o// 'di saMsrid pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di na skye ba'o// 'di na skye ba'i kun 'byed ba 'o// 'dan ba 'a bgo pa'o// 'di ni skya ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i
lam mo// 'di ni rga ba'o// 'di ni rga ba kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'o// 'di na rgyu ba'agog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni 'chi ba'o// 'din/
'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni 'chi ba 'gog pa'o// 'di ni 'chi ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di dag ni mya ngan dang skyesngags
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ pad ma bde bdod 'khrug pa rnams te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshan pa 'apa'i shag 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas/ 'gag bar
'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes sa 'di'i sdug bsnga la go/ 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di'i sdug bsngal 'gog par
'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yad dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// dge slong dag de ltar pyad chub sems dba' namagyi ma snyed skya red 'char ba'i dus kyi/ rnga brdud ba'i nam tshod
tsam na/skyes bu dang/ skyes bu dam pa dang/ skyes bu mchog dang/ skyes bu chen bo dang/ skyes bu khyu mchog dang/ skyes bu gladapo dar/ skyes bu seng ge dang/ skyes bu skyas mchog
po dang/ skyes bu dpa' bo dang/ skyes bu brtul phod dang/ skyes bu cad shes dang/ skyes bu ba dang/ skyes bu bar dkar po dar/ skyes bu lnga de khyer ba dang/ skyes bu kha la sgyur ba sman
mad pas/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyisashos bar bya ba dang/ khodod chud par bya ba dang/ thob par bya ba dang/ blta bar bya ba dang/ mngon du bya ba gang tsam rungs/ de thams cad
ba sems kyi skad cig tsag dang ldan pa shes rab kyis/ bla na med pa yod dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mgo par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rig pa gsum thob bo// dge slong dag de
nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis me tog gtor cig ces byas so// de nas lha'i bu gang dag sngon
gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dag 'dus nas/ dadrug gis de dag la sbas pa/ grogs po dag sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brda mdzad cing brda mngon par sbrul
pa mdzad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brda ma mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor cagi/ dag slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ lha'i bu de dag yid gnyis su gyur ba mkhyen nas/ shang tal/
bdun tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ der bzhugs nas lam gyi rgyun ni chad do// rdul ni nya bar zhi'o// thog pa ni bskams te yang ma zag ga/ lam ni chad de yang ma
'jug go/ 'di ni sdug bsngal mtha' zhes bya'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog gis gtor te/ donas lha'am
tog bus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mun pa mun nag dang 'brel/ sred pa ni rnam par sbyang//
lta ba ni zlog ton mongs pa rnams ni rnam par dkrugs/ zug rdzu na phyung/ mdud pa ni bkrel/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan nibasal/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng/ ba sa la lta ba rnams ni bton/
chos kyi de bzhin nyid namkhyen/ yang dag pa'i mtha' na thugs su chud/ chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi khams ni rnam par bkod/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni
bsngags/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po na red/ ma nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung/ sems can gyi dbang po rnams la ni rnam par gzigs/ sems can gyi spyod pan yongs su
mkhyen/ sems can gyi nad gso ba na thugs su chud/ bdud rtsi'i sman sbyang ba ni grub sman pa'i rgyal por na byung/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa por na gyur[7/ ]
mya ngan las 'das ba'i bdud la 'jog pa por nagyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i srid pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyirgyal po'i khrin pol nibazhugs/ ma
blobar grol ba'i thabs ni bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du nizhugs/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang dag par nibadras/ chos dbyings thugs su chud pa las dbyer med
bar na gyurato// dge slong dag de bzhin gshags ba ngas 'di thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar byung ngo zhes bdun pa dang pal byang chub kyisAng po de nyidan/
bzhugs so// ka 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po btsolnga pa// dag slong dag byang chub sems dpas
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ma thagatu/ dAnas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi snyoms can thams cad skad cig de dang/ thang cig do dang yud tsam dal
mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rtan gyi bar sdug pa sdug pas khyab pa/ mun nag ces bya ba snga
ma bzhin no// phyogs bcu'i 'jigartan gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tug yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldegag/ 'gul
rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'ur bur/ rab
du bur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// sa des rgyas thams cad kyis kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba la lags so// zhes bya ba byin te/ chos/
dgab pa dag kyang bskur ro// chos kyi dgab pa de dag gis song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'a jig rten gyi khams 'di nirin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs bar gyur te/ rin po che'i
gdugs de las kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung ste/ de dgags phyogs bcu'i 'a jig rten gyi khamasagungs med dpag tu med pa dag snang bar byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sen
dang 'a rnams dang/ lha'i bu rnams kyang kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur te/ sems can mkhas pa'i pad+maye shes kyi mtsho las byung ba 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ma gos pa byung
ngo / thugs rjechen po'i lding yang dag par 'a phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba'i skye bo'i snyan gyi chos kyi char/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad kyits+tsaM
gu skyed pa/ dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin par byed pa'i char 'bebs par 'gyur ro zhes zer to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
skyes bu seng ge de yas da dung bcas bdud btul te/ ston pa bsam gtan bde ba mngon du mdzad nas na// gang tsho stobs bcus rig pa gsum po bar gyur tshe//
phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhang mang bye bgayos par gyur// chos 'dod byang chub sems dbab gang dag yongs lcags pa// zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma mnyal tam//
[¥]bdag cag mngon sum ci 'dra shin tu 'jigs dbud de/ shes rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis btsam// khrag khrig zhin gnas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzugs rnams/
