bskur// des pa skyes bu chen po bdud kyi sde rnams btul// khyod kyis gnas mchog 'chi med mya ngan med pa brtas// srid pa gsum du dam chos char ba myur du thob// phyogs bcu'i sems
can snying po rnams kyis phyag brkyang ste// ka la padi'i sgra yi gsung du brjod na ni// bdag cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs rgyas// dper na mar dang mar gyi nying khu mtshungs 'dra
bzhin// dge slong dag de nas 'dod ban spyod ba'i lha'i bu mo dag rebazhin gshegs ba byang chub kyi sAng po la bzhugs pa// mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang// brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa
dang/ g.yul las rnam par rgyalapa dang// bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dad [？ ]bdan bsgreng ba dang/ dpa' dang/ rgyal ba 'phags pa dang/ ]
skyes bu dang/ skyes bu chen po dang/ sman pa'i mchog dang/ zug rngu 'byin nga chen po dang/ seng ge 'i ltar ma sI shing spu zing zhes byed pa ma mnga' ba dang/ glang bo ltar thugs shin tu dul ba/
dang/ dri ma gsum sbangs pas drim ma mapa'i ba dang/ rig pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang/ chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byonab dang/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas
rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang/ sdig pa'i chos sbyangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur ba dang/ ma rig pa'i kho'i sbyabs bcom pas dge slod du gyur pa dang/ chags pa thams cad las
yang dag par 'das pas/ge sbyong du gyur pa dang/ nyon mongs pa bsal bas gtsang spracan r gyur pa dang/ rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal bas dpa' ba dung/ stobs bcu mnga' bas shan tu stobs
dad ldan ba dad rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas/ byang chub snying lags su phyogs te// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
par bstod do// 'di ni shang gi rgyal drung du// bdud sde mngon du pham mdzad nas// ri rab lta bur ma g.yo bzhugs/ bsnyangs pa ga mnga' 'bros ma mdzad// 'di bskal ba byamang
du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis// byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrubs// des na 'dir ni do med mdzes// byang chub dam pa tshol ba na// 'di yis bskal pa bya mad du// tshul khrims/
[s/ ]@#// brtul zhugs dka' thubakyis// brgya byin tshangs pa zil du rlog/ 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ bzodapa'i stobs kyi go mnabs te// sdug bsngal rnams ni
dang du blangs// des na gsalamadog 'od dang ldan// 'di yis bskal ba bye mdadu/ brtson 'grus stobs dang rtsalagyisan// gzhan dag phyir bsal mdzad pa de// des na bdud kyi sde las rgyal//
'di yas bskal pa bya mang du// bsam gtan mngon shes ye shesakyis// thub pa'i dbang po yang dag mchod// des na do meda'adi la mchod// 'di yas bskal pa bye mad du/ shes rab
dang nigs pa bsags// sems can bye ba phan yang btags// des na byang chub myur du brnyes// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha
ya bdud las rgyal// des 'dimya dan ma mnga'o// 'di ni shin tu lha ya lha// lha rnams kyis kyang mchodapa'i cha// 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'os// bsod nams don du gnyer ba'i
zhing// 'chimad 'bras buspun mdzad pa// 'di ni sbyin gnas dam pa ste// 'di la spyan ba btangan da// byang chub dam pa thob bar du// bar ma don chudama'// 'di yi mdzod/
tsha mdzes pa mas// zhing mang bye ba gsal bar bgyid// nyi zla dag kyang zil du rlag/ sems can rnams la snang bgyur// 'di yi gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te// gzugs kyidam pa
0 legs pa'i gzugs// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan bzhed pa// 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// 'di spyan shin tu rnam dag ste// zhing rnams dang nasems can tshogs//
soms dang ldan dang sems med pa// mang po dag la rang byung gzigs// 'di snyan shin tu rnam dag ste// lha ya dag dang ma yi dad/ rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sa dang// mtha' yas pa
yi sgra rnams gsan// 'di la lngags niyanges pa ste// ka lab 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'chi med rab tu zhir 'gro ba'i// chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan// bdud kyi sde rnams gzag
gyur kyang// de yi thugs ni 'khrug mi mnga'// lha la tshogs rnams gzigs gyur kyang// shan du thugs gzhungs dgyes ma mngab// 'di yis mtshon dang mda' rnams kyis// bdud
kyi sde las rgyal ba lags// bden pa brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis// sdang ba'i gyod las 'di rgyal la// gdan las ma skyod bzhin du ni// de yi sku la gnod ma byung// de yi abA
su byams ma mnga'// zhe sdang gyur pa'i ng ma lags so// gar dag khyod las tshesathos nas/ sgrub ba bgyid par 'tshal ba ya 7]ltadar ma rnams de dag ni// rAd ba legs par nod
pa lags// rgyal ba bsod nams gza mnga' ba/khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis// ma ya zla ba khyod 'dra bar// kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog/ skyes bu khyu mchog
[{ ]/'dra bsabyang chub sangs rgyas nas// khrag khrig zhing rnams skyed cing bdud kyad pham mdzad d// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ku 'bad ka'i sgra skad kyis// 'dren
pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i sungs so// bsod nams rnam smin bde ste sdug bsngal thams cad sol// bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub//
bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ba zha ba bsal ba'i dngos pa 'thob// de bas bsod nams bya bas chog bdasu zhig 'dzin/ bdud rtsi chos mnyan
pas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// skya pa yod pa'i nags gnas chog par su zhig 'dzin// sems can don byabs kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// byang chub sems dpas lag pa
brgyad ste tshig brjod pa// mchod pa byas kyis rang rang dag gi zhing du deng// kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// sna tshogs bkod pas rang rang dag bag zhing du dog
dbung rnams phan tshun chen po byung ba de gzigs nas// bde bar gshegs pa tshul du shes par rnam par rol// dpung bcas bdud lasargyal de bdud rtsi rig shog ces// sems can rnams
kyis mtshungs med sogs kyis byang chub smon// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shang dung na seng ge 'i gdan la bzhugs taM/ man par rdzogs par sogs sa rgyas nas/ skad
[s/ ]cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol ba dpag tu med pa mdzad de/ de dag ni bskal par yang bstan bar sla ba ma yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa na lag mthil lta bur mnyam
bar gnas par gyur// mdab ma brgya pa rgyus la 'od dang ldan pa byung// lha rnams brgya stod byang chub snying por rab tu 'dud// seng ge 'i sgra ya mtshan ma dang po 'daredir mthong// stongagasum
shing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang// ri la rgyal po lhun po byang chub snying pora'adud// stobs bcu'i gan du songs brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud// 'di yang m yasangag byang chub snyade bdarel//
sku las 'od zer brgya stong dag ni ba bkyis// rgyal ba'i zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song gsum po zhi// de nas skad cig yid tsam ma de 'om bskams par gyur// sems can gang la'ang tha brgyug
sdadaganod pa med// 'di yang de la sangag gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol// nyi zla nor bu me dang glog dang lha ya bod// bod ldang ba'i rlabs kyis zil mnan lam me tshan// 'gro ba gang gas
kyang ni ston pa'i gtsug ma mthong// 'di yang ma yi sang gi gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol// phyag ga mthar gyis reg nas sa yang rnam drug g.yos// de yis bdud kyi sde rnams shang bal bzhin
dkrugs// bdud ni mdab thogs sa la ra gang 'drib// 'di yang ma yisangag gdan parol pa lags// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u zhes bya bas gtsaganyis pa'o//
de nas gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sad labazhugs ba'i de bzhinagshegs ba la bskor ba byas te/ lha'i tsan dan/
gyi phyi ma'i char mngon par phab nas/ tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad pa byung// 'jig rtenamagon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig
rten ldengs par gyur pa la// nyon mongs spangs pa mig sbyin pa// khyodon g.yul las rnam par rgyal/ bsod nams dag gas dgongs pa rdzogs// dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu rdzog
khyod/'gro ba tsham mdzad 'gyur// sdig pa ma mngab 'dam las rgal// ga'u ta ma thang la bzhugs// sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis// khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur//
shes rab chen po khyod baphags te// 'jig rten dag na zla ma mchis/ 3'jig rten chos kyis khyodam gis// chab na mchis pa'i brla bzhin// 'jig
rtan ring nas gnyid log 'di// mun pa'i phung pos gtibs pa la// khyed na shes rab sgron ma las// rab tu sadapar mdzad spyod pa// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ring nas ni// nyon mngasand
kyis gzir ba la// nad rnams kun las thara mdzad pa// sman pa'i rgyal po yang dag byung// 'jig rten mgon po khyedabyung bas// mi khom rnams ni stongs par 'gyur// lha rnams dang ni mdog
khad ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// skyes bu khyu mchog des pa khyod// lta ba gang dag 'dong bgyid pa// de dag bskal pa stong rnams su// nam yang ngan 'gror mchin 'gyur// gang
dag chos nyan 'gyur pa rnams// de dag mkhas share nad tshodadang// zab dang phung po zad pa dang// 'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur// nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni// kun kyang len/
pa ma mchis par// myur du rab tu grol 'gyur te// dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu 'thob// de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te// sbyin ba rnams nang ga'i 'os// de dag yon phul ma chung ste//
kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu lags// dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsad gab ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhinagshegs
ba la phyag 'tshal zhig/ phyogs cig tu 'khodado// de nas 'od gasal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/
sgros dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba don rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mo ba bzhin dumachod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa
'di dag gis mngon par bastod do// thub pa thugs zab gsung ni shin tu snyan// phung mchog tshangs dbyangs glu ltar gsung snyan mchog/ byang chub rab mchog ngashan tu dam pa brnyes// dbyarA
kun mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyodaskyabs khyodanagling khyod dpud gnyan to// khyod ni 'jig rten mgon pa byams thugs mdzad// khyod ni sman pa'i sa
pa zug rngu 'byin// gso ba phan mdzad khyod ni rim pa mchog/ mar ma mdzad pa gzigs ma thag tu khyod// byams dang thugs rje'i sngon gyi dra ba bsgrubs// mgon po bdud rtsi'i sbyin
gyi char phob la// lha ma rnams kyi gdung ba zhi bar mdzod// khyodan srid gsum ma gos pad+ma 'dra// khyod ni mi g.yo moskyod khyun bo 'dra// khyod thugs dam mgayo rdo rdzobazhin// yon
tana mchog kun mngab ste zla ba 'dra// dge slong dag de ltar 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas// thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshags pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs
ba la nor bu rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgyastod dums sdus pa'i rin po che'i dra bas bkabalta// lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// tshul dang mthun ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis ma'o//
bar bstod do// dag ba dri med shes rab 'od dang gzi brjid ldan// mtshan gyi dam bsumacu rtsa gnyis mchog mnga' ba// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'o// mnyal ba mi
mnga' khyod lamago bos phyag 'tshal lo// dri gsum dris mnga' ba dri med dris bral// 'jig rten gsum du grags shade rag pa gsum brnyes pa/ rnam par thar ba dam pa gsum gyi thag sbyin
pa spyanagasum dri ma ma mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dus ngan rtog pa bsal zhing rab tu zhi thugs ldan// thugs brtse thugs rjes 'phags ba 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thub pa dgyes
pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhi ba// khyod ni yid gnyis grol bar mdzad pa btangasAmos dgyes// brtul zhugs dgakhrub 'phags pa 'gro ba'i dona mdzad pa// rang spyod rnam par dag cing
sngod pa'i pha rol byon// bden pa bzhi po ston pa rna mthararagyes pa po// grol bar gyur nas 'gro bgazhan yang grol mdzad pa// stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bdud bo 'dir lhags ba
shes rab brtson 'grus de bzhin byams bas pham mdzad nas// khyod kyis go 'phang dam pa 'chi ba med pa brnyes// g.yon can dabung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag
de ltar lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis// de bzhinagshegs pa la tshugs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhin gsheg
pa la phyag 'tshal zhade phyogs gcig tu 'khed de// de nas bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs lagal ba der sod sa phyin pa dang// rin po che'i gdug
nubya/ dad bya re chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkabanas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs gal tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag/
gis mngon par bstod do// khyed stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste/ bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen pa de yang khyod kyis skad cig tsag la pham par
mdzad khyod ni bzhengs par ma gyur sku yadamag tsho gsud yod brjod pa ma mdzad pa// thub pa don kun grub ba 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa khyed la bdag phyag 'tshal// bdud
kyi bu mo bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du mga'i khyim nyid// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drud nas khyed ni bskyodacing gsos ma nus// mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrag stong phrag du ma
gang+ga'i bye ma snyed mdzad di// byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa des na de yid khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags// byang chub spyad ba dam pa spyod mdzad tshonashin tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang//
phangs pa'i sras dong bran mo de bzhin bskyed mo'i tshul dang grong khyer dang// yul 'khor grong rdal dag dang rgyalaphrad rnams dang btsun mo 'khor dang glang po dang// dbu dang spyan dang
ljags dang de bzhin zhabs btang des nd rang rnam par mdzes// nga nas nigs rgyas 'gyur te bsam gtanardzu 'phrul blo ya go bgesanas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang pasdug
bsngal rgya mtshos khyer bar gyur pa rnams// dam chos glu yis nyid kyis bsal babya zhes khyed kyis lan mang gsud parjod pa// khyed kyis smon lam de na grub lags srog chags
rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur// skyaba'i khyu mchog 'jig rten mag sbyin mdzad pa khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des// bdag cag thams cad dga' mgur yadagyurtsomu
cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs// sas rgyas rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs nas ni// de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams
cad mkhyen nyid 'tshad rgyur gyur bar shog/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud kyis bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa la
phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te ma dun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa la 'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi pad+ma dgags mngon par gtor ta/ sbyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gsung na dpas ma mchis shing ma 'khrug rnam
par ma 'khrugs pa// mun rdul bral zhing 'chi med rtogs par thugs su chud par gyur// lha yul ma yul ba yi dpal dadabagyi bgazhal med 'os// rab tu 'bar ba'i blo gros ldan
la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// dka' ba mdzad pa nyon mongs sbong ba rdul dang dri ma sel// shin tu dga' ba'igasung gis lha dang ma rnams dga' bar mdzod//
kyi sku mchog 'od zer rgyas pa'i dri ma shin tu ma mnga' bas// lha dang ma yi bdag pa bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las rgyal// pha rol tshogs rnams rab tu badzom pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa// lha dang
mi yi srid par dgab pa gzhan gyi blo solab// shin tu mkhas pa blo ldan gzhan gyi spyod pa rnam par phye// stobs bcumanga' ba gshegs pa'i lam 'dir rnam par rgya ba mdzad// srid pa ni
dang sdug bsngal lag 'a dzan bdor sel te// lhas blo gros 'dul baji lta bzhin du 'dul ba mdzod// zla ba bzhin du mkhas las phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam rgyu ba// srid pa gsum 'di'i rmad/
byung tshig dang dpung gnyen gyur par shog/ lha dang ma yi srid par dga' yang yul la 'khrul mi mnga'// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral zhing dag ba'i dga' la dgyes pa bo// 'khor la sgrogs pa
'jig rten gsum na khyodadang mtshungs ma mchis// khyod 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen lags// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbangasgyur la sogs pa gzhan/
'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstodanas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu/
kha dka rab 'phrulagyi lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ladar gyi lda ldis g.yogs nas/ spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis man
parab stod do/drim rnam gsum spangs pas khyod ni chos kyi snang ba yang dag 'phags// gti mug dang ni lta dang ma rag 'joms pa mas dang dpalagyisargyas// log pa'i lam
la dga' ba'i skye go bde dag 'chi med dgong mdzad pa/ 'jig rten 'dir byung mchod rten lha yul ba dang ma lul pas mchod pa// khyod na gso ba'i sman pa mkhas pa bdud rtsa bde baspyan
ba bod lta dang nyon mongs pa da nga ma rig bsags pa sngon gyi bag la nyalaM// lus can rnams kyi nad kun sngon rgyal ba'i lamagyis salabaste// de bas sman ba dam pa 'dren pa khyod ni
sa la rnam par rgyu// nyi zla'i 'od dang skaram rnams dang ma dang de bzhin nor bu dang// brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od rnams dbal stag spyan sngar lam me ma lags te// shes rab snang ba
mdzad dang 'od dang dpal gyis rab tu rgyas// khyod kyi ye shes rmad byung mno sum gyur pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// rnam bor 'dren pa stan pa'i gsung ldan bde dang bden mnagasung//
dul ba thugs zhi dbang po dul ba rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// ston pa lha dang ma yi 'khor la bstan par bgyi ba ston mdzad pa// shAkya thub pa ma yi khyu mtshog lha mas mchod la phyag
'tshal lo ye shes mang ba ba ye shesabaka' mchid mchogacan srid gsum ga mdzad pa// dri ma gsum bsal ga ba gsum dang rnam par thar gsum ston pa//
thub ba blo gros ji ltar gdul kha skal dang skal med rab mkhyen pa// stong gsum rmad du byung ba lha mas mchod ba khyodal phyag 'tshal la// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang
bcas bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu yos
su dga' ldan dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig dud bzhan gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos/ byang chub kyisAde po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
zlagshegs pa la mngon par bkab ste/ sbyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gisa mngon par bstod do// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nabazhugs te der khyod kyis rgya chen chos kyaba bshad/
khyod kyis bstan pa re na da dung lha yi bu rnams chos spyod rgyun ma 'chad// khyod la blta bas ngoms par ma 'gyur chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa red ma 'gyur// yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig
rten sgronam khyodol mgon yid kyis phyag 'tshalalo// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos ted tshakhyedakyis mkhom thams cad sbyadas// gang tshe byang chub shing drung bzhugs 'gro ba
nagyi nyon mongs rab tu ni de/ gang ga tshad du rgya chen byang chub btsal ba brnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad// khyod kyi smon lam de ni rab tu rdzogs kyis 'khor la rgya chen myur du skor//
chos 'tshal ba dag chos ma nyan bgyi zhes te// srog chags stong phragamang po sdod cing mchis// 'khor lo rgya chen rgyun du bskor du gsol// srog chags stong rnams srid las bsgrol
du gsol// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu longs su dga' ldan 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshags ba la mdon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhinagshegs pa la phyag
'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu dgag/ de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ ma tog dar
sbas dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying bo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/ spyan snga nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gis mngon par bstod do/ tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs rab kyis// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis ga la lhag// mos dang rnam par grol la mkhas pa po//
de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// byang chub snying por lha yis gang bgyis pa// bkod pa mdzes pa de dag mthodo lags te// ji ltar khyod la lta dang mas mchod
[F]bya@#// pa de ni gzhan gad la la da 'os ma lags/ khyod byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te// gang don du dka' ba mad po spyad// shin tugayon can sde rang bcas
ko las rgyal// khyod kyis bla na med pa'i khyang chub brnyes// phyogs bcu dpag tu snang ba mdzad bar gyur// shes rab sgron mas 'jig rtenagasum po gsal/ khyod ni rab rib sel bar
ts+tsha 'gyur bas// 'gro la bla na med pa'i mig sbyin pa// khyod la bstod pa bskalapar brjod kyang ni// khyod kyi bsdu'i khung bu mtha' ma mchis// yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten rnam par
grags// de bzhinagshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// de ltar lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thob bral lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod
nas thal sbyor te/ de bzhinas/ shigs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum ras kyi lha rnams dang lhan
tsag tu ma tog dang/ sa dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bkod ba rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas tshigs su
(bcad pa 'di dar bas mngon par bstod do// thub pa ma 'khrul kha na ma tho mi mnga' rtag tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra// phyogs bcu dag tu ye shes 'dagrags bsod nams/
dag dang gzi brjid ldan pa po// thub ba khyod kyis sngon chad sa das rgyas brgya phrag mtha' las yang dag mchod pa mdzad// de la yul de las byang chub shing drung bdud kyi sde las
rgyal bar gyur// tshul khrims dang nithos dang ting 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas yishes rgyal mtshan tog/ rga shi'ajoms bar mdzad pa snyan pa dam pa 'jig rten dag la mag sbyin
pa thub pa dril gsum dang tha ba sbangs shade dbang po zhe la thugs zhib// shAkya khyu mchog 'gro ba dag gis chos kyi rgyal po khyed la skyabs su mchi// khyod kyis brtson 'grus mthu
yis 'phags pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yasagyur lags te// shes rab stobs dang thabs dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nams stobs rnams dang// stobs rnams dod/
bcom ldanubadus khyod byang chub n gzhugs pa'i tsho namatha' las te// stobs dang ldan pa de rang byang chub snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bdagyur// dbud tshogs mtha' yas/
mthong nas dge sbyang rgyal po byang chub sAng por bzhugs pa de// nyams pa mgyur grang zhes lha rnams thams cad rab tu sngangs shang skrag bar gyur// khyodan 'byung po rnams kyis
bstangs par ma gyur sku yang g.yo ba ma mnga' ste// khur lce phyag gas brdabs nas kun tu g.yos te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur// ji ltar snga ma rnams gyi seng ge 'i khri labyang chub
[; ]dam pa brnyes gyur pa// de ltar khyod kyisarjes susangs rgyas mtshungs sharim nyam stagazhan du 'gyuram lags// yid kyang mnyam zhing sems kyang mnyam stakhyod
kyi bdag nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes// des na khyodan 'jig rten dam pa rang byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa la ma na par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'dug go/
de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bo dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cige tu/ khazhin gshags khag la ba der song ste phyin nas [7 ]me tog a ti mug ta ku dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ sna
ma'i mi tog dang/ bar sha ka dang/ d+ha nu ska pa'i 'phreng ba dang/ chun po thogs te/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong gas bskor nas lha'i glu dbyangs len pas// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas ta/
tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// shan tu gsung snyan dbyangs ni yid du mchi// zla ltar btu zha mdzad thugs dang// 'dzum pa'i zhal ldan ljagasan
rab langs pa// thub mchog dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma rnams kyi snyan cing dgar 'gyur ba// smra skadagang dag 'jig rtenamachis pa kun// khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung na phyung bas
du[z ]/na ma yasgra skad thams cad zal gyis no// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mdas zhi// ma man dga' ba rnam par dag pa skyed// rtog pa ma mchis snying gis ches thes nas// kun 'bag
ba'i rnam par grolo bgo/ khyod ni mkhas rnams la brnyas ma mdzad// mkhas pa'i rgyags pas nam yang rgyags mgyur// khyod na 'gying ba'amanga' zhum ma mnga'// rgya mtsho'i dbus/
nas ra mchog 'phag sa pa bzhin// de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten byung bas na// mi rnams 'di ni rnyed pa legs pa red// pad+ma dbal ltar nor rnams sbyin ba'o// de ltar 'jig rten kun la
chos sbyin mdzad// de ltar rgyal bo tshon po bzhi la sogs brgyal chen pazhib ris kyi lha rnams kyis// byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo
sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas bar snang gi lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags te/ mngon par rdzogs padapung
chub pa la mchod pa'i las phyi bar snang thams cad rin po che'i dra ba dang/ dril bug bar ka'i dra ba dang/ rin po'i gzugs rnams dang/ ni bo tsho'i ba dana rnams dang/ rin poche dang/ na
gyi lda ldi dang/ ni po che'i mi kho rna rgyan dang/ mu tig gi chun khor dang/ me tog ga lta lda sna tshogs rnams lus phyed phyung ba'i lha rnams kyis bzung ba dang/ zlagam rnams kyis legs par brgyan
nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul la// phul nas kyang spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgags mngon par bstod do// thub pa mkha' la bdag cig mchis nas ni//
'gro ba spyod kun ji bzhin gas kho bltas shing/ sems can dag pa khyod kyi dbaltasan// daltar khyod kyi thugs gcig 'khrul ba na thango// mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags ba//
sa ya badren pa de dganam mkha' khyab/ 'di ltar dadag nam mkha'i lus lags pas// gzhal med khang rnams la'ang gnodamo mchas/ bar snang nas nume tog char phab pa// stong chen byung
bur rab tug ngagyur pa// de dag ma lus khyed kyi skur bab kyang/ 'bab chu rgya mtshobab pa bzhin du gyur// gdugs dang me tog rna rgyan me tog phreng// me togatsam kha ka ya lda ldi dang// rgyan
ts+tso phreng zla ba zla gam rnams kyang mthong// lha yis gter kyang 'dres par gyuramamachis// bar snang thams cad lha yas gdagyur te// 'di la spatsam gzhag pa'i gnas ma mchis// rkang gnyis
mchog la mchod pa bgyid kyang ni// khyod la rgyags pa 'am ngomatshar 'gyur mi mnga'// de ltar bsnang gi lha rnams kyis// byang chub kyisnying bo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lagadon
bar ba stod nas tha la mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'bod do// de nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir//
sa gzhi thams cad legs par phyags te byugs nas/ sbos chus chag chag btab ste/ me tog gisachal bar bkan gnas ras bcos bu sna tshog sakyi bla bres te de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas//
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mgo bar ba stod do// stod pa sum rdo rje lta bur ma gtogs bdanas par gyur// dab dar pags pa sha dang rus pa skad bskams kyang// byang chub ma reg nga nib danas ma
ldang zhes// dordzob gnas kyis de ni byang chub snyade por bzhugar/// gal tem song ba khyod kyis stong gsum kun// byin gyis ma brlabs na gang dag rkang mthal gyis// bya ba'i zhing rnams
bskyod pa de ltar shugs chab// khyad tshul soms dang ba lhags tshe ma lus zhigs bar 'gyur// sa phyogs gang du sems can dam la 'chag pan// sa malha yas redab rgya chen legs par mAd/

'jig rten rdul rnams ji snyed khyod kyis snadabar mdzad// stong gsum mchod rten gyur na khyed sku smos nubatsal// ga ga chu la khung bo brgya stong ji snyed dang// sa yi stengan 'gro kho'i 'tshob ji snyed
pa stong gsum sa rnams thams cad bdag cag bzung bar bgyi// khyod la kun dabul dzaltar bzhidabazhin spyad du gsol// gangad khyod nibazhugs sam 'chagal ma mnal bdad// ga'u tam
bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po nyan thos gang// chos gtam smra dang gong yang de dag nyan pa dang// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub phyir bsngogo/ de ltar sazla gi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi
sAri bo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstodonas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'bododo/ mngon
bar bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// dge slongadag bltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la ba de bzhin gshegs pa la lha rnams kyis bstod cing
skyal makru ma bshig/ spyan mi 'dzum par shing gi rgyal po la gzigs shing bsam gtan dang/ ga' ba'i zas kyis bde ba myong bar byang chub kyi shing drung du zhag bdun 'das par gyur to//
de nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams sbos chub bum pa khri thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der lhags so// gzugs na spyodab lha'i bu rnams
kyang sbos chub bum pa khri thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub kyi shing dang de bzhin gshegs pa la spos chus bkrus so// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang
dri zi dang/ lha ma yin dang ]namakha' lding dang/ mi'amacad ng/ lto 'phye chen po bgrang ba las 'das ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la phog pa sbos chudag rang rang gi lus la
bskus so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang soms bskyed do// lha'i bu la sogs pa de dag rang radag gnas su phyin kyang sos chu de dang ma bral bar gyur to/ spos
gzhan la 'dod pa ma skyid do// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus par yid la bya ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang// mchog tu dga' bangs khu na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
phyir ma ldog par gyur to// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur ba des/ de bzhin gshags pab zhabs gnyis lagajugasate
thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs ba dgung bdun du skyil mo krungam bgag par
bzhugs pa gtod de 'dzin de'i mad su zhes bgyi/ dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa des lha'i bu de la 'diska cisabaka' stsal to// lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i
mang ni dga' ba'i zasapakod pa zhes bya sta/ting de 'dzin 'di dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshags pa zhagabadun du skyil ma krung ma bshig par zhugs so// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu
kun nas me tog gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa latshags su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// zhabs na 'khor les khyab pa po// pad mdab rdul med stongagazi ldan// lha yod
ban zhabs gtugs pa// dpal stug zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshags zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// de tsho 'ibu de soms dgabag lha ma rag tu zhi byed galadag nyis sel bas tshig 'daskas/
shAkya'i rigs la dgyes skyed pa// chags sdang gti mug mthar 'byin pa// zhus ba rnams kyang mthar 'byed pa// lhun rigs ba bsal du gsol// dbab/
medwathamasacad mkhyen pa nyid// sangs rgyas stobs bcu duslad du// rgyal ba go sa snyade bar ni// dgung bdun skyel mo krung ma bshig/ 'dab brgya rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba//
su zhig gzigs na dgud bdun du// ma ya sang ga rnam ga sbyin// spyan ma'adzum par gzegs pa mdzad// gangags shing rgyal chung du na// skyil krung ma bshag dgung bdun
bzhugs// smon lam 'di ni khyod kyi 'am// sbuba'isangag kun gyi lags// tshems ni mnyam zhing rnam dag pa// stobs bcu'i zhalan dri'i bgadab// ma nor legs par bakal
stsal te lha dar ma rnams dga' bar mdzod// zla 'dra'i zhal gyis bka' stsal pa// ngas bshad lta yabu nyon cig/ ngas ni dris bdeya lan// cung zad tsam zhig bshad par bya/
dper na rgyal bo phyogs gang du// gnyenagyi tshogs kyis dbang bskub// zhag bdun bar du sa phyogs de// ma 'dor rgyal po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba yang//
gang tshosnyen rdzogs dbang bskur ba// sa yi snying bor zhag bdun du// rgyal ba'i skyil mo krung ba 'jig/ dper na dbab bo dgra tshogs rnams// ma lus pham byas lta ba ltar//
byang chub snying por sas rgyas kyang// nyon mongs bcom nas gzigs pa mdzad// gti mug byung ba 'dod dang khro/ de dag 'gruba'i dgra 'dra ste// chos bo chas ni bzad 'dra ba/
de dag ma lus ngas 'dir bshig/ nga 'dir nga rgyala rnam dgudang// gnas med rlom sems rab tu bcom// zag pa thams cad rab tu sadas// nga yi yashes dam pa skyes// ngas 'di
sre dbang sridargyudang// ma rig bya len byed ba du// bag 1la bcas rtsa dra ba rnams// ye shes gsal ba'i me yis bsregs// ngas 'dir da dang da ya dang// nyes zhags ris
'gro rtsazug pa// sgrib pa'i mdud pa ma podo// ye shes mtshon gyis bcad bar gyur// ngas 'dir rang nas nga'i ldan pa// slu ba tha ma rnams 'jig pa// len par bcas pa'i
phung po de// ye shes kyis ni yongs su shes// gnyis su rmongs pa lag 'dzin pa// tha mar dmyal 'gyur de dag rnams/ gangs 'dir ma lus bsal byas te// phyin char nam
yang skye ra ma 'gyur// ngas 'dir dag pa'i rtsa ba ya// ma las sgrib pa'i nags tshal bsregs// byin ci log ni rnam bzhwa lang// nga yas ma lus nges par bsregs// 'du shes
skud pas brgyus pa la// rnam rtog phreng ba gnod byed pa// ngas 'dir byang chub yan lag gi 'phrang ba sna tshogs rnams kyis bzlog/ bgrod dka' drug cu rtsa lnga dang// gtamug
nyu// sum cudris can// sdig pa dga' bzhi bcu sa// sa la snying po 'dir bsal te// sa yasnying por 'dug nas pas// sdom pa ma yin bcu drug dang//
khams ni rnam pa bco brgyud dang// khyab pa nyi shu rtsa lnga bsal// nyon mongs chu bo tashu dang// 'gro ba 'jigs pa nyi shu brgyad// brtson 'grus mthu dang rtul ba las// ba'adir de ga
shin tu'adas// de bzhanas nigs rgyas basgyings sgrog pa// lnga brgya ngas 'dir yang dag rtogs// brgya phrag stod du chung ba la/ chos rnams nga yis mang dag rtogs// ngas 'dir
bag nyal ma lus pa// dgu bcu rtsa brgyad rtsar bcas mtha'// kun nas ldang ba'il ma rnams// ye shes mo yis nges par bsregs// dogs dang yade gnyis kun 'byung ba// lta
bab tshu las gad gyur pa// ma dge gos can srel pa'i klung// shugs drag ye shes nyi mas bskams// tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag sbangs// sbya dang ser sna phrag dog sda// nyonamodra
dgon pa deng 'dir bcad// 'dulakha'i ma las rab tu bsrogs// 'dir ni rtsod pa'i rtsa ba da// ngan 'gro nyam par 'dren byed pa// 'phags pa skur pa'i dabs pa'ig/ meshis mchog gi
sman gyis bskyugs// ngas 'dir ye shes yon tan dang// ting 'dzin thob nas du ba dang// cho nge 'don dang mya ngan dad// skye ba ma lus mthar mar phyin// ngas 'dir bden tshul ting nge
'dzin// thob nas chu gosbyor ba dang// mdud pa mya ngan zug rngu dang// rgyags dang bag med kun las rgyal// das 'dir nyon mongs gadzades pa la// srid pab ljon shang rtog rtsa don
dran pa'i ste res ma lus bar// bcad nas leshes me yis bsregs// ngas 'dir nga snyam dargyal te// khams gsum dbang byed stobs che ba// g.yon can ye shes ral gris bcom/
lha min dbang la dbang po bzhin/ dra ba ma lus sumacu drug/ 'jug pa sa yi snying po 'dir// shes rab ral gri stobs ldan pas// bcad nas yi shes mams bsregs// nyon mongs
rtsa ba bag nyal bcas// sdug bsngal mya ngan 'byung do dag/ ngas 'dir shes rab dam pa ya ]/thong lcags kyis ni ma lus bton// rad bzhin gyis gsems can gyis// shes rab mag
'dir da yis sbyangs/ yo shes mag sman chen po yis// gti mug lang tog rgya chen bs la// 'byung khams bzhi pa rgyags pa yi// tshusAn gyis dkrugs sred yangs pa// srid pa'i
rgya mtsho dran ba dang// zhi gnas nyi ma'i 'od kyis bskams// sa 'dir yul gyi shing gi tshogs// rnam rtog tu'athul chags chen m// rab tu 'bar ba rnam thar chu/ pasal ba'i khu bas
bsad bar gyur// nges 'dir bag la nyal ba'i sprin// ro myang glog 'dra rnam rtog 'khrul// brtson 'grus stobs kyi rlung shugs kyis// bdas te kun tu gtor bar gyur// ngas ba'i dran pa
dri med pagi/ ting 'dzin thob nas sems srid dgra// srad ba'i bon rgyud ma lus par// shes rab ral gri'i stabs kyis bcad// sa 'dare rgyal mtshan mchog
'chadab// shari rta glang bo rtas ma bo ga/ gzugs bsgyur bdudad bur brtson ba ste// byams pa thobanas rnam par bcom// ma sdug ting de 'dzani thob nas// sa 'di'i dbang po drug
ga rta 'dod ba'i yon tan lngas rtas pa// rtag tu rgyags yan ma lus pa gas/ sman mad tid de'adzin thob nas// ngas 'dir ris su chags ba dang// khong khro ba dang 'thabab dang/
rtsod sbyangs ma lus mtha' mar thun// stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas// ngas 'di phyi dang nang ga ga rlomasams kun dang rtog pa dang// rnam par rtog pa yongs su zad// mtshan
med ting nge 'dzin thob nas// lha ma srid brtsor thug pa// bde ba thams cad ma lus bar// da yas 'dir ni yongs su btang// ngas 'dir rnam thar gsum thobanas// ngas den
shes rab stobs kyis ni// sradi ba dgag 'ching ba kun// ma lus kun las grol ba'agyur// ngas 'di'i rgyumathod gyuranas ni// rtag dang ma rtag 'du shes dang// bdag dang
bdag med bde sdug bsngal// rgyu yi 'dushes ba sum lasargyal// ngas 'dir las kyis rnam par dag/ skyo tshatshadajug rtsa kun 'byungalas// byung ba thams cad shang dbangarung//
[z/ ]ma rtag pa yas bsnan te bcad// ngas 'di shes nyi ma las// gti mug mun pa'i rig pa dang// lta gyur rgyags dang khros gang ba// yun ring mun pa bsal snadabyas// ngas
'di'i brtson 'gyur stobs grus// 'dod dang chags pa'i chu srin can// dar ba dzan lta dan srid rlabs chu// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal// gangartogs chags dang gti mug dar
sems kyi rnam par rtog bsregs te// phye blugs nas mar lhung 'dra ba/ngas 'dir de ni rjes su rtogs gang 'dir rang nas song ba yi//bskal pa dpag med bye brag khrig/ 'khor ba'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa
gdung ba medanas pa la yang sos// 'jig rten phan khyi rga shi dang// mya ngan sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa// phas rgol kun gyis ma thob pa// bdud de ni ngas 'dir rtogs// srid
las byung ba'i skye mched kyis// sdug bsngal phung pos sdug bsngal ba// phyir ma 'byung ba 'jigs med kyis// grong khyer 'dir ni ngas phyin to// ngas 'di'i nang gi gru chen po//
khyab ba de dag rjes su rtogs// rtogs nas rab tupasregos te ngas// de dag yad byung gnas med byas// bdud rtsi don du bsal ba ni// bye ba khrag khrig rang gcig/ mag dang rin chen
mang btang ba// de 'dir da las rjes su rtogs// sngon gyi rgyal ba dpag med bas// gangasangs rgyas de ngas 'dir rtogs// gang gis na ba nyams dga' ba// sgra ni 'jig rten
rnams su grugs// rten nas byung ba'i 'gro ba stong// sems kyi skad cig cig la 'jig/ sAg rgyudri za'i grong khyer 'dra// de 'dir nga yas rjes su rtogs//
gang gis lag ba'i mthal dun// shing tog kha zhag bzhin 'jig rten khams// thams cad mthong ba'i tshog mchogate// nga las 'dir na dag par byas// sngon gyi gnas ni ngas 'dir
dran rag pa gsum ma thob par gyug/ khaskal pa khrag khrig dpag med pa// gnyis kyis log las sadabazhin dran// lha ma nored 'du shes leg/ phyin ci log gyur gang
'bar ba// de yang de bzhin ma nor bar// ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thus// gang bas don du stobs bcu pa// sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms// byams pa'i/
( stobs kyis rgyal gyuranas/ ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs// gang gi don du stobs bcu pa// sems can kun la snyade rjes bsgoms// snying rje'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas
ngas 'dir bdud rtsab snyade khu 'thungs// gdag den du stobs bcu pa// sems can kun la dga' babasgoms// dga' ba'i stobs kyis rgyalagyur nas// ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i srid
khu 'thungs// gangag don du stobs bcu pa// bskal pa khrag khrig btang snyoms bsgoms// btang snyoms de las stobs kyis rgyal// ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snyibalu 'thungs stabs
bcu brlab bye ma bas// rab tu mang bas bdag/sol pa// sngon rgya la segs spyon gsol la// bdud rtsi'i snyad khu des 'di 'thungs// rga sha mtha' mar ma phyin par// skyil mo
krung ni mi gzhig ces// sder bcas pa ya bdud mdun 'dir/ nga las ga na gang snus pa// ye shes rdo rje brtan par byas// nga yas ba yeg pa yang bcom// stobs bcu nyid ni
thob par gyur// de lta bas na skyil krung ga zhig/ nga yas dgra bcom nyid thob ste// da ni zag ba ma lus zad// bdud kyis yang bcom par gyur// de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig/
sgrib ba lnga yi sgo glegs rnams// nga yis 'di ni thams cad bcag/ sred pa'i 'khrishang rnams kyang bcad// da 'dir skyil mo krung gzhig// de nas ma ya zla ba de// dal gyis
gdan las bzhengs nas su// dbang bskur chen po bzhengs nas ni// seng ge 'i gdan la bzhugs par gyur// lha tshogs rnams kyis rin chen snod// sten gnas sa chu sna tshogs
kyis/ stobs bcu yon tan mthar phyin pa// 'a jig rten rtsa lag sku yad pasal// bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams dag/ lta ma khrag khrig lhan cig tu// kun nas ril ma stedadag ga gis/ya
mchodab gzhal dumed pa byed// lha ya bu dag de ltar na// sa yi sAng bor zhag bdun du// rgyal po'i skyil krung ma shig pa// rgyur bcas rkyen bcas gzhi dang bcas// dge slong dag de
ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir// ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs/
rgyas so/ ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang// rga ba dang/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar byung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang bol gdand nyid la bzhugs so// zhag bdun pa gnyis
pa'i tsha nid bzhinagshegs la stodagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasakyi bar du rgyud du'achag pas 'chag go/ zhag bdun pa gsum pa'i tsha ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngas
'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// thog ma med pa'i skye bdang// rga ba dang/ 'chiba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes
byang chub kyi snyang po lasman ma 'dzums par gzigs so// zhag bdun pa bzhi pa'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa shar gyi rgya mtsho nas/ nub kyi rgya mtsho'i bar du ma rang ba'i 'chag pas
rgyu'achagage///'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu drug pa// de nas bdudasdug can de bzhin gsheg
ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags kyis// bcom ldan
'das yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gsol// bde bar gshegs pa yosasum ngan las 'da' bar gsol// dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas
bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can nga'i dge slong gnas brtan/ gnasabartan dulab/ gsal ba/ byang ba/bag tsha ba med ba mad du thos pa/ chos kyi rdzas
su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs la/ bdag nyid slob dpon du sgrogs pa dang/ bas kyi rgol ba 'byung ba/ byung ba rnams chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad de/ dad par byas nas/ cho 'phrul/
dang bcas pa'i chos ston par nus pa dag la byungag bar desridi dud yongs su mya ngan las ma 'dago/ sdug can ngas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas dang/ tshes dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra bzhag
bar mgyur pa dang/ byung chub sems dbab dbag tu med ba dag/ blon med ba la da dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan bar 'gyur gyi bar des di dung yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o 6
sdig can nga'i 'khor bzhi ba dul ba/ gsal ba/ byang b/ bag tsha ba med pa nas/ tshe 'phrul dad pasras pa'i chos ston bab bar du nus pa dag byung bar mgyur gyi bar de srid du yongs su
mya ngan las ma ba da'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad bso nas/ sdug bsngal zhing mad ma bde ste/ phyogs gcig tus nas 'dug ste/ mag smad nas mdas sa lari mo 'dri/
ka 'a@#// zhang bdag gi yul las 'das so snyam du sems par gyur to// de nas bdud gyi bu mo dga' ma dang/ ma dga' ma dang/ sred ma gsum gyis bdud sdig can la/
kyi tshigs su bcad da sa pa/ lab cig ji ltar thugs ma dgyes// mdagyes gang lags bka' stsal dang/ 'dod chags zhags pas dbacings nas// glang bo bzhin du dgug par bgyi//
bku gnas de na myur du mang// khyod kyis dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi// de ltar thugs ngan 'o brgyal 'or// dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes bar 'gyur// bdud kyis sbas ba/ 'jig rten dgra bcom
bde bar gshegs// 'dod chags dbang du de ma 'gro// nga la yul las shin tu 'dus// de bas nga ni mya ngan chu// de nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthubyang chub sams dpa'
mdzad pa rnams kyad shes mod kyi// bud med kyi mi brtan bs pa'i tshes ma mnyan te// bu cig btsas tsam gyi na tshod kyi dar la bab par bsgyur nas// mig gis ma rtsol khar bya ba'i las kyi phyir
(de bzhin ga shegs ba'i gan du dong ba dang/ de bzhin gshags pas de dag yid la mdzad par de dag rgas pas 'khogs par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de dag pha'i gan dudong// 'di
!/ skad ces smras so// de na chags pas ma be kri ste/ dam yul las shin tu 'das// de bas mya nganang cha ste// yabakyis bdag cag gsungs pa mang// ga'uta pa brlag pa'i phyir// bdag
cag rnams kyis gang sprul pa// gzugs la gal te de ltan// dmas desnying 'gas par 'gyur//khab badrag cag lus rga bas 'khogs pa 'dim mchis par mdzad du gsol// bdud
kyis sbas ba/ gang zhig sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs nag zhan du sgyur bar byed nus pa// rgyu dang ma rgyu dag gi 'jig rtenadag ma de ngas ma mthong// myur du songs thub pa de la nad byas nyesal/
shogs shig dang/ des ni khyod kyis bsam pa bzhin du sngon gyi lus su sgyur bar 'gyur// de nas de dag dong spyi[7 } ]bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la sku brnyas bgyi bar bsams pas//
bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byis ba rnams dang// ji ltar n pa rnams dang/ ji ltar ma ngesal ba/ mi mkhas shing ma 'tshalab rnams ltar bdag cag nongs pa can du bzudadu gsol// bde bar
gshegs pa bdag cag nangos pa can du bzung du gsol// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la bzod pa gsol to// de nas bzhin pa/shags bas de dag la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa// san
mas de la brub dang/ so las lcags nibaca' ba dang// mdo las ri ni dbug pa dang (gting mi dpogs la dpog par 'dod// de ltar bsan bu mo khyod/ nyes pa can du gzung ngo// de ci'i phyir
rtsi zhe na/ gang zhes pa la nyes par mthong nas 'chags shing phyin chad kyang sdom bar byed pa de ni// 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag zhag bdun pa lnga pa zhag
bdun duyul ngan chen po byung ba'i tshon de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal bobatang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs so// de nas klu'i rgyal bo btang bzung/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang/ rlung gis thog tu 'ong zhes rang gi gnas nas gyur ste/ lus kyis de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku la lan bdun du dkrisanas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab
bo bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dad rlung gis thog tu bod zhas/ shar phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal bo gzhan mang du lhags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyis
lan bdun du dkris nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab po// shar phyogs nas ji lta ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grong ba dad rlung gas thog tu 'ang ngo zhes lha dang/ nub dang
byang phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal bo rnams lhags nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyi lan bdun du dkrin nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo/ klu'i rgyal po lus

kyi phung po de nidi'i dbang po lhun po ltar mthong par gnas par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po de dag gas kyang ji ltar nyin bdun mtshan bdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la reg pa de lta bu'i bde ba de dag gis
sngon nam yang ma rnyed do// de nas zhag bdun 'das nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yul ngan med par shes te de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku las lus bkral nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
zhabs la mag bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor btus nas rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo/ klu'i rgyal bo btang bzud yA de bzhinagshegs pa 'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gnas su bzhugs so// zhag ban pa drug pa'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po btang bzung ga gnas nas shing n+ya gro dang skyongagi drung du bzhud do//
klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas dang/ shing n+ya gro dar skyobag bar du klung ne ran dzA na'i ngogs su spyod pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ nyan thos rgan po dang/ gtota ma dang/ gcer bu pa dang/
kun tu 'tsho ba pa la sogs pas de bzhin 'a -]shegs pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mas zhag bdun pa yul can chen bob dus bde bde bas bde bar gnas par byas sam zhes zer
to// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas deb rtsa chad du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// chos thos pa dang/ mthong ba dang/ dben bar dgag pa bde ba yin/
srog chags 'khyud pa rnams la bsdams// gnod pa ma byed 'jig rten bde// sdig pa rnams las rab 'dus pa/ 'dod chags bral ba 'jib rten bdaka/ nga snyam ngo rgyal gang 'dul ba/
de ni mchog tu bad ba yani/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs ba'i skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ skye sngags 'don ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang//
mad ma bde ba dang/ 'khrugs pa rnams kyis 'jig rten kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar bgazigs nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
blabarjod do// sgra reg rogazugs dang dri rnams kyis// 'jig rten bde kun tu gdungs bar gyur// sred pas 'jigs kyang srid pa'isrid ba yis// phyir zhare sud pa tshol bar byed pa
man zhag bdun ba bdun pa'i tshanid bzhinagshegs bshadesgol rgyu'i drung du bzhugs so// de'i tshabyang phyogs ba'i tshod pa bag gon dang/ bzang po zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa gsal kha spun/
gnyis rnyed pa chen po redanas/ zang rnam pa mang po thogs te/ 'gron ba phal po che dang/ shing rta shin tu gang ba lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas/ byang phyogs su dong ngo// gzhes
la glod bu cad shes legs skyes dang grags pa zhes bya bganyis yod do// de gnyis la thogs pa'i 'jigs pa med de/ gang glang bu gzhan ma ra ba der de gnyis gtong ngo// gang du
mdun rol 'jigs pa yodapa der de gnyis phur pa la btags pa bzhin du 'dug g/ de gnyis la lcags ma 'ju'i mi tog ut+pal sngar gang ngam/ sna ma'i me tog phreng bas deganyis
rgyu ded de/ shing sgrolargyu dang nye ba zhib tu shad 'o ma can gyi nags na gnas pa lha mos byin gyis brlabs kyis byan gyis brlabs pas/ de dag gi shing rta dag thams cad ma 'gro ste/ phreng ba/
lasogs pa shing rta'i cha rkyenathams cad kyang chad grugs so// shang rta'i phang lo rnams kyang lte ba la thug par sa'i nang du nub ste/ thams cad kyis rab tupasgrims kyad rasha'i rta de dag 'grub
mgyur nas/ khacig ngo mtshar dang skrag par gyur to// shing rta dadag thang la yang thogs par gyur pa 'di rgyun ci zhig yod 'di'i 'gyur ba ni su zhig yanasnyam nas de dgagis glang bu
legs skyes dang/ grags pa gnyis 'drenadu bcug ste/ me tog ut+pal spar gang dang/ sna ma'i me tog 'phreng bas bdas kyang 'gro bar ma gyur nas/ de dag 'disnyam du sems te//
gang gi phyir 'di gnyis kyang ma 'gro ba las mdun na 'jigs pa 'ga' zhig 'byud du gdon mi za'o snyam nas/ de dag gis sa 'khrul rta pa dag sngar btapang/ 'as 'khrub rta pa rnams/
sar gnas 'jigs pa ci yang med ces smras so// lha mo des kyang rang gi gzugs bstan ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs phyung ngo// gling bu dga' s kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
ga la bde legs su shang rtadrangs pa dang/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa me ltar rab tu 'bar ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan gyis legs par brgyan/ 3ma 1nas
ring por ma lon pa lta bu dpal gyis 'bar ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di ni ci zhig tshadas pa 'di'i phyin tam/ 'on te lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'on te
rnam shes kyi bu 'am/ ban te nyi ma dang zla ba 'am/ 'on te ma'i lha la gzhag gam/ klung bag lha zhag snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshags bas na bza' dur
skyag rnams bstan te// de nas de dag gis du go bgos ba 'don rab tu byung ba yin gyis bdag cag 'jigs pa med do zhes smras te/ dedag dad pa thob nas mduphan tshun du sgyus
pa rab tu byung ba 'di ni dus su za ba yin na/ cung zad cu yod/ snus ba/ sbrang rtsa dang/ skye ma dang bu ram shing bshus pa yod do// de dag gis sbrang rtsi dang/ skye ma dang/ bu ram
shing bshus pa khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pa bgal ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo des phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum khaskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig
tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad cesagasol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ spyan
gzigs 'di bzhes su gsol// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs la 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdagags lag bas 'di blangs na nam legs na/ sngonagyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams kyis snod ji lta bu s bzhes snyam nas mkhyen ba 'jug par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs kyi dus la bab par rig nas skad cig de nyin
la phyogs bzhi nas rgyal pa chen po bzhis gser gyi lhung bzed bat+taM shoras lhal nas yakhan gshegs pa la pim ldan 'das bdag cag la smugs partse bar dgongs te/ gsal
gyi lhung bzed ba zhu bo 'di dag bzhes su gsol zhes phul la// de dag gi sbyang g cham lan par dgongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so// de bzhin du dngul gyi bzhi dang/
bat+tachu dad/ shal dang/ sdug dang/ rdo'i snyid pa las byas pa bzhi bzhi dang rin po tshe thams cad las byas pa'i lhung bzed bzhi thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul na yang dag sbyang gi
cha ma yin bar dgongs te// de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'ad snyam du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
lhung bzed rnam baji 'dra ba dang gas bzhes snyam dgongs na rdo'i lhung bzed las kyis bzhes par mkhyen nas/ de bzhin bshegs pas de lta bu'i thugs bskyed bdad/ de nas rgyal ba tshon
ba rnam thosakyi bus rgyal po chen po gzhan gsum la sbas pa/ grogs po dag snonapo'iras kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi byon pa dang/ de la bdag gis 'disnyam du
bsams te/ 'di sbyad par bya'o snyam pa dang/ de nas sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnam par snang byed ces bya ba des bdag la 'di skad tsos smras so// kye snod 'di dag spyad par ma bya bar//
'di dag tshongs 8shag mtshod rtagrags par 'gyur// shAkya thub ces bya ba rgyal ba 'byung// de la lhung bzed 'di dag dbul ba gyis// grags ba bdag cag shAkya
thub la la// snod bul ba la dus dang tshod la bab// glu dbyangs dag dang sal stan sgra phyung ste// mchor ba byas nas lhung bzed dbul bar bya/ snod de chos kyi rang bzhin mgashegasab//
snod 'di rdo la ri da ba zhin bzhes su rung// gzhan gyis phreng bar bzod pa ma yin gyis// da ni bdag cag de dag len du 'dong// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis rang gi gnyen dang ra khor du bcas te
me tog dang/ bdug ba nad 1 pos dad/ phreng ba dang/ phyugapa dang/ sal snyan dang/ pheg rdob pa dang/ glu dbyangs len cing/ rang rang ga lag tu lhung bzed de dag thogs nas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa ga la ba dedasong ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ lhung bzed de dag lha'i me tog gis bkang nas/ de bzhinagshegs pa la phul//dge slong dag/
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'disnyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po chen po dad ba dor ba bzhi bo 'di dag gis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi phul na/ bdag la bzhi'i mdung la ja stegacigags blosanani/
gsum yang ma dga' bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis lhung bzed bzhi bo 'di dag blangs te/ ltung bzed gcig tuphyin gyis brlab bo snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin mas phyag g.yas 'barkyang
ste rgyal pa rin po rnam thosakyi bu la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa// khadabaragshegs la lhung bzed phul cig dang// khyod nathig ba mchogags snod du 'gyur gang 'dra dag la ltud
bzed phul bani// dran dang blo gros nam yang nyams ma 'gyur// dge slong gde nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rgyal bon po rnam thos kyi bu las lhung bzed
bzhes sa// bzhes nas kyang rgyal bo chen po yul 'khor bsrung la chags su bcad pas bka' stsal pa// ga zhag de bzhin gshegs la lhung bzedabul// nam yang dran dang shes
rab nyams ma 'gyur// bsal dngos go ba'ang sangs rgyas thob par du// bde bas bde bar dus rnams zad par byed// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgod
te rgyal ba tshen po yul 'khor srung las lhung bzed bzhes so// bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes re la tshigs su bcad pas bka'astsal pa// rnam par dgasems de bzhin
gshegs pa la/ khyod kyis yongs dang lhung bzed khul cig dang// khyod kyi sems na myur du dag par 'gyur// lha ma 'jig rten dag na bsngags par 'os// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin
gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rgyal bo chen po 'phagasaskyes lasalhudabazed bzhes so// bzhes nas kyang rgyal bo chen po mig mi bzang la tshags su bcad pas bka'
ul pa skyon med sems dad dad pas skyon med snod//de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims skyon med ces// tshul skyon med la rab tu phul cig dang// khyod kyi sbyin la/
sgo bson nams skyon med bgyun// dge slong dag de ltar der zhin gshegs pasazugs brtse bar dgas ta/ rgyal po tshon po tshabag ba khozad las lhung bzed bzhes so// bzhes nas kyang gos
pa'i stobs kyis lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis parlags te/ de'i tsha ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de// da las ston gyi srid pa'i snoda rnams// barbad byus 'bras bus rab tu bkang
ste byin do nas lhung bzed dbyibs legs bzhi po de// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha bzhi rnams kyis byin/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtan pa dam pa'i don de dgangos pa de// zhag bdun/
rgyu byang chub shing mchog gza'i/sa nas ni// seng ge 'i stabs 'dra ma nges na deng ge de// sa ni rnam pa drug tu bskyod nas bzhengs// glang po'i dbang ltar kun tu dal gyis gshegs// rim gyis
sgrol rgyu'ishang ga drud byonanas// lhun po lta bur g.yo ba ma mnga' bzhugs// thub pa bsam gtan tang de 'dzami rnams dgongs// de yi tshon ga gon bzad pa sbyin// gnyis dang tshong
pa'i tshogs dad shing rta ni// nor skyo gad pa dag dang lhan cig tu// sA la'i me tog nags tshal rgyas par zhus/sa// drad srong chen po'i gzi yis skad cig du// srog shing shug par
bang la sa nang nub// de dag de 'dra ba ya gnas ma bongan// tshong pa'i tshogs 'jigs pa chen po skyes// de dag rab g mda' dang mdud bud thogs// nags nag dgas bzhin du/
su zhes tshol// sbyin med 'od zer skyid ldan 'dra ba 'irgyal/ zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'drar mthong// khro ba spangs shing rgyags pa bsal nasasu/ mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di na su
zhes dpyod// mkha' las lha yis 'di skad tshig snasate// 'di na gangs rgyas 'jig rten ban dono mdzad// nyin bdun mtshan bdun bzang dad btung bdag/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid
ga gi nyon mongs zhi 'dod na// sku dang thugs bsgoms 'di la bshos gsol cig/dadagags nas snyan de thos nas// rgyal la phyag 'tshal bskob
byas nas ni// dga' nas de dgakhrags dang lhan cig tu// rgyal ba bshos gsol bar na grogs bcas so// dge slong dag de'i tsha tshod pa ga gon dad/ bzad bo gnyis kyi ba'i khyamatha'
'khob kyi 'o cag na gnas so// de nas de'i tshab de dag bzhes na mar gyisAri khu byug par gyur to// de nas b.ladi dag gis maragyis khur khyer nas/ tshong saMg gon
dang bzang po ga la ba der song na phyin nas de dag gis tshul smos ta/ btsun pa dag mkhyen bar mdzad du gsol// khyed kyis thamasacad nibazhos nas/ maragyisangakhu byud na 'ditsa nag
da/ ba zhig lags sam/ 'on tan lags/ rinapasaze zas la bsams pa'i rd pa zhin can dag 'di skad ces/ 'di ni dag bzhu lan te/ bram ze rnams la 'dod
klo sbyan chen po byed dagos so zhes 'dzar to// dge slong dag de'i tshong pa ba len dang// bzang ba dag ga tshe rabs snga ma'i dgagaleganyen mtshams bram zem bya zhes bya ba tshangs ba'i 'jig rten du
! skyes bar gyur pa des/ bram ze'i gzugs su sprul nas/ tshong pa de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyed kyi sngonan smon btab pa/ byang chub brnyesanas de bzhin gshegs// bdag cag/
rnams kyis shes gsol te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog/ smon lam de ni rdzogs zin gyis// byang chub brnyes la de bzhin gshegs// del zhal zas phul cig dang// gsol
nas 'khor la skor bar 'gyur// khyed kyi ba ma sang khu byung// shin tu bkra shis skar ma bzang// drang srong chen po de la ni// bsod nams las kyi mthu 'da'o// de ltar tshod pa
bskul nas na karma byaradag gnas su song// ga gan zhisan bya la sogs// thams cad mdanamagu bar gyur// bsnyenga'am ji snyed yod pa dag/ de kun ma lus par bsdus
nas su// de yi steng nas phras na nam byas te// de dag rab tu gus par nal zas sbyag/ rin chen gzhong pa'i tshad byed ces bya ba// srung cig la yang 'bum phrag gcig ra ba//
gtsang mararab bkrus dran med byas nas// zhal zas kyis ni bad chad du bkang// sbrang rtsadang rin chen gzhong thogs te// sgrol rgyu'i shing gi drung seng ston pa la// btsan ba
bzhes te bdag cag sman yang thogs// zhal zas rgyanom pa 'dimanabs su gsol// spyan gnyis la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang// byang chub bzhugs pa'i sngonan bsam mkhyen/
nas ston bas bzhes pa mdzad de zhal zas gsol// gsol nas gzhong ba nam mkha'i rakyil du bod// lha ya bu pho rab tshangs zhes bya ba// de yis rin chen gzhong pa mchog de bla
des de da dung tshangs pa'i 'a ga rtenan// lha gzhan grogs dang lhan cig mchod pa byed// de nas de'i tshod bzhinagshegs bas tshong pa ga gon dang/ bzang po de dag las 'di
dag gis rab tu dga' bar mdzad de// lha ya bkra shis don sgrub cing// phyogs rnams bkra shas byed ka res// khyed kyi don rnams sgrub gyur cig/ thamasacad myur du mthun par shog/
phreng ba mag lo 'dug ba ltar// lag pa g.yasan dpal yodashego g.yonan 'ang dba' zhig nas gyur cig/ yan lag kun nu'ad dbal yod shog/ tshod pa dag nanor tshol zhing// phyob/
bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams// red ba chen po rnyed gyur cing// de dag bde ba skyed par shog/ dgos pa la la gang bag phyir// shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas ba
'a rgyu skar khyed la skyod gyur cig/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang// mgo dang lag dang nab so dang// rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste/ de dag rnams shar phyogs pa//
rgyu skar bdun po de dag// 'jig rten skyongob grags ldan ga/ shar phyogs la'o sa na yodatsas bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// de dag bdag bo rgyal mo na// yul 'khor bsrung
zhes grags pa ste// da ni dri zakun gyi bdag/ nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bun mang yod la// mkhas shing mdi yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad bar yang// dbang po zhes
bya stobs pa tsho// de rnams khyed la nad med cing// shis par lhag par skyod gyur cig/ shar phyogog sa lags kyi phyogs man/ lhatsho gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang
tshu don grub ma dang ma'i lam dang// dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang// dag 'a can m dang dga' sel ma// de dag khyod la nad medatsad// shas par lhag par skyong bar shog/ shar phyogs
lags kyi phyogs can// ga 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten yod/ rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa// de rnams kyisan bzhugs shing mkhyen// de yang khyed la nad med cing// shas bar lhag pa
skyod gyur cig/ phyogs na byed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig bar ma gyun cag lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams red de ldog par shog/ dgas pa la la gang gi phyir//
lho phyogasasu ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa la// rgyu skar khyed la skyobagyur cig/ mchudang ge dang dbo dang na// sa bab nag pa lnga pa yan// sa ra dang ni sa ga ste// de dag
rnams na lho phyogs pa// rgyu skar bdun bo do dag na/'jig rten skyong bgrags ldan pa// lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyod la kun tu bsrungs// de dag bdag po/
rgyal bo ni// 'phags skyes po zhes bya bar brjod/ de ni grul bumakun gyi bdag/ gshin rje lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bunasong yod la// mkhas shing mang yang mthun pa ste// dgu khacu/
rtsa ga ga zad par yang// dbang po zhes khya stobs bono// de rnams khyed la nad med cade// gas bar lhag par skyong gyur cig/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na// lha ma gzhon nu
brgyad yod de// dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma// grags pa thob dang grags 'dzan dang// legs par ladas dad rab sna dang// legs par sad dad bde sgrub ma// de dag khyed la nad
med cing// shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na// pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod// rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'apar/ rtag tu thams cad gsal
byed pa de yang khyed la nad med cing// shas ban lhag par skyegyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par mgyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas//
nor rnams red de ldog par shog/ dgas pa la lagang gi phyir// nub phyogs sun 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa la// rgyu skar byed la skyod gyur cig/
lha mtshams dang ni sman dang yong// brtson 'grus brtan ldan snubs dang ni// chu stod chu sad bya zhen dang// gre bzhan du na bdun ba lani// de dag rnams ni nub phyogs pa// rgyu
( skar bdun bor dag ni// 'jig rten skyod ba gribs ldan pa// nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu srung// de dag bdag ba rgyal bo ni/ mig mi bzad M
zhes bya bar shes// de ni klu rnams kun gyi ba dag/ chu lha lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la khu nu mang yoda'// ma las shing mang mang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par mang/
( dbang po zhes bya stobs po go/ de dag khyed la nad med cing// shas bar lhag pa skyong gyur cig/ nub phyogs lags kyi phyogs tshan// lha mogazho nanu brgyad yod do// rna cha skra
'dres ma dang ni// bar dkur dang skya reng dad// cha mad cig dang dgug pa dang// rol dang gnas dang stabasagyur srung// de dag khyed la nad med cing// shas par lhag par skyong bar shog/

! nub phyogs lags kyi phyogs cha na// nub ces bya ba yod// nyi ma zla ba rnams kyang gnas// nub ba 'ang khyed la nor sbyin gyur/de yang khyed la nad med cing gshis bar lhag bar skyong gyusacig gos ma bye
cag bde ba shog/ khyed cag sna ga par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams redad ldog par shog/ dgas pa la lagangag phyir// byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/
gang dag phyogs der gnas pa ya'i rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mon gru dang ni mon gre dang// khrums stod dang yang khrums smad dang// nam gru dang na tha skar dad// bra to ste mi bdun pa man
rgyu skar bdun bo de dag na// 'jig rten skyong bgrags ldan pa// byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed lakun du srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// ma la zhan pa
lus ngan// gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste// nor bzangs lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu na mang yod la// mkhas shing mang yang mthun paste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang//
dbang po zhes bya stobs po tsho// de dag khyed la nad med cing// shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha ma gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rab chags lha mo/
gtobalha mo// sa dang de bzhin pad+macan// rgyal ba tsho la nyara gnas dang// re dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing// shis par lhag par skye bar shog/ byang phyogs
logasakyi phyogs cha na// spos ngad ldan pa'i re ba yod// gnod sbyin 'byung pa rnams gnas// rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug/ de yang khyed la nad med cing/ shas pa lhag par skyong
@#[gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar khyed cag sdug par 'gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nora rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ rgyu skar nyi/
po brgyad pa// phyogs bzhi dag na bdunabadun gnas// lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis// phyogs pa zha dag na brgyad brgyad gnas// dge sbyong brgya da dang bram ze brgyad// yul rnams na grong rdal
brgyud dab da bar bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// khyed cag grona'ang bkra shis gyur// ldog pa na yang bkra shag shog/ gnyen lalta ba bkra shis gyur//
kha gten gyis blta ba 'ad ba klasha sashog/ dbang bcas gnan sbyin rgyal chen dang/ dgra bcom pa dag snyade brtse bas// thams cad du na bkra shis rang// bdud rtsarigs pa thob par shog/
(tshangs pa da nga ni de bzhinanor rgyas dang// zag ba med pa rnam par grolo rnams dang// kludang gnod sbyan rtagatusung brtsis bsrungs// ston brgyad mtshungs par tshan skyong bar shog/ rnam 'dren
bla med 'jig rten mgon po yis// de dag mthun bar sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsud// khyed rnams kyi ni dge ba'i las 'di yas// sbyang rtsa 'byung zhes bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'jig rten
! rnam par 'dren ba rgyal khams// lung bstan chags mod bad ni dad pa yin// phyin chad byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mang// gang dag lung bstan de dag phyir mi ldog/ rgyal bas lud
bstan ba nib dathos nas// sems ni gu zhang mchog tu dga' gyur te// de dag sbyin dang bgos dang lhan cig tu// de dag sangs rgyas chos la skyabs su dod// go gon dang bzang/
po' le gu zhes bya ba/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o////dge slad dgag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sha'i sgrol rgyu'i drung na bzhugs la// dad po mngon par rdzogs par sas/
rgyas pa gcig pu dbon par gshegs te/ nang du yang dag pa zhig nas 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad pa'i phyir 'di snyam du dgados te/ kye ma dus thob cing mngon par rdzogs bar sangs
rgyas pa'i chos bdun// zab pa/ zhi ba ta rab tu zhi ba/ nye bar zhi ba/ gya nom pa/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ brtag ma nus la/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yan ba/
'chag sa ba ma khas pa dang mdzangs pas rig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'di phung po thams cad bor kha/ kun tu rag pa/ des ba rag pa/ tshor ba thams cad 'gog ba/ donadam pa/
kun gzhi ni da ba/ bsal ba'i dngos po// len pa med pa/nye bar len ba med pa// rnam par rig ba ma yin pa/ rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa// 'dus ma byas pa// yul
drug las shin tu 'das pa/ ma rtog pa/ rnam par ma rtog pa/ brjod du med pa/ sgra med pa// sgras brjod du med pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ dmags pa thag
cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ zhi gnas kyi lamagyis chod pa/ stong pa nyid dmags su med pa/ sridapa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral lo/'gog pa/
mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ gal te bdag gis chos 'di gzhan dag la bstan la/ gal te de dag gis ma shes na de na bdag ngalab dang/ lag par stsal pa dang/ chos bstan pa don med
par 'gyur gyi/ bdag snyade las chung dud kha rog par gnas par bya'o snyam mo// dag tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// zab zhi spros bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas//
bdud rtsi chos ni bdag gas thob par gyur// bdag gis bstan kyang gzhan gyis ma shes te/ ma sbyar nags 'dab gnas bar bu ba snyam// tshag bral ngag ga lam gyis ma gos pa/
de bzhin nyir chos rang bzhin nam mkha'a'adra// sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba rab grol ba// mchog rab sotshar chub dam pa shes/ don tshul 'don yagi rnams kyis su// shes par
mnyis mdzangs bas yig pa lan/ gasnon gyi rgyal la lhag byas samaMs can rnams// de dag chos 'di thos na yid ches 'gyur// bden tshos na gang yang yodaman te// yod mnagang yin/
! da ni yod ma yin// gang gis rgyu dang bya ba rgyudangashes pa// de la yodapa 'am med pa yodan na// bskal ba brgya stong dbag tu med par ni// sngon gyi rgyal kha'agan nas bdag gis spyad//
! ban kyang gang na bdag dang sems can dang// srog med bzod pa ni bdag ma thob// gang tshe 'din skye bachi gang med pa// chos 'dithams cad rang bzhin bdag med pa'i// bzod
bde bag gas thob la de yatsha// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bdag lud bstan// 'jig rten kun la snying rjematha' las nga// gzhan gyis gsol ba btab lang ma sdod// skye ni
dag tshangs la dad pa ste// de yis gsol ba btaban 'khor lo bskor// gal te tshangs pas da ya rkad par gtugs// rnam pa bzang po 'tshala'agyurasams cad machas// rdul bral
gya nom chos phashadagasal btab na// de ltas da yachos bdu gzung 'os 'gyur// dpa/slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od gang
gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur ba'i 'od phyung ngo// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud na/
sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes te/ bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung du la thugs btud cing tshos ma ston bar shes nas/
de 'di snyam du sems te/ bog song la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar bskul gor ma chag snyam mo// de nas tshangs pa gtsug phud can gyis de'i tshe de ma man pa tshadasaras
kyalha'abu gzhan dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang
'di ltar ngos ma ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud bas/ kye ma ba jig rten bad na rung ngo// grogs po dag kyi ma 'jig rten bdun rnam par ma rung ngo// bdag cag dongs
de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor la bskor bar bskul gar ma chag go/ dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can/ chas
ba 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor// mdun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der songs phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te//
thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad cesagasol to// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
nas kyang/ chos ma ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs bdud pas/ kyi mabo bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di ni ma rung ngo// kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtan 'di ni rab tu ma chung
ngo sems can rnam babazang po ba de sa ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba'i don 'tshal bar rdo thog nga skal ba dang ldan pa/ nus pa dang ldan pa dag mchis te// de lta lags pas/
00 bcom ldan 'das chos legs par bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa chos bstan du gsol// de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// ye shes chen po mchog gsadakyil
'khor bsgrubs nas ni// phyogs bcu dag tu bod zer rnam par 'gyeda mdzad de// ye shes wer gyis ma yi pad+makha 'byed pa// smra ba'i nyi ma de ring bsad btang snyoms bzhugs// 'phagA
pa' nol sems can dag ni mgron gnyer te// srog chags bya ba mad po dbugs phyunga mdzad nas na// gang slad ma gsudas 'grol btang snyoms mdzad pa 'di// 'jig rten ma lag khyodal
migs pa ma lags so// chos kyi dam pa'i rnga bo che ni brdung du gsol// dam pa'i chos kyi dung ni myur du budadu gsol/ 2chos kyi mchod sdong chen po bsgreng bar mdzad du gsol// chos kun
mchan bo 'bar bar na dzad du gsol// chos chu mchogagi char ba rab tu dbab tugasol// srid pa'i rgya mtshor ba nas pa 'di dag bsgral du gsol// nad chen nyon mongs 'di dag thar bar/
mdzad du gsol// nyon mngos mas gdungs rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol// bde ba shes pa rims med mya ngan medagyur pa// zhi ba'i lam ni khyod kyis nges par bstan du gsol// mya ngan
'das pa'i lam du ma 'gro mgon med pa// log pa'i lam du gnas la mgon po thugs rje mdzod// rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams rab tu dbye bar gsol// chos tshul 'khrugs pa ma mchis de ni
bzung du gsol// skye bo dmus long dun gyur pa de dag la// mgon po khyod kyis chos mig dam ba sbyang du gsol// ma yi zla ba mgonapo khyod ni mgatogs par// lagi
rten dag la skye dang rga pas lo bgyid pa// tshangs ba'i 'jig rten dang lha ya 'jig rtenadang// gnod sbyin dri za ma ya 'jig rten na ma mchis// lha rnams thams cad lhag par spyad pa bgyis
nas ni// bdag ni chos rgyal khyed la gsol ba 'debs pa lags// bsod nams 'di yas bdagakyang rab tu myur bar na// chos kyis 'khor la dam pa rab tu skor gyur cig/ dge slong dag
de bzhin gshegs pas lta dang ma dang lha la yon du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rjes su gzung ba'i phyir thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can la cad ma gsung bas gnang ngo//
de nas tshangs pa chen bo gtsug phud can gyis/ deng zhin gshegs pas cang ma gsung bsaganang bar rig nas// lha'i tsan dan gyi phyi ma dang/ agaru'i phyi mas de bzhinagshegs pa la
mngon gtor nas/ dga' ba dang mchogatu dga' ba skyes te/ de nyid dum snang bar gyur to// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas chos la 'jig rten gus pa bskyed pa dang/ tshangs
ba chen po gtsug phud can yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mad dang yang skul bas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par sbel ba dang/ chos kyad shin tu thob pa'i phyir/ yang gcig pu dben par gshegs
te[7 ]nang du yang dgag zhag nas/thugs la 'di lta bur rnam par rtog par gyur te/ bdag gis chos zab pa/ phra ba gsal ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba/ brtag ma nus pa/ rtogage'i
spyod pa ma yin pa/ mkhas pa dang mdzangs pas rag pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma mthun pa// mthong bar dka' ba/ shud po thams cad bor ba/ 'du byed thams cad nye bar zhi ba/
zhi gnas kyi lam gyis char ba/[7 ]snyed ba nyid dmigs su med pa// sred pa zad ba/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'gog pa// mya ngan las 'das pa bda mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyus te/ gal te bdag gis chos 'di bstan la/ gzhan gyis 'di bod dum chud na de ni bdag la shan tu batho btsams par 'gyur gyis/ bdag snying las chud dus gnas bas gnas par
bya gor ma chag snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshadas ba chen po gtsug phud can gyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rnam par rtog ba de lta bu desems
kyis shes nas// lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di la 'di skad ces smras so// ko shaka shes par gyis shig/ de bzhinagshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos ma ston par thugs las chung du lazugs btud da/'daltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs ba'i
sangs rgyas chos mi ston par thugs las chung ngu la thugs btud pas/ ko'u shi ka kyi ma'o 'jig rten 'di na ma rung par 'gyurano// ko'u sha ka kyi mngo'ajig
[P ]rten 'di ni rnam par ma rung bar 'gyur ro// kyi 'go 'jig rten 'di ni ma rig pa'i mun pa chen por bcug par 'gyur na/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar skul du ci'i phyir ma 'dod/ da ci'i phyir zhen/ ma bskul bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i phyir ro// grogs bo
legs so zhes te/ brgya byin dang/ tshadas bdad/ sa bla'i lha rnams dad/ bar snang ba rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i sa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang Da 'thab bral dang/ dag da
ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dad tshungs ris dang/ 'od gsal dang/ 'bras bu che dad/ dge rgyas dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya
stong rab tu mang po kha dog mngon par 'phags pa dag nam spos ba dang/ lha'i kha dog dang/ lha'i snang bas ngashang spel rgyu'i drung lci tsha snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pag
la bder dong ste phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba byas nasa phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// de nas lha'i dbang pa
brgya byin gyis de ba zhin ga shegs pa ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do// zla ba nya ba gza' las thar
ba ltar// khyod kyi thugs ni rnam par grol ba lags// g.yul las rnam par rgyal po bzhengs su gsol// 'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dabyung gsol// de skad ces gsol pa
dang de bzhin gshegs pa cang ma gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis lha'i dbang pa brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ka'asha ka
ji ltar khyod kyis bskul ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba ni gdab bo// de nas tshangs pa chen bo
gtsug phud can gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga su lagatsugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ de bzhin gsheg
pa la tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba// g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba bzhengs su gsol// 'jig rten mun par shes rab 'od dbyung gsol// kun tu 'atshal bar 'gyur ba mchis
lags kyis/ thub pa khyod kyis chos nil stan du gsol// dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshadas pa chen po gtsug phud can la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/tshadas pa ngas ches zab pa/ phra ba gsal ba 'da mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ da ni bdag la shan tu tho btsums par 'gyur
zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar ra/tshangs pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag nga la rgyun tu snang mod kyi/ nga'i lam rgyan las bzlog par 'gro ba/ thang pa mthong bar dka' ba ran// 'dodochag
kyis ljongs pa dag gis ma mthong ste/ de lta bas na bstan kyang ma phan no// skye dgu 'dod pa rnams la bcangasaM// rgyun gyis rab tu bdas pa lani// ngas 'di tshogs ni chen pos rnyed ka
de lta bas na bstan ma phan// dge slong dag de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can dang lhag ngangang po brgya byin gyis/ de bzhisog shegs pa cang ma gsung bar gyur bar rag nas/ lha'i bu de dag dad
lhan cig tu sdug bsngal zhing yade ma bde nas/ de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// lan gsum bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thugs las chung du la thugs btud do// dge slong dag de'i tshe yul ma
gad+hab ma rnams la sdug ba ma rige blta ba gyur pa 'di lta bu dag phyud bar gyur te// 'di lta ste/ kha cage na 'di skad du rlung ldang bar ma 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// khacag na 'di skad du ma 'bar
bar ma bgyur ro zhes ze do// kha cig ni 'di skadadu char 'bab par ma 'gyurar zhes zer// kha cig ni 'daskad du chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer ro// kha cig na la tog skye bar ma/
'gyur ro zhes 'dzar ro// kha cig nib rnams nam mkha' la 'phur ba'am 'gyurar zhes 'dzir ro// kha cig ni sbrum ba rnams nad med par btsa' bar mi 'gyur ro zhig ga dzar ro// dge slong dag/
de nas tshangs pa chen po gtsug phud can gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kya rnam par rtog pa da lta bu de yang shis/ yul ma ga d+ha'i ma rnams nad kyi stobagyur ba de dag kyang rig nas/ nam
sros pa dang 2 kha dog mngon par 'phags pa dang/ lha'isnang bas shing sgrolargyu'i dud thams cad snang bar byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bder song ste phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gsheg
pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzaranas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba'ang
nas de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pasagasol pa// ma ga d+har ni sngon ches ma dag pa// pra mar bcas par sems pab sla ba byung// de slad thub bas bdud rtsi'i sgo dang gsol
dri medasangs rgyas chos nyid nyan cing mchis// khyodanarang ga dgos mdzad rang dbadagyur/ sdug bsngal mngon bar 'du byed dri ma sbyangs/ khyod kyidag ba 'phel dang 'grabi ma mchis//
khyod 'dir chos mchog pha rol byon par gyur// thub ba khyod 'dra 'jig rten 'dir ma mchis/ drang srong che khyod lhag pa ga la mchis// srid gsum 'di na rnam par lhang nge ste// lha min
gnas na mchis pa'i ri bo 'dra// sdug bsngal skye bo thugs rje che bskyedag sol// khyod badra nam yang btang snyoms mdzad ma rigs// khyod na mi 'jigs stobs/
dang yang dag ldan// khyed ni skye bo rab tu sgrol bar spyod// lha dang dge sbyong bram zer ba nas ba kun// dge dgu 'di dag rang na zug rngu bcas// nad rams ma mchis nad ma mchis gyur cing//
'di ni de dag skyabs na gzhan ma mchis// chos rje rgyal bas thugs su chud gyur te// ji lta bzhin du ma nyud stan 'gyur zhes// dge ba sems kyis bdud rtsi don gnyer zhing// lha dang mi
rnams khyod phyir rang nas 'phur// de slad mthu rtsal bzad pa khyod la gsol// ring nas lam las nyams pa'i sems can thul// ma thos don rnams rab tu thos par 'tshal// shin tu
nyam chung rtas par 'tshal dang 'dra// rab tu skam pa'i sa la sbyin ltakhur// 'dren pa chos kyi char pas tshim par mdzod// rang nas nyams pa'i ma rnams srad pa na// lta ngan thabs so/
tshor mar bcas pargyu// gang bsgoms na ni bdud rtsi thob 'gyur ba// tshe ba ma mchis drang lam de bstanadu gsol// lad bgayang lhung 'dren pa ma mchis pa// 'di na de dag gzhan gyis
drang ma nus// blo ldan khyu mchog khyod ni mis skyed de// g.yang sa chen por lhung ba gdon du gsol// thub ba khyod dang rare nas rtag ma 'jal// u dum wA ra'i me tog brgya lam ltar//
'dren pa rgyal ba dag ni sa la 'byung// mgon po dalaredasems can sgrol du gsol// rang rgal nas nibasgral bar bya 'o zhes// sngon srad khyod kyi dgongs pa 'di 'byung ngo// da ltar khyod na/
pha rol khyon bar nges// bden pa'i mthu rtsal thugs dam dam par mdzod// thub ba chos kyi sgronams mun pa sol// de bzhin gshegs pab rgyal mtshan khyod kyis bsgreng// snyan pa'i
